76b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbang po'i gnas/ bde 'gro/ dga' byed/ lhas na b+ha rtsen/ rol pa'i sa/ steng gi 'jig rten lha yi grong/ lha yi 'jig rten/ sai ri ka/ ta bi Sha dang/ tA bi Sha/ ri rab steng dang/ mkha' gnas so// 30 //
76b6(mdo 'grel): de nas lha dang/ yid bzang dang/ bde 'gro can dang/ 'dod gzugs can/ legs bris/ tshigs mda'/ mi sbyin skyes/ tshigs bzang dang ni tshe ring dang/ /tshogs bzang bcud ldan rmi lam med/ /bi na swan+ta/ gzhal med
76b7(mdo 'grel): can/ lha la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis skabs gsum pa dang/ ri yig skyes/ bsgrub bya/ 'chi med/ bdud rtsi zas/ a mri tand+ha pa mi sbyin bu dang/ a di'i bu/ sum rtsen dbang dang mkha' khyim can/ /bdud rtsi skyes dang mkha' la gnas/ /
77a1(mdo 'grel): sbyin sreg za dang mchod sbyin za/ /mkha' 'gro mkhar gnas gnam la gnas/ /rnams sad dang ni bdud rtsi za/ /na lim+bA dang rgas med dang/ /ge skyes mi 'chi sbyin skyes dgra /mkha' spyod sbyin dgra gzhi gsum gnas
77a2(mdo 'grel): ma? na pa lha las skyes dang lha/ /swA dA b+hu dza mtho ris/ gnas dang na b+ha(mdo 'grel): sa da? mig mi 'dzum/ /pU dzi lA dang ma hi la/ /pu bA na dang ba bu nA/ /pai rthA? lha dang rje ma tu ra btsun zhabs/ /dang po'i/ a ma ra dA nA bI ra/ lha dang rgyal byed ? tyida dang/ /tshangs pa
77a3(mdo 'grel): 'phrog byed rdo rje can/ /nyin da ba ta mo'i 'byung gnas par ma gsum/ /gnyid swa lha las skyes mchod zhes 'dzin zer/ /nyi ma 12 sna tshogs ma tu ta 10 nor lha dang/ ? /dga' ldan dang ni 36 rgyal po che/ /220 grub pa 12 rlung lha ?
77a4(mdo 'grel): 'dol dang/ /? drag po 'di rnams tshogs kyi lha'o/ /chu skyes rig 'dzin mi 'am ci/ /dri za gsang ba pa sha za/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po dang/ /grub pa 'di rnams lha las byung/ /ri zhes bya ba dang mi sbyin ma/ /lha yi
77a5(mdo 'grel): ma'o ? sngon skyes pa/ /zla ba'i spugs gnas mtshon cha bkod/ /bdud rtsi zas dang mtshun gyi ni/ /gzhon nu la sogs de rnams kyang/ /sgyin skyes dang ni mchod sbyin dgra/ sngon gyi lha dang sbyin ma'i bu/ /sbyin skyes dbang po'i
77a6(mdo 'grel): dgra sbyin byung/ /ba sangs slob ma sa 'og gnas/ /bcud mi ldan dang lha la dmod/ /kai ke ya g+ha mi pho zer ba 'dra dang ku tsa dang/ /di te lha ma yin la ming bco lnga skyes dang pra g+ha Sha/ /iSh+Ti yu zhes de rnams so/ 15 /sbyin ma sgyin skyes
77a7(mdo 'grel): ma dang ni/ /sbyin skyes skyad ma di ti'o/ /4 kun mkhyen bde sangs rgyas la mtshan bdun cu rtsa gnyis gshegs ston pa dang/ /gnyis med gsung ba de bzhin gshegs/ /kun tu bzang po rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thub pa sangs rgyas thub
77b1(mdo 'grel): pa che/ /dpal stug thugs rje brjod pa dang/ /bdud 'dul rgyal ba 'jig rten 'dul/ /skyob pa thub dbang bcom ldan 'das mngon shes drug ldan rnam par 'dren/ /byams pa'i stobs mnga' stobs bcu mnga' / /sa bcu'i dbang
77b2(mdo 'grel): phyug rgyal ba dang/ /mchod 'os bcu ba spyan bcu gnyis/ /thams cad gzigs pa stobs chen ldan/ /chags bral skyabs gsum sku gsum pa/ /'og min bzhugs dang chags 'joms dang/ /chos kyi rgyal po mun pa 'joms
77b3(mdo 'grel): mkha' mnyam ba dang mi mnyam pa/ /rtogs ldan yon tan 'byung gnas dang/ /rnam shes ma hA ba la tsam pa mkhyen lnga pa/ /chos sku chos/ tri mu tri dbyings chos 'khor ba/ /shin tu nges pa bde chen pa/ /rtabs chen sems
77b4(mdo 'grel): chen stobs chen pa/ /rgyal ba'i dbang po 'ba' zhig ba/ /rdo rje can dang yang dag sbas/ /dgra bcom pa dang bzod mang ba/ /'jig rten mgon po dus gsum mkhyen/ /pha rol phyin bcu 'chang ba dang/ /nam mkha' mtshungs
77b5(mdo 'grel): dang tog dkang? ma hA ba la bo/ /byang chub sems dpa' legs gsung ba/ /gnyis med pa dang rtsod pa bral/ /sku gsum yon tan 'byung gnas dang/ /dri ma mi mang 'byams chen ldan/ /byang chub pa dang sa bcur sa/ na//

77b7(mdo 'grel): sgyu 'phrul sras/ nyi ma'i rigs 'khrungs nyi ma'i ston pa thub pa la mtshan bcu drug gnyen/ /don thams cad pa dge sbyong che/ 16 'di yi longs spyod rdzogs bstan sras/ /grags 'dzin skyes dang sgra gcan 'dzin?/ /1 gtsug ni lhas
78a1(mdo 'grel): byin sgyu 'phrul ma/ /lha mo sgyu 'phrul lum+bi nI/ /3 bse ru lta bu rang sangs rgyas/ /legs 'dul dang ni cig pur spyod/ /rang byung dang ni bse ru rgyal/ /6 nyan thos slob ma'i ming can no/ /'byams pa rgyal tshab dpal ldan dang
78a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ /'jig rten dbang phyug chu skyes can/ /rang sangs rgyas la mtshan drug /phyag na pad+ma mkha' spyod pa/ /ral pa 'dzin dang brtse ba can/ /'jig rten mgon dang spyan ras gzigs/ /rdo rje nyi byams pa la mtshan bzhi ma brtson 'grus che//
78a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dbang dang pad+mas mtshan/ /spyan ras gzigs la mtshan nyre? gsum bdud rtsi'i char ldan yid bzhin no/ /gzugs mang ha lA ha la dang/ /bde ldan dbang phyug bu mo dgyes/ /'od dpag med pa'i thod can dang/ /za ma tog bkod mnar
78a4(mdo 'grel): med gzigs/ /gru 'dzin ri la dgyes pa dang/ /yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas so/ /23 sgrol ma sgrol ma zhi ba dang/ /sgrol ma dpal chen oM mdzad ma/ /rgyal ma 'jig rten dbang sras mo/ /yang pa can ma sgrol ma che/ /bzang mo mdza'

78a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gzhon nu dang ni gtsug phud ka rI 'dzin// badzra k+ShA lik+Sha badzra k+Sha li 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan ?? pa dang/ /sngon 'jam dbyangs pa mtshan nyre bzhi/ gyi rgyal ba gaN+Dis brgyan/ /byis pa'i brtul zhugs ral gri can/ /ye shes me long blo yi
78b1(mdo 'grel): bdag /zur phud lnga pa ngag dbang phyug /smra ba'i rgyal po shes rab sku/ /utpa la sngo ldan rgyal chen dang/ /seng ge sngon po bzhon pa can/ /brtan pa'i 'khor lo seng ge rtsen/ /24 nor bu bzang po rmugs 'dzin dang/ /sngon gyi gnod sbyin chu'i thub

78b3(mdo 'grel): dpyid dang dpa' bo ri khrod pa/ /zla kyai rdo rje la mtshan dgu pa'i thod can he ru ka /lha dang rdo rje thod pa can/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro nges gnod mdzes/ /11 sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /gsum po bde mchog la mtshan bcu gcig 'di ni dkon

78b7(mdo 'grel): po reg byed 'dzin skyes dang/ /rang byung tshangs pa bdag skyes dang/ /mchog gnas tshangs pa la ming lnga bcu rtsa gnyis lha rgan tshangs pa'i ming gdong bzhi pa/ /pad skyes ma skyes 'byin byed dang/ /'jig rten dbang dang pad+mas mtshan//

79a6(mdo 'grel): ya Na sred med bu/ /me tog 'phred ldan stobs ldan 'joms/ /mkhar ba'i sga dang briShA ka pi(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs sde dang ba con can/ /'dug gnas lha dang nor lha'i bu/ /sba ya mu na sna tshogs 'gengs/ /shas gsal 'dul dang skyes bu
79a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /skyes mchog dga' ba brgya pa dang/ /rtag tu dga' dang dga' byed dang/ lha mo dga' byed gang dga' byed/ /gnas sbyin mchog sbyin lha min dgra /pad+ma'i lte ba sbrang rtsi'i sgra/ /rtag tu sbyor ldan dbyug rtse skyes/ /thig le

80a3(mdo 'grel): po'i lha'o/ /? 'di yi pha ni nor lha ste/ 1 /dundu ra dang/ a na ka /dundu b+hi dang/ b+hu kA'o/ /shing ldan dang ni/ shing rta 'dren/ /? blon po/ rgod dang/ rlung nang can/ /shi ni'i tsha bo bden pa can/ /brag skyes/ yu yu d+hA na'o/ 3 /khyab 'jug

80i6(mdo 'grel): byed/ sgrib bya dang/ /srid phyed pa tu Ta bzhon dang/ /sgra byed dga' ma dga' byed dang/ /yid la nyal dang/ sdom pa'i dgra /chu srin mtshan pa lus skyes dang/ /'khor ba'i bla ma/ kun rtog byung/ /yid la skye ba rnams yin no/ /87 'di yi

81a7(mdo 'grel): ma yi bu/ /lha rgyal 'dul dang/ 'od srungs skyes/ /33 'di yi chung ma u lU ti/ 1 bu ni bzhin bzang zhes par dran/ /1 rgyu skang ('de 'grel med 1 brtags) ji bzhin zhes bya ba/ /rgyal byed ming ldan de'i mtshan mo/ /yud tsam rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/ /gang
81b1(mdo 'grel): la skyes pa 'gro ba 'joms/ /aSh+Ta karma pa ti b+h+raSh+Tonya rdan+to dzi na shtsas:/ zhi ba skyo med gzhu can dang/ /'phrog byed dbyig ldan bde byed dang/ /ri dpang/ ri rmod ral pa bcings/ /bde 'byung u mA'i bdag po dang/ /mdung can tshim byed/ dbang phyug
81b2(mdo 'grel): che/ /gtsug na zla ba thod pa 'dzin/ /mig gsum/ gnas byed/ du byed dang/ /phyugs dbang phyug gi ming brgya nye drug/ bdag dang ni zla ba 'dzin/ /dbang po/ dbang phyug/ dbang ldan dang/ /'byung po'i dbang dang/ tsan dan 'od/ /ri nyal/ thod ldan/ dgra sta'i dum/ /b+ha
81b3(mdo 'grel): ga lI dang rab 'joms? brgyad bas yongs 'joms pos 'os? rgyal ba yang de bdag/ 'chi las rgyal dang stag gos can/ /srid pa 'jigs dang/ mig gsum pa/ /kun mkhyen me yi khu ba dang/ /ral pa'i khur can sngon dmar can/ /dpal mgrin drag shul
81b4(mdo 'grel): bskal bzang 'phreng grong khyer dgra/ /mgul nag nam mkha' i skra can dang/ /gaM gA 'dzin dang/ phran? 'joms dang/ /rgyal byed grong gsum mthar byed dang/ /g.yon gyi lha dang/ lha chen po/ /sna tshogs mig dang ga las g.yo/ /ri yi gzhu skyes/ long
81b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i dgra/ khyu mchog rgyal mtshan/ mchod sbyin 'joms/ ya? dunda? la nam mkha' i skra can/ tA las mtshan/ /zla ba 'dzin dang/ gang mkhan che/ /srid bsrung 'dzin dang skra spas dang/ /'jigs byed 'byung po can b+hang+gya/ /mgrin nag/ mi zad/ thun

81b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin/ /dal 'bab/ nor bu/ u yindA?/ /gzugs mang po dang/ gang? bas bskor/ /pur bu/ /rnam? 'jig mtho ba'i dbang/ /mig gcig/ tshangs 'joms/ 'gro la 'tshe/ /mtshams smra snying byed/ rkang gcig dang/ /steng gi khu ba mi zad mig/

86a3(mdo 'grel): dka' 'brel ni mchog ram ba spubs pany+tsa ka twa gra san+nA li/ /1 sna tshogs spas pa/ yi ge pa/ /1 g.yog ni/ gtum po/ gtum chen dag /2 sin po'i dbang po sgra sgrogs dang/ /laM kA'i bdag dang gdong mang po/ /gdong bcu pa dang/ /mgrin bcu pa/ /dal?
86a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin lto dga' / dga' byed sgra/ /dal 'dzin nga rgyal 'od yangs bu/ 'od las? skyes dang/ gnas bzhi pa/ /nor sbyin gcung po rnams yin no/ /13 dbang po 'dul dang/ sprin gyi sgra/ bden bral phyogs bdag dron la ming bcu 3/ 2 langka'i bdag po'i grong langka/ /1 rtsed mo'i mtsho ni dra ba can
86a5(mdo 'grel): rtse ba'i sa ni 'chi med phrad/ /1 skyed tshal mya ngan med pa'i stobs/ /1 ral gri zla ba dgod pa'o/ /1 'di yi spun zla chung ba dag /bum pa'i rna pa 'jigs byed do/ /2 dmag dpon lag mchog 'phyad ba po/ /2 blon po 'gro byed dang ne tso/ /2 slob ma

90b3(mdo 'grel): sdong 'dzin dang/ kun dzi ta/ dkar po 'od ldan/ tshig brgya'i dbang/ bcu drug 'od ldan mchu las skyes/ /14 spen pa/ rgyal ma'i bu/ kroDa/ /ngal ba 'khyog po/ ngal 'gro dang/ /su ta/ shu ba/ rjes skyes dang/ /nag po/ tshangs skyes/ mi bzad mig
90b4(mdo 'grel): 'od zer bdun pa/ gos sngon can/ /gshin rje'i ba ngan/ nyi ma'i bu/ /15 sgra gcan/ gza' yi rna ba 'dzin/ /mtho ris snang byed/ bra nye skyes/ /seng ge mo'i bu/ mun pa can/ /mgo zlum/ lam nag/ zla ba 'joms/ /nye bar 'phar 'gro/ sprin las ni/
90b5(mdo 'grel): rnam rgyal dang ni/ sha za'o/ /13 du ba mjug ring sprul can dang/ /gtsug phud can dang/ skra gnyis pa/ /skag las skyes dang/ steng 'gro'o/ /6 drang srong ba drun te 'od zer can/ /rgyun shes/ 'od yangs/ yan lag skyes/ /pu la ha yi mchod
90b6(mdo 'grel): spyin dang/ gnas 'jog /sna tshogs/ gtsug phud can/ /khyim rnams 'char ba dus sbyor dang/ khyim gyi sgo ste de dag ni/ /nyin dang mtshan du longs spyod pa/ /lug dang glang sogs shes par bya/ /grib dgu tshigs 'dra'o ma'i lam dang
90b7(mdo 'grel): lha yi lham/ /gza' yi mu khyud nam mkha' i gnas/ /'od gzugs/ nyi ma/ 'od 'byin dang/ /nyin mo'i nor bu/ nyin mo'i 'dren/ /gsal ba'i nor bu/ nam mkha' i nor/ /so sor nyin byed/ nyin mor byed/ /snang byed/ 'od ldan/ ba ru NA/ /'od 'gro/
91a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas byed/ mkha' 'gro dang/ /rnam bsgyur/ snang byed/ pa ti ga /cha ldan/ nges bsreg/ 'od zer ldan/ 'od kyi a sri rgyun dang/ phyogs snang ga pa sti byed/ /sgrol byed/ sU ra/ sU ra ba/ /gdung byed/ tshang byed/ rnam snang byed//
91a2(mdo 'grel): mun sel/ haM sa/ ma ga dang/ 'od stong byed dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ lus skyob/ nyin byed 'dam skyes mtshan/ /nyin mo'i bdag po/ /pad+ma'i bdag/ phyogs bdag/ mchog 'dod/ char 'bebs dang/ mchod ldan bdun gyi bdun pa dang//
91a3(mdo 'grel): gza' yi bdag po/ /snang ba'i bdag/ nyi mo'i bdag po/ 'bar byed dang/ /'dzin byed/ snang ba'i mu khyud dang/ /'dod byed pa dang/ rnams gsal byed/ /sna ldan/ mig gzugs/ rta bdun pa/ /rta ljang can dang/ tsha zer can/ /'od 'gyed/

91a5(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /rgyu ba'i brtul zhugs/ mdza' shes dang/ /sna tshogs shing rta/ /sna tshogs 'od/ /mchod 'os/ 'od kyi nor arka can dang/ /'gro ba'i sgron ma/ bcu gnyis bdag/ pad+ma'i lag pa rtag tu 'char/ /rig byed 'byung dang las

91a7(mdo 'grel): bI tha/ snga dro 'dul ba dang/ /srub byed dang/ rgyas byed/ chu'i chom rkun/ /'jig rten mig dang/ nam mkha' i mig/ 'jig rten dbang bo/ rtag tu 'gro/ srung byed/ dus la dga' ba dang/ /syu na/ gzugs ma/ lha kun spyod/ /nam mkha' i thig le/ mkha' lam
91b1(mdo 'grel): pa/ /nam mkha' i go la'i nor bu dang/ /'od phur/ tarShu nam mkha' i tog/ 'od gtsang ldan dang/ gsal ba ldan/ /phyogs kyi mu khyud phan tshun byed/ /ser skya/ rab gsal/ skems byed dang/ /las kyi dbang po mun pa'i dgra/ lo yi shing rta/ skyong byed dang/ /mun 'joms//
91b2(mdo 'grel): changs pa'i rta rnams so// 130 //nyi ma'i btsun mo rgyal mo'i ming/ /legs 'dar ma dang/ rdul bzang ma/ /'od skyes/ gshin rje/ kA lindi/ nam gru/ ma nu/ sbyin skyed ma/ /skrag byed ma zhes bya ba'o/ /1 nyi ma'i shing rta'i grib ma ni/ /sa skyes ma dang/

93a1(mdo 'grel): byed dag/ gcig tu sbyor ba/ me tog lan/ /gza' yi rab tu byed pa 'o// //mig 'dzums bco brgyad kASh+Tha ste/ /de sum cu la cha zhes bya/ /de sum cu ni skad cig ste/ /de nyid bcu gnyis yud tsam yin
93a2(mdo 'grel): de sum cu yis nyin zhag go/ de dag bco lnga phyogs yin te/ /snga ma phyi ma'i phyogs dag ni/ /dkar dang nag po de gnyis zla/ /mgo sogs zla ba gnyis gnyis dus/ /de dag gsum gyis bgrod pa'o/ /lto byad gnyis su bgrod pa'i

94b6(mdo 'grel): bi tsi kaT+si/ bi tarka/ 10 phyogs snga ma dang/ snga rgol lo/ /2 grub mdza' / gzhung lugs/ rtsod ldan dang/ /byas mdza' / nus pa/ rA d+hAn+ta/ /phyogs phyi ma dang/ yang dag bzung/ /yang dag bzhag pa rnams su 'gyur/ /7 dam bca' so sor mnyan bya dang
94b7(mdo 'grel): khas len/ phyogs bzung/ yang dag 'dzin/ /nges pa mnyan bya/ /bdag gir byas/ /khas len/ /so so'i shes pa dang/ /yang dag thos dang/ mi bzad pa'i/ mang+ga ra dang/ u ra rI/ /a'u ri/ /a'u ra rI yang 'dod/ /15 log par lta dang/ med pa pa/ 2/
95a1(mdo 'grel): gnod sems dang ni 'tshe tha'i sems/ 2 /'tshe ba a ba bA ra'o/ /2 nye bar bzlos dpa' byed pa mtshungs/ 2 /thar pa grol ba zhi ba dang/ /bsil bar gyur dang mya ngan 'das/ /mthar 'gyur legs pa nges 'byung dang/ /ma 'dros
95a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang tshangs pa dang/ /nges par legs dang bdud rtsi dang/ /rab tu tshim dang byang grol dang/ /dga' ba chen dang yang srid med/ 16 /don dam pha rol sun dpung gnyen/ /3 log pa'i blo gros 'khor dang 'khrul/ 3 ma rig mi shes rig min dang//
95a3(mdo 'grel): nga rgyal blo gros rmongs pa'o/ /5 so sor snang min shaSh+yi'o/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /reg bya 'di dag yul rnams te/ /'dod pa'i yon tan dbang po'i don/ /dbang po'i bzung bya'i spyod yul lo/ /'dir ni yon tan mar gyur ba/ /dbang
95a4(mdo 'grel): po yul dang yid byed do/ /las kyi dbang po lag pa dang/ /rkang pa bshad lam nyer gnas dag/ blo yi dbang po yid dang mig/ rna ba sna lce pags pa'o/ /bska ro drug gi mid ba dang ni mchog tu bska'/ mngar ba lany+tsa che ba dang/ /kha ba dang ni
95a5(mdo 'grel): skyur ba ste/ /'di rnams do ni drug rnams so/ /rnam nyed sbyar sbos snying 'bab dri/ 3 /bzhon pa can dang kun mos dang/ /shin tu ring nas 'gugs pa dang/ /brjod bya'i rtags nyid yon tan las/ 2 /'gugs byed ring dang khyab pa mtshungs//
95a6(mdo 'grel): dri bzang dang ni sna tshim byed/ 2 /'dod pa'i dri dang dri zhim mo// /1 kha la bgos pa'i ga pur dri/ /legs 'dul dang ni kha la chags/ 2 /dri nga ba dang rul dri'o/ 2 /mi gtsang ba dang bsur dri'o/ /2 dkar po
95a7(mdo 'grel): dge byed gtsang dang gsal/ /mdog dkar dang ba dkar snum dang/ /skyong ba tshos 'ching gau ra dang/ /stobs byed dag byed ardzu na/ /skya ser ser skya dkar skya'o/ 16 /cung zad skya dang 'ol/ ba'o/ /2 nag po d+hyA ma/ nag shi ti dang/ kha dog gi ming
95b1(mdo 'grel): syA ma mang 'dzin dkar ming dang/ /nag lhad sngon po d+hya ma la/ /kA la sngo bsangs dga' byed de/ /12 ser po ser shang yud ba'i mdog/ a ru ra mdog ser can no/ /5 ljang gu ljang ser bA lA sha'i/ /mdog ste 'di dag ljang gur mtshungs/ 3 /dmar po u?
95b2(mdo 'grel): mang po'i mdog /khrag dog/ ro hi lo hi ta/ ga mi gsal dmar ba skya rangs mdog/ dkar dmar 'dres pA ta la/ /ser nag dang ni nag ser ro/ /'dam ra nag dung kha mchin kha'o/ /1 ser nag ser skya/ skyer kha dang/ /3 ka drug sing+ga sing+ga la/ 3 /sna tshogs 'dres ma
95b3(mdo 'grel): zal bo dang/ /khra bo sA ra shA ri ga/ a ta dang ni sha ba la/ 8 /piny+dzar ni dmar ser ro/ 1 /pa la k+ShA ni dkar sngon te/ /chu shing me tog lta bu'o/ /ardzun ni dkar po dang/ /nag po'i cha tsam ldan pa ste/ /ku mu da ltar dang ba'o/ /si tArdzun rnam rgyas pa'i/ /ston ka'i
95b4(mdo 'grel): sprin dang mtshungs shing gsal/ /pAN+Da dA ni dkar ljang ste/ /mtshan mo'i ri bong can mtshungs pa'i/ /pAN+Da ra ni dmar ser te/ /rdul ldan tho rangs zla ba bzhin/ /pAN+Du ser po'i cha ldan dkar/ /ke ta k+Shi yi rdul dang mtshungs/ /d+hU sa ra ni dkar po la/ /ser
95b5(mdo 'grel): po'i bag dang ldan pa ste/ /utpa la ltar dangs pa'o/ /ma tsa ka ni sngo nag ste/ /zar ma'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'o/ /gau ra kha dog dmar ser ste/ /gi hi gsar pa ltar gsal ba'o/ /hi ra ta ni nag dkar ldan/ /tA la'i 'bras bu ltar gsal ba'o//
95b6(mdo 'grel): ro hi ta dang lo hi ta/ /dza ba'i me tog dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rak+ta thun mtshams ltar gsal ba'o/ /sho Na ban+tUI me tog bzhin/ /ha ri tra ni dkar ngan ser/ /nye ba'i thun mtshams sprin ltar gsal/ /sh+yA ba rang bzhin ser nag ste/ /thun mtshams
95b7(mdo 'grel): sprin dang 'dra bar mdzes/ /d+hU ma la ni nag dmar te/ /du ba dang ni spur me bzhin/ /dkar ser dmar ljang ka DA ra/ /rtswa yi me dang 'dra ba'o/ /ljang gu'i cha yis dman gyur pa/ /de dang ldan pa pad rdul 'dri/ /ka drug gser mdog ltar gsal lo//
96a1(mdo 'grel): kirmIr ni dkar dmar ro/ /kalmA Sha ni dkar nag go/ karbu ra ni dkar sngon no/ /sing+ga na ni dkar nag sta// chu yi rnam pa mtshungs shing gsal/ /ka ba ra ni dud nag ste/ /dud ldan mar me'i 'od mtshungs pa'o/ /bA la dmar sngon dkar ser
96a2(mdo 'grel): te/ /lci ba'i thal ba lta bu'o/ /yon tan dkar po la sogs pho/ /yon tan rtags rnams de bzhin no/ /ro hi NI/ ri hi tA rak+ta/ lo hi Ni dang/ lo hi ta/ /ro hi ti kA lo hi ti kA/ rA gA ko NA zhes pa yang/ /sho NI shi NA si shing+gA/ /sing+gI lA 'dab?
96a3(mdo 'grel): ha ri NI/ /ha ri tA zhes pa yang ngo/ /2 sh+ye NI sh+ya tA si tA yang/ 3 nI lA gos dang ldan pa'i ming/ /nI lI/ srog chags sman dag go/ sh+ye nI/ ku mu da'i 'dab mtshungs/ /ne tso'i mdangs 'dra ha ri NI/ /tshangs ldan b+hA ra tShi skad tshig /dag
96a4(mdo 'grel): dang brjod pa dbyangs can dang/ /tshig dang/ gsung dang/ bA tsa dang/ b+ha Ni ti dang/ ba tsa naM/ /pa tsa tha snyad smra ba dang/ /smras dang/ bAkya/ 'chad dang/ bshad/ /17 saM skri ta ni lha yi skad/ /bai shA tsi ni 'byung po'i skad/ /a pa/ b+h+raM sha/ zur
96a5(mdo 'grel): chag sgra/ /rjod byed bstan bcos sgra la ni/ /ting dang/ sub kyi mdza' can tshig/ bya ba'i ni/ byed ldan pa'o/ /pa ri sA Ta/ gsang tshig ste/ rI ti tshig gi lam yin no/ /rab tu bcings dang/ sbyar ba dang/ yang dag spel dang/ rgyus pa dang//
96a6(mdo 'grel): sdud sbyor 'di rnams sbyar ba ste/ /sgra yi mal ni gumpa ne'o/ /thos dang rig byed man ngag dang/ /sdeb sbyor dang ni/ /ba ton lung/ /rgyud dang/ yal ga/ des 'gro'o/ /7 snyan tshig/ a'uk+Sh+raM?/ dbyangs 'drebs dang/ /der ni u pa ni Sha ta rnams//
96a7(mdo 'grel): rig byed dag ni gsang ba'i'o/ /chos dang nges par 'gro ba yang/ /chos dang thos dang sgrub ba gsum/ /nges brjod dang ni snyan tshig dang/ mchod sbyin 'di gsum? rig byed gsum/ /bslab dang brda spyod sdeb sbyor dang/ /de bzhin skar rtsis thos
96b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /rtog pa dang ni yan lag go/ dran pa dang ni chos dang bcas/ /2 oM zhes bya ba rab bsngags dang/ tshangs pa yi ni 'gyur med sngags/ /3 u dAt+ta dang/ swa ri ta/ a nu dAt+ta dbyangs gsum mo/ /de lta bu byung sngon gyi tshul//
96b2(mdo 'grel): 2 sngon rabs mtshan nyid lnga yin te/ /rjes tshol ba dang/ lugs kyi rgyud/ /rtog ge/ sa bdag bstan bcos dang/ /kun nang nye bar dmigs don no/ /bstan bcos rgyud dang/ thos pa mtshungs/ /'bel ba'i gtam dang/ phan tshun 'gro/ rab sbyor tshig
96b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ gtam yin no/ /2 gab tshig dang ni/ /brda' yis ston/ /dri ba'i pho nya/ shes dka' 'o/ /4 tshig bsdus pa dang bsdus pa'i don/ /2 bsdus dang/ legs par bsdus pa'o/ /2 khyim pa'i gtam dang/ skye bo'i brjod/ /lag pa'i glu dang/ smra
96b4(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ 4 /rab tu brjod dang/ ci zhes smra/ /rjod par byed dang/ skye bos thos/ /4 sgeg ldan skad dang/ nyams ldan no/ /2 gtam m+brjod pa dang/ de bzhin glu/ lo rgyus dang ni kha skad do/ /3 ming dang/ 'bod phyogs/ mtshan nyid dang/ mtshon pa/ rigs
96b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ kun gsal dang/ kun gsal nA ma d+he ya dang/ /bya ba de sha tshig bla dags/ /brda' dang/ 'phral sbyar/ byas pa dang/ /kun tu 'bod dang/ mngon brjod do/ /2 la gsal dang/ grags dang/ rab tu grub/ 3 nye bar mjal dang/ dper brjod do//
96b6(mdo 'grel): 2 nye bar dgod dang/ smra ba'i sgo/ 2 /'di dang/ rjes sbyor/ shes 'dod dang/ /gtam dang/ sgrogs dang/ rjes sbyor byed/ 5 /slar smra ba dang/ lan ldon mtshungs/ /2 log par mngon sbyor ngan brjod dang/ log smra/ sun 'byin mngon sum spyod/ /spyod dang/ khros
96b7(mdo 'grel): tshig/ rnams khros tshig/ 8 rnam par smra dang/ tha snyad dang/ /mna' dang/ khro bor/ shA pa'o/ /3 legs smra dang ni/ rjes chags skye /2 yang dag mkhyen ldan snyan grags dang/ /tshigs bcad dang ni grags pa'o/ /4 bstod pa nu ti/ stu ti dang/
97a1(mdo 'grel): na ba/ sta ba/ sta traM dang/ /bsngags pa dang ni/ rnam par brjod/ /8 smra dang rab tu bsngags pa dang/ /mtho bar grags dang/ dbyangs su byed/ /4 skyor tshig dang ni gnyis gsum brjod/ /2 mya ngan 'jigs dang rtse sogs las/ /cod skad dang ni/
97a2(mdo 'grel): yi ge bral/ /2 skal ba mchog dang/ yon tan lhag/ 2 'gran par byed dang/ yang dag dga' / /2 smad pa/ nye bar spyod pa dang/ /ngan ga garg+hA garg+hA NaM/ mi bsngags/ dor bya nges smod dang/ /yongs smed dang ni skur 'debs dang/ bi taM ba dang/ ngan bya ba/ /smod dang/
97a3(mdo 'grel): smod par byed pa dang/ rtsog pa ni/ g+h+ri NA'o/ 16 /de la g.yo ba gang yin pa/ 'khrig pa'i phyir du phan tshun smod/ /mngon par smra dang/ tshig rtsub po/ /2 spyi tshig/ gnod tshig/ sdigs tshig go/ 3 smod pa dang bcas nyer dmigs pa/ /sa ri b+hA Sha Na zhes
97a4(mdo 'grel): so/ /u pA lam+b+ha/ rjes su sbyor/ 'gron gnyer 'bod dang/ 'gugs dang bod/ /3 yang dag 'bod pa mang pos bos/ /tshogs pa'i sgra ni/ sAM rA bi Ni/ sgra chen ko lA haM la'o/ /rjes su smra dang/ yang yang smra/ smyo tshig dang ni/ don med tshig/ 'gal ba
97a5(mdo 'grel): brjod dang/ 'gog tshig go/ mya ngan tshig dang/ smre sngags 'don/ /khams bde dang ni/ 'dri rmed do/ /shin tu smra dang legs par brjod/ gsang tshig dang ni/ /gsang ba'i gtam/ a sa h+na ba/ a pa d+hma ma/ /a pa dz+nyA na/ a pa hA ya/ /phal cher bsdus  
97a6(mdo 'grel): nas kun bshad pa/ rkang pa las skyes rgyun chags yin/ /mtho bar brjod dang/ nges bcings so/ /2 tu mu la ni 'khrugs pa'i sgra/ /1 tshig gis skyas dang/ tshig phreng dang/ /bstan pa dang ni yang dag smra/ /4 tshig gi dbye ba phyi ma gsum//
97a7(mdo 'grel): ngan smra dang ni/ ngan brjod mtshungs/ /2 sdig pa'i tshig dang/ mi dge ldan/ /26 dge ba/ dge ba'i bdag nyid can/ snyan dang/ shin tu zhi ba dang/ legs par smra dang snying la 'bab/ /4 tshig rtsub dang ni/ gya rtsom dang/ /2 grong pa dang ni/ tshul
97b1(mdo 'grel): min pa/ /2 myur bar brjod dang/ stabs te brjod/ /2 grastaM/ ngag tshig yi ge phyis/ /1 mi mngon pa dang/ mi gsal ba/ 2 kla klor gyur pa skad nyams pa/ /1 kun tu 'khrugs dang/ nyon mongs gyur/ /phan tshun 'joms par byed pa'i tshig/ 2 don med pa
97b2(mdo 'grel): dang 'brel med pa/ /2 yi ge bral dang brjod bya med/ /2 chu 'thor gtam dang/ mchil gtam mo/ /zegs mthor gtam dang 2 brjod dang/ /don stong tshig dang brdzun gtam dang/ de nas bden dang dga' ba dang/ phyin ci ma log mi bslu ba'o// 4
97b3(mdo 'grel): bden sogs bden par smra ba dang/ /bden pa de bzhin mi bslu ba/ /yang dag 'di rnams gsum de ni// //sgra dang nges sgrogs grag pa dang/ /lhang tsher/ ni swA na/ ni stwa na/ /di da 'ur/ /nges smra/ nges sgrogs dang/ /sgrogs pa ca co ku co dang// 
97b4(mdo 'grel): byangs dang/ grags dang/ skad 'don dang/ /hA sa/ rA ba bar smos/ ku ha ri taM/ brjod pa dang/ /mngon par brjod dang rjod byed sgra/ /mgrin skyes/ mngon brjod/ nyams ldan yang/ 26 /gaM gA'i sgra ni manman/ /ca co ko lA ha la'o/ /shwarb+ha Ti dang/ tsarba rI/
97b5(mdo 'grel): 2 sgra ldan dang ni brag cha'o/ /2 pA si taM ni/ dud 'gro'i sgra/ /gzhu yi sgra ni/ bi sphA ra/ /rnga chen sgra ni Tu Tu ra/ /gos dang la ma'i ma rmar/ /rgyan gyi sgra ni pany+dzi taM/ /pi wang sgra/ ni kwA Na/ /mi gsal kwo Na/ kwo Na sgrogs/ /khog pa'i ka la ka la'o/ /phug ron dang ni
97b6(mdo 'grel): dbyangs sbed do/ /glu dang glu dbyangs 'di dag mtshungs/ /pi wang sgrogs pa la sogs la/ /pra kwa Na dang pra kwa Na/ /ka Na kwA Na/ saM kwaNA// saM ku Na dang/ sU ku Na/ /a nu kwa Na la sogs so// //
97b7(mdo 'grel): ra 'khor nyan khyu mchog dri 'dzin dang/ /drug skyes par ma blo gsal dang/ /lnga pa zhes pa 'di rnams bdun/ /rgyud dang mgrin las skyes pa'i dbyangs/ /'khor nyen glang ba'i sgra lta bu/ /blo gsal rta yi skad lta bu/ /dri 'dzin ra yi skad
98a1(mdo 'grel): ltar 'tsher/ /drug skyes zla ba can sgra bzhin/ /khyu mchog ba lang sgra lta bu/ /bar ma khrung? khrung sgrogs pa bzhin lnga pa me tog dus ldan 1/ /rma bya sgrogs pa lta bu'o/ /'di rnams thams cad myos pa yis/ /sgrogs byed
98a2(mdo 'grel): de yang lnga pa'o/ /kA ka li ni phra ba'i sgra/ /mi gsal snyan pa ka la'o/ /zab mo'i sgra ni sngags yin no/ /shin tu mtho ba tA ra'o/ /cha lang pheg rdo ba sa mand+hi/ /pi wang dang ni bar+Na ki/ rnam par spyod dang/ dbyangs ldan no/ /4 pi wang rgyud ni lA su
98a3(mdo 'grel): ki/ rgyud rnams lha yi grangs rnams kyis/ /pi wang nyid ni yongs su bsgrags/ /pi wang srad bu ma ru kaM/ pi wang bu ga nA li kA/ pi wang khog pa pra pA la/ pra pe ka/ rtse'i shing 'khyog/ ko lam+ba ni lus yin no/ /thag pa'i gnas
98a4(mdo 'grel): dang 'ching ba'o/ /'dab ma'i rgyud rnams de yi dbus/ /pi wang la sogs rol mo yi/ /skad thabs g+hu g+hu ri kA'o/ /pi wang la sogs rgyud kyi sgra/ /rnga la sogs pa sbubs kyi sgra/ gling bu la sogs bu ga'i sgra/ /sil snyan sgra ni cha lang sogs/
98a5(mdo 'grel): rol mo rnam pa bzhi po 'di/ /bA ti/ tra mA ta zhes bya/ /sil snyan dang ni sil khrol lo/ /mA hA ti dang/ a mA na/ pa Ta ha la sogs pa'o/ /mahA na dang/ marda ka/ rda zlum/ rdza rda a na ka/ a ru ra 'dra'i rda angkya/ /nas kyi dbus 'dra udzha ka/ a
98a6(mdo 'grel): lang+gyi ni ba lang gi/ mjug ma'i dbyibs 'dra 'di dag gi/ ba rma mu ra dza yin no/ /'khar rnga/ dzhang+gi pa dag mtshungs/ /Dhak+ka/ cha lang marda la/ 2 /kA ha la dang/ sgra chen dang/ kA ha'i sgra dang/ sbubs can dang/ /gtum po'i ku co zhes pa rnams/ /5 siny+dza
98a7(mdo 'grel): la dang/ kA ha la/ 2 de nas Dhak+ka/ guny+dza dang/ /Dhak+ka rnams rgyal marda la/ /rgyang grags sgra can/ /rgyang grags kyi/ /cha lang/ snyan pa'i paTa ha/ /go byed pa Ta ha dang ni/ /lam+bA pa Ta ha med can/ /A na ka dang/ pa Ta ha/ /guny+dza pa Ta hi kA ya/ /4 a na ka dang/
98b1(mdo 'grel): mri daM ka/ 2 'jigs byed rnga dang rnga po che/ /2 rol mo'i rab dbye 'di rnams te/ /ma ha na dang/ Da ma ru/ mu Dhu/ Di N+Di ma/ rdza rnga/ glu rnga/ 'khar rnga/ ka ra Du/ /na ba/ rang+gi teng+ga ri/ g.yul du sil snyan sgra dang ni/ /rnga chung gnyis ka DiN+Di ma/ /g.yul 'thab nyin mo'i
98b2(mdo 'grel): sil snyan no/ /mi bdag rnams kyis bza' ba'i mthar/ /bza' ba'i sil snyan gang yin de/ /'jig byed zas kyi sil snyan te/ /rlabs kyi 'gros can yin zhes bya/ /byis pa'i sil snyan gang yin de/ /rab dga' i marda la zhes so/ /'tshe ba byung ba'i go
98b3(mdo 'grel): byed pa'i/ /sil snyan gaN+Da'i sil snyan brjod/ /thig pa'i sil snyan dag dang ni/ /shing rta glang po gnyis ka yi/ /DiN+Di kA dang/ ud+ga? ra/ /grong khyer dbyangs dang/ 'khor ba'i rlabs/ /mi bzad pa'i sgra rnams so/ /chu tshod bum shar byug gu'i rnga/ /mel tsho?
98b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa/ mel tshig?/ thun gyi dbyangs dang/ thun gyi skad/ /dus kyi sil snyan du yang bshad/ 7 /zangs ma'i dbyug gu/ chu tshod dbyug/ bu ga'i tshad dang/ dus 'dzin pa'o/ /4 de nas sbubs can bum pa dang/ /thun gyi tho ba/ dbyug gu'o?/ /4 de sgra thun gyi dbyangs
98b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ thun gyi tri ga ra zhes kyang/ /2 shing byed yi dags rnga dang ni/ /shi ba'i ud+ga? ra yang ngo/ /3 glang po myos pa'i tang+ga rI/ /myos pa'i tri ga ra zhes brjod/ /na kAta tri ga ri kA ni/ /dbul po'i pa Ta ha ru 'dod do/ /khyu mchog dga' ston sil
98b6(mdo 'grel): snyan gang/ ba lang rnga yi ming can no/ /bum ston 'khar ba'i sil snyan ni/ 'khar ba'i cha lang zhes par 'gyur/ /ku Tu guny+dza/ shing rta'i sgra/ /lus ldan pa Ta ha yang nga'o?/ /kha yi sil snyan/ kha'i cha lang/ /2 ga lwa sil snyan sgra chen po/ /ka ra rdi
98b7(mdo 'grel): dag ngag? rdeb po/ /2 k+Shurdza naM ni/ mig gsal sgra/ /tsa Tu/ ba Tu/ spya ba'o/ /gtam pa dang ni/ gar 1 pa/ 2 re mos smra dang/ rab myos pa/ /rig byed/ sil snyan/ gA ta ri/ glu len pa dang/ glu mkhan ni/ 2 /gar ba dang ni/ /rol rtsed pa/ 1 /dal dang/ myur dang
99a1(mdo 'grel): bar ma la/ /ta stwaM/ e g+ho/ g+ha naM rim/ /cha lang myur rdeg dus ma ni/ /la yaM zhes sogs bya dus tshang/ /lag pa/ rkang pa/ dag dang ni/ mig gis so sor blta ba dang/ /'dren par blta sogs bya ba'i tshad/ /3 la bya ba gang gzhan de//
99a2(mdo 'grel): phan tshun/ la ya(mdo 'grel): la ya(mdo 'grel): dang/ sA mya zhes pa de 'dod do/ /tA N+Da baM/ na Ta ni/ nA Ta byaM/ /lA syaM/ rang+ga?/ na rta ni/ nri traM zhes pa rnams su 'gyur/ /bud med rnams kyi zlum po'i gar/ ha l+li sa kaM zhes par 'gyur/ /rnga gsum gang dang glu dang ni/ /rol
99a3(mdo 'grel): mo gar bya 'di ni gsum/ /de nas b+ha kum bA dang ni/ /b+h+ru kum pa dang/ b+h+ru kum bA/ b+h+ri ku sa ni 'dra ba ste/ /'di dag skyes pas bud med kyi/ cha byad bzung ba la brjod do/ zlos gar la bshad rgyal mtshan ni/ /gzhon nu/ jo bo'i khyi'u 'o//
99a4(mdo 'grel): 2 rgyal po rje btsun dang ni lha/ /bu mo rje bo'i khyi'u mo/ /lha mo gang la dbang bskur ba/ /gzhan rnams la ni rje btsun ma/ /skyed byed pha ni/ A bu ka/ b+hA ba mkhas pa'o mA ra Sha/ /'phags pa/ am+bA/ skyed ma'o/ /sring mo che ba an+ti kA/ sring
99a5(mdo 'grel): mo'i dag po A barti/ /rA dza swA la/ /yul 'khor ro/ /tshogs can ma ni A rdzu kA/ byis pa bA su zhes bya'o/ /haN+Da/ hany+dze/ ha las 'bod/ /dman pa/ g.yog mo/ grogs mo'o/ /'phags pa'i bu zhes bod bya ba/ /bu mo rnams kyi lang
99a6(mdo 'grel): tsho'i bdag/ gzhan du yang ni 'phags pa mchog/ rgyal po che dang mi bdag go/ a prahma N+ya bsad bya min/ /niSh+Tha zin pa yin te mtshungs/ /lus nyams lnga pa zin pa'o/ /ang+ga? hA ra/ yan lag bskyod/ /gsal byed dang ni/ tshul dag
99a7(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /gsal byed la sogs gar la ni/ /snga ma'i yan lag la gnas dbye ba/ /gar gyi gnas dang zlos ger gnas/ /2 sgeg dang/ dpa' dang/ snying rje dang/ /rmad byung rgod dang 'jigs su rung/ /mi sdug drag shul mnyes gshin pa/
99b1(mdo 'grel): zhi ba zhes bya nyams bcu'o/ /sgeg ba/ nyams ldan/ gtsang dang/ 'bar/ gsal ba can zhes pa yang ngo/ /4 sgeg pa'i dbye ba longs spyod rdzogs/ /pa prA lam+b+ha/ ting nge 'dzin/ /spra pa 'phel ba dpa' ba yin/ /snying rje/ thugs rje/ brtse ba dang/ kri pA/ da yA
99b2(mdo 'grel): rjes su brtsa/ /rjes su chags dang/ shu ka'o/ ngo mtshar/ 'phags dang/ rmad byung/ mtshar/ 4 hA sa yaM ha sa/ hA sa'o/ /3 tsa markA ra/ 'dul byed dang/ /'dul du 'jug pa zhes pa yang/ /3 mi bzad/ 'jigs byed/ dngangs byed/ 'jigs/ /drag po
99b3(mdo 'grel): 'jigs rung/ 'jigs bar byed/ /so sor 'jigs dang/ b+hA mu rA/ /b+hI la/ b+hai ra ba/ b+ha yA ba ha/ /12 drag po drag shul/ zhes pa dang/ /mi sdug pa dang/ pi barsha/ /dngangs skrag/ nya mang/ bag tsha dang/ /pham par byas dang 'jigs pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam
99b4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur dga' ba dang/ /zhum dang khro sogs kyis bskyed pa/ /nyams su myong dang rnam 'gyur rtogs/ /de yang nyams myong longs spyod rdzogs/ /thob pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ /der ni mig bzhi las byung ba/ /smin ma 'degs dang 'dzum rnams
99b5(mdo 'grel): 'khor/ /bkra bar nyams myong dag la sogs/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid 'dod/ /mngon 'dod de bzhin bsam pa dang/ /rjes su dran pa'i tshogs su 'dod/ /de bzhin skyo dang rnam par smra/ /smyo ba dang ni nang nyid dang/ /dza b+ha/ 'dul byed
99b6(mdo 'grel): kyang zhes pa/ /thob pa'i bdag nyid bcu yin no/ /rgod pa dga' bar byed pa ste/ /de bzhin gnyi ga spro pa'o/ /sped dang ngo mtshar zhes bya ba/ /dngos po bzhag par rab tu bsgrags/ /dbang du byed ba rnam shes kyis/ /dngos po'i lam la skyes pa'i
99b7(mdo 'grel): las/ yid kyi mdud pa dar sems te/ /nga rgyal sems ni mtho ba'o/ /snyems dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang/ /dar 'dzin/ rgyags dang/ dregs/ mngon zhe na/ 6 bgyings pa dang ni yang dag shugs/ /kun rtsom/ kun 'bebs/ yang dag?
100a1(mdo 'grel): bskor/ rang? dbang 'jug dang/ kun nas ldang/ /2 mngon par ldang dang/ zhe sar byed/ /gus byed/ gus par nyan ba dang/ yongs su spyod dang/ mchog tu byed/ /sten byed/ rab bsten dang pa dang/ /nye bar byed dang/ nye bar gnas/ kun
100a2(mdo 'grel): tu bsten dang/ mnyen byed dang/ /nye bar spyod dang/ u pa sA naM/ 13 /ma gus/ yongs smod/ zil gnon dang/ /ring byed/ mi rtsi ni kA ra/ brnyas dang/ kun brnyas/ zhum byed dang/ gus med/ brnyas byed smos pa dang/ /ba ba na dang a ba li/ a b+hi
100a3(mdo 'grel): b+ha bA zhes rnams so/ /12 zhum byed/ ngo tsha mdzem/ mig dma'/ /hI/ na ti bi sha/ khrel yod/ 2 /bzod pa/ k+Sha ma/ ti tik+Sha/ sa hiSh+Shu tA zhes rnams so/ /gsod dang/ rnam par 'tshe ba'o/ /2 mi bzod pa dang/ phrag dog go/ yon tan la ni skyon sro?
100a4(mdo 'grel): 'dogs/ a sU ya zhes bya ba'o/ /rab skyon 'gebs dang 'chab? ba'o/ /2 do Sha dang ni/ A dI na/ 2 le lo/ rmugs pa/ snyoms las so/ /3 yang la gcags dang/ rjes su gcags/ /phyi nas gdung dang/ rjes su gdung/ /bgrod pa'o/ /ba rnam sems

104a5(mdo 'grel): 'dra ba rgyal po'i mgrin/ /rgyags chen zhes pa rnams yin no/ /3 rtaM dang ni/ shing tsher can/ 2 /'od can/ 'od ma'i 'dab ma can/ /2 stobs ldan dang ni zlum po'i nya/ /dro ba'i nya dang/ logs rgyas dang/ dkar po'i gzings zhes bya ba'o 3//
104a6(mdo 'grel): zla nya ba dang g.yo byed dag 2 /bong bu bde byed/ shing steng skyong/ /bong bu'i mig dang/ //gyen 'byung nya/ /gtor byed chen po zhes pa rnams/ 5 /tshangs ma 'dam gyi ga DI dag 2/ /dbyug pa'i nga rgyal phye dmar byed/ 2 /gaN+Das
104a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro dang/ so gal rlung/ glo ba'i sgra can/ /rlung bug can/ /gos ngan dang ni/ sha za'o/ 6 /mkha' la nyal dang/ mkha' nyal spyod/ 2 kaM ka skyob dang/ chus gzir bas skyes/ dbang 'dzin/ nya 'bu dang/ /mig lnga pa dang/ skra skyed do/ 5 /sgo nga'i nya
104b1(mdo 'grel): bran tshogs pa la/ /gru skyed dang ni/ chu'i sgong can/ /'khor lo spyod dang/ gru 'dzin dang/ /ma nu'i sprul dang/ skums pa can/ /2 u lU pI dang/ byis can mtshungs/ 8 'od brtsegs dang ni/ /ga hwar dang/ dmar por za dang/ sha ku ma/ dga' ba 'khyil

104b3(mdo 'grel): tshim dang nya 'debs dang/ de dbye chu srin ka ri'o/ /chu srin dkar dang/ phyogs 'dzin dang/ /'dzin khri lus kyi rgyud can dang/ /chu yi srin rings/ na kra'i rgyal/ /chu sgong can dang/ chu'i bu za/ /ran kra chu yi zas can dang/ /bA tuN+Da dang/ kum+b+hA

104b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin chu yi/ sri me'o/ 6 /byis pa gsod dang/ /byis pa can/ /ral gri'i mjug ldan pa la'ang+ga/ chu yi rus sbal/ chu'i spre'u/ /dpyid skad cig dbugs dang/ bdag po can/ /ba shA g+ha zhes pa rnams so/ /7 rus sbal yan lag lnga pa dang/

105a1(mdo 'grel): byed/ b+he ka dang/ rma yi gnas dang/ char skyes dang/ /be ka /dga' byed/ shA lu ra/ /'phar bar byed dang 'phar ba dang/ lce med dang ni/ bshad ba sbas/ /13 /chu srin/ /chung ngu/ ma k+Shi kA/ chu'i bu chu yi ma k+Shi kA/ 4 /'gron bu/ ba Ta/
105a2(mdo 'grel): hi ra N+ya/ hi ra Na dang/ rin thang kun/ /za ma tog can/ rus pa'i zod/ tshe lo'i sa bon/ zhes pa rnams/ /dung gi khyu dang dung can ma/ 2 /dung phran dung gi sren mo'o/ /2 /dung dang kam+bu ra/ chu skye/ /chu yi ka raM ka dang ni/ /khab kyi/ ba zhes bya ba'o/ 5/
105a3(mdo 'grel): mu tig skyes dang 'gas byed dang/ be shI'i mdzed dang nya phyis dang/ /sa TA lu ka zhes pa'o/ /5 ur zhes bya dang mdzod ring mo/ 5 /pu Ta Ti ka /'dam nya phyis/ /4 chu yi nya phyis/ 'bu lkogs dang/ spur ba'i bu dang/ sham+bu ka /dza la Dimpa/

105b7(mdo 'grel): bzang can/ 1 /thun mtshams ltar dmar ha lU kaM/ dug gi lte ba pad rtsa can/ 4 /sdong bu can ma ni la nI/ /rgyas ldan ma dang pad+ma can/ /pu Ta ki nI zhes pa'o/ ? ku mu da yi nags tshal ni/ /ku mu di nI 'o gzhan mdza' yas/ /kundi na laM
106a1(mdo 'grel): nI la sogs/ /sdong bu nA lU nA laMO/ /pad+ma'i rtsa ba tan+tu laM/ bi si dang ni bi ShaN+DaM/ /pad sogs tshal ni/ ka dam+ba/ ka ra hA Ta/ shi kA/ kanda/ 3 /ze 'bru dang ni ge sar ro/ /2 /lte ba dang ni/ sa bon mdzod/ /gdugs kyi sa bon sak+Sho

108a7(mdo 'grel): grong las ni/ /gyes pa grong khyer nye ba'i grong/ /de la rgyun 'bab/ grong chung dang/ urba saM su ram zhes so/ 3 /'phrog byed zla grong bzang po'i grong/ /dri za'i grong khyer zhes pa'o/ 3 /'dul gnas/ chos kyi phur bu'o/ /2 mutga tI dang/ dmangs

108b4(mdo 'grel): gzhi ma/ /rab tu dga' dang/ dga' byed do/ /gri ha/ gri haM/ be sha dang/ be shmra dang ni gnas pa yin/ /ga haM kun dga' i gnas dang ni/ /gnas khang/ phibs 'og 'dun gnas dang/ /mtshan mo'i nang gnas sgrib g.yog dang/ /khyim dang bya ba'i
108b5(mdo 'grel): gnas kyang ngo/ /des gnas/ gnas dang/ kun ta gnas/ /skyab 'og dang ni/ khang khyim dang/ khang chung/ spyil po/ bdun sa dang/ laM lA/ ka k+Sh+ya/ 'jug gnas so/ /2? /ra ba bzhi pa/ kun 'jug go /2 /kun gnas khyim dang/ bshes gnyen
108b6(mdo 'grel): can/ 2 khang bzangs ra bas yongs bskor dang/ zla ba'i rwa ba/ spyi bo'i khyim/ khang brtsegs dang ni/ ba Da b+hI/ ? /da d+hE TA dang/ nges byas khyim/ thub rnams lo ma'i spyil po dang/ /mchod spyil po zhes bya ba'o/ /bzo ra dang ni kun 'jug
108b7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ 2 /rta yi ra ba/ rta yi khang/ /2 'dab chags ra ba/ bya ldan no/ 2 /chu khang/ btung ba'i ra ba'o/ /rgya mtsho'i khyim dang rlung yod can/ /chu yi 'khrul 'khor gnas yin no/ /ba si ta pa yi las dang/ /a ba sa nI/ spra yi khyim/ /til mar?
109a1(mdo 'grel): ra ba 'khrul 'khor khyim/ /dud khab a land+hu gA'o/ /btson ra dang ni 'ching ba'i khyim/ /gsod pa'i myu gu bya ba'i sbyor/ /dka' tshegs gnas dang byed pa can/ 6 chang ma'i khyim dang gany+dza'o/ /grwa pa'i khang pa la sogs la//
109a2(mdo 'grel): gan+t+rI dang ni/ ma Tha 'a/ /so so'i gnas ni da'i ra pa/ /thub pa rnams kyi gnas dang rten/ grags pa'i phung po lha yi gnas/ mchod rten dang ni/ /mchod sbyin gnas/ 4 /snying po'i khang pa/ kun spyod do/ /mdun khang dang ni skye bo'i gnas/ /sa gzhi
109a3(mdo 'grel): dkor mdzes mdun khang mchog /snying po'i khang pa/ gnas khab dang/ /longs spyod gnas su de brjod do/ /mtshan dang mtshan gyi bar dang ni/ mdzod rab/ dang ni mdun khang ngo// 3 /bang mdzod dang ni mdzod yin no/ /a riSh+Tas ni bu btsas khyim
109a4(mdo 'grel): rtsa spyil dang ni/ /lus chad can/ 1 /rna ba'i rgyud dang/ many+tsa ka:/ 2 /rtsa yi khang bzangs ma ka Ta/ /mun khang/ 1 many+tsa/ ku traM sha/ bsil khang la sogs nar ldan gnas/ /khang bzangs lha dang sa bdag khyim/ /gtsang gnas dang ni rgyal po'i

109a6(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i pho brang gi/ khyad par gzhan yang sbyin sogs 'gyur/ /btsun mo'i khang pa sa spyod ma'i/ /nang dang pho brang srungs ma can/ /dag pa'i mdza' can kun nas 'gegs/ 4 /yang tog dang ni/ khang bzang ste/ /pa? phubs dang ni/ dgra khang ngo/ /dbang
109a7(mdo 'grel): po'i sgra dang/ aM ga ka/ manda ni nI ba lang ra/ /glang po mchog gi ra ba la/ ku traM ga dang/ urg+ha Ta/ /si Tha rA zhes bya ba'o/ /sat+mI/ ka n+yA Ta ni(mdo 'grel): ku TI/ /grong rnams par gyi lam po che/ /rAts+tsha zhes sad tshong khang dang/ /zong gis gnas khyad de nyid
109b1(mdo 'grel): do/ /lcags chung tsa ya/ ba praM 'o/ 2 /lcags ri skyabs dang/ /bgrod dka' dang/ mda' yi ra ba 'di'i rtsa chings/ /nga ba/ 'bos rings/ /mdza' mu khyud/ /gtam gyi lam zhes bya'o/ 6 khor? yug /skor ba grong sogs mdza' / /'od ma spa sogs las byas
109b2(mdo 'grel): dkris/ /skyobs dang/ mdza' bskor/ /brtsigs pa brtsegs/ /e Du kaM zhes bya ba'o/ /de nang rus pa so btsugs pa/ rtsig pa b+hit+ti/ ku Tya'o/ /lus can khyim dang kun 'dzin no/ /sgo drung/ sgo 'dun/ sga rtsa ni/ phyi rol sgo yi 'khyams yin no/ /srang
109b3(mdo 'grel): lam dang ni khyim gyi 'gram/ 5 /g.yogs dang/ khebs dang/ bkab tsA la/ 4 ku TI la dang/ nI gra dang/ bkab dang/ /rab mdza' phreng ba can/ /tA ke/ gral bcu/ rab rings dang/ /sprin ldan/ a ba hA li kA/ 7 sgo glegs/ ka pa/ ka pA Ta/ /a ra ra dang?

110a7(mdo 'grel): 'gro'i gdan zhes bya ba'o/ /'phigs byed dang ni/ /me ka la/ /chu po/ na rma dA 'bab pa'o/ /? tal 'bab ri dang/ dbang po'i phur/ 2 /ri bo khrung khrung/ kauny+tsa dang/ /phreng ba can zhes bya ba'o/ /3 bde ldan/ ming pa/ rab 'bab ri/ /2? ri bo rtse?
110b1(mdo 'grel): gsum/ ngos gsum pa/ /'jig rten snang dang/ 'khor yug ri/ 2 /ma la ya dang tsandan ri/ ri bo A ShA d+ha zhes so/ /2 de nas ni Sha d+ha dang ni/ /da rda ra dang yongs 'du can/ /spos ngad ldan dang gzhan yang ni/ /sna tshogs brtsags pa la sogs ri/ gangs ri

110b7(mdo 'grel): 'byung khungs sa/ ri btsan ni 'og sa gzhi dang/ /ri steng dang ni sa gzhi mtho/ /lto ba brtol dang brag brtal ba/ shwa dang ri yi bud ces bya/ nags tshal dang ni/ /sman ljongs dang/ /'gram shing sogs kyi lto ba bkag/ zhes pa yi sde rdzogs so// //

111a2(mdo 'grel): yin no/ 17 dgon pa chen po nags stugs po/ /nges 'gro khyim gyi kun dga' ra/ /bcos ma'i tshal dang nye ba'i tshal/ /nags kyi kun dga' ra ba'o/ /2? dpal gyi kun ra/ /bsod nams 'bras/ /2 'dod pa'i da? gnas? btung mchog tshal//
111a3(mdo 'grel): 2 smad 'tshong ma dang slob dpon gyi/ /khyim gyi kun dga' ra ba ni/ /pa Ta'i shing ldan/ /tsu ti'i shing/ skyes bu rtses skyer mos tshal/ /thun mong rgyal po'i nags kyi tshal/ /rab dga' i tshal dang rab myos can/ /btsun mo rnams kyi spyod mos tshal//

111b1(mdo 'grel): 'bras med nags tshal bdag/ de nyid ni mu DDha zhes bya/ /me tog khardzu ra re 'brog dang/ amra dang/ al ka la sogs pa/ /'bras ldan tshal dag skyes/ /rkang 'thung mchod rten du brtan no/ /shing gi grib ma bstan pa'i grag/ yal ga rtsa thung k+Shu pa'o/ /lha yi bdud rtsi

112a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mu ku la/ me tog/ rab skyes/ skyes pa dang/ sum yi dga' nas/ yid 'ong dang/ ku sru me tog ma zhes bya ba'o/ /6 me tog rdul dang yid 'ong rdul/ /me tog rtsi dang/ me tog ro/ /lo ma rnyengs pa/ /sa pa kau 'dab ma/ lo ma/ sgrib

112b1(mdo 'grel): a khyad par gnas sam tra gnas shwartA/ /ka ga sirtha'i ming pA spre'u gnas tA na 'bab ma snum/ /ke sha bA la/ pA bam 'gyur k+Sha dang/ byang chub dang ni mchod rten shing/ /12 'phi 'bras gnod sbyin kha spyod do/ /1 pA kA ni/ parka TI/ 3 /A a nra'i mid/ ma
112b2(mdo 'grel): tsU ra/ bcud 'dzin dang/ /mA kanda dang rkang drug tshes/ /sbrang rtsi'i ngo nya dbying kyi shing/ bud med dga' dang/ ge sar 'thab/ /pi ka'i gnyan dang/ rtsa lag 'dzin/ /'di ni sa a ma khyad par ba'i ming hA lhan cig byed ka ra dang/ /shin tu bcud bzang zhes pa'o//
112b3(mdo 'grel): A mra'i 'bras dang/ 'bras bu mngar/ 2 /ki ka shi dang/ ka ba kI/ 2 sa na sa dang/ cher can 'bras/ /tsampA kA lu/ gtsug phud ldan/ mu ra dza 'bras zhes pa'o/ /5 de yi spubs la san sa'i/ /tA li kA zhes bya ba'o/ /ba ku la dang/ shI d+hu dang/ dri ldan
112b4(mdo 'grel): ge sar can zhes pa'o/ /4 /mya ngan mya ngan med kyi ming med dang/ bany+dzu la/ /chu la gang rtse/ rkang mdzes dang/ /dga' pa sbyin zhes bya ba'o/ /bska nang skya nar? gyi ming can shing/ don yod dang/ /chu ldan gnas pa bA Ta la/ me tog rtsa nag/ lus ngan mig/
112b5(mdo 'grel): thang gi kro kA tsi/ s+thu lI/ 'bras bu skyes/ /'dod pa'i pho nya mdzod tha ma/ /zangs kyi me tog can ma'o/ 12 /tsam nag ge sar gyi ming/ pa skyes dang ge sar can/ /nA ga ge sar rkang drug dga' / /nA ga puShpa zhes kyang bya/ /'di ni gser gyi me tog can/ puShpa
112b6(mdo 'grel): ro na/ gser 'dra dang/ klu yi ming can zhes pa'o/ 9 /ha spung pa'i mid ri dra ba 'di'i phye ma/ de bzhin ka di/ ku sum+b+ha le rgan/ /2 tsam tsam pa ka'i ming pa dang/ bsod nams bsung/ /me tog rgyal dang tsam ba skyes/ mchog thob/ gser gyi
112b7(mdo 'grel): me tog can/ 6 /'di le 'bras bu ka/ li kA/ dri yi 'bras bu zhes par 'gyur/ /se 'bru shing se 'bru'i ming dang/ me tog go/ dIm+ba se 'bru dang/ /ka ra kaM/ 'bras bu bya ba/ sad+d+ha mla/ /ne tso'i ldug ma tshogs chen skyes/ rab skyes dang rshi?
113a1(mdo 'grel): gong bu can/ /10 'o ma can dang rgyal po'i zas/ /'bras bu'i bdag po zhes bya ba'o/ /klu shing/ skyes bu/ mtho ba dang/ /ge sar can dang/ lha'i lcug ma/ seng ge skrod dang/ klu'i me tog/ kiny+dza ra dang/ ge sar dmar/ /bum can
113a2(mdo 'grel): lha yi 'dab ma can/ 11 /ke ta ka dang/ sogs le sgrib/ tshad ldan 'dab ma me tog rtse/ rtsa ba mang dang/ dzam+bu 'dzin/ /sa srung skyes dang/ klu yi tshon/ /shun pa dri zhim/ 'bab chu gnas/ /kirmI ra dang/ chu bo skyes/ /sa yi dzam+bu ka rnams so/ /chu
113a3(mdo 'grel): la rol dang/ gzhol ba dang/ /mdog mdzes/ mA ru lang+ga la/ /skyar sgyur rtsi chen po ming rtsi chen po so rtsed dang/ /skyur mo/ dzam+b+hI sgyur mor ra/ dzam+b+ha skyur mo la/ legs 'dzin/ rab gnas me tog dang/ /snying rje dang ni so dga' byed/ rnam par
113a4(mdo 'grel): mdzes zhes bya ba'o/ /10 rgyal po'i 'o ma/ spre'u laM sbrang/ /las kyi tshon dang/ las kyi cha/ 2 rab mchod dang ni mo la kaM /btung ba nas kyi btung pa dang/ ma la kaM zhes bya ba'o/ /da raM/ rak+taM/ ba ra rA/ mal kaM zhes pa la yang de'o/ /4 /chus
113a5(mdo 'grel): gar pa dang/ sa bon gang/ /de nyid skyur ba'i ge sar can/ 3 /mA ru lum gI/ rul 'bras ma/ /lha ldan ma dang/ dri bzang can/ /4 la ku tsa dang ni ku la/ /shing skyur dang ni shing bran dang/ phra ba'i sa na/ sa zhes so/ /ba me ldan ma dang/ tin+ti drI/ /tsiny+tsa/ tin+ti

117b6(mdo 'grel): ki mpA ka la nI/ ma hA kA la dang/ u tu kA la'o/ 2 /de nas sabta lA dang/ pri'i rdzas dang/ dri med ma dang/ lA ta lA dang/ dbu ba mang po dang/ tsarma ka Tha zhes pa yang ngo/ /nag po dang/ u ba ku lya dang/ lus 'phags skyes dang/ /bisba lI dang/ g.yo ba
117b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ zags ma dang/ u Sha N+ta dang/ mA g+ha d+d+hi dang/ ko lA dang/ sna ring sa dang/ rtog med ma zhes ba rnams so/ /11 mdud pa can dang/ /bisba lI dang/ rtsa ba tshigs zug? ba dang/ bi kA shir rnams so/ /spre'u'i lcug ma dang/ ko la'i/

118a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ lug nag ma dang/ 'bras nag ma dang/ bA gA dzI dang/ rul pa'i 'bras bu yang ngo/ 8? /shu dag dang/ dri mchog dang/ /mdung ma drug pa dang/ tshigs brgya ba dang/ sa yi sbu dang/ dag phan dang/ dri rtsub zhes par 'gyur ro/ /7 de nyid dkar po

119b7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ma dang/ rgyun sbyin ma dang/ ral pa'i spu can ma rnams so/ /6 /dri yi 'dab ma dag stobs bzang ma dang/ 'gro byed ma dang/ rab 'gro ma dang/ ka Tam+b+ha ra dang/ rgyal po'i stobs dang/ dri 'dzin ma dang/ 'byor ba'i dri ldan ma rnams so/

120a2(mdo 'grel): sa gaM ga ta(mdo 'grel): shi Sh+ye Na sa maM tiSh+Tha ti/ ye nAM ga bi gA ra(mdo 'grel): gang gi lus kyi rnam 'gyur la'o/ /gang gi lus kyi? rnam par 'gyur ba/ 6 dang lhan du yod/ yod pa gsal bar gzhan mtshon nus pa de la rnam dbye dang bu dang lhan du yod/ bu dang lhan du sod/
120a3(mdo 'grel): po'i don la gsum slob ma dang nye bar gnas/ pa 'gyur te/ ak+Sh+NA kA Na(mdo 'grel): pA de na khany+dza(mdo 'grel): kar+Ne na ba d+he da(mdo 'grel): shi ra sA kha lwA Ta(mdo 'grel): i t+thaM b+hU ta lak+Sha Ne/ 'di 'drar yod pa'i mtshan nyid la'o/ /'di dang 'di 'dra'o zhes pa'i mtshan nyid
120a4(mdo 'grel): kyi don la gsum pa 'gyur te/ k+ShA tre No pA d+hyAM ya ma drA k+ShI ta/ mi gzhar ba'o/ rkang pa 'thed po'o/ rna ba 'on ba'o/ mag bo spyi zer ba'o/ saM dz+nyo n+ya ta/ ra s+thaM karma Na/ yang dag par shes pa'i las la yang na'o/ /yang dag par shes pa'i
120a5(mdo 'grel): las kyi don la gsum pa yang mkhan po dang 'dra bar slob ma la blta'o/ /na 'gyur te/ bi trA sany+dzA nI te/ pi ta raM sany+dzA ni te/ he tau/ rgyu la'o/ /bya ba sbyor ba'i rgyu la gsum pa 'gyur te/ pu N+ye na driSh+To gu ru(mdo 'grel): 'grel par de'i bya ba sbyor
120a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyu la zlos pa la'ang skabs 'gar gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes byung bas/ mang? yang dge bar shes/ par yang dag par shes/ sha te na sha te na bat+sA na pA ya a ti pa ya(mdo 'grel): sha taM? sha taM? bat+sAn pA ya ya ti bsod nams kyis mthor bla ma'o/
120a7(mdo 'grel): ba ya(mdo 'grel): yang 'grel par/ dal po'i sbyor ba la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/ a lampi lam+be na/ dal pos ngal po/ yang 'gel par bdan pa'i don be'u brgya brgya'o ma 'thung ngu 'jug/ sbyor ba'ang gsum pa 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa
120b1(mdo 'grel): byung bas/ sa tA ma rtho ha ri b+ha wbA/ yang 'grel bar pUrba dang a ba ra sbyor ba dang ngan med pa ste ngan pa'i don la gsum pa 'gyur ro zhes pa byung bas/ mA se na/ pUrba(mdo 'grel): a ba ra:/ puN+ye na hI na(mdo 'grel): sha ste NaM ka la ha(mdo 'grel): a sriSh+Ta sya bya ba ha re tsa tu rthya rthe tri
120b2(mdo 'grel): tI yA mi 'os pa'i rgyu mngon pa'i don 'phrog byed 'bangs/ la bzhi pa'i don la gsum pa'o/ /gang mi 'os pa'i bya ba'i rgyu sbyor ba la bzhi pa'i don la gsum gzhan zla ba snga ma/ pa 'gyur bsod nams dman pa/ mtshon chas 'khrugs/ te dE syA saM yatsdza ti kA mu ka:
120b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'os pa ma yin na gsum pa mi 'gyur te/ b+hAryA ye saM yats+tsha ti kA mu ka(mdo 'grel): de rnams kyis gsum pa'i 'jug yul bshad zin nas da ni bzhi pa'i 'jug yul bshad par bya'o// ` karma NA ya ma b+hi prai ti sa saM pra dA zan mo la theg le sbyin/
120b4(mdo 'grel): ni/ gang gi las mngon par rab tu 'ong ba da yang dag pa chung ma la thig le sbyin rab tu sbyin pa'o/ /gang gi ched du sbyin par 'dod pa dang len par 'dod pa ste sbyin pa'i las dang/ gang gi ched du 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rnams la
120b5(mdo 'grel): dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes tha snyad btags so/ /tsa turthI? si pra dA ne/ yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa la bzhi ba'o/ gang gi ched du yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa zhes brda chad byas pa de la rnam dbye bzhi pa 'gyur te/ brAhma Ne b+hya(mdo 'grel): gI dwa dA ti/
120b6(mdo 'grel): de bab+hya(mdo 'grel): puShpAM da dA ti/ yu pAd+hya A su Shar+NaM? da dA ti/ yang dag par rab tu sbyin pa ma yin na sbyin pa'i don yin kyang bzhi pa ma 'gyur te/ dA nI yo pi pra(mdo 'grel): zhes pa rnams sbyin pa'i las kyi don 'ong ba'i don bram ze rnams la ba lang sbyin/
120b7(mdo 'grel): lha rnams la me tog sbyin mkhan? ? la gser 'bul/ la/ pra tya she tasti/ bud med bdag po'i ched du nyal/ ru tsyarthA nI pri ya mA Na(mdo 'grel): sred pa'i don dang ldan bram ze la sho gam sprod/ pa'i dga' ba la'o/ /gang sred pa'i don dang ldan pa 'am sred pa la
121a1(mdo 'grel): ha re Ni dang/ thal ba'i dri dang/ ser skya ma rnams so/ /6 mung+ga'i lo ma ni/ bya rog mung+ga dang/ lhan cig pa zhes kyang ngo/ /3 rtag 'jug ma ni/ 'dar byad skyes ma dang/ zla ba'i lo ma dang/ bzod chen ma rnams so/ 4 /shing
121a2(mdo 'grel): tsha dang/ 'dab ma dang/ pUtna TaM dang/ mtho ba dang/ shun pa dang/ tso tsa dang/ lus mchog can rnams so/ 7 /ge bur dang/ trA bi tra ka dang/ 'od srungs dang/ rig byed gtso mo rnams so/ /4 sna tshogs sde'i dga' ma dang/ griSh+Ti dang/ phag mo

121a4(mdo 'grel): Sh+Ta barga ya ti ta sya dzi ba kA sya kA(mdo 'grel): 'dab sku ma ma dang/ ngo tsha ldan ma dang/ nor can dang/ ba su twaTTa ka'o/ /2 bkra ba dang nyer bkra dang/ n+ya gro d+hA dang/ bra ban+tI dang/ sham+ba rI dang/ pri ShA dang/ pra tya k+She NI dang/ su ta sh+re NI dang/ raN+DA dang/ byi ba'i
121a5(mdo 'grel): lo ma rnams so/ /hany+dza kA dang/ bram ze dang/ padmA b+hA rgA dang/ bram ze'i mchod sdod dang/ sol ba'i mdo ma dang/ skyob skyes dang/ bak+Sha shA dang/ bi shA ka dang/ barba ta bard+ha ha rnams so/ /9 reg dka' / d+ha nwa yA sha dang/ du byed ma dang/

121a7(mdo 'grel): yas utpal sA ri kA/ 9 mi yi gtsug phud la'ang ga li/ /gshol ldan ma dang smra byed ma/ /rab gdung ma dang go byed ma/ /rang dbang ma dang mi gdong ma/ 8 /de nas bya rog byin pa la/ /bya rog lus dang bya rog sna/ 2 /dri yi rdzas kyi
121b1(mdo 'grel): i la dA/ /ka me la ya/ dri bzang dang/ /gser bye ma dang/ bye ma can/ /5 de nas sa laM kI la ni/ /mu kun Tu dang ku du dang/ ku tu ru zhes bya ba'o/ 3 /sbrang rtsi dang ni 'tsho byed ma/ /'tsho byed/ /'tsho ma/ 'tsho ldan ma/ 5 /na tshod gnas dang/ sde brgyad dang
121b2(mdo 'grel): kA ko lI dang/ A lI dang/ /'bras bu zhi ma dang/ lang tsho gnas/ /de nas ma kA la ka dang/ /bum nges glang po/ son can gyi/ /so so'i phreng ba dag dang ni/ /u dum+ba ra'i 'dab kyang ngo/ /nad med ma dang shin tu spyod/ /pad+ma spyod dang pad+ma mchog /
121b3(mdo 'grel): lam skyes spyod ma rnams yin no/ 5 /kAm+bi mU dang/ karka sha/ /zla ba lus do mar gsal ma yang/ 5 /gzhan gyis mi thub d+ha ti ka/ shI ta ma dang/ sha ni 'dab/ 4 /dArbi ka dang/ ba lang lce/ /darbi 'dab ma can dang ni/ /gser gyi 'o ma can yang de'o//
121b4(mdo 'grel): me tog brgya ba kA ra bI/ /a kakbu Shpi/ gdugs dkar dang/ /shin tu gdungs dang mi si dang/ /ma d+hu rA zhes pa rnams so/ /7? ra ba skyes dang si ba dang/ /mngar ldan mi sI g.yo ba dang/ nestre la zhes pa rnams so/ 6 /kun tu reg dang/ dza tu byed/ skyed
121b5(mdo 'grel): ma bye la zhes bya dang/ /mchod sbyin ma dang/ dzi rU kri te/ /'khor los sgyur ma rnams yin no/ /7 sha TI sha Thi karts+tshu ra/ /mdud pa drug ba tri'i sha ShI/ /sa lA sa dang spos kyi rtsa/ 7 /spubs ldan byu ru'i 'khri shing dang/ /phug don?  rkang dang/ gar
121b6(mdo 'grel): mkhan ma/ don bzang rdzas kyi sdong bu'o/ /5 skye ba'i skra dang/ d+ha ma n+ya/ /han+ta haTTa bi lA dang/ /spos rdzas sI nI zhes bya'o/ /4 /nya phyis dung dang/ rmig pa dang/ /ko la'i 'dab dang sen mo'i/ 5 /na khI/ alpa Ta ki dang/ /bya rog sa dang/ sbyor byed ma
121b7(mdo 'grel): sa can yul 'khor skyes pa'o/ 5 /'khyog po gang byed grong bcu pa/ /stobs skyes pa ras la kaM/ rkyal 'gro/ sngon 'dro/ rgyal? mtshen pa/ /ke ba Ti zhes bshad 'di rnams/ /kla sgang ming du blta bar bya/ 8 /gcan gzan mtshon cha/ /stag
122a1(mdo 'grel): sen dang/ /lag skyes 'khor lo byed pa skyes/ /4 dus rjes 'brang dang gzhi 'dzin bsil/ /rdo yi me tog /rgan po dang/ /brag las byung dang brag las skyes/ 6 /tshogs bde dang ni srin mo dang/ /gtum mo nor/ /'phrog bde ba ma
122a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ bu ngan tshogs dang 'bangs mo dang/ 8 /gaN+Di'i me tog/ Do ka Ta/ /2 gaN+Di ra dang/ mnyam gnas 'dzin/ /nye ba spyod dang/ sha maN+Tha/ 'di la chu yi rma bya can/ 5 /dpal gyi lag ldan b+h+ru rU N+DI/ 'bras bu/ be b+h+ra/ ki Ta laM/ /ku ra pinda
122a3(mdo 'grel): sprin ming can/ /mtas dang ni/ /mu sta kaM/ guN+Da/ rdul can/ se ru'o/ /gtsug phud 'dzin dang 'bras gang dang/ skyod byed 'khor lo 'dzin guN+Da/ /kra ma ka dang/ mkha' yi grong/ /i tri ka dang/ shi lI nd+hAM/ /i du lI raM dang/ kanda laM/ /lus
122a4(mdo 'grel): pral bcud ldan/ /sa dang ni/ /sge psa dang ni bka' o/ 7 /yal ga nag po dus skyes dang/ shA tha dzi hA ra sA ta kaM 4 /gzhi can dga' byed/ yal ga dpa' / /tsandi rA laM/ sprin dri med/ /Tak+ka'i yul can/ sAM shu'i 'dab/ /dngos po can
122a5(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba rnams/ 8 /rtsa ldan pa dang/ lte ba'i 'dab/ /zhing skyes dang ni dben par spyod/ /4 sA ta ki ni myos byed rkang/ /'khri shig mchu dang/ steng phur dang/ /mjug ma can zhes bya ba'o/ /shA li dang ni/ sandu ra/ /lcags gsod pa dang/ yul
122a6(mdo 'grel): 'khor che/ /ba rA Ti'i bris/ mA ri Sha/ /pa To la dang/ sa bdag 'bras/ /tik+ta/ karka shi yi 'dab/ /ya Tu dang ni ka la kaM 6 /'di yi 'khri shing/ kA li kA/ rtsa ba dga' byed/ dwi brin+ta/ /sen mo dang ni runy+dza la/ 2 /ka Tam+b+ha rA 'dab ring dang/ /chu bo zhags
122a7(mdo 'grel): ldan ka lam+bI/ 4 /hi la mo tsI tshangs ma'i chu/ /nya lus ma dang 'di rnams mtshungs/ 3 /bi tun+tA? kaM /'dab ma'i zhing/ /legs gnas dang ni tsu tsu'o/ /'dab bu can dang/ shog shing dang/ /bispa lI dang/ bya yi zas/ 4 seng ldang dang ni yid byed ma//
122b1(mdo 'grel): mnyam lus 'dud dang/ dbu ba can/ /sdong nag/ shu ka/ parbrA dang/ /ma 'dod pa dang/ mthun pa can/ /7 tA ri TI dang bA ra kI/ b+ha rA dang ni tso ti kA/ rtsa ba pA TI ra dang ni/ /glang po'i so dang/ rgyal po 'jig/ rtsa ba che dang/ rtsa ba lci/ 4 /lag pa/ 'ug ldan/ pe tsa'o// 3 /sgog
122b2(mdo 'grel): pa kun dong su kanda/ /2 me mo/ spre'u/ du pru mo/ de nyid ljang gu sman chen no/ /sgog skya/ ke'u/ a riSh+Ta/ rA pri h+ra ta siSh+Ta/ rA so na/ tsha ba'i rtsa ba/ /rtsa ba che/ kla klo'i spos te 'di rnams dgu/ de nas ma d+hA lu ka la/ /lha yi lo ma tsher ma mang/ /'bras bu'i me
122b3(mdo 'grel): tog/ ba raN+Da lu/ gaM bA ra gnas 'dzin yu ta'o/ /bde legs mau ta/ /dpal gyi mgo/ su ra kits+tsha bar ma tsan/ /kabdI'i rgyal dang/ gdugs kyi bu/ /thang gi pad+ma nga rgyal can/ 6 /kabdI/ kandA/ yal ga'i khyon/ /pi taN+Da dang/ nga rgyal chung/ /4 'dod byed/ skem?
122b4(mdo 'grel): byed/ 'bruM pa 'joms/ /ka ra bel+la/ ka thilU/ /steng dkar ba dang/ pa rA ru/ /dar ro/ /ba ku la'i sa bon/ /de ni dA dza ba ro li'o/ /7 'di rnams sa dza kuSh+maN+Da/ /lo rgyus ma dang/ mtshan ldan ma/ /rab tu tshugs dka' / /b+haN+Da kI/ 'khyog po 'bel ldan chen
122b5(mdo 'grel): po dang/ /bil ba'i yal ga /bArta kA/ bA DaM giM Na/ sa lA dang/ ro pI/ bartA rnams yin no/ /12 kuSh+ma N+Da dang/ /nag mo dang/ rgyal po'i spal mo zhes so/ 3 /byo ma can dang/ sbal mo dang/ bA ru/ gshin ldan lo ma shA/ 3 /de nas dags dang sbal ba dang/
122b6(mdo 'grel): 'gas byed/ bI ru/ nya phyis rnams/ /shAr+Ni briN+ta/ bde gnas dang/ mA lu t+tI na/ te mi ShA/ 4 /de nas ba lang mig dang ni/ go dum+bA dang/ glang po tsi b+ha Ti zhes dang/ kaM ka chen mo zhes pa rnams/ 5 /yangs pa chu lha'i dbang mo dang/ dbang mchog/ ba
122b7(mdo 'grel): las gzhan ba dang/ nags kyi me tog ces pa'o/ /pa bud shing/ tsha ba'i tu mIr? 'gyur/ /tum+bya lA/ shU du shtsi kA/ lA bu ka/ grong kuSh+mA N+Da/ paN+Di tin+ti li kA rnams so/ 6 /'od ldan ma dang/ skya nar dang/ dra ba can dang rda zlum byad/ /'bigs
123a1(mdo 'grel): byed dra ba mang po dang/ /dra ba ring dang ring mo dang/ /rak+ta ba To li ka dang/ de la ko sha ta kI dang/ /rnam par rgyas dang sdong bu rings/ /12 rtsa ba'i 'dab ma rab skyes dang/ 'bras mchog mda''phags/ /bags ba bye/ /rany+tsa kaM dang/ ba ka dang
123a2(mdo 'grel): da sha d+hA shA ki zhes brjod/ 'od ma/ pags pa'i snying po dang/ karmA dang/ shun pa'i snying/ /ki lA Ti na tshigs brgya ba/ tshigs bzang rtsa'i tog /rtsa'i rgyal mtshan/ /'od ma nas kyi 'bras bu dang/ sa bon gyis 'chi 'gyur med dang/ brjid
123a3(mdo 'grel): ldan rnga zlum ba tI na/ /26 ka rI ra dang 'od ma dang/ karkar 'o gang yang ni/ rlung gi sgra sgrogs bi shA dang/ /ki tsa kA te de dag 'chi/ /'od ma 'di yi skye ba ni/ rgyud dang 'bras bu nas 'bras ldan/ /muny+dza sa ra pra dang ni/ dza Na?  ka dang gutDa te/ de ltar
123a4(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams mtshungs pa yin/ /ku sha ku Tha/ darb+ha dang/ /dag byed dang ni/ mchod sbyin rgyan/ /bard+hi dang ni/ khrus kyi rtsa/ 14 dArbA dang ni tshigs brgya pa/ /brtson 'grus stong ldan rdul med dang/ /ngan spong skyes dang/ ljang ser can/ /skye zhing gnas dang sa yi

123a6(mdo 'grel): ma 'dzin/ /'o ma mngar dang/ ro mngar dang me tog 'chi dang bcud chen po/ /12 'di yi rtsa ba mo ra Ta/ /tshigs la ta ra Ta zhes bya/ /dbye ba dgon pa'i bur shing sogs/ ku na lI dang a na lA/ mkha' ni bo Ta ka la dang/ /kun+dza la ka d+ha ma na/ 4 yal 'dab
123a7(mdo 'grel): la ni skabs chen po/ /gsal ba po Ta ga la dang/ /nags dgod pa dang/ dzyal+lu lA/ /bya rog bur shing/ spyad bya/ /gzhon/ ik+Shu gandA zhes bya'o/ /sa la rtsa lag skye ba'o/ /i Da ka Ta rtsa ba'i sde/ /mdzod kyi yan lag rtsub ba'i dbang/ 4 /dpa' byed dang
123b1(mdo 'grel): ni ches dpa' ba/ /dpa' bo'i me tog d+ho ba'i dgra/ 4 'di yi rtsa ba shi ram dang/ pad rtsa'o de nas chu la nya la/ /'jigs med bsten byed na la dang/ nags tshal bsregs dang 'dod dang laM/ /lA madzdza kaM zhes pa dang/ /yang pa'i gnas dang 'khrug ces bya/ 11

124a4(mdo 'grel): ya/ gshin rje'i gzhon pha rol pa can/ /rdul can dang ni/ rta yi dgra/ dA ba si kA sar dang/ sai bi b+ha dang/ buk+Sha dang/ mig dmar dang ni ha la gnas/ /'jigs pa bcu pa rdul ldan ma'o/ /ga ba la dang/ ma he skyes/ /shi gaM ka tA/ ma

124b7(mdo 'grel): myaM ku dang/ aM ku sdom pa skyed byed dang/ /pa lang rna ba/ ri dags dang/ eNa rsha dang ro hi ta/ /tsa ma ra dang/ ri dags dang/ rta dang/ mdzes dang/ dga' byed sogs/ /gzhan yang ri dags dbang sogs dang/ /Da men la sogs rnams dang ni/ /phyugs kyi?

125b2(mdo 'grel): yab/ mkha' ma spyod byed me yi mgrin/ /spu can dang ni gnam la spyod/ na tshod gnas dang mkhar 'gro dang/ /tsany+tsu dang ni/ dril+lI NA?/ /dzA ne ka dang gnyis skyes dang/ lce gnyis pa dang/ kI kI shA/ steng 'gro dang ni shing la gnas/ 38 /'dab ma'i
125b3(mdo 'grel): theg pa na tshod gnas/ /bri pa lAk+Sha ta ru sha /dpyid kyi pho nya ngag snyan dang/ /ud+hA rb+hA la pi ka dang/ /ku hUI mgrin ldan phrog byed gtam/ mgrin snyan kha nas ku hu 'don/ /nags su dga' dang/ gzhan gyi gsol/ /khu byug dang ni gzhan gyis
125b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /'dod pa'i pho nya ma d+hu kaN+Tha/ /'dod pa'i tA la/ ku hU snyan/ /mig mdzes dang ni bya rog gsos/ /dbyangs 'khis/ su tra rda na dang/ dbyangs san 'brus na mkha' 'gro/ nags la rag lus gzhan la sems/ /khu byug skad dang lnga
125b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sbrang rtsi'i sgrar yang de brjod do/ /27 rma bya/ sa 'gro/ mdongs ldan dang/ /bkra pa bkra pa'i 'og pag can/ /gtsug phud can dang rtse mo can/ /kaM ki'i sgra can rab g.yo dang/ /ki sha ra dga' mgrin sngon can/ /si tA sang+gA zhes bya dang//
125b6(mdo 'grel): 'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa dang/ rna rgyan can dang sen mo'i gar/ /gtsug phud can rgya mtsho skyes dang/ /'dab brgya pa dang/ sprin gyi sgeg /me nA da dang mgul pa sngo/ /mjug sgo can dang legs bris sgo/ /sil sil sgrogs dang lag 'gro
125b7(mdo 'grel): za/ /shing la brtse dang brtan par drags/ /gang mkhan ri mo dmar ser can/ /byi dor byas pa'i mgrin ldan pa'o/ /30 rma bya'i thig le/ u ruN+Da/ ra /mjug ma mdengs ldan de bzhin du/ gtsug phud dang ni rab g.yo'o/ /4 zla khaM dang ni
126a1(mdo 'grel): mdongs yon no/ /2 /thod dang gtsug /phud nyid kyang ngo/ 2 /ke kI'i tshig ldan gtsug phud can/ /bya rog la ni gtor za dang/ /sgra ldan dang ni/ /mau ku li/ /khwa ta bo na ba/ 'chi med/ /gtor mas rgyas dang/ brgya byin skyes/ lan
126a2(mdo 'grel): cig skyes dang bdag nyid sgrogs/ /dga' bas/ rgyud dang thos sgrogs dang/ /'khrig ba sbed dang/ /luN+DA ka /dwi pa sa dang/ kA na dang/ gzhan gos byed dang/ gro sher spyod/ /bden pa'i ngag dang rab dga' dang/ /lte ba skyes dang g+ha kA sgrogs/

126a4(mdo 'grel): rog chen po kA ko la/ ra g+ha bya rog mau ku li/ /bya rog mnan dang/ bya rog nag /'ching blu ba zhes bya'o/ 7 /de nas 'ug pa nyin mo 'jigs/ 7 /bya rog dgra dang/ be tsa ka /mtshan mo spyod dang dri bAn+na/ brgya byin bshad dang/ rna 'khyog
126a5(mdo 'grel): dang 'phrog byed mig dang/ bya rog 'jigs/ /sen mo shI sI g+ha g+ha so ba/ mtshan mo za ba rnams yin no/ /13 /dmar ser la ni se tsi ka/ 'ug pa/ tsa Ti kA yin no/ 3 /trik+tA/ gtum mo/ ri skeg dang/ myas byed thur ma/ rjod byed ma/ mig
126a6(mdo 'grel): bkra ma dang rkang bkra ma/ /mtshon byed brtod pa'i snye ma'o?/ 7 /rnam par 'gro byed ku Na yI/ sa 'thor dang ni go rA Ta/ 4 /bya gag /sa gnas/ pA li ka /kri mi dang ni ku ku sgrogs/ /5 ne tso/ 'dab ma za ba dang/ /'thar byed yid
126a7(mdo 'grel): gzhungs/ tsashtsi mi/ /blo gsal shin tu gnas pa dang/ 'khyog po'i mthu can zhes bya'o/ /saud+d+hA kI dang/ mi gnas dang/ ngag skyes/ dbang po/ 3 sgra dang/ spyod byed sbrang rtsi sbrang rtsi 'dod/ /sbrang rtsi brtul zhugs/ sbrang rtsi byed/ /sbrang
126b1(mdo 'grel): rtsi myang dang sbrang rtsi skyong/ /sbrang bu me tog zas can dang/ bung ba nyams chung sbrang ma dang/ me tog 'jug dang/ me tog rtse/ /ra yi gnyis pa bcud brtul zhugs/ /ge sar 'dzin dang bcud 'dzin dang/ /rdul 'chang/ skems dang/ bcud sbyin dang/ /rdul nyal
126b2(mdo 'grel): me tog 'thor ba dang/ sbrang rtsi'i dri? myang ge sar spyod/ /des ni cha shas mthun sgra dang/ ri skyes dang ni spos dang ldan/ /ro myang mchog dag /skad cig 'dras/ snying por son pa zhes bya rnams 33/ sI pa ba ta/ sgra snyan dang/ skad cig 'dod ldan 'gyur dga' //

131a7(mdo 'grel): mri ta dang dzA ra dza/ /kuNO mri ta/ go? tsa dang/ go na ka dang bdag skyes dang/ lus skyes bu dang gnyis pa'o/ /kum 'dzin byed rang skyes dang/ /bu smad/ bu dang/ lto byung/ rgyu/ skye byed dang ni dga' byed do/ /mo la bu mo smra ba ste/ /bdun 'dir bdag skyed

140a5(mdo 'grel): sreg byed/ /gzar bu mar la 'dri byed pa'o/ /u pa kri ta dud 'gro ni/ /mchod sbyin ched du gsod par btags/ /phan tshun zhing dang gsang gtor byas/ /gsod pa'i tshad kyi phyugs yin no/ /brjod bya'i brtags can pra mI ta/ /bsnyen rdzogs 'thor 'thung
140a6(mdo 'grel): byas nas gsod/ /sreg rdzas sbyin sreg sbyin byas pa/ /zas ldan pa ShaTa byas pa'o/ /de gnyis gcig te mchod sbyin lha/ /sbyin sreg rdzas bAn+na mmA/ /de nas thub pa smra ba bcad/ /dik+Sha'i mdza' can mchod sbyin gtso/ /de dag gsod las byed yadz+nyi yaM/ /mchod
140a7(mdo 'grel): sbyin las 'dod pUrta'o/ /khA ta la sogs las rnams so/ /'dod pa'i pU rta la sogs las/ /a mri ta bi g+ha sa/ /mchod sbyin lhag ma'i bza' ba ste/ /mchod sbyin lhag ma'i rdzas dag ni/ /snod can sbyin dang rnam par gtor/ /gtor ma 'bul ba sbyin
140b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ nye bar rnam par gtor/ /rnam byin brims dang rnam par bkram/ /so sor byin dang mngon du bstan/ /'bul ba yon dang me tog go /gshin don ster ba sbyin pa ste/ /aau dza de hi ka zhes bya/ /pha gshin sbyin bA ni ba sa/ /she zan de las bstos sbyin/ /'phags
140b2(mdo 'grel): pa can dang bsod snyoms sogs/ /pha mes bya ba brgyad pa dang/ /nyin mo'i cha dang ku ta pa/ /dus ston zla dus mchod pa'o/ /lha yi sgo dang lha'i ltad mo/ /gyang kyi ltang mo ma hU ri/ /ko sha la can yun ring dang/ /'don pa po dang chos smra ba/ /mngon par 'ongs dang 'gron
140b3(mdo 'grel): 'ongs dang/ /rab 'joms 'joms dang bi shi kA/ tshes zad 'dzin byed mthun pa dang/ /ba ku la ngag mtshungs pa'o/ /mnyam pa rkang pa 'dzin pa dang/ /mngon par smra dang nye bar 'dzin/ /gsong bar smra ba rnam pa gnyis/ /nye bar
140b4(mdo 'grel): kun 'dzin cho ga bzhin/ /mngon par smra bya mchod par byed/ /dge ba rnam par bcas mchod mtshungs/ /gtor ma'o gus par nyan pa dang/ /rnam par gnas dang nye bar gnas/ /yongs su spyod dang nye bar spyod/ /spyod pa dang ni spyod lam gnas/ /tshol ba yongs su
140b5(mdo 'grel): tshol ba dang/ /rjes su tshol dang kun tu tshol/ /gsol ba dang ni zhu ba'o/ /slong dang mngon par slong ba dang/ /don du gnyer ba zhes bya'o/ /mchod pa'i ri ni mchod yon te/ /zhabs kyi ched du chu zhabs bsil/ /'gron po glo bur gsar 'ongs dang/ /longs skyes zhes

140b7(mdo 'grel): bar dgong dang nges pa dang/ /brtugs bsnyen gnas bsod nams can/ /shin tu gso dang nye bar gnas/ /bsnyen gnas kun nas sgrol byed dang/ /'da' bar byed dang brtugs mdzes/ /zla ba bsnyen gnas byed pa dang/ /gcis mdza' gsum mthar za ba 
141a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /zas drug pa dang dus can dang/ /mchod sbyin gnas dang mchod sbyin brtan/ /dpe ma pa tha dad bdag nyid dang/ /glu len pa dang rigs byed 'don/ /tshangs pa'i rig byed 'don pa dang/ /mtshan mo grub ba brjod par 'gyur/ /tshangs pa dang ni bi

141a3(mdo 'grel): tshangs stan rtogs pa'i cho ga rim/ /gtso bo dang ni rtog pa'o/ /rjes kyi rtog pa rjes gcod pa/ /'du byed sngon du 'dzin pa ni/ /nye bar byed dang thos pa'o/ /tshangs spyod dbang po mdza' dag sdom/ /dbang po thul dang grong du zhi/ /zhi dang sdom rtsom sdom ldan

143a1(mdo 'grel): ba paN+Da ta snyan? ngag mkhan po dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yi rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba mu tig 'phreng ba las bram ze'i sde rdzogs so// //spyi bor dbang bskur rgyal po'i bu/ /lag skyes rgyal rigs

144a1(mdo 'grel): di skyes ma/ /nag mo lnga len ma skye'o/ /skyed ma bsod nams grags ldan ma/ /mchog spyin 'dren ma rig byed skyes/ /rtag tu lang tsho ldan ma'o/ /kra ya stobs bzang ma gnyis ma/ /srid sgrub ma dang lus ldan ma/ /rigs med dang ni lhar

144b3(mdo 'grel): dar gu li ka so rtsi byin/ /rab 'jug byed dang 'jug pa po/ /'jug byed bu dang rgyug byed pa/ /dzam g+hA ka ri dzam g+hi ka? /btsun mo'i sku srungs kany+tsa ki/ gnas byed dang ni nyug rum pa/ /ma ning nyams pa za ma mtshungs/ /yang dag thob byed lus nyed pa//
144b4(mdo 'grel): zhabs thog pa dang 'tsho ba pa/ /grogs byed pa dang skyid byed pa/ /yul mthar gnas pa'i rgyal po dgra/ de yi pha rol ba shes yin no/ /u pA shin bar gnas yul/ /rtsa 'dzin dang ni rgyal gnas so/ /dgra bo mi dga' yongs bgrod dang/ /dgrar 'dzin pa dang
144b5(mdo 'grel): bshes mi byed/ /sdang byed/ zhe 'gras/ 'khon byed dang/ /mi 'dza' ba dang pha rol rgol/ /mngon bgrod dgra byed rnam sdang dang/ /mi phan byed dang phyir rgol dang/ /yongs gnas 'gran zla mngon gzhom bya/ /dzi g+ha kun tu 'gran sdang byed/ /rnam sdang ba thong byed
144b6(mdo 'grel): mi dga' byed/ /bzhin mnyam mtshungs pa 'gran zla dang/ /grogs dang gos gnyen/ snag gnyen dang/ sdug dang/ rtsed rol/ lhan cig spyod/ /sI shUrtha nI zhes pa yang/ /dbang bcas legs spyod/ /legs sdud dang/ 'grogs dang 'dun pa'i skye bo dang
144b7(mdo 'grel): bdun rgyud gnyen dang 'ja' grogs bshes/ /ljang gu'i mtshon 'drar brjod pa dang/ /skad cig tsam gyis mtshon gyur pa/ /sngon po'i chos bzhin brtan pa dang/ /dga' dang dor byas rjes su 'jug/ mkha' la rtsen dang rol rtsed dang/ /der ni nye bar gyur pa'o/ /lta
145a1(mdo 'grel): nyul dang ni rtog ni ba/ /rtog dpyod byed dang nyul mi dang/ /ldum bu ba dang sor rtog mi/ /bya gtong dang ni nang yan no/ /lo shes rtsis mkhan lha zhes dang/ /lha yig pa dang shes ldan dang/ /dus shes yud tsam thang cig shes/ /gnas shes 'grangs byed
145a2(mdo 'grel): lha 'dri ba/ /gus par 'dri dang sems brjod 'gyur/ /pra sya sha ka Ti zhes pa'o/ /der ni nges 'gro sbyin dang/ /lha la 'dri dang nye bar thos/ /rgyud dang grub mdza' shes pa dang/ /sbyin bdag khyim bdag mtshungs pa'o/ /bris mkhan dang ni yig mkhan dang/ /yi
145a3(mdo 'grel): ge pa dang 'dri byed pa/ /ki ra ka dang shAn+t+ri ka/ yi ge can dang snag tsha'i zod/ /gA k+Shi kA dang po li ka/ de nas me lA purma lA/ /dga' byed dang ni yi ge 'chags/ /snag tsha'i nor bu snag tsha'i nor/ /yi ge khron can bArta la/ /snag tsha chu dang me lA dang/ /mda' la mig
145a4(mdo 'grel): sman snag tsha'o/ /myu gu yi ge'i 'dab can dang/ /kA tsa na dang yi ge 'ching/ /yi ge'i pho nya khu tshung byed/ /phrin yig brjod dang rjod byed pa/ /yi ge'i gnas dang dri gtsang khang/ /rgyas 'debs rkyen byed 'dri byed dang/ /bri bya/ kun tu bri bya dang/ yi ge'i rim pa
145a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis rnams so/ /la khI la ka 'phrin yig khyer/ /lhag par phrin yig spyod byed 'dod/ /yig mkhan las byed rkyen bcug pa'o/ /skyes kha dang ni pho nya ba/ /du tyaM de dngos las yin no/ /lam ba tshong pa 'gron po dang/ /lam 'grul 'gron lam gnas spos
145a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /'gro byed lam po de nas ni/ /sdud byed lam pa dang ni rgyud/ /mnyam pa sa mu na sA tha/ /dzadka 'dug gnas 'di dag mtshungs/ /dzA gam la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa'o/ /bdag po blon po thugs ches dang/ /mdzod dang yul 'khor rdzod dang dpung/ /rgyal po'i
145a7(mdo 'grel): yan lag gnyis yin no/ /khab dang pho brang zhes pa dang/ /dums dang 'thab dang chas pa dang/ /gnas dang nor stong zhen rten rnams/ /drug rnams yon tan zhes bya'o/ /nus pa dang ni mthu stobs dang/ /dga' bar byas dang sngags bzlas dang/ /zang dang gnas dang 'phal ba dang
145b1(mdo 'grel): sde tshan gsum pa rig pa'o/ /rnam par gnon dang skyes bu'i mthu/ /gzi brjid dang ni mdangs dang stobs/ /dpungs dang mthu brjid can dang ni/ /bang mdzod nor gyis gang ba dang/ /dbye dang sdud dang dums dang ni/ /dpya 'tshal thabs ni rnam pa bzhi/ /khral dang
145b2(mdo 'grel): sdud dang dpya dang ni/ /phra ma dang ni skyo ma mtshungs/ /de nas dbye dang nye bar 'gyed/ /u pa d+ha ni chos sogs kyi/ /gang zhig nye bar blta ba'o/ /drug ni blta bar byed pa ste/ /gang zhig gsum sogs spyod yul lo/ /mtshungs pa blo thub yid ches so/ /nyams

145b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ gang de so sor bstan pa'o/ /nges bstan kun tu bstan pa dang/ /mdogs bstan gdams pa bstan pa dang/ bstan pa/ dka' dang/ rjes su gnang/ /khrims lugs dang ni 'dzin pa'o/ /kun tu gnas dang yul chos dang/ /yang dag rab 'dzin kun tu 'ching/ /nges

146a1(mdo 'grel): dang phung po skyob/ /nges 'jug dang ni khyogs can dang/ /byi dor can dang A ThA byed/ /rab tu rtsom dang bka' lung ngo/ /rnga yab dang ni g.yo byed do/ /rnga yab rnga ma sbu can dang/ /sa raM/ tsA ba tsU la kaM/ kra ye rlung yab lus gcig pa/ /po ma guts+tshe kaM dang

149a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rab mgyogs rgyug par byed dang mgyogs/ 'dod 'gro rjes su 'dod pa dang/ /kun tu myur dang shin tu myur/ /rgyal dang rgyal nus dze tum te/ dze ya rgyal bar sems dpa' o/ /a b+hya mi ta/ /grogs ngan dang/ /skya log zhes ba de
