149a3(mdo 'grel): tA rgyal can rgyal bar byed/ /dpa' bo rab stobs rnams gnon can/ /dpa' spyod/ shor ba/ stag shar dang/ g.yul na brjid dang legs pa dang/ /rkang thang gzhan la thob byed pa'o/ /rgyal mtshan can dang bzhon pa can dmag dpon tu dar sde
149a4(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /dmag dang dpung ni chas pa'o/ /stobs kyi sde dang 'khor lo dang/ /tshogs pa dang ni ba dan can/ /de nas nA sI raM dang ni/ /'dren pa dang ni sngon 'gro mtshungs/ /dpungs tshogs rnams kyi bkod pa ni/ /de dbye dbyug sogs 'khrug shoms so//
149a5(mdo 'grel): thang dkar zlum pa'i dbyug par 'gyur/ /longs spyod rjes su spyod par brjod/ /dkyil 'khor kun sbyin zlum po ni/ /so sor spyod pa 'dus pa'o/ /slar 'brang bkod pa phyi ma'o/ /dmag gi rgyab ni yongs 'dzin pa/ /glang po shing rta re re dang/ /rta pa
149a6(mdo 'grel): gsum dang rkang thang lnga/ /padA ti kA zhes pa'o/ /so sor yan lag sum 'gyur gyis/ se nA mu khe'i rim pas gzhan/ /sum 'gyur gulmi ga NOo dang/ /ba ha nI d+ha da/ pri tA nAM/ tsa mUM/ A ni ki nI dang/ /de bcu ak+Sho hi NAr 'dod/ /phun tshogs
149a7(mdo 'grel): 'byor ldan dpal dang shis/ /phongs pa ma 'byor phun tshogs bral/ /ngal gyis sa bsrung chen por 'gyur/ /ngal gnas/ mtshon cha/ /la lpha ri/ gzhu dang tsA ba/ d+hu mu dang/ /mda' phan dang ni karmu ka/ /mnga' mo mnga' dang/ mda' rnon dang/ a pasdri Na trA twi
149b1(mdo 'grel): Na/ /tA d+ha nu dang/ gu NI tA/ /gzhu mchog dang ni/ a sha'o/ /gAN+Di ba dang gaN+Di ba/ /changs zung dang ni rna ba dang/ /rgyab nag mda' yi zas can no/ /gzhu yi mchog ma mu Ta nI/ /ta lam lag 'khrag lag stan no/ /go bA dang ni las sta ka/ chang zung dang ni gzhu yi rgyud//
149b2(mdo 'grel): gzhu rgyud srad bu rgyud yon tan/ /ga byaM dang ni tA ra bi/ /mda''phen mtshon cha/ lakAM dang/ mda' bsnan dbug bya 'phen pa dang/ /mtshan ma dang ni so so'i lus/ /drang lta rab 'gro mda'i spyod yul/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas brkyang la sogs pa'i/ /gnas
149b3(mdo 'grel): 'di rnams la lnga zhes so/ /mda' dang lam ldan shA ya ka/ bA Na/ tshor can i Shu dang/ /mi 'khyog dang ni mkha' la 'gro/ sgro ldan skra ba skyes 'dra dang/ /shar nag phran ro pa dang/ tshogs can dang ni pri Sha rka/ /rtse mo can dang myur 'gro dang/ /gshog
149b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'bab byed b+ha la dang/ /k+She la kaM ka mtshon cha'i 'dab/ /ka Ta ka ka rnam par 'don/ /'ben snun dpa' 'joms rab 'joms dang/ bA dzi na dang/ bi karg+ha/ 26 /de nas phyogs can 'gro byed dang/ /gsum khas sta dang gcod byed dang/ /'gro ldan 'dab
149b5(mdo 'grel): ldan bkod pa can/ b+hal+li/ b+hal+la la sogs mnga' / /lcags mnga' sgra chen lcags sbubs can/ /mtshon cha'i gtso bo zhes pa'o/ /rtse mo'i tshal tshol byed dang/ /mtshon cha tshad ldan mu Na ya/ /dug can li sta mda' phyogs dang/ /lista ko zhes pa rnams so/ /ni ra ta
149b6(mdo 'grel): ni mda''phangs pa/ /'gro ldan 'dor byed shA ya ka /mda' dang grol ba rnam par gcod/ /'bar byed dang ni shugs drag go /zla ba phyed pa po can dang/ /pra sogs sgo dang d+hA rA'o/ /tU Na tU Ni ra dag mtshungs/ /des chags dang ni mda''dzin no/ /nye bar chags
149b7(mdo 'grel): dang chogs can dang/ /mda' yi gnas dang bi pA tha/ /ral gri dang ni dkyil 'khor can/ /rtse mo can dang kri bA Na/ /a si gcod byed shA ya ka/ lag skyong zla ba 'dzum byed dang/ sgrol byed skyob byed gcod byed dang/ /shang lang dang ni brdeg cha dang/ /bzang
150a1(mdo 'grel): bdag skyes dang pha rol skyes/ /mtshon cha'i gzhi dang 'dzin byed 'dzin/ /dug can dang ni rnam 'joms dang/ dpal gyi snying po las rnon dang/ /rjes su gtso dang/ shis byed dang/ /21 phub dang pha la ka zhes so/ /pags ldan drang po'i ral
150a2(mdo 'grel): gri dang/ /ka TI ta la/ arga naM/ 'khor lo'i cha can g.yul du 'dzin/ /se ru ral gri'i yu ba ste/ /de yi 'ching thag mo kha la/ /prA tya kA ra/ ka la ha/ /si d+ha na ka ral gri'i shubs/ /tho ba 'joms byed g+ha na'o/ /dbyug pa lcags bcings pa ri g+ha//
150a3(mdo 'grel): skyed gri ka ra pA lI'o/ b+hindi pA la mda' thung mtshungs/ /dgra sta sta ri gcod byed dang/ /sta mo zhes pa'o dgra sta'i 'og /gcang byad go zing dang gri gri gug/ chu gri gri thung ts+tshu ri kA/ mdzod kyi ral gri ral gri'i bu/ /mda' bo che ni to ma ra/ mdung dang mtshon ring
150a4(mdo 'grel): thag mdung dang/ /pa rA ba dang/ sha la rnams/ /mdung thung dang ni kA sh+ri mtshungs/ /'phang mdung/ sor mdung/ bir shang ga/ mdung dang mtshams can zhes pa'o/ /rtse gsum pa dang mtshams gsum pa/ /phur bu/ brtan pa/ shaM ku dang/ zhi ba me tog cha rnams
150a5(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /sna mdor ko Ta ya zhes so/ /zur dang mtshon cha rnam pa bzhi/ lag grol 'khrul 'khor grol ba dang/ /muk+tA/ pu ka/ muk+ta kaM/ lag grol ba/ k+ti la sogs te/ /grol ba chu gri la sogs pa/ /muk+twA muk+ta gsal shing sogs? 'khrul 'khor grol ba mda' la
150a6(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /mda' skyong mda' ni ring ba la/ /phyi rol des dang paTTi sham/ /dbyug pa/ gsal shing be con dang/ /'khor lo la sogs mtshon rigs dang/ /mda' dang mtshon cha goms pa ni/ /u bA pa naM khur lI/ /rgyal pos dmag la mnga' gsol byed//
150a7(mdo 'grel): dgra la dpung ni sngon 'gro dang/ /gang zhig dmag 'gro de dbang bskur/ /phyir rgol byed dang phyir sngon 'gro/ 'thab skyod shin tu 'gog pa'o/ /kun tu 'thab dang 'khrug pa dang/ /dmag 'joms pa dang nges par 'jug /dmag 'gro skyod
150b1(mdo 'grel): dang theg pa dang/ /zhugs dang 'gro ba ga la'o/ /'jug dang de ru gnas pa dang/ /yul lta pra tir thar 'dod/ /brkyang pa dang ni ru brkyangs dang/ /pha rol dmag nang 'jug pa'i don/ /bai tA li kA go phyed pa/ /bde ba sgrub par byed pa'o/ /'khor lo can dang dril bu can/ /mnyam dka' dang
150b2(mdo 'grel): ni sbrang can mtshungs/ /gcer bu bstod pa'i brtul zhugs dang/ /phyag 'tshal go ra ga stong 'don/ /tho rangs mdo ni rab 'don dang/ /dbyangs dang bkra shis brjod byed pa/ /longs spyod stobs ldan phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed rgyal/ /phye ma dang
150b3(mdo 'grel): ni k+Sho da'o/ /nye bar 'khrug dang 'gyed pa'o/ /'dzings pa dang ni phyogs med do/ /sngon gyi 'dzin pa mchod pa dang/ /longs spyod tshogs dang yongs rdzogs nyid/ /ba dan/ rnam par rgyal byed dang/ /rgyal mtshan tag dang mkha' i snye ma/ /ka d+ha lI dang kard+ha lI/ /bsags
150b4(mdo 'grel): ldan mtshon byed d+ha dza'i/ /a ba tsU la uts+tshu la/ /'phel byin kha dang kurba ka/ dur khrod 'khrug pa'i sa gzhi dang/ /shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu ster/ /nga snga nga snga zhes pa dang/ /bdag ni snga'o zhes bya ba/ /mtshar can skyes bu dregs pa can/ /de ni nga rgyal can dang bdag/
150b5(mdo 'grel): dad ces smra phan mun 'gran/ /gang zhig 'gran par byed pa'o/ /shugs can thal 'gro brtul phod dang/ /stobs ldan dpa' dang nyam dmad/ /'joms byed mthu dang brtson 'grus dang/ /nus pa srog dang pha rol gnon/ 14 /rnam gnon dang ni shin tu dpa' //
150b6(mdo 'grel): gnod ba'i gnas su 'joms byed pa/ /dpa' bo mchog ni gang zhig gi/ chang thung g.yul gyi snga phyi ru/ /'khrug pa 'gyed pa rgyal byed pa/ /saM k+Sha/ mri d+hi/ sa lI ka/ du byed dang ni ka da naM/ /rab tu rnam par 'joms pa dang/ /g.yul du 'thab dang rtsod pa dang/
150b7(mdo 'grel): saM yu ga dang kan rab 'joms/ /g.yul gyi 'du byed rtsod pa che/ /rnam 'dzin g.yul las skyes pa gang/ /mi bde g.yul 'gyed a dzi ni/ /sa mi yu d+ha zhes bya'o/ /g.yul du 'thab mos phan tshun dag/ mnyam du shi ba a naM ka/ dge bral saM spho Ta zhes
151a1(mdo 'grel): 'dod/ /sAm+ba ra yi ki dang ni/ /mngon par nyed dang yang dag 'joms/ /'khrug long rnams ni spyi yin no/ /du byed mi bzad 'thab mo'o/ /mtshon med g.yul sha tu mu la/ /dpung pas 'thab ba ni yurta/ /glang bo'i bum pa'i sgra dang ni/ ? sgra 'thal
151a2(mdo 'grel): dang dgra kun 'phel/ /glang sgra seng ge'i 'ur sgra dang/ /'khrug snga pa Ta ha yi sgra/ /mtshungs so ta raTTa dang ni/ /mngon gsal rdzas dang a raTTa/ /snyems pa'i garga ra rnams so/ /dpa' bo'i brtson pa dpa' bo'i rgyud/ /dreg rtsom ma Ta ka Ti'o/ /g.yo sgyu ngan
151a3(mdo 'grel): thabs na tha'o/ /de nas 'khrul dang nor pa dang/ /'chi byed 'chir 'jug shi ba dang/ /nges zin slar yang bskor ba'o/ /rgyal dang myos dang 'bog pa dang/ /mnar ba dang ni mtshar ba'o/ /rmas ba lus nyams ltung ba'o/ /'dras dang rtsan dang slar byed
151a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /khon zhugs pa dang sha khos zhugs 'jigs dang b+ho lo snying stor dang/ /par+Na ga Ta zhes bya'o/ /bros dang byer dang nye bar bros/ shin tu bros dang rnam par bros/ /phyir song ba dang phyir log dang/ /kun tu bros dang khyus pa'o/ /ce sbyang can dang mche ba
151a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'du byed dang ni rnam par 'phyo/ dus mtshan 'jigs byed shing rta mo/ /g.yul du bcom dang gzhan rgyal dang/ /'pham pa dang ni pha rol rgyal/ /yib pa dang ni bskyabs pa'o/ /ma lus gsod dang ngas pa bsnun/ /gsod ba dang ni brdeg ba dang
151a6(mdo 'grel): brdung btag dang ni rab tu 'joms/ rnam bar gnon dang 'jug byed dang/ /'tshe byed yongs dor gnas med byed/ /gos med stan med gnas med dang/ /tsa ka da ni nor 'joms dang/ nges 'tshe nges gnod nges par sel/ /gnas sngo/ /gzhan nas
151a7(mdo 'grel): nges 'gugs dang/ /sel byed dang na snab sems dang/ /ni shun+tan/ nges par gtser/ /rab 'joms mner dang mnar ba dang/ /kun thob rnams 'gro shin tu bsrub/ /'joms dang 'tshed dang/ /gnod pa dang/ gnod byed/ 'gro byed/ 'tshe
151b1(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rkyen dang rnam 'dor rab 'jal 'jug rnam bsnun srub byed yongs 'jal 'jug/ chung za byed dang rnam zhi byed/ /'joms dang nges sel rnam 'tshe byed/ /de bskyed ces pa rnams su 'gyur/ 57 /gnyid log mtshan mo gsad pa shi/ ge dang me dang chu dag go
151b2(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa dang ni 'bras bu bcas/ /lnga ba nyid du dus kyi chos/ /lta ba'i mdza' dang 'jigs pa dang/ /shin tu 'gro dang nges par thim/ /ring dang/ chas du/ kun tu gnas/ /lnga nyid mdza' dang zhig pa dang/ /'chi dang/ shi dang/ nub pa dang/ /nges par lhung dang
151b3(mdo 'grel): sa thob ba'o/ 19 /ro dang/ rab thob lnga ba nyid/ /tshe 'das nyer thab rab tu bkod/ /gzhan song/ rab thim/ kun tu gnas/ /rab song dang ni gzhan du song/ /bcu pa zhes pa rnams sa 'gyur/ 10 ro dang/ phung po/ gnas son dang/ /ro sha/ sa 'phel/ gnas skabs
151b4(mdo 'grel): lnga/ 6 mthar 'gyur dang ni/ bA ru tha/ ro khri can dang khA Ti dang/ /ro yi shing rta shing gi gyang?/ 6 ka band+ha dang/ byed ldan ni/ mgau dang bral khog pa'o/ /dur khrod dang ni pha mas nags/ /drag po rol pa zhi ba'i gnas/ /'jigs gnas/ bsrag/ ra yi gnas
151b5(mdo 'grel): ro thab sgrong bug tsa ting pa/ /shing gi gi nas zhes bya pa'o/ /ri mos bkra dang mchod rten dang/ /rtag par ro khar byur pu'o/ /legs byas bslur sti dam pa byed/ /mchog tu byed pa rnams? yin no/ /rab zung/ nyed bzung bzung bya dang/ /phyag byed pa dang ma ti'o//
151b6(mdo 'grel): btson ra bcings pa'i khang ba dang/ /khri mon dang ni chang ba'i khyim/ /shing gnas/ shing khyim/ tshad can bcings/ /skyes bu'i srog ni pra Na'o/ /de bzhin 'tsho dang gson pa dang/ /tshe na ji srid 'tsho ba'i dus/ /skyes bu 'tsho byed 'tsho ba'i sman/ /dmag gi
151b7(mdo 'grel): yan lag gis ba tu byed pa'o// //zhes ba snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkad pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan mu tig phreng ba las rgyal rigs kyi sde rdzogs so//
152a1(mdo 'grel): brla byung/ brla skyes/ dzau dang/ rje rigs 'dzin rje'u/ 6 kun tu 'tsho ba dang/ /'tsho ba dang/ /gson byed so nam 'tsho tshis so/ /'tsho bar byed dang 'jug byed do/ /skye bo 'jig rten skye dgu rnams/ /zhing ba/ phyugs skyong/ tshong byed dang/ /'tsho ba'i chos zhes
152a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'o/ /zhabs thog 'jug byed/ lta ba dang/ /bden par brjod dang zhing las dang/ /bden dang shi pony+tsa dang ni/ /rmo rko dang ni phru klog go ma bslangs pa dang/ a mri ta/ /bslangs pa dang ni mri ta'o/ /prA mi tyaM ni skyed kyis 'tsho/ /bu lon dang ni parya dang/ /bskyi ba dang
152a3(mdo 'grel): ni g.yar ba dang/ /rje ba dang ni bsgyur brlog go so sor sbyin dang rnam par rje/ nges pa yongs su 'jug pa dang/ /rje dang yongs 'jug cha gzhan dang/ /nor gyi rab tu sbyor ba dang/ /le lo can dang skyed kyis 'tsho/ /ma lAk+Shi kA ha zhes dang/ /ra Ni d+ha ba bden
152a4(mdo 'grel): mi bden/ /bi shan ni/ bu lon gtong/ /skyed pa dang ni nor spel ba/ /'dzin pa can dang sbyor ba la/ /ut+ta ma ni rab sbyor ba/ /spel ba spo dang spel bas 'tsho/ /log min byed dang log 'tsho ba/ /legs pa dang ni nyis 'gyur ba/ /zhing ba shas pa son mig/ khru
152a5(mdo 'grel): rlog ba dang rmos pa dang/ /bram ze zhes pa 'di dag mtshungs/ /rab rje ba dang nus ldan dang/ /shor ba pa dang 'khor lo skyong/ /zhing dang 'bru shas pa le yi/ /'bru dang sa lu 'byung ma'o/ /nas dang nas zhing dug thu ba/ nas sogs 'byung ba'i sa
152a6(mdo 'grel): gzhi'o/ /til zhing dang ni til skye ba/ /aau mI ni dang sran ma skye/ /sran ma can dang b+hi gI ta/ /bcang bya gzhan lam dag pa'o/ /thog gnyis moM gyi khri tshe dang/ /sran sogs skye dang bzod pa'o/ /sa bon btsugs dang bskrun pa dang/ /btab dang smos
152a7(mdo 'grel): dang skyed pa'o/ /gsum log dang ni lan gsum pa/ /gsum brlog gsum smos de la yang/ /gnyis 'gyur byas dang de bzhin du/ /thams cad sam+bA kri ti mo/ /bre dang bre bo che sogs tshad/ /bre can bre bo che can sogs/ /bA rI tshad can khA rI ka/ marta
152b1(mdo 'grel): par+No dang pa'o/ /zhing dang sa gzhi 'bru skye dang/ /'bruM sa chu ma mu tshigs can/ /rmo ba zhing ba sa gzhi tshogs/ /bong ba dang ni sa sgong dang/ /ko Ti ri dang ko Ti dang/ /she loSh+Ta sogs dbye ba'o/ lcag pa dbyig pa to tri dang/ /bra dzAn dang gzir byed do/ /zor ba
152b2(mdo 'grel): dang ni rnga byed do/ /tog rtse dang ni rko byed do/ /gshol dang thong ba rmo byed dang/ /ri rI shaM dang lang+ga la/ /pha laM phung po can ha laM/ /sa 'joms dang ni ku dA la/ /ma ni rnam par 'joms pa'o/ /gshol chen dzi tpa ha lI dang/ /sA mya'o gnya' shing gnya' phur dang
152b3(mdo 'grel): gshol mda' gshol gyi dbyig pa'o/ /dong? dang rmo glang bart+ta ti/ /pags dang skul byed rim pa las/ /srab dang 'dzin sbyad ces pa yang/ /stong bur dang ni 'dogs pa'i shing/ /gang du phyugs rnams 'ching ba'o/ /kha lA d+ha no kha la mtshungs/ /rda
152b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang ni gcod pa'o/ /ba rI ta pa sa bon yin/ /'bras dkar 'bru dang pa Ta la/ /'bru dbye an+na sbin dang/ tshogs can bod kyi sran ma dang/ /ha re Nu dang khaN+Di kA khri li ku dang khre rgod do/ /bkra shis dang ni sran chung dang/ /mon sran 'bru ser gre'u 'o/ /gro dang yid
152b5(mdo 'grel): bzad kla klo'i zas/ /rab sgrim zhes pa 'di dag go /pri ka dkar po ya tsa dag /trok+Sha kha dog ljang ser ro/ /barba Ta ni sran ma'i rgyal/ /sran dkar nas kyi 'khri shing ngo/ /sran ma yongs mnyam murkha dang/ /tsan ka dang 'phrog byed sbub bo/ /mung+ga dang ni 'phrog
152b6(mdo 'grel): byed do/ /muta nag po nags skye dang/ /dpyid skyes nags kyi mung+ga dang/ /mung+ga brkyed pa dag mtshungs te/ /til skyes dang ni dgos pa'i til/ /til gyi phung po dzA Ti la/ /ko Da pa dang ko tra pa/ /byin 'joms de nas yungs nag la/ /tshogs can sa ri ba
152b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /tsha ba'i snum can tan tu b+ha/ /yungs kar don grub zas tsang dang/ /'byung po 'jigs byed ces pa'i/ /ska tshe/ k+Shu d+ha/ mngon skyed dang/ A shwa rI dang nag mo dang/ /k+Sha ba dang ni yungs kar rgyal/ /ku lat+tha dang nges snum dang/ /zangs?
153a1(mdo 'grel): kyi gtsug phung kul+la Sha/ /ya ba ka rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /mA tu lA ni b+hang+gA'o/ /zar ma u mu k+Shu mI'o/ /tsaN+Di kA ni/ tsang+ga TI/ gaM ge Sh+Shi zhes bya ba ni/ /ka Ta sharka rA zhes so/ /rtsa dang so ba des sgrib dang/ /sdo bsangs kA sh+ya thun 'gro
153a2(mdo 'grel): mtshungs/ /lo tog rtse mo ki sha ru kha la tog snye ma ka ne shaM/ so ba 'bru dang lkogs can dang/ /stam+ba guts+tsha rtsa sogs 'bru/ /za byed tsha ba'i 'joms pa ni/ /lo tog rnams kyi gcod byed do/ /mgul pa dar ba sdong bu dang/ /pA lA la dang 'bras
153a3(mdo 'grel): bu med/ /sbun stong dang ni phub ma dang/ /skogs pa dang ni spun pa'o/ /rtse mo dang ni gra ma dang/ /rno ba sha mi sim+bA'o/ /so pa'i tshogs pa d+hA n+ya yin/ /gtsang ba dang mang byas dang/ /sran ma la sogs gang bu 'aM 'bru/
153a4(mdo 'grel): snye ma'i 'bru ni nas la sogs/ /ka lA la sogs sA le rnams/ /drug bu pa la sogs pa'o/ /ga pe/ bgrod dka' / pe d+hu kA/ /rgya che'i rtsa dang dgu luny+tsu/ /zegsma phra mo tAN+Da la/ /lcags rtse dang ni gtun shing dang/ /gtun dang u dU kha
153a5(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /kaN+Da ra dang pA TI ra/ /tshogs sa dang ni khrol ma'o/ /blo ma dang ni 'khrab byed do?/ /khras dang thub po sgya la tshe?/ /rtsa khras ki lin+dza ka dang/ /sbyangs dang nges sbyangs 'bru'i bad pa/ /ku shu la ka/ uSh+TaM kA/ lus ldan snod dang padsA?
153a6(mdo 'grel): na/ kA tsa'i snod dang snod dpyad dang/ /lhung bzed dang ni a ma tro?/ /bre skyong/ ru khA/ s+tha lI dang/ /me thab dang ni si thar/ /bum pa bum chu pa'i ba dang/ /ka la sha dang bum pa'i rgyal/ /mgrin bug can dang kum+b+ha dang/ /sa li g+ha zhes bya ba yang
153a7(mdo 'grel): ra shA lA dza ti/ 'tshe bya ba/ kham por dang ni rdza phor ngo/ /chu khang kha chod sa ldan dang/ /sa tsan bA ra sa naM d+ha/ /sa da naM dang chu 'dzin 'phel/ /buM can ma dz+nya ri dang mtshungs/ /rdza ma dang ni/ btso rdza'o/ /chu yi snod dang chu rdza'o/ /nan+ta sha? nA? ka Ta ha
153b1(mdo 'grel): chu snod mtshungs pa kA ra dang/ /lo b+han+ti kA su ta'o/ /snum zan ma dang dul ma dang/ /mkhar ba dang ni btung ba'i snod/ /lcags can rtsub ba sol+la dang/ /ku tu ko spubs snum gyi snod/ /de nyid chung ma tut+ta ya/ /shing dang lcags las byas pa yi/ /gzar bu kau pi kA
153b2(mdo 'grel): ma le/ /su da Ta? dang zan ma dang/ /g.yos ma dang ni lag bde ba/ /mchod byed pa dang gnas byed pa/ /thab kha ba zhes bya ba'o/ /phyag tshad ba dang zas gnyer ba/ /zas byed pa zhes bya ba rnams/ /tshang mang dang ni ro ldan dang/ /mchod pa'i gnas dang g.yos
153b3(mdo 'grel): khang ngo/ /thab dang sgyi bu me thab dang/ /tsu li dang ni g.yos pa'o/ /bar+Ni ha pin+tA? twiSh+ga g+h+ri ta bi sha bA/ ga ti b+hi Ta lya rbaM su skri ta pya shwitkaM ya Na? si skri ta su ti swAtA yongs thob phun tshogs gya nom dang/ /yongs su sbyangs dang legs par sbyar/ /snum brdos snum? btsos
153b4(mdo 'grel): mdangs dang ldan/ /ltar ltar dang ni mal mul lo/ /legs sbyangs pa dang dag byas mtshungs/ /mtshungs pa 'gyur bA si ta/ /mdung dang dag ba'i bar gsum mo/ /ma smin pa dang bsru bu zas/ /rma med pa dang ma nyams pa/ /'bras yos bcag pa so brdos?
153b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin urhu? Shu zhes dang TaM/ /yos dang su Ta d+h'n+yad nga?/ /tsam ka dang byings pa can/ /yos dang nas brdos ba dag dag/ yos bkra mdzes pa'i rma can dang/ /bcad bya dang ni gang ma can/ /po la ba Ta ka dang ni/ /ShiSh+TA gang ba can zhes so/ /shing sgril gnas
153b6(mdo 'grel): dang tsam sa?/ /yongs bcod dang ni bcad bya mtshungs/ /thug ba lo gro phye bag phyer brjod/ /zas dang rjes su myos pa dang/ /bza' ba dang ni rab dang byed/ /'khrugs dang tshod dang tshigs ba mtshungs/ /zas dang lto zhes bya ba dang/ /ro kun dang po khu ba'o
153b7(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu tsam khu ba dang/ /thug pa khu ba zan? los? myung?/ /snyigs ma phye ma bza' ba dang/ /ro can shA ba d+hA li kA/ me rdza lcags snod me gzhong dang/ /rdod gzhi slang nga ther po'o/ /thod pa dang ni ras bal mtshungs/ /gzer bu dang ni lag skyo gso/
154a1(mdo 'grel): lo ma sngo yi lo ma dang/ /dar? pa sdong bu chu ba'o/ /sped dang kha dog sgyur byed do/ /ka Dampa dang ka lam+ba/ /be la pa ra yo byad do/ /zi ra dza ra a dzA dzi/ /yul dpus skyes sogs shI ka ra/ /zegs ma snang byed ka ra bI/ /zi ra nag po rgya chen ma/ /gro
154a2(mdo 'grel): bzang can dang yangs ma dang/ /dus nye ba dang kuny+dzi kA/ /sgye'u gsher dang rwa can no/ /de nyid sman chen sga dang ni/ nA ga raM dang ku la sman/ /chen po'i sman dang thams cad pa/ /sna tshogs 'gro dang ba lu dza/ /pho ba ris nag mu Sha NaM/ /ko la kaM dang chos kyi

154b1(mdo 'grel): rtsi sbyar ba ra sa lA/ /tshod ma dang ni thug pa dang/ /tsha ba rnams ni mtshungs pa'o/ /'byor ba b+h+ri Sh+TaM/ b+ha ru? 154b2(mdo 'grel): bA ka li/ /pA tsa lam rnams mtshungs pa'o/ /rtsa byas/ bsreg sha shu lam bya'o/ /btsos pa'i sha ni pai tha raM/ /sid+d+ha zho yis bsres pa'o/ /'o ma mar sar dag kho na/ /lA ba ni kaM/ sA rbbi twaM/ zhag lon til gyi bza' ba la/ /aau da kri Sha/ aau ta stwi ta//
154b3(mdo 'grel): 'bras thug dang ni ya ba gu/ thug pa kyo tsha tar la/ /ngom/ 'grangs/ tshim dang/ chog pa'o/ /kres dang/ longs sbyor/ sha za can/ za 'dod/ za/ ltogs/ zas la gdungs/ /bza' ba kha zas ldan pa dang/ /zas dang/ bza' rgyu/ nyin mo pa/ b+hak+Sha

155b7(mdo 'grel): su/ /ni pA naM dang da ha nI/ sru pa ma'i rdza ma mtshungs pa'o/ /srub ma srub shing na n+than/ /srub ma dang ne zho skya'o/ /ta kra Ta dang zhe bsgral dang/ /srub ma bdun pa zhes pa'o/ /srub ma'i ka ba ku tha ro/ /zhi ba'i phung pa ni Sh+ka m+b+ha/ /srub thag sandan? dben?

157a1(mdo 'grel): gshog pa mar gang dang/ /rdo yi snying po nor bu ljang/ /pa dA rA ga dmar po dang/ /ku ru pinda/ shme nA sma/ ri bzang can dang rin chen dmar/ /ya ba rpo la/ /dpal me tog/ nor bu chen po byu ru dang/ /'khri shing nor bu tsa kri kan/ /lus dmar

157b1(mdo 'grel): mchog mdog ldan su rA b+hi/ /29 rwa can rgyan gser/ rwa can gser/ /mi zad gser la ka lyAM naM/ /dngul la tshon can arga DaM/ khardzu ra dkar mdog ngan dang/ /'khyog po'i sa bon tA nga'o/ /7 zangs pa shu lnga nyi ma yi/ /ljon dmar u dum+ba ra dang/ /dmar po kla klo'i

157b7(mdo 'grel): po/ /pI tAM/ byi la'i mig /ro ma pra ta naM zhes so/ /11 ldong ra so dang ni gar ngan ma/ yid 'bod ma dang klu lca ma'o/ /bal mo sa yi gar ma dang/ /go la dri rto mu zi'i dri/ /dri bzangs dang ni mig la phan/ /rigs can ku larthi kA'o/ /dus kyi me tog ze/ /pauShpiM//
158a1(mdo 'grel): dang ku shu'i khams/ /kA shi shaM dang many+dza naM/ /dus kyi padmo las skyes dang/ /phug ro na skyes dang dpal bzang skyes/ /chu srol mig sman sau nI rA/ /mig sman ga tis ya mu naM/ /mig sman nag po chu klung skyes/ /rgyun gyi mig sman mig
158a2(mdo 'grel): gi rgyan/ /spang ma'i mig sman rtse can mgrin/ /sngon po dang ni rma bya can/ /btsos pa las byung spang ma'o/ /spang ma brtul ba darbi ka /mig sman sngon po bya khyung rto/ /khu ba'i mig sman khu ba'i snying/ /kA shi Sha khams kA shI kham/ /la bargan ka ma lus dang mchog/ yang
158a3(mdo 'grel): dag tshon dang me'i rtse mo/ /grong gi gur gum zhes pa rnams/ /brag zhun don phan rin skyes dang/ /rdo skyes shi lA dza tu dang/ /rto pa'i nad ces bya ba'o/ /dbyar rtsi gong bu dri sbyin dang/ /ri bong gos srog can dang/ /ra sa ganha ganho ra/ /gnag tsha 'phel bya ba rnams/ 9/

162a1(mdo 'grel): lits+tsha la ro pi Tu(mdo 'grel): 3 khye'u rtse dang gnas 'joms dang/ /'dod pa'i rtsed mo rnams sun 'byin/ /b+ho lo be lu ha la sh+rai ba be la sa bi b+hA wa li se/ la te pa krok+ti ra ti re ts+tsha kA la tshtshe ki lA bu b+hau/ yan lag mchog dang gzugs sngan?  dang//

162a6(mdo 'grel): gyis zin par de brjod do/ /gang zhig bud med skyes pa yi/ /mtshan ma rig byed rgya mtsho pa/ /rma gzir ba dang gnad la reg/ /gnad du phog dang gnad 'byed pa'o/ /'brel pa can dang yon tan ldan/ /ldan dang bya ldan las la brtson/ /las

162b1(mdo 'grel): dang rang du byed/ /skye bo'i bya ba grong ldan dang/ /grong bya grong dang ldan pa'o/ /'dres par spyod dang ci 'grub byed/ /ngan dang dman pa byed mkhos chung/ /nyams chung stobs chung sgrub pa las/ /'dres ma'i lam du 'phags pa'o/ /gti mug rmongs par?
162b2(mdo 'grel): ji bzhin skyes/ /shes pa gzhan dang ma la brtan/ /mdog med dang ni mtshan nyid med/ /lta ba dman dang 'jigs bcas so/ /'gro med kun tu bsgribs pas 'tsho/ /skyabs tshol mngon zhugs skyabs ngan gnyer/ /rjes skyab dang mtshan
162b3(mdo 'grel): nyid med/ /ltags pa dang ni bkres pa dang/ /bru ba tsha dang zas 'dod pa/ /bkros gyur kres dang lo ma za/ /ku TI ba ga gzhan za dang/ /gzhan gyi bsod snyoms za ba dang/ /gzhan skyes gzhan la reg pa'o/ /kun zas kun gyis 'tsho ba'o/ /'dod
162b4(mdo 'grel): pa can dang rje can dang/ /a mi gyu dang 'dod sred can/ /bskams dang shin tu rmongs pa'o/ /snyoms las sgyid snyoms sgyid skyur dang/ /'jas po dang ni tha shal lo/ /bdag 'gengs dang ni rang grong 'gengs/ /bdag gis gsus pa 'ges?

166b7(mdo 'grel): dang gnyis gshen gces pa'o/ /mthong bya pa sho h+ri ta'o/ /lcags sgrog a narla na'o/ /tshig mang gcig gis dbye ba dang/ /skra bregs pa dang/ gzhar ba'o/ /mnyes pa subs pa bur ba dang/ /rnam bab 'gro dang 'gyur ba'o/ /bar du sod dang

171b4(mdo 'grel): ba gnyis/ /sbal ba dang ni ba lang bshed/ /zas dang byed pa ta rku Ta/ /nyin mo ma tsu kaM ma ning mA mA dzyi ti rta rnams kyi'o// //zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming
171b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan mu tig phreng ba las 'dres pa'i sde rdzogs so// //skad dod gcig gis don du mar 'jug pa'i mngon brjod nor bu'i khred ba bzhugs so// //sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs dang ka sogs rim pa las/ /gtan phab
171b6(mdo 'grel): ka? 'ang sogs pa'i mdza' / /yi ge gnyis pa la yang yod/ nges pa ka sogs rim pa las/ /ka(mdo 'grel): ni tshangs pa/ rlung/ nyi ma/ /me dang/ gshin rje/ bdag nyid dang/ /gsal ba dang ni 'gro ba la'o/ /kraM ni mgo dang/ chu dang/ bde/ /ku'i sgra/ sa dang ngan pa la//
171b7(mdo 'grel): a ka sdug bsngal/ sdig pa la/ /arka /ri mo/ mtshan mo dang/ /mtshan ma dang ni mtshan nyid dang/ /gar la sogs dang/ le'u dang/ /phang pa dang ni/ gzugs can la/ /an+ta ka ni/ ri mo/ 'khrug /sngags dang gnas dang rgyan dag la'o/ /arka/ nyi ma/ arka'i 'dab//
172a1(mdo 'grel): brgya byin shel dang zangs dag la/ /e ka/ gtso bo/ grogs po dang/ /gang zhig cig ra shos min pa la/ /kaM ka 'dab chags bye brag dang/ /mthar byed/ sgo gregs/ gnyis skyes la/ /karka rin chen/ karke ta/ /me dang/ rta dkar/ me long/ buM/ bska/?
172a2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa/ gshang pa dang/ /kiTTa/ skyon dang/ ngan g.yo dang/ /de bzhin til mar/ tshigs ma dang/ /sdig sems dang na ba? tu ra'o/ /kA ka /bya rog /gdan dang/ sprul/ /mgo ba/ bying/ gdong/ ngan pa dang/ /nga rgyal/ gling dang/ shing gi pa pa/ kA kA/ bya rog /byin pa dang//

172a7(mdo 'grel): srong dbye/ /padka/ 'dam dab sdig pa laM/ /pA ka /smin dang byis pa la/ /bA ka rgas dang yongs su smin/ /mthar thug pa dbang la ba la/ ba ga mthar byed/ zhi ba dang/ /srin po'i bye brag /lus ngan la/ /badka? chu sogs 'khyog pa dang/ /paryA na dang/ skal pa dang//
172b1(mdo 'grel): bcom pa la ni brjod bya ldan/ /badka/ shing shun snying lkogs duM/ /b+hU ka /bu ga /dus la'o/ /b+he ka /spal pa/ sprin dag pa/ /muSh+ke/ sgong? nga'i mdzod dang/ tshogs/ thar pa can dang/ yal ga can/ /mU ka/ ngag mi ldan dang/ dman/ /radka/ rta dang gyang dag la/ /rA kA mthong ba'i rdug?

175b7(mdo 'grel): TI dang/ /lcags dang 'khar ba rnams la'o/ /pri thu ka ni/ byis/ sna nyag /pU dA ku ni srog chags pra/ /bri dA ku ni/ sdig spu dang/ /stag dang khra bo dag la yang/ /pe tsa ka ni/ 'ug pa dang/ /glang po'i mjug ma'i rtsa dang rtsa/ /pa Ta ka ni po ti yi/ /sgom dang tshogs
176a1(mdo 'grel): pa can la'o/ /pra tI ka ni mi mthun dang/ /phyogs te ba dag go zlog dang/ /cha shas la'o pra be ka/ 'khrus dang/ shi ba dag la'o/ /prA na ka ni sems can rigs/ /bo la ka dang 'tsho byed shing/ /pri ya ka ni ka dam+ba/ /a ? ?tstsa tra lus
176a2(mdo 'grel): ngan dang/ /pri yaM ku dang ljang ser dang/ /gur kuM dang ni dga' byed la'o/ /pha la kaM ni bkod pa bkra/ /dar dbyangs lus kyi rab dbye dag /ba rA ka ni brjod bya ldan/ /spyad dang rjes rtse sang+ga ra/ /pa su ka ni/ zhi ba'i gyang/ /arka'i 'dab dang spu can
176a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ nyi ma dang ni sbal pa can/ /dA tyu ha dang khron pa la'o/ /bA ra ka ni rta'i bye brag/ rta'i 'gros dang dgag pa la/ /bArd+ha kaM ni rgan po'i tshogs/ /rgan po nyid dang rgan po'i las/ /hAM la ka ni mi shes byis/ /skra dang rta dang/ glang po dang/ /sgra can rnams la blta bar
176a4(mdo 'grel): bya/ bA la ka ni/ ngo tsha dang/ /bA ri harya sor gdub la/ /bA li kA ni bye ma byis/ /bo la kA ni rgyan la'o/ /bA lu kA ni bye ma la/ /bA lu kaM ni e la'i bye/ /briSh+Tzi ka ni sdig srin dang/ /shing dang khyim dang de bzhin sman/ /b+hasma ka ni thal nad dang/ /byi dang ga dang cha yi gter/ /tA lAM
176a5(mdo 'grel): ka ni dmar po dang/ /sngo yi bye brag rus sbal dang/ /'phrog byed/ mtshan nyid chen po rdzogs/ /skyes bu lag pa'i 'dab ma'o/ /b+hA ti kaM ni/ b+hI na mA/ /'bar byed ga bur gcod byed dang/ /sa can/ bkod pa sa yi ni/ /khyad par yongs su bzung ba'o/ /b+h+ra ma ka ni/ rtse sbyang dang
176a6(mdo 'grel): khram pa nyi 'khyims rdo'i bye brag /maN+DA ka ni sbal sprul dang/ /'ching ba'i rab dbye dmar po la/ lo ma la yang maN+DA ka/ maN+DU kI ni sgrang rtsi can/ /shing mngar zhes kyang bod pa dang/ /phyag dang phyogs kyi khyad par dang/ /shing mngar lo ma la yang ngo/ /mil+li ka dang/ mal+li kA/

176b1(mdo 'grel): por brjod/ /mA sa kaM ni mnyam nyid ldan/ /phreng ba dang ni mgul rgyan dang/ /do shal me tog phreng ba dang/ /mkha' lding chu klung khyad par la/ /me tsa ka ni sngo bsangs dang/ /rma bya'i mdongs dang mun pa la/ /me tsa kaM ni/ brjod bya bzhin/ /kha dog nag po la 'gyur ro/ /mo tsa ka ni
176b2(mdo 'grel): chu shing 'bras/ /de las skyes dang si gru la/ /ni rmo tsa ka tshags bral can/ /mo dag ni bca' ba yi/ /bye brag dga' byed gzhan bzhin no/ /ya ma kaM ni/ yang dag sdom/ /sgra'i rgyan dang mtshe ma skyes/ /dzA ga ka ni 'gro ba'i tshul/ /rgyal po'i glang po mchod pa can
176b3(mdo 'grel): yA dz+nyi ka ni mchod sbyin dang/ /ku sha mchod sbyin nyer sbyor la/ /su ta kaM ni byis pa dang/ /su mA/ rkang rtse/ the tshom dang/ /gos dbye/ bu mo'i gos g.yo dang/ /ldan pa la ni brjod bya ldan/ /mu thi ka ni 'dod pa dang/ /khyu dang/ nad med me tog 'ga' / /rak+ta
176b4(mdo 'grel): ka ni nad med dang/ /gnyen byed/ gos dmar rdzas chags la/ /ra dza ka ni/ rgyug pa dang/ /ne tsa pho dang btso lag mkhan/ /ra sI kA ni bcud ldan dang/ /gser dang ske rags dag la'o/ /rA dzi kA ni springs yig dang/ /nya pa/ ske tshe/ yungs dkar la'o/ /rA tri ka ni rje
176b5(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi/ khyim dang lo ni 'gro ba'o/ /rA tri kaM ni mtshan mo la'o/ /ru tsa kaM ni mgul rgyan dang/ /byi dang ga dang bkra shis rdzas/ /bshang pa/ phreng ba de'i rked dang/ /rus rgyan gi wang lha shing dang/ /skyur rtsi bI dza pU ra dang/ /gser la sogs pa'i dong tse la'o/ /ruN+Di
176b6(mdo 'grel): kA ni 'thab pa dang/ /sgo dang bsdus pa pho nya mo/ /re Nu kA ni glang mo dang/ /la mang agni'i dga' ma la/ /lam+bA ka ni/ yul/ rgyan gos/ /lA sa ka ni rol pa dang/ /sgeg pa'i byed po ma rdzogs pa/ /lU na ka ni/ phyugs tha dang/ /lo tsA ka ni mig 'bras dang/ /sha yi
176b7(mdo 'grel): gong du bsdus pa dang/ /btsun mo dang ni byis pa'i rgyan/ /dud pa/ sngon po 'dres pa dang/ /maurbI/ smin ma/ pags pa lhong/ /chu shing dag ni rna ba gang/ /nges pa'i blo gros rnams la'o/ /many+tsa ka ni grol ba dang/ /khram pa dang ni khyim pa dang/ /rta sre bo dang ces spyad la//
177a1(mdo 'grel): band+ha ka ni brje ba la/ /band+ha ki ni g.yo bcas ma/ /band+hu kaM ni rtsa lag 'tsho/ /band+hu ka ni gdong ser la/ /brda ka ni zlum po dang/ /bya'i bye brag rta'i rmig pa/ /bar+Na ka dang bar+Na kaM/ phyag dang spyod dang snyan ngag mkhan/ /byug pa dang naM ri mo mkhan/ /yi
177a2(mdo 'grel): ge dang ni tsan dang la'o/ /bar+Ni kA ni sra ba dang/ /be'u dang ni/ smyu gu la'o/ /balmi ka ni grog mkhar dang/ /thub pa/ nad kyi bye brag la/ /bIrSha kaM ni skyob pa la/ /ba rA dus la gzhan bzhin 'gyur/ bA h+ni ka ni mi ldan dang/ /yul gyi khyad par dang ni rta/ /bA h+rni/ ni/ me ldan dang/

177b2(mdo 'grel): mdza' shing 'khyog rjes su 'tsho/ /s+thA ka ni spyod pa dang/ /pha ri sogs dang chu bur la'o/ /sya mI kA ni/ des la 'gyur/ /grog mkhar/ shing dag sya mI kA/ swasti ka ni bkra shis rdzas/ /dga' dang/ khyim gyi bye brag dang/ /phyi ma'i rab tu dbye ba dang/ /dga' ba'i

177b4(mdo 'grel): k+Shu ra ka ni khu byug mi ga/ ba lang rmigs pa/ spum can shing/ /ang+ga ra ka sol ba dang/ /sa skyes kaN+Da ka la'o/ /i gA ri ka/ bur shing mda'/ /ki shu ka'i ko ra ka'o/ /A ma la ka/ spal pa dang/ /sbrang can/ chu skyes/ ge sar la'o/ /a li ba ka/ gral dang ni/ /pi ka dga'

178a4(mdo 'grel): pa 'dzin/ /chu klung gi ni bye brag dang/ /rol mo'i dbyug gu dag la'o/ /tsaN+DA li kA sman bye brag/ gau rI kA ni mi 'am ci/ /rnga? 179b1(mdo 'grel): par byas pa'i bza' ba la'o/ /so ma balka shun pa dang/ /seng ldeng dkar po dag la'o/ /sau gand+hi ka ga dur dang/ /pad+ma rA ga gcong? bying dang/ /dri can dri ldan dag la'o/ /a ni Da mA kA zhes pa/ /ki ta ba dang/ dag thos spangs/ /Ats+tshu ri ta kaM zhes pa/ /dgod dang/ sen mo 'joms bye

179b3(mdo 'grel): tshal skyong bar byed pa dang/ /'khrung? dang/ tsad+gA 'tsho sgo skyong/ /kri mi kaN+Da kaM zhes/ /ri mo/ spyo ba/ byi dang ga/ sho dza ga ri ko zhes pa/ /bkra shis brjod dang/ thab byad pa'o/ /rtsi li mI li kA zhes pa/ /mgrin pa can gyi bye brag dang/ /mkha' snang dang ni klog rnams la'o/ /dza

179b6(mdo 'grel): krA ma nI dar? rgya yi 'bras/ /sha ta sarbi kA/ du rgA/ /shI ha tsamA ka'i sgra/ /gshin rje 'tshim byed sgron me la/ /su ga san+ta kaM dpyid la'o/ /rgyags pa'i dag ston pa yang 'gyur/ /he ma puShpe ka dang ni/ /he ma buShpa ka zhes pa/ /me tog tsam pa ka'i phung po'o/ /grA ma mad+gu ri kA lcog/
179b7(mdo 'grel): grong gi 'thab mo la yang blta'o/ /ma nga na Na lA kA ni/ /sprul dang 'dod pa skyes la'o/ /mA tu la su h+ra ka ni/ /zhang po skyes dang khram pa'i 'bras/ /la tA markA Ta ka ni/ /mu mo me tog spre'u'o/ /bar+Na bi lo Da ka ni/ /tshigs bcad grib ma 'phrog tshom rkun/ /sindU ri ti la ka ni/ /klu dang/
180a1(mdo 'grel): sindU ra'i thig le/ /sna tA tsi kit+sa ka ni/ /zla ba bzhi pa'i bsnyen gnas la/ /snA ta tsi kit+sa kaM ni/ /dka' thub/ bud med me tog la'o/ /zhes pa snyan ngag mkhan po paN+Di ta dpal ldan dpal 'dzin sde yis rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes pa/ ming
180a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan mu tig phreng ba las/ ka dbyangs bcas dag mdza' i sde'o// //kha ni nam mkha' lha yul sde/ /blo dang yang dag rig dang grong/ /stong pa thig le dbang po zhing/ /kuNA ha la'i 'bras bu la'o/ /na gsen mo gaN+Da la/ /na khI/ na kha dri yi rdzas/ /n+yaM kha snyan
180a3(mdo 'grel): tshig yid 'ong/ /snyan tshig oM yig drug pa la'o/ /predkhA parya Ta la dang/ /gar dang 'gros dang rta yi 'bros/ /singkhA 'gro ba'i khyad par dang/ /gar dang sri ka shi kya la/ /mu khaM/ kha dang nges 'byung sgo/ /thabs dang rtsom pa dag la'o/ /le kha springs yig/ lha min la//
180a4(mdo 'grel): le khA ri mo/ gral yi ge/ shaM kha dung dang dpral rus la/ /na khI gter gyi bye brag la/ /sA khA/ lcug ma rig byed che/ /mdza' can lag pa phyogs kyi bar/ /shi khA/ yal ba/ /gtsug phud? rtse/ /phung bu/ 'bar? ba/ 'jug ma la/ /sA kha mdza' o/ grogs po la/ /su khaM/
180a5(mdo 'grel): skyid dang/ mtho ris la/ /su khA grong dang rab sems sa/ /go mu kha ni kha chud dang/ /rol mo'i snod dang nyer byug dang/ /tri sh+rI dri shA khA b+he ka thal+la ko/ bi shI kha ni mnga' po cha/ /mnga' dang/ rko byed shing rta dang/ /sdeng bu la'o/ bi shi gA/ sa ga sgrub byed/ bsrub pa la'o/
180a6(mdo 'grel): pra mu kha ni dang po/ gtso/ /'od chags 'bar ba/ nad lag pa'o/ /bi shA khA na skems byed rtog/ agni mu kha lha dang ni/ /gnyis skyes dang ni rlung gi ming/ /signa mu khI zhes pa dang/ /'ga' zhig/ agni gru? kha ste/ /b+hal+lA ta ka'i shing la'o/ /agni shi/ bA mjug ma can
180a7(mdo 'grel): agni shi khaM gung kum brjod/ /in+d+ra le khA/ zla ba'i cha/ /la tA su kha zla ba'i bcud/ /agni na kha rus sbal dang/ /glang po 'gar ni ba lang sogs/ /bard+hA le? khA bskrad pa la/ bard+ha shi kha byis pa la/ /ma hA saM kha mi rus dang/ /gter dang dung gi rab dbye la/ /byA g+h+ra
180b1(mdo 'grel): na kha/ kanda ste/ /dri yi rdzas kyi bye brag go/ /parya? dA? mu khaM zhes pa/ /nam mkha' dang ni lam la'o/ /sarba to mu khA zhes pa/ zhing shes/ cho ga drag po la'o/ /sna tshogs gsal ba las/ /kha mdza' i sde'o// //ga(mdo 'grel): ni dri za tshogs bdag nyid/ /gaM/ glu/ gA ni/ glu mkhan la
180b2(mdo 'grel): go ni glang dang mtho ris dang/ /mkha' 'od rdadzla ba ri/ ba lang/ sa phyogs mig dang/ dag/ mnga' dang/ chu rnams la ni mo/ /a ga 'gro med/ shing ri'o/ /nyi ma/ lag 'gro dag la'o/ /ang+ga tshang? gi rab dbye la/ /a gaM lus dang/ gtso bo dang/ thabs dang/ 'gran zla nye ba dang
180b3(mdo 'grel): yan lag ldan pa rnams la'o/ /ang+ga/ kun tu pho'o bod pa dang/ /grangs med/ bzlos don/ rab dga' la/ /ing+ga sur dang shes pa dang/ /'gro dang rmad byung dag la'o/ /kha? ga/ bya dang/ mnga' dang ni/ /nyi ma lha dang gza' la'o/ /khangka ral gri/ tsher? ma dang/ /rwa can
180b4(mdo 'grel): rgyal ba'i khyad par la/ /gAng+gA/ gdong drug/ 'jigs byed la/ /gi gA 'byung pa brjod byar ldan/ /tsang+ga mdzes dang mkhas pa dang/ /chags dang rnam par sgag pa la/ /Tang+ga? mtshon cha'i khyad par dang/ /byin pa dang ni rko byed la/ /tyA ga sbyin dang yongs gtod? la/ /tung+ga?
180b5(mdo 'grel): mtho bo brjod byar ldan/ /tuM baM?/ klu shingA?/ /dang mtshan ma'o/ /durga bgrod dka' du rga ni/ gtuM mo dang ri rams la'o/ /na ga/ ri shing 'gro med dang/ /nya ma/ lag 'gro dag la'o/ /na? ga/ klu dang glu shing dang/ /nA ga ge sar so dang ni/ /glang po dang ni char sprin 'khrug/
180b6(mdo 'grel): 'khrug? las lus kyi rlung bye brag /gat+to? 'di? dang mchog gnas dang/ /zha? na? mtshon dang bud med kyi/ /'chi bar byed pa'i khyad par la'o/ /sing+ga dmar ser sing+ga ni/ /ma sI'o/ /sing+gi sgra can la/ /sing+gA ra ma Tha dang rtsa/ /u mA dang ni gi wang la/ /pU ga/ ni ku ru mA
180b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rkang 'thung kra? mu ka la'o/ /bal+lu dzi ma 'bral bu med/ /b+ha 'o/ /ye shes skye gnas 'dod/ /grags pa/ bdag nyid tshe/ dang grol/ /dbang phyug brtson 'grus tshigs bral chos/ /dpal dang/ 'bad pa nyi ma lus kyi lha mo la'o/ /b+hang+ga/ chu rlabs nang bya
181a1(mdo 'grel): brag /dbye ba/ rgyal ba/ go rims bzlog /b+h+riM ga sha na'i lo tog la/ /b+hA ga cha dang/ rnam par dbye/ /phyogs gcig dang ni bgo skab la'o/ /b+h+ri gu/ pa sangs pi nA kin/ /g.yang sa ya mang agni la/ /b+h+rid+ga/ bud ga Shad+ga dang/ /du ba
181a2(mdo 'grel): 'tshubs la'o b+h+ri dgaM ni/ /skra yi rgyal dang bu ram shun/ /b+ho ga bo de dang/ sprul gyi ni/ /gdengs ka dang ni lus dag la/ /'dus la blta dang/ bud med kyi/ /gza' ba skyong byed nor la'o/ /mA rga lo yi thog ma dang/ /sil snyan dang ni/ rjes tshol chags thogs la//
181a3(mdo 'grel): mri ga ri dags phyugs glang po/ /rgyu skar gyi ni dbye ba la/ /mri gI tshol dang ri dag 'gros/ /'dren pa'i khyad par dag la'o/ /yu ga/ san mo/ sI/ rAdga/ /yu gaM rdzogs ldan la sogs dus/ /khru bzhi/ 'phel dang ming dang sman/ /yo ga go cha gyon pa dang/ /sbyar
181a4(mdo 'grel): ba bsam gtan las dang ni/ /khyon la sogs dang srad bu rdzas/ /kun 'joms mchog dang/ sngar med rnyed/ /sman dang/ thabs dang rigs rnams la/ /ro ba/ /sman rul ba dang nang/ /laM ga mdzes dang/ /bilga la'o/ /liM gaM/ mtshan ma/ rjes su dpag/
181a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrug /'thor dang/ grangs dang ni/ /ku pra kri ti rnams la'o/ /bang+ga yul gyi khyad par dang/ /b+haN+Da ta kI ras bal la/ /bang+gaM mtshon la'ang blta bar bya/ /byad+ga sbal pa lus dman la/ /byad+gaM gzhan bzhin ma ning po/ /shADgaM mda' yi stan la'o/ /shADga khyab
181a6(mdo 'grel): 'jug mda' stan la/ /sh+rid+gaM rwa dang rtse mo dang/ /de bzhin ngan pa gtso bo mtho dang zhi ba la/ /sh+rid+ga rtse mo'i chu 'bab ma/ /mtshan ma sa'i mag ba la/ sh+rI dgA rwa dang khru mA chag dang/ /nya dad gser gyi khyad par la/ /swarga/ /rang bzhin nges grol dang/ /ngas pa spyo dang blta ba
181a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rmongs dang le'u rnams la'o/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang/ plak+Sha dag /ser po la ni skrid+gA'o?/ /a ni ga ni/ yid bsrub dang/ /lus med nam mkha' yid la 'dod/ /a naM gaM na/ lus dman dang/ /lus kyi 'byung ba bzlog pa la/ /a sAng+gaM ni lus khra la dang/ /mig gi mdza' 
181b1(mdo 'grel): dang thig le la/ /a yo ga ni brtson gral brtsegs/ /phral dang khregs dang skyed mos tshal/ /A b+ho ga ni/ kun 'gro 'bad/ /gdugs dang rab sems gang ba dang/ /kun sbyor dri dang phreng ba sbyin/ /rtsol ba sgribs pa rnams la'o/ /A shu ga ni/ mda' dang
181b2(mdo 'grel): rlung/ /utpa rga ni 'dor dang gtong/ /thun mong ba dang phyir sbyin pa'o/ /urba ga ni skyo ba dang/ /shin tu mang po can la'o/ /urba gaM ni/ shin+tu 'gro/ kra mu kI yi 'bras bu la'o/ /ka ling+ga ni/ sen mo rul/ /du ba 'tshubs dang tshang bye brag /yul gyi dbye ba mkhas pa
181b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ /bsregs dang/ ko Ta ka'i 'bras bu/ /ka li gA ni btsun mo'o/ /kA liM gA ni grul buM pa/ /glang po dang ni sgrub dag go /ka liM kI ni sbal pa'i rgyag /tsa krAM ga ni 'dab chags/ /tsa kraM gI ni/ ku Tu'i nya/ /dzihma ga ni/ sprul 'grol mang/ /tA Da ka ni chu klung dang/ /'dab ma'i phung
181b4(mdo 'grel): po'o tA Da gu/ /thu lu tA ta/ skyed bu mo/ /tu ra gI ni rta bon po/ /tu ra gA ni/ rta dang sems/ /tri barga ni/ chos 'dod don/ /chogs dang/ che ba gsum dang ni/ /snying stobs/ rdul mun gsum 'dus dang/ 'phel dang gnas dang zad pa rnams/ /lhan cig brjod la yongs su grags//
181b5(mdo 'grel): mu stag se?/ ral gri d+hA rAdga/ /na rad+ga ni pho'i rtags dang/ /ba raN+Da ga phur bu zlum/ /nA rad+ge? ni zha nye'i mtshon/ /bshad ba/ skye bo/ zung du skyes/ /pispi li'i khu pa la'o/ /ni ShaM ga ni/ mda' dong grogs/ /ni saM ga ni/ tshul khrims le'u/ /ni lad+ga ni/ 'bu srin dang/ /b+haM b+ha ra
181b6(mdo 'grel): NI snying po can pa taM ga ni phye ma leb/ /nyi ma bya dang/ 'bras bye brag /sa bad+ga ni ro bcud la/ /ba trAdga ni tsan dan dmar/ /gro ga dang ni shug pa la/ /pan+na ga/ sprul/ pad+ma shing/ /pa rA ga ni me tog rdul/ /khrus chal sogs dang rdul la'o/ /nye bar chags dang/ tsan dan dang/
181b7(mdo 'grel): ri bo'i khyad par dag la'ang bshad/ /sun+na ga ni skyes bu gtso/ /shing gi khyad par utpal dkar/ /dza ti pha la dag dang ni/ /skya bo'i sprul la'ang blta bar bya/ /pra ya ga ni 'jug degs dbye/ /arga 'bab dang khyab stobs la/ /pa yo ga ni las rab sbyor/ /nges
182a1(mdo 'grel): bstan la'o praM yaM gu/ /kaM guM rA dzi kA dang ni/ /'bras ldan dang ni pi sphi lI/ /sla ba ga ni/ spre'u dang/ /sbal pa/ me lce/ kha lo pa/ /b+hu dzaM ga ni/ sprul/ Shilga /khyi 'tshed glang po mA taM ga /mri taM/ ga ni rnga dang dbyangs/ /lus dmar 'tshe byed sman la'o/ /rak+ta? ga? ni
182a2(mdo 'grel): bkra shis dang/ /brtan pa/ brtse ldan rnam gnon la/ /rA thA ga ni/ gnyis med dang/ /'khor lo dang ni 'khor lo'i 'dab/ /shing rta'i yan lag rnams la'o/ ba rad+ga ni mgo skyes gnas/ /bu ram shun pa glang po la'o/ /bA ti ga ni bcu smin pa/ /sgyur pa po dang gser
182a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur mkhan/ /bi DaM ga ni srin 'joms dang/ /nA ga ra'o bi ha ga /mkha' 'gro rang ni rtse mor 'gro /bi sarga ni dman pa dang/ /gtong dang dri ma 'dor pa dang/ /rnam par 'dor dang grol ba dang/ /'od dang sel ba'i khyad par la/ /saM b+ho ga ni dga' ba dang/ /longs
182a4(mdo 'grel): spyod dang ni rgyal ba'i bstan/ /sarba gaM ni chu la'o/ /khyab bdag bde byed sarba ga:/ /sA raM ga ni ri dags dang/ /glang po bye'u/ mkha' 'gro'i dbye/ /bung ba dang ni khra'o la/ /bya khyung/ tshangs pa/ he mAdga/ /a nu Shad+ga ma brtsams dang/ /snying rje la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod
182a5(mdo 'grel): a pa ba na thar pa dang/ /'bras bcas bya ba byas pa la/ /a b+hi ShaM ga 'du 'dzi dang/ /mna' dang/ spyo ba mdzod dang ni/ /g.yo ba pa dang spyang ki dang/ /skye bo gzugs kyi rab dbye la'o/ /a pa rA ga mtho ris snang/ /gza' dang me tog ldan pa dang/ /du lU la yang/ gza' rna
182a6(mdo 'grel): can/ /yongs su smra ba rnams la'o/ /u pa sarga nad kyi dbye/ /nye bar 'gro ba dag la'o/ /ka Ta b+haM ga lo thog rnams/ /sen gcod/ bri ya tya ya'o/ /in+d+ra b+haM ga zla ba skyes/ /rang dbang can dang mi bdag sna/ /dIrg+hA d+hwa ka glang chen dang/ /phrin yig khyer ba dag la brjod/
182a7(mdo 'grel): mal+la nA ga/ glang chen dkar/ /pat+sa'i bu dang thub pa la'o/ /rA dza sh+riM ga gser gyi ni/ /dbyug pa dang ni mad+gu ra/ /chu bya rog /ma mA yo gaM/ kun sbyor dang/ /'du ba dang ni dgos pa la/ /saM pra/ yo ga rab dga' dang/ /las dang rjes su 'gro ba la/ /ka thA pra sata zhes pa/
182b1(mdo 'grel): rlung gi tshogs dang dug gi nad/ /'chos pa'i sman pa dag la brjod/ /nA DI ta raM gA zhes pa/ /kA ko la dang/ hiN+Da ka /ra ta hiN+Da ka la'o/ /ga mdza' i sde'o// //g+ha ni dril bu'i dbang po la/ /g+hA ni dril chung 'joms byed la/ /g+hu ni bud med sgra la'o/ /ag+haM sdig pa sdug bsngal phongs
182b2(mdo 'grel): aM g+h+ri rkang pa shing gi rtsa/ /arg+ha/ mchod byed rin thang la/ /ud+g+ha lag pa/ ba? sbyar dang/ /lus kyi rlung dang smin pa la/ /o g+ha/ phan tshun rgyud pa dang/ /myur dang gar gyi man ngag dang/ /tshogs dang/ lam dang rab 'bab la/ /ma g+hI/ sman gyi bye brag la/ /ma g+hA rgyu skar bcu pa la//
182b3(mdo 'grel): me g+ha/ sprin dang musta la/ /mo g+ha 'bras med dman pa la/ /mo g+hA/ rkang 'thung/ skya nar la/ /la g+hu yid 'ong snying po med/ /a gu ru dang/ srik+kA dang/ /a gu ru nag cig car la/ /shlA g+hA rab bsngags/ bsnyen bkur la/ /mngon par 'dod pa dag la'o/ /a na g+hA ni sdig pas stong//
182b4(mdo 'grel): dri ma med dang yid dga' la/ /a mo g+ha ni 'bras bur bcas// a mo g+hA ni kun bshad dang/ /phan pa dang ni byi dang ga /ul+lA b+ha ni nad med dang/ /mkhas dang gtsang dang dga' ba ldan/ /kA tsi g+ha ni gser dang ni/ /byi ba/ dkyil 'khor shin+tu dangs/ /ni dA
182b5(mdo 'grel): g+ha ni tsha ba'i dus/ /gdung tshad dang ni rdul gyi chu/ /sa ri g+ha ni tho ba dang/ /rnal 'byor dbye ba yan lag 'dzin/ /'joms dang 'chid bu'i bum pa dang/ /bum pa/ ra ba/ ba lang grong/ /pra ti g+ha ni/ khong khro khro/ /ma hA rg+ha ni rin thang che/ /rin thang med dang lA ba ka /sarbo g+ha ni/ bla ma dang
182b6(mdo 'grel): shugs don/ go cha kun don bdag /g+ha mdza' i sde'o// //da ni 'jigs par byed dang yul/ /nga mdza' i sde'o// //rtsa ni tshoms rkun zla ba dag /a rtsa mchod dang/ gzugs brnyan dag /uts+tsha che dang mtho be la/ /ka tsi skra dang bla ma dang/ /khu ba bu dang
182b7(mdo 'grel): rma chings skam/ /ka tsa glang po mo la'o/ /kA tsa nor bu dra ba dang/ /mig nad dang ni sa'i khyad par/ /kA ny+tsI ske rags chun po dang/ /los ma si guny+dza dang ni tshangs bye brag /kU rtsa smin ma'i dbus dang ni/ /bsgrub bya smar mi bsngags pa'o/ /khrung khrung kruny+tsa bya yi bye brag dang/ /ri dang
183a1(mdo 'grel): gling gi rab dbye la/ /tsany+tsa sprul pa 'dam bu sogs/ /tsany+tsA rtsa'i mi la'o/ /tsany+tsu sor lnga/ tro TI dang/ /ba lang rtsa dang/ ki liny+tsa/ /tsartsA gnas dang rtog pa dang/ /spyod dang sems dpa' dag dang ni/ /pags pa dang ni shing shun dang/ /pags pa tsam dang bu ram
183a2(mdo 'grel): shun/ /nI tsa gA ma ra dang gzhol/ /mi'u thung/ 'bab phyogs dma' ba dang/ /mdza' dag/ 'jam po shing bal dang/ /ru rta/ lha min bye brag dang/ /zhing las 'jigs dang gzhan bye brag /prA tse dus dang phyogs dang yul/ /mo tsa mig sman bzang po la/ /mo
183a3(mdo 'grel): tsa shAl+la li chu shing/ /ru tsi mdzes dang 'ong dang 'dod/ /mngon par chags dang bzang ba la/ /ba tsa/ ne tso ba tsA ni/ /dri dang sA ri ka la brjod/ /pA tsa dbyangs can tshig dang ni/ /shin tu chung ba'i dpa' rlabs dang/ /go skabs dang ni bde ba la/ /sa tsI dbang mo brgya
183a4(mdo 'grel): byin ma/ /shu tsa'i nyer 'dzin dag pa dang/ /sngags pa chu dang rma bya dang/ /sgeg pa dang ni mo ga'i dus/ /dkar ba dang ni mnyams pa'o/ /sU tsi lag sogs tshul dang ni/ /bsnum pa dang ni rtse mo la'o/ /sU tsI mtshams ldan rnams dang ni/ /brjod dang byed pa'i khyad
183a5(mdo 'grel): par la/ /a bI tsa ni dmyal ba dang/ /chu yi rba klong bi ra ha/ /u dI tsi ni chu dang/ phyogs/ /yul dang dus la brjod bya ldan/ /ka ni tsi ni rgyas pa dang/ /'khri shing guny+dza shing rta la'o/ /ka ba tsa ni phub ma 'da' / /rnga dang/ bong bu sgo nga la'o/ /kra ka tsa ni sogs le dang/
183a6(mdo 'grel): mdung pa can dang sa skyes so/ /na mu tsi ni bral ba dang/ myos byed dang/ /lha min klu/ chu glang po la'o/ /nA rA tsa ni lcags mda' ma/ /nA rA tsI ni 'degs bye brag /pra tI tsi ni phyogs dus yul/ /pra pany+tsa ni rgya che dang/ /kun bsags dang ni spros pa'o/ /ma ri tsi ni 'bar ba
183a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ thub pa dang ni kri pa Na/ rta? dang ral gri dang bkren pa dang gsum la 'jug go /mA rI tsa ni mchod sbyin can/ /glang po che dang/ kak+ko la/ /srin po'i khyad par rnams la'o/ /mA ri tsI ni lha mo'i dbye/ /bi ka tsa ni rab rgyas la/ /pi pany+tsi ni/ ngo tsha can/ /rol rtsed/ pi wang/ phong can
183b1(mdo 'grel): gza'/ /saM ko tsha ni 'ching ba dang/ /nya'i bye brag dag la'o/ /saM ko tsam ni gur kum dang/ /yang dag grogs po bzang po la'o/ /kA kA tsiny+tsi/ srad/ sa bon/ /chu yi 'bu dang/ di li ra/ /dza la sU tsi chu'i srin bu/ /rA can dang ni byis pa gsong/ /kaM ka tro Ti dzha ka'o/ /ma li mlu
183b2(mdo 'grel): tsa/ chom rkun me /ta ra nA rI tsa yi sgra/ /khyi dang dga' ba'i yal 'dab dang/ /bud med mchog dang yongs brtsams las/ /kun tu byung ba'i bya ba la'o/ /tsa mdza' i sde'o// //tsha ni gcod dang bya rog la/ /tshA ni gcod dang 'dod pa dang/
183b3(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma dang ni dang ba la/ /ats+tshe mi zad pa dang ni/ /dom dang shel dang mngon du phyogs/ /ats+tsha shin+tu dang ba la// kats+tsha brag la sogs mtshams la/ /gru yi yan lag na ka la/ /ma min/ bdag dang yongs gnas dang/ g.yo ba'i khyad par
183b4(mdo 'grel): rnams la'o/ /kats+tsha tsI ri kA dang ni/ /phag mo la yang blta bar bya/ /guts+tsha phon po/ do shal dbye/ /sdong po dang ni bsags pa la/ /pits+tsha mjug ma pits+tsha ni/ /shalma li yis bkris pa dang/ /rdul dang pU gats+tsha Ta'i spubs/ /mA bA'i mdun khang phreng ba dang/ /skye bo bral ba la
183b5(mdo 'grel): buts+tsha/ /pits+tsha phyi ma/ phyogs dag go /mEts+tsha skad mi gsal ba dang/ /rigs kyi bye brag sdig la dga' / /ma hA kats+tsha chu klung mgon/ /chu yi bdag po la yang ngo/ tsha mdza' i sde'o// //dza ni myur 'gro dzA zhes pa/ /'byung po skye ba rgyal byed rgyal/ /dzA ni rA ga dbyangs
183b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ bstod/ /sha za dang ni mgyegs pa la'o/ /a dza nag po dran pa dang/ /rdo rje sgra gcan ba g+hu'i pu/ /apdza gzhu yi khyad par dang/ /zla ba chu skyes ni tsu la/ /dud la'o a dzi sa mnyam/ g.yul/ /urdza spro dang/ byed pa po/ /a'urdzA brtson 'grus dang ni stobs/ /kany+dza/ skra dang tshangs pa
183b7(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /kany+dzaM bdud rtsi pad+ma la/ /ku dza/ dmyal gsol ba la/ /kuny+dza spre'u sdong po dang/ /glang po dang ni so la yang/ /kuny+dza/ sgur 'khyog /shing bye brag/ ? /brdzu 'bra go'i shing dang ni/ /g.ya' ba dang ni srin bu'o/ /gany+dza lha khang/ gur kha ri/ /mdzod la'o/ gardzA/ bsrub?
184a1(mdo 'grel): la/ gardza pra ha sta la'o/ /guny+dza/ kA ka ma tsi ri dang/ /pa Ta ha dang sgra yi cha/ /dwi dza/ braM ze sgong skyes so/ /dwi dzA ngan spong/ bu rdul bzang/ /d+hwa dza/ rtags mtshan khri rkang dang/ /ba dan mtshan rtags/ shauN+Di ka/ ni dza bdag po/ rtags pa dang/ /n+yuny+dza na byis
184a2(mdo 'grel): pa thos par brjod/ /n+yubdzaM mtshon gyi las la 'gyur/ /kubdza/ mon sgan nu? 'og tu phyogs pa la/ /piny+dza gnod pa/ piny+dzaM g.yo/ /piny+dzA shing bal/ yung ba la/ /piny+dza 'khrugs la brjod bya ldan/ /pra dzA rgyud dang/ 'jig rten la/ /pra dza/ 'gro ba tshogs pa dang/ /tshA ba
184a3(mdo 'grel): ka dang lam la'o/ /b+hu dza dang ni b+hu dza dag/ dpung pa dang ni lag pa dang/ /ma dang pha dang gnyis ka la'o/ mardzu btso blag pa dang ni/ /khrus dang dag ba rnams la'o/ /radzdzu lhas ma yon tan dang/ /thags pa gral dang/ phreng ba rtsig pa la'o/ /ru tsa nad dang ud+ga
184a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /lany+dza/ nga ra dang mdza' ngos la/ /lA dzA 'dzin dang 'bras so ba/ /lA dza gsher ba'i 'bras la'o/ /lA dzaM/ pu shel rtse la brjod/ /bA dza phyogs la yang 'gyur te/ /sgra dang thub pa'i bye brag la'ang/ /bA dzaM mchod sbyin don dang la/ /mar la'o/
184a5(mdo 'grel): bI dzaM rgyud dang ni/ /nye bar len dang khu ba la/ /byA dza kun tu 'dzin don dang/ /de nyid g.yo dang/ mi ston pa'o/ /brdzu tshong pa dang ni/ klog /sadzdza go bgos kun tu 'byung/ /sany+dza bde 'byung tshang pa dang/ /swa dza/ rdul dang rang skyes dang/ /khrag dang de bzhin
184a6(mdo 'grel): bu la'o/ /ad+ga dzaM ni/ sgra dang dga' / /bu dang bde bas dregs pa dang/ /yan lag 'dzin dang glang po che/ /ad+ga dza ni khrag la'o/ /aN+Da dza ni/ bya dang nya/ /rtsangs pa/ sprul dang/ gla rtsi dang/ /sgong skyes rnams la'o/ /am+bu dza/ mtsho skyes dang ni ni tsu la/ /chu'i lcang ma/ kom+ba
184a7(mdo 'grel): dza ni yul glang po/ /shaM ga'i dbye ba rnams la bstan/ /ka ra dza ni lag skyes dang/ /stag sen dang ni sen mo la'o/ /kAM bo dza ni/ zla ba'i shun/ /dung dang/ klu shing rta rnams la/ /kaM bo dzI ni sngan ma'i 'dab/ /shing kun lo ma la yang 'dod/ /kA ru dza ni bzo bo dang
184b1(mdo 'grel): ri mo dang ni rang skyes snum/ /grog mkhar btsag dang dbu ba dang/ /glang phrug nA ga ge sar la'o/ /ku Ta dza ni shing bye brag /bra bo che dang bum pa skyes/ /gi ri dza ni ri yi bu/ /zhang po/ kho ru dA h+ri dA/ /gi ri dzaM ni lhang tsher dang/ /lcags dang/ brag zhun/ dri bzangs la/ /dza la
184b2(mdo 'grel): dzaM ni 'dam skyes dang/ /chu skyes/ pad+ma/ ru rta/ dung/ /pa rany+dza ni til 'khrul 'khor/ /ral gri/ dbu pa/ bor ba'i 'dab/ /pA Ni dzya ni tshod ba dang/ /'tsho byed byed pa'i khyad par la/ /ba la dzA ni tshong/ tshong zod/ /kha dog ldan pa'i bud med la/ /ba la dzaM ni sa rang zhing//
184b3(mdo 'grel): lo tog yul dang ba lang lhas/ /b+hU mi dzSha sprul la a na kI/ dmyal ba ngan skyes b+hU mi dza/ /murga'i lo ma ba na dzA/ /ba na dza ni glang po stag/ 'dam skyes/ nags byung ba na dzaM/ /ba hu dza ni rgyal rigs bshad/ /thig le khu ba/ swa yaM dzA/ /sa ha dza ni grogs med la//
184b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi rtags can sa ha dzA/ /sA ma dza ni/ snyan tshig byung/ /brjod bya'i rtags can glang po la'o/ /hi ma dzA dang hi ma dza/ /ri yi sas ma legs brjod ma/ /de bzhin mai nA ka la'o/ /a hi b+hu dza rnam 'dul bu/ /'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg ba la'o/ /kA smi ra da bong nga dkar
184b5(mdo 'grel): du rta? gur gum pad+ma la/ /gra ha rA dza/ zla nyi ma/ /dza g+ha n+ya dza zhes pa ni/ /nu bo dang ni dmangs rigs la/ /dwi dza ra dzA mtshan mo'i mgon/ /'dul byed bdag skyes khyad par la/ /d+harma rA dza gshin rje dang/ /bde bar byung rma bya gshegs dang g.yul ngor brtan/ /b+ha ra d+hwA dza
184b6(mdo 'grel): bla ma'i ?/ stag gi tshogs dang thub pa la/ /b+hA ra dwA dza bre'o dang/ /shing bal gyi ni khyad par la'o/ /b+h+ri ga rA dza sbrang rtsi'i btung/ /spre'u dang ni/ bya'i bye brag /yak+Sha rA dza mig gsum grogs/ /rA dza rA dza nor sbyin dang/ /sa kun dbang dang ri dags mtshan/ /k+Shi rA bd+hi dza/
184b7(mdo 'grel): ri bong can/ /k+ShA rA bd+hi dzA dpal mo la/ /k+ShA rA bd+hi dzaM nya phyis dang/ /rgya mtsho'i lan ral bal tshwa dag la'o/ /ri Sha b+ha ra d+hwa dza'i sgra/ /bde byed mchod pa'i khyad par skye la la/ /de nas mu na b+he Sha dzaM/ /drang srong ri byi/ a ru ra/ /'gom pa la ste dza mdza' i sde'o/ //
185a1(mdo 'grel): dzha ni spyod pa rlung dag la/ /zhig pa la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /dzhany+dzhA sgra yi bye brag la/ /dzhaM ni chu 'khyags char pa la'o/ /dzha mdza' i sde'o// //nyani/ dbye kha'i sgra dang ni/ /glu len pa la 'ga' yis bshad/ /dz+nya ni mkhas dang/
185a2(mdo 'grel): blo la'o/ /be d+ha'i sgra ni rmongs sems po/ /pradz+nyA blo la prAdz+nyA mkhas/ /saM dz+nyA ming dang glu len dang/ /sems pa drang srong bud med dang/ /long ba'i lag pa mgo dang ni/ /mig rnams kyi ni mtshon byed la'o/ /kri ta dz+nya ni byas pa shes/ /snying po gzhal bya brjod bya
185a3(mdo 'grel): ldan/ /bud med rnams kyi lta ba la/ /dai ba dz+nya ni tshogs can la/ /bde gshegs bde 'byung sarba dz+nya/ /bdag dang grong khyer k+She tra dz+nyA/ /nya mdza' i sde'o// //TA ni sa la'o/ Ta ni sgra/ /TaM ni spyi blugs la 'gyur ro/ /aTTaM khyim gyi khyad par dang/ /zar
185a4(mdo 'grel): ma/ skam po/ zas dag la'o/ /iSh+Ta mi dang/ mchod sbyin dang/ /'du byed rnal 'byor mchod sbyin las/ /mchod dang mchog tu dga' dang bsngags/ /iSh+Ti mchod sbyin mchod dang 'dod/ /bsdus dang tshig bcas srad bu dag /ka Ta sked pa sha ka dang/ /shin
185a5(mdo 'grel): tu'i don dang lte ba dang/ /glang po'i 'gram pa dam tshig dang/ /bya'i rnam pa/ rmad du byung/ /ka TI/ ka TiM/ A ka d+hi/ /kaDtha kA ni sun 'byin dang/ /bri yaM gu dang/ ske tshe dang/ /mya ngan med dang dmar po dang/ /tsha ba rnams la lta bar bya/ /ka Tu bcud dang ser sna dga' 
185a6(mdo 'grel): dri bzangs rnon po dag la'o/ /kaSh+TaM thibs po dka' 'tshogs la/ /ku Ta/ bum pa/ rdo gzhong dang/ /ko Ta dang ni/ khyi la'o/ /ko TI/ 'o ma 'bangs mo chad/ /ri mo dang ni guts+tsha ka/ kU Ta/ phung po dang ni shar/ /rtsibs dang tshul 'chos sgyu ma gar/ /sbun pa/ rtse gsum/ sI
185a7(mdo 'grel): rAM ga/ 'khrul 'khor lcags gong g.yo med la/ /kriSh+Ti/ rtogs dang/ mi dang 'gugs/ /ko Ti grangs kyi bye brag dang/ /mchog dang shin tu phul byung rab/ /rtse mo gzhu'i mchog ma la/ /kruSh+TaM du dang/ sgra sgrogs la/ /kha Ta/ bad kan/ thal lcag la/ /mun pa
185b1(mdo 'grel): dang ni khron pa la/ /khA Ti/ sa ba ra tha dang/ /ki Na e ka/ gra ha la'o/ /ge Ta smod dang/ nor la dga' / /ka pha grong gi dbye ba la/ /griSh+Ta sman gyi khyad par dang/ /e ka pra sa band+ha la'o/ /g+ha Ta bum pa glang po'i gram/ /ting 'dzin gyi ni bye brag dang/ /ba lang gnas dang byed
185b2(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /g+ha TA'ang bum pa glang po'i 'gram/ /g+h+raM Sh+Ti phag dang kun tu sgrogs/ /khyab 'jug gnon bad kan dang sgrogs byed la'o/ /gyoN+DA rgya shug/ bU ga'o/ /tsa Tu/ tsA Tu/ pi tsinDi/ /gdan gyi bye brag/ brtul zhugs la/ /dza TA/ gcer bu/ skra rtsa ba/ /spang sbos la'o dza
185b3(mdo 'grel): TI ni/ /lus dang/ dgon pa ni rkuny+dza/ /rma yi byi dor/ nags tshal la/ /tru Ti/ 'god dang/ cha shas dang/ /sug smel dang ni kun tu gdung/ /dus kyi tshad la'o tro Ti ni/ /kaTpha la dang/ chu dang nya/ /twaSh+Ta 'phel dang/ tshig mda' dang/ /bzo bo dang ni rnon po dang/ /diSh+Ti khu tshur yongs su
185b4(mdo 'grel): mjal/ /diSh+Ta/ dus dang nyer bstan dag/ /driSh+TaM skal ba/ driSh+Ti ni/ /mig dang lta ba blo rnams la/ /d+ha Ta dag pa 'jal ba la/ /d+ha TI dum bu dang ni gos/ /na tang sal TI/ lag pa'i rnam rol la/ /na Ta/ shol/ shai luA Sha/ /pa Ta/ gos bzang/ yo byad skyong/ d+ha?
185b5(mdo 'grel): Tu smra mkhas nad med dang/ /rno dang/ mkhas dang/ gsal ba dang/ /pa To la dang/ gdugs dang sgrogs/ /pa TA phye ma rdo ba dang/ /spang leb/ bzhi mdo/ rma sogs 'ching/ /rgyal po'i lugs dang stan gyi dbye/ /pa tA rna rgyan rgyan cha dang/ /rgya skyegs dang bar byed pa la/ /baTTi gos kyi bye
185b6(mdo 'grel): brag dang/ /dag gi 'dren dang bum can shing/ /puSh+Ti 'phel dang gso lug khur ma bar byed/ /pa Ta/ gdengs ka/ tshul 'chos dang/ /'gram la'o ngal gso byas pa la/ /pAN+TaM/ de nas pa Ta na/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang/ ba rta? Ta/ barti kA dang/ ma TIr 'dod/ /b+ha Ta/ pA ma ra yi dbye/ /dpa' 
185b7(mdo 'grel): bo la'o/ b+ha Ti ni/ /rab tu 'gro ba nyid la'o/ /b+h+riSh+Ta/ zhes pa/ spyo ba dang/ /stong pa'i ba Ti kA la'o/ /muSh+Ti/ 'bras bu khu tshur bcings/ /mliSh+Ta mi gsal smra ba la/ /nad brjod pa la mliSh+TaMO/ /yaSh+Ti mda' dang mtshon cha dbye/ /do shal mchog dang do shal che/ 'khri shing rgyal mtshan
186a1(mdo 'grel): dbyug pa dang/ /b+hArgI'o riSh+Ti ni/ /'byor pa dang ni ral gri la/ /riSh+TaM bde dang mi dge med/ /la Ta/ ral gri rab myos/ skyon/ /lA Ta yul dang/ gos phyogs la/ /bA Ta/ lam dang/ tshul la'o/ /bA TI khyim dang niSh+ku Ta/ /bi Ta/ Shilga lan tsha dang/ /grangs dang
186a2(mdo 'grel): byi ba mda' dang sbrul/ /biSh+Ti las byed bzang po dang/ /pe ta na dang/ mngag pa la/ /b+yuSh+TaM nyin mo tho rangs dang/ /'bras bu yongs su smyungs pa la/ /b+yuSh+Ti 'byor pa/ rigs pa dang/ /nges pa la sogs 'bras bu la/ /sha TA/ ral pa seng ge la/ /pri dTaM/ sbrul dang sbyar
186a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rnam par nges byas bskyed pa la/ /priSh+Ti sprul pa le'u la/ /sphu Ta gsal dang rgyas dang khyab/ /sphu Ti gsal dang spal pa mo/ /rkang sgrogs la'o h+riSh+Ta ni/ /sphu long dga' skyes rab bsnun la'o/ /a ba Ta ni bu ga can/ /khron pa lhag mo dang? la'o/ /ba Tu dong dang dron
186a4(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /bum pa ya ma ku Ta dang/ /lcags sgrogs dang ni 'tshing ba la/ /a riSh+Ta ni/ sbu ba can/ /gzhol 'phyang/ bya rog/ kaM ka'o/ /a riSh+TaM ni bcas pa'i khyim/ /ta kra dge dang mi dge'i mtshan/ /utka Ta ni shas tsha dang/ /dar ba/ bod pa dregs pa'o/ /ka ra Ta ni 'tsho ba
186a5(mdo 'grel): smad/ /shing zan nyi ma bcu gcig pa/ /bya rog sil snyan khyad par dang/ /bram ze ngan dang leb rgan rtsi?/ /gdul dka' glang po'i 'gram pa dag/ karka Ta ni bud med kyi/ /byed pa khyim gyi bye brag dang/ /sbal ba dang ni bya la'o/ /karka TI ni skra can ma/ /shAlma li yi
186a6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu la'o/ /karta Ta ni 'dam dang ni/ /'dam rtsibs ka ra hA Tar grags/ /kArba Ta ni ras bal dang/ /rgya skyags la'o/ kI ka Ta/ /'jal/ 'tshed/ nor med/ rta la'o/ /kurk+ku Ta ni ma ga d+ha/ /zangs kyi gtsug pud can dang ni/ /gding ba srad bu khu dang ni/ /ku ku
186a7(mdo 'grel): b+ha dang/ rdo can la'o/ /kuk+ku TI ni/ rna rgyan dbus/ /se gol dga' ba dman pa'i dbye/ /zangs kyi gtsug pud can ma dang/ /bud med log par spyod pa la/ /shA la b+hany+dzi ku ruN+DI/ /dz+nyi ny+dzi kA'i dbye kuN+Da/ /kri sI Ta ni dga' ba dang/ /chu dang sgra tshogs 'byung gnas
186b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'grog byed rnams so tsa krA Ta/ /dman dang khram pa/ dug sel ma/ /tsarba Ta ni khyab pa dang/ /rgya che ba dang thal lcag dang/ /sarba Ta la'o tsa rda TI/ /phye ma'i bye brag la 'gyur ro/ /tsi pi Ta ni/ sna leb dang/ /sna nyeg dang ni ri sri ta/ /tsi rinTI legs gnas ma/ /lang tso gnyis pa'i bud
186b2(mdo 'grel): med dang/ /spyod pa me tog ngan pa la'o/ /dza ku TI ni dza ku Ta'i/ /ri dang khyim la'o dza kU TaM/ /rgya mtsho yi ni lan tshwa la/ /tri kU Ta ni dus bzangs la/ /tri pu Ta ni zhan pa dang/ /sa tI na ga la yang 'gyur/ /tri pu TA ni me tog gi/ dbye ba sug smel dur byid la/ /traM ga ni dra ba'i dbye//
186b3(mdo 'grel): b+hau tAny+tsa lI ma yang 'dod/ /tro hA Ta ni rngon pa dang/ /tshigs bcad rab dbye la 'dod do/ /bA ra Ti/ rta/ tsa ta ka/ ro langs brtul zhugs can la'o/ /ni rta Ta ni/ brtse med dang/ /gzhan snod khrag dang 'bras bu med/ /nirku Ta ni skyed tshal khyim/ /nya pa dang ni/ sgo glegs la/

186b5(mdo 'grel): pa gso/ /pa ra TA ni gand+ho lI/ /barba Ti ni/ rje rigs 'bru/ /bArba Ta ni chu srin la/ /bA ruN+Da ni byis pa la/ /b+hA kU Ta ni/ nya dang brag/ b+hAryA Ta ni rdas 'tsho ba/ /chags dang/ rang gi bud med phrad/ /b+hA bA Ta ni 'dod ldan dang/ /legs dang cha lugs lus dang gar/ /marka Ta ni/

186b7(mdo 'grel): 'tsho dang chu shing gi /rus dang nye bar byed pa la/ /mo ra ti ni rtsa ba dang/ /aM ko Ti ni me tog la/ /mo ra Ta ni/ zhag bdun dang/ /'o ma mchog dang/ mUrbi kA/ /bal+lA Ta ni/ glu mkhan dang/ /'dod can ri me tog tses 'tsho/ /bi ka Ta ni rnam gtsigs dang/ /yangs dang mdzes
