187a3(mdo 'grel): dga' / /karbba pu Na ngo tsha med/ /smyo dang long bar byed pa la/ /ka TaM/ na TaM/ nya pa dang/ /gla sgang dang ni dmar po la'o/ /kuN+Da kI Ta long ba dang/ /dag dang mngon shes g.yo ba dang/ /dzA ra dza'i bram ze ma/ /bu dang 'bangs mo 'dod can la/ /baTka rI Ta spang leb
187a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ral gri'i so dang brtul zhugs spyod/ /gA Dha muSh+Ti ser sna dang/ /ral gri dang ni chu gri sogs/ /tsakra bA Ta/ kra ya dang/ /mchu zheng mdza' dang/ gtsug pud shing/ /tsa tu(mdo 'grel): ShaSh+Ti grangs mang cha/ /nA ra ki Ta rdo ba'i bu/ /legs byin sha bi/ hin+t+ra
187a5(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /pa ra puSh+Ta/ gzhan 'dzin dang/ /gzhan gyis gsos dang/ tshod zong la/ /pra ti/ kriSh+TaM gsang ba dang/ /zhing rmed las ni gnyis pa la'o/ /pra ti shiSh+TaM zhes pa ni/ /so sor bshang dang/ bsngags pa la/ /parkA rA Ta zur mig dang/ /nyi ma gzhon
187a6(mdo 'grel): nu 'od 'bar dang/ /mi'u thung chu 'dzin/ phang pa dang/ /kAn+ta dat+ta sen mo nyams/ /shi ba'i biSh+Ta ngan pa dang/ /pags pa ngan dang dbang phyug che/ /prAny+tsa lo ha rnams la'o/ /sh+ru ti ka Ta/ sems mang sbrul/ /siM hats+tsha Ta zhes pa ni/ /klu shing dang ni ge
187a7(mdo 'grel): sar la'o/ /da sha no ts+tshiSh+Ta zhes pa/ /kha sbyor dang ni dbugs 'byin rten/ /pA tA tsampa Ta zhes pa/ /lcags dang mkhar pa/ rnga zlum dang/ /'thab dang/ rked pa/ rin chen zegs/ /rlung dang/ rnga chen/ rgya shug la'o/ /Ta mdza' i sde'o// //
187b1(mdo 'grel): Tha ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /stong pa bde byed mtho ba'i sgra/ /ka Tha thub ba des brjod dbye/ /lhag par de klog de rig lha/ /kaN+Tha mgrin ba rtsibs logs dang/ /zug rngu 'dzoms dang sgra dag la/ /kAN+ThA phyogs dang rab 'gyur gnas/ /dus kyi 'jal byed mtshams dang
187b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /thang shing la'o kASh+ThaM ni/ /bud shing kuN+Tha rmongs las med/ /kuSh+ThaM nang dang nang mtshon byed/ /koSh+Tha nang dang/ lto ba khyim/ /kU shUl dang/ rang gi ba'o/ /goSh+Thi 'dun sa gtam gyi sa/ /goSh+ThaM ba lang lhas la 'dod/ /dzyaSh+Tha zla ba'i bye brag dang/ /gtso bo dang ni rgan pa
187b3(mdo 'grel): la/ /dzyeSh+Tha zhes ba skar ma dang/ /gtun shing sor mo'i khyad par la/ /duSh+Thu nyam chung/ tha ma la'o/ /na Sh+ThI nges thob rdzogs pa dang/ /nyams dang/ mdza' dang/ phul byung dang/ /slong ba dang ni nyon mongs la'o/ /yA thA ma'i gnas/ pA Tha klog /priSh+ThaM lus kyi rgyab phyi ma//
187b4(mdo 'grel): praSh+Tha sngon 'gro gtso bo la/ /prASh+Tha gtum mo dang ni sman/ /baN+Tha ma byas kun thob dang/ /gdung gi so dang mi'u thung/ /sha Tha ngan pa/ khram pa dang/ /par du gnas pa dag la'o/ /shA Tha le lo/ rmongs pa la/ /sh+reSh+Tha mchog dang ku be ra/ /ShaSh+ThI/ drug rnams rdzogs pa rang
187b5(mdo 'grel): 'phrog byed kyi ni btsun mo la/ /ha Tha stobs kyi byed pa dang/ /pA ri pa li dag la'o/ /a praSh+Tha ni/ dus/ byis pa/ /e baSh+Tha ni/ rje rigs kyi/ /bu dang gnyis skyes yul phyogs la/ /am+baSh+Tha ni/ gaM gA skyes/ /ma'i gnas dang ni tshogs la'o/ /ka niSh+Tha ni chung ngu dang/ /no po/
187b6(mdo 'grel): tsa chung/ nyam chung dang/ /mthe'u chung dang ni sor mo la'o/ /ka ma Tha ni/ rus sbal la/ /ka ma ThaM ni/ snod bye brag/ dza ra Tha ni sra ba dang/ /skya'o dang ni gseg mar brjod/ /narma Tha ni tsU tsu ka/ grong khyer la'o pra koSh+Tha/ /rgyas par byed dang ras bal gzhi/ /mi yi bdag po'i khra ma'o//
187b7(mdo 'grel): pra tiSh+TA ni zhe sar 'dod/ /mchod sbyin/ sgrub dang/ gnas gzhi dang/ /yi ge tshigs bcad dag la'o/ /ba riSh+Tha ni rab mchog mdzes/ /tin+ti ri la'o/ pa riSh+ThaM/ na le shaM dang zangs la'o/ /ma kuSh+Tha ni/ bsrub pa dang/ /'bru dang phar 'gro dag la'o/ /la g+hiSh+Tha gos shin tu chung//
188a1(mdo 'grel): bai kuSh+Tha ni/ skra can dang/ /brgya byin la'o/ /sh+rI kaN+Tha/ /ri sras bdag dang/ sgra ngan dang/ /dug sel la yang 'gyur ba'o/ /sA d+hiSh+Tha 'phags shin tu brtan// //ka la kaN+Tha pi ka dang/ /phug ron dang pa/ sgra snyan dang/ /kaM ka ri dags
188a2(mdo 'grel): khyad par la/ /kA la/ priShtha/ rna ba/ bzhu/ /dan+ta sha tha skyur rtsi dang/ /ka pitTha dang/ mtshon gyi las/ /nA rAdga dang tsu kri kA'o/ /nI la kaN+Tha dA tyu ha'o/ /gyol po dang ni rab g.yo dang/ /ki ni ka la biM ka dang/ /ser po'i snying po can dag la'o/ /kA la kaN+Tha bzhin du
188a3(mdo 'grel): 'jug/ pU ti kASh+ThaM thang shing dang/ /lha shing dang ni/ sa skyes la'o/ /sU tra kaN+Tha phug ron dang/ /gnyis sgyes khany+dza ri Ta la/ /hA ri kaN+Tha/ khu byug dang/ /mgrin pa do shal bcas la'o/ /tha mdza' i sde'o// //Da ni ri yi mgon po dang/ /skrag pa'i
188a4(mdo 'grel): sgra la'ang blta bar bya/ /aN+Da bya dang/ nya sogs mdzod/ /'dom gyi sgo nga/ brtson 'grus la/ /a'i DA rtogs pa bu mo dag/ i lA bzhin du/ sa ba lang/ /kAN+Da sde tshan/ mnga' dang/ don/ /sdong bu/ skabs dang chu/ dbyug pa/ /mtshams dang/ kutbA?/ sdong po dang//
188a5(mdo 'grel): 'phrog dang/ smad dang bdag ldan ma/ /bu dang dzA rA ta rnams so/ /kuN+Di/ spyi blugs la/ /kuN+Da/ lha yi dra ba'i gzhi/ /pha ma yang ni 'dod pa'o/ /krI DA/ rtsed mo smod brnyas dang/ /ku re la'o kro Da ni/ /dal ba dang ni phag pa'o/ /kro DaM phag dang bak+Shas la/ /khaN+Da
188a6(mdo 'grel): phyed ma bur shing gi/ rnam 'gyur nor bu sun 'byin la/ /ga Sha? nya dang/ par la 'gro/ gu Du/ sgur rgyab/ bu raM la/ /gaN+Da/ bre dang sbyor ba'i dbye/ /bse ru dang ni khur tshos dang/ /mchog dang rab dpa' mtshan ma dang/ /rta dang rgyan dang chu bor la'o//
188a7(mdo 'grel): gu Da glang po'i go tsha dang/ /pru ba bur shing rnam 'gyur la'o/ /gu Da/ sgu hI/ ri lu dang/ /ma d+hwa na la yang 'dod pa'o/ /goN+Da pA ma ra'i dbye ba/ /rgan po'i lte ba la brjod do/ /tsaN+Da drag po lha min dbye/ /gshin rje'i 'bangs dang shin
188b1(mdo 'grel): tu khro/ /tsanDa nor 'phrog ma dang ni/ /dung gi me tog can dag la/ /tsiN+Di ri yi bu mo dang/ 'tshe byed btsun mo khro byed ma/ /tsU DA gdub bu'i dbye ba dang/ /gtsug pud dang ni ba Da b+hU/ /tsau Da yul dang/ gos bye brag /dza Da/ rmongs/ lkugs/ grang bas gzir/ /kuN+Du sman la'o b+hA Da
188b2(mdo 'grel): ni/ /khu tshur sogs dang yang dag 'jal/ /rtsa la sogs dang rdeg pa la/ /tA DI thal mo dang ni shing/ /daN+Da/ gtum mo'i cha shas kyis/ /yongs skor dmag dang dpung bye brag/ nga rgyal dbye ba gshin rje 'dul/ /mngon pa'i nga rgyal srub dang rta/ /zur gyi dbyug pa mtshams
188b3(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /gza' gdon mi bdag gdugs dang ni/ /la gu Da la 'dod pa'o/ /nA DI/ spubs rtsa rma rnams kyi/ /gaN+Da/ turbba dag dang ni/ /skad cig drug gi dus dang ni/ /spyod pa dang ni/ ku ha na'o/ /ni DaM/ gnas dang rigs su 'gro/ nye ba dang ni sde ba bcas/ /baN+Da blo dkar
188b4(mdo 'grel): paN+Da dang/ /baN+Du kan+tI'i bdag dang dkar/ /piN+Da lus kyi cha dag dang/ /gnas dang sid+ga? ka'o/ /piN+Da nas las skyes pa'o/ /gong bur byas pa dag la'o/ /piN+Da rgyun dang stobs po la/ /khyim gyi cha dang 'tsho ba dang/ /piN+Di A lA bu dang ni/ /'bra go dang ni sbos bye brag/ pi
188b5(mdo 'grel): DA 'joms dang brtse ba dang/ /thang shing dang ni mgo'i me tog /tsaN+DA rigs rnams tshogs pa la/ /tsaN+Da lag sogs por ba la/ /b+haN+DaM snod dang/ rtsa ba tshod pa yi/ /nor dang/ rgyan dang rta yi rgyan/ /chu klung snod la'ang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /guN+Da grul bum sbal mo la'o
188b6(mdo 'grel): maN+Da snying po mjug ma dang/ /raN+Da dang ni rgyan dag la/ /maN+Da ma ma'o N+DaM ni/ /phal ba'i dbye ba la yang ngo/ /muN+Da/ sgra gcan mgo bo dang/ /lha ma yin gyi bye brag la/ /raN+DA bya ba'i la ma dang/ /sman dang bi d+ha ba la'o/ /byA Da phyug la 'tshe dang sbrul/ /shuN+Da myos dang gya
188b7(mdo 'grel): tshom la/ /puN+Da chad dang rje rigs dang/ /sdong bu glang po'i lig pha la/ shuN+Da chu yi glang mo la/ /shauN+Da myos pa mngon par brjod/ /shoN+Di zegs ma tsa bi ka /Sha Da bdud ba'i khyad par dang/ /pad+ma sogs kyi tshal la'o/ /ShaN+Da/ bad rims bdag /bsags/ k+She Da sgra
189a1(mdo 'grel): dang ga ra la/ /rna bar byung dang rtsub pa dang/ /'khyog po'i k+Shwe DA glang mo dang/ /dpa' bo rnams kyi seng ge'i sgra/ /rgyab kyi zug? rngu la yang ngo/ /dAk+ShaM DaM/ arka dmar po'i 'bras/ /dbyangs dang me tog dur sang/ /kA raN+Da ni sbrang rtsi can/ /pA si ka/ tsaN+Da ba
189a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'dab chags da lA Ta ka'o/ /kuSh+ma N+Da ni tshogs kyi dbye/ /srin bu karkA ru dang mngal/ /kuSh+mAN+DI ni gtum mo sman/ /ko daN+Da ni smin ma gzhu/ /yul gyi bye brag la yang ngo/ /gA ru Di ni bstan bcos dang/ /dug dang ma ra ka ta la/ /ta raN+Da ni/ snum can dang/ /'chi'i
189a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ srang bu bcings pa dang/ /dngos po dang ni grub pa'o/ /tin+ti Da ni lha min dbye/ /tin+ti Di ni/ gshin rje'i bran/ /shing dbye mu tsiny+tsa yi shing/ /dra ba'i Da ni dbye ba'i sgo/ /tshang gi khyad par mkha' dag la/ /ni rguN+DA ni tra Ni kA/ sngon po'i rtags dang chung ba dang/ 'dzin
189a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ka ra hA Ta ka la'o/ /pi tsiN+Da ni sra ba dang/ /phyugs kyi yan lag la yang ngo/ /pu tyaN+Da sbrul ri dags dri/ /gand+ha kI Ta ka la'o/ /pra kaN+Da ni bkra shis dang/ /rtsa ba yal ga'i mtshams shing dang/ /yal ga'i tshogs pa la yang ngo/ pra tsaN+Da ni rab
189a5(mdo 'grel): gdung dang/ /ngan 'bab/ lugs dang dpa' bo'i lag kha raN+Da ni tshod pa dang/ /yu ba gaN+Da ka dang ni/ /bar gyi kha khyer dag la'o/ /bArtaN+Da ni mtshe can bya/ /bA ruN+DI ni sgo'i piN+DA/ /pA ruN+Da thabs mig dri ma/ /gaN+Di sta yi rgyal po la/ /khrus kyi snod dang tha ba la//
189a6(mdo 'grel): b+he ruN+DA ni 'dab chags mo/ /lha mo dbye dang 'jigs ma la/ /mArtanDa ni gtum mo'i 'od/ /phag la'o ma raN+Da ni sbrul/ /lam dang/ ba byung dkyil 'khor la/ /ba tsaN+DA ni ri skegs dang/ /ral gri gzhon ma gnas la 'jug bi taN+Da ni rlung dbye dang/ kar bI
189a7(mdo 'grel): rI rdo yi ming/ /kats+tshi sA ka sA dz+nyA la'o/ /shi khaN+Da ni/ rma bya gtsug/ sa paN+Di ni bgo skal dang/ /gong bu dang bcas nu ma la/ /sa raN+Da ni sa ra Ta/ /khram brgyan gyi khyad par la/ /a bo gaN+Da gyis pa can/ /lus ma tshang dang shin tu 'jigs/ /tsakra bA Da ri yi dbye ga tsakra
189b1(mdo 'grel): bA DAM zlum po'o/ /dza ga ruN+Da chu sgyur ba/ chu rdul dang ni sbrul dag la/ /de pa NA DA? lha yi nyi/ /mtho ris sgang byed dbyangs ldan ma/ /bA tA(mdo 'grel): khu Da rlung dmar dang/ /ba tyA lcags sgog mjug ma can/ /gnas tsam la yang blta bar bya/ /Da mdza' i sde'o/ /
189b2(mdo 'grel): Dha ni rda dang yon tan med/ /ma zad pa yi sgra la'o/ /g+hU Dha dben dang gsang ba sgribs/ /kA Dha mche ba 'dod pa la/ /dri Dha/ sbom po stobs ldan la/ /dri DhaM/ bA Dha/ pra ga Dha/ /mA Dhi 'dab sogs bcom pa dang/ /nor dang/ zhan dang/ gsal ba la/ /mU Dha la'o/
189b3(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa la/ /rA Dha tshangs pa bzang dang mdzes/ /ba d+hi nges dang dam bca' la/ /bau Dha rgyas dang skyes pa la/ /byA Dha/ rgya che rnam bkod tshogs ShaN+Dha/ sgrib/ char skyes bu bcings/ /so Dha bzod dang nus pa la/ /sho Dha yang ni bzod pa la/ /a d+hyu Dha ni dbang
189b4(mdo 'grel): phyug la'o/ /a d+hyu Dh+ra ni btsun mo dang/ /kri ta pA pan+n+ya la'o/ /AShA b+ha ni brtul zhugs kyi/ /dbyug pa zla ba/ dri ma slong/ /u dU Dha ni/ phung po spom/ /u po Dha ni/ bkod pa tshogs/ pra gI Dha ni brtan dang dka' / /pra mI Dha ni/ dri chu 'thug/ pra ru Dha ni rtsa ba/ bcings
189b5(mdo 'grel): mkhregs pa dang na gur la'o/ /bA ru Dha ni rgyags dang me/ /gos dang g.yo ba sgo glegs la/ /bi g+hu Dha ni/ smad dang sbed/ /bi rU Dha ni sol ba skyed/ /sa mU DA ni sarba dang/ /b+hugna/ nye bar 'gro ba dang/ /phung po byas pa'o/ /saM rU Dha/ /dar ma dang ni myu gu la'o//
189b6(mdo 'grel): a d+hya ru Dha/ zhon pa dang/ /lhag pa la te rtags gsum pa/ /Dha mdza' i sde rdzogs so// //Na ni gtan la phab dang shes/ /Na ni pra dang bram ze'i dbye/ /a Ni mchog tu mkhas pa dang/ /yur bu mtshams dang zur la'o/ /uSh+Na chad pa/
189b7(mdo 'grel): gdung ba dang/ /bsregs pa dang ni mkhas pa'o/ /a'ur+Na mdzod pu/ lugs sogs pa la/ /ka Na/ phra zegs so ba'i cha/ /ka NA dzi ri bas pa li/ /chu srin dang ni mak+Shi kA/ /kar+Na/ rna ba pri thA'i bu/ /mdog bzang dang ni lta ba la/ /kA Na/ mau kri/ lA ba dang/ /lta ba'o ka Na/ rma mtshon
190a1(mdo 'grel): rtags/ /phra mo rma dang yon tan la'o/ /kIr+NaM khebs dang/ yongs khyab dang/ /'tshe ba mngon par brjod pa'o/ /ku Ni/ khyi dang gzir ba la/ /kriSh+Na/ khyab 'jug/ srid sgrub/ spre'u/ /rgyas pa la'o/ kriSh+Ni ni/ /na le shaM dang/ lcags la'o/ /kriSh+Na/ dau ba
190a2(mdo 'grel): dI nI dang/ kha mo/ dU rA/ pi spa li/ /ko Na mchi ma dbyug pa dang/ /rol mo'i dbye ba/ karka skyes/ /bi waM la sogs sbyor thabs dang/ /phyogs gcig dang ni khyim rnams so/ /ga Na tshogs dang/ 'joms byed grangs/ /dmag gi rab tu dbye ba la//
190a3(mdo 'grel): gu Na gzugs sogs/ snying stobs sags/ /rig pa sogs dang ljang gu sogs/ /'dod dang gtso bo min pa dang/ /mtshams sogs/ thag pa/ maurbI dang/ /spyang ki'i lto ba rnams la'o/ /geSh+Nu gar dang glu len la/ /g+h+ri NA/ snying rje smad pa la/ /g+h+rA
190a4(mdo 'grel): NaM/ sna dang/ g+h+rA ta la'o/ /tsUr+NaM phye mar gyur pa la/ /tsUr+Na k+Sho da 'gyur byed dbye/ /tsur+NA dri yi sbyor ba la/ /dzo r+Na shing dang cha shas gter/ /zla ba// /rdziSh+Na/ sa dang/ dbang po mi/ /rgyal byed la'o dzI r+NaM ni/ /smin dang rgan dang mchog tu rgas/ /ri Ni/ bU ga gdug pa'i
190a5(mdo 'grel): lha/ /thos pa dang ni/ mkhregs pa la/ /tIk+ShA 'gyur byed lhag par rno/ /rno ba'i bdag nyid la sogs la/ /tI k+Sh+NaM lcags dang dug dang ni/ /rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa 'thab pa dang/ /nas kyi rtse dang swa ka ka'o/ /tU Ni sngon mo/ tU Na chags/ /triSh+Na sred dang 'dod pa
190a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /trA NaM skyo ba dang bsrub ba dang/ sbyangs dang skyob par byed pa la/ /rI r+NaM/ bcoms dang 'jigs pa la/ /deSh+Nu 'joms byed/ gdul dka' la/ /dru Na sdig pa bung ba la/ /dru NI rus sbal mo dang ni/ /chu yi sbal mo la yang ngo/ /dru NaM/ ral gri
190a7(mdo 'grel): la yang ngo/ /dro Na/ bya rog/ kri pI'i bdag/ lung pa/ bzhi mdo 'brog la'o/ /dro NI shing dang/ 'bab 'bab dang/ /ba lang za dang sa dang ni/ /shing/ khyim/ ri dang mtshams dang ni/ /tshang gi dbye ba la yang ngo/ /d+ha r+Na gser dang mchod sbyin dang/ /? por dang/ glang dang
190b1(mdo 'grel): sped/ /brgyad cu dang ni ba rA Ta/ /kArShA pa Na dang ni nor/ /tshong dang shing rta/ tshe long dang/ /tha snyad la yang dran par bya/ /khu tshur bcings ba la yang ngo/ /par+Na/ ljang gu/ kiM shu ka/ par+NaM 'dab ma/ lo ma la/ /sArShI zhes pa phyi'i cha/ /dmag rgyab sa 'og/ smyo ba la/ /par+Na/ tshe
190b2(mdo 'grel): dang gang ba la/ /prA NA gnas dang prA Na ni/ /rlung mchog/ rlung dang g.yo ba la/ /prA NaM/ snyan ngag 'tsho ba dang/ /bo la dang ni/ gang ba la/ /pha ni/ bu raM byed pa la/ /bA Ni bkod pa dang ni dag/ bA Ni sprin dang/ rin thang la b+hU Na/ bud med mngal dang byis/ /ma Ni rin chen rtags
190b3(mdo 'grel): kyi rtse/ /ra dag mgrin pa nu ma dang/ /a liny+dza ra/ mu tig sogs/ /mo Na pa Ta kutsha ka/ nags dang/ chu srin/ kuM b+hI ra/ /ma k+Shi ka/ sprul za ma tog/ ra na rkang pa'i rting ba zur/ sgra/ 'thab pa la'o/ /ra Na/ rdul dang/ nag po dang/ /parpa Ta la parpa Ni/ /bstod pa/ gzugs/ grags
190b4(mdo 'grel): yon tan dud 'gro dang/ /chags dang/ bram ze la sogs dang/ /dkar po sogs dang mdzes pa dang/ /la pa/ khra bo brtul zhugs dbyangs/ shing dang/ cha byad/ mdog mig go /bA Na/ sa yi bu dang/ rta/ /rta yi lus dang 'ba' zhig pa/ /mdang dang/ rb+hiN+Da can la'o/ /biSh+Nu ba?
190b5(mdo 'grel): smed med bu nyi ma/ /bI Na nor lha'i dbye ba dang/ /pi wang dang ni glog dag la/ /priSh+Na yA da ba dang lug/ sA ShaN+Di dang gtum pa la/ /be Ni chu klung/ ri mo dang/ /skra bcings pa yi khyad par dang/ /lha la sogs pa la yang ngo/ /be Nu 'od ma mi bdag dbye/ /bA Na byed 'degs
190b6(mdo 'grel): zhi ba las dang/ /'tshe ba dang ni sog le dang/ /grang ba skyob pa'i khyad par la/ shA NI/ snyigs dang chung ngu dang/ /rnam par snyigs pa rnams la'o/ /sho Na dga' ba chu klung dmar/ /dang ba bya khra rma bya dang/ /rta dmar la'o sh+rA NA ni kA cho ma'i/ thug pa lan brjod bya ldan/ /sh+rA NaM
190b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshed pa sh+ri Ni ni/ /phreng ba dang ni khrus la'o/ /s+thA Nu bzo'i tshogs dang ni/ /'phrog byed brtan pa nges pa'o/ /s+thu NA lcags kyi gzugs brnyan dang/ /ka ba dag la'o k+Sha Na ni/ /dga' ston dus dbye/ skabs dang tshigs/ /a b+hI k+Sh+Na nges pa dang/ /shin tu'i don la'o a ru ba/ /skya
191a1(mdo 'grel): rangs dang ni nyi ma dang/ /ru rta/ mi gsal dmar ba dang/ /thun mtshams dmar ba chu 'dra dang/ /dmar dang ser skya 'dres pa la'o/ /a ru Na ni dur byid dang/ /kho dang/ sngo bsangs le brgan la/ /a ra Ni ni me bsrub dang/ /srub par byed pa'i dbyug pa la//
191a2(mdo 'grel): in+d+ra Ni ni bde sogs ma/ /sindu bla ra byed pa sman la/ /byA ra NaM ni ma mo stong/ /a'ik+Sha NaM ni mthong dang blta/ /u Sha NA ni zegs ma la/ /u Sha NaM ni na le shaM/ e sman Sha NI ni rma dang lam/ /rjes su 'brang dang srang gi dbye/ /e Sha Ni lcags mnga' dang/ /rjes su 'tshol
191a3(mdo 'grel): dang sngar rjes can/ /kaM ka NaM ni lag pa'i rgyan/ /lag pa'i srang bu mgo thod la/ /kartri ni ni/ rtsa'i bye brag /chu yi lo ma la yang ngo/ /ka ra Na ni rje rigs dang/ /dmangs rigs dang ni rjes skyes la/ /ka ra Ni ni sgrub po mchog/ /lus dang lus gnas las dang ni/ /bya ba dang
191a4(mdo 'grel): ni dbang po zhing/ /byis pa'i smra ba dbyangs kyi lus/ /do shal kun tu 'jug pa dang/ /bya ba'i khyad par la yang 'dod/ /ka ru Na dang/ ka ru NA/ /brtse ba ro nyams shing la'o/ /ka ru Na ni dbang dang ni/ /lta ba glang ma dag la'o/ /ka lya Na ni dge ba dang/ /gser dang bkra shis
191a5(mdo 'grel): mi zad la/ /kA ka NI ni bzhi cha dang/ /srang dang tshad kyi dbyug pa la/ /kA ka NaM ni/ guny+dza dang/ kha Ta tsam dang/ mdza' i bye brag/ kA ra Na ni bsnun dang bsang/ /gzir dang gnod pa'i byed pa la/ /kA ra NA ni 'bad pa la/ /karma NaM ni 'tshe ba'i las/ /gzhan lus rab 'jug
191a6(mdo 'grel): shes pa dang/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi rab sbyor la/ /kurbA Na ni glang mi byed/ /kri pa Na ni smod dang 'bu/ /kri pA Na ni/ ral gri la/ /mtshan dang byed po kri pA Ni/ /kong+ga Na ni/ yul bye brag/ kongka Ni ni mtshon bye brag/ go ka r+Na ni dre'u dang/ /sprul dang ri dags dbye ba dang//
191a7(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi khyad par mthe bo dang/ /ming med/ tshad sman/ muArbi kA/ /gra ha Na ni mi bdag thob/ /rang gir byas dang byed pa la/ /gza' dang/ nyer chags/ phyag 'tshal dang/ /rkyen dang/ gus pa dag la yang/ /grA ma NI ni/ nA si ta/ /gtso bo bdag po longs spyod tsam tshogs
191b1(mdo 'grel): can/ grong dpon/ rams rnams la'o/ /tsa ra NaM ni/ a brku/ /'gros dang rin dang rkang pa rigs/ /tsa ra Ni ni 'khor ba dang/ /mdza' dang/ rgyu ba za ba dang/ /zi ra/ go stod/ mtshal dang ni/ /sau brtsal 'dod do/ /ta ra Ni ni sgrol byed nyi/ /gzhon nu ma dang gru mkhan la/ /ta ru Na ni na
191b2(mdo 'grel): chung dang/ /gsang ba 'khyog po'i me tog dang/ /ce spang chen po dag la'o/ /dak+Shi Na ni/ thang shing dang/ /g.yon min gzhan 'dun rjes su 'jug/ a pA tsi las byung la 'dod/ /dak+Shi Na ni mchod sbyin/ sbyin/ /rab gnas a bA tsO la'o/ /du rbbar+N+Na ni bye ma can/ /gzung/
191b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ mdog ngan la yang brjod/ /daurbA NaM ni mriSh+Ta'i 'dab/ /dUrbA'i khu ba la yang ngo/ /dru g+ha Na ni tho ba dang/ /pa ra/ sU d+ha 'tshe ba la/ /dra bi NaM ni pha rol gnon/ /gser dang 'byor pa la yang ngo/ /d+ha ra NaM? ni 'dzin pa dang/ /nga rgyal dbye ba dag la'o/ /d+ha ra NI nas la'o
191b4(mdo 'grel): d+ha ru Ni ni chu dang ni/ /mtho ris dang ni mchog la gnas/ /d+harmA Na ni sprul bye brag/ rkang 'thung khyad par dag la yang/ /d+harSha NI ni rigs tshogs ma/ /d+harSha NaM ni mdzod dang dga' / /d+ha ra NI ni sangs rgyas gsungs/ /sngags kyi bye brag zlos gar la/ /d+hi Sha Na ni/ lha'i slong
191b5(mdo 'grel): dpon/ /d+hi Sha NA ni blo dang gnyid/ /ni rmA Ni ni sprul pa dang/ /snying po dang ni bkod pa dang/ /sa many+dza pa zhes pa la/ /nirya Ni ni nges 'byung thar/ /mdzod dang a pAdka dang bcings/ /nirbA Ni ni myang 'das thar/ /nub dang glang po skyes bu dam/ /ni(mdo 'grel): sh+re Ni ni them skas dang/ /'bra go'i
191b6(mdo 'grel): rkang 'thung dag la'o/ /ba tro r+Na? ni sbyangs pa'i dar/ /bat+tor+Na ni shA na'i shing/ /pak+Shi NI ni kun 'gro dang/ /da ltar ba dang nyin mtshan ldan/ /khyogs mdza' dang ni nya gang ga/ yal ga can gyi dbye ba la/ /bu rA Na/ karShA ba Na'o/ /pu rA NaM ni mtshan nyid lnga/ /dus rings lon
191b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i rdzas la brjod/ /gU ra Na ni rdzogs byed dang/ /bskong phye ma'i khyad par la/ /pU ra NI/ shalma li/ /gos dang rtsom dang srad bu'i dbye/ /pra g+ha Na ni zangs bum dang/ /a linda dang lcags tho la/ /bra ma Ni ni/ bden smra dang/ /rgyu mtshan gtan tshigs bstan bcos dang/
192a1(mdo 'grel): lugs dang gcig skyob rab 'ja'/ /rgyu mtshan 'di snyed ces pa la'o/ /pra ba Na ni rab tu sbyangs/ /'bod dang rim gzhol/ sa/ skad cig/ bzhi mdo la'o/ pra be Ni/ /'dres dang rul ba dag la'o/ /prok+Sha NaM ni khrus dang 'ching/ /ba ra Na nir ? ? ?
192a2(mdo 'grel): tshul la'o/ /ba ru NaM ni shing dbye dang/ /lo ma kha ba chu bdag dang/ /nyi ma dang ni chu la'o/ /bA ra Na ni glang por bshad/ /bA ra NaM ni dgag pa la/ /bA rU Ni ni nub phyogs dang/ /mai re ya dang durbA tri/ /brAhma NI ni rten byed ma/ /gnyis skyes chung ma gnyis
192a3(mdo 'grel): skyes ma/ /prik+kA rnams so/ prAt+ma Na/ /de bzhin brAhma Ni zhes pa/ /sngags rigs dang ni gnyis skyes tshogs/ /b+ha ra Ni ni dmar po dom/ /b+ha ra NaM ni rig dang gla/ /mi bzad mche ba/ b+hI Sha Na/ /shal+la Shi'i bcud b+hI Sha NaM/ /b+h+ra ma Ni ni tsher ma dang/ /dbang phyug
192a4(mdo 'grel): rol pa g.yo ba la'o/ /matku Na ni rmar dang/ /kun tu dor ba'i mi dang ni/ /so med glang po che dang ni/ /mthon po dang ni be ta la'o/ /ma sri Na ni karka sha/ snuM pa dang ni 'jam pa la/ /ma sri NA ni k+Shu mA la'o/ /mArga Na ni slong ba dang/ /mda' dang sems can/
192a5(mdo 'grel): Sha tsnya la'o/ /yan+t+ra NaM ni nges dang 'ching/ /srung la'o/ /pa To la'i rtsa ba/ /ra pa NaM do/ ra ma Na/ /dga' ba dang ni rtsub pa la/ /ra pa NaM ni sgra sgrogs sgra/ /ro Sha Na ni khro byed dang/ /gzhan skyon sbyin dang gser brdar ba'o/ /ro hi Ni pa skar ma dang/ /rna ba'i nad
192a6(mdo 'grel): kyi dbye ba dang/ /dmar po so ma balka dang/ /ka Tu ro ha Ni la'o/ /la ba Ni ni gnyis 'thung dbye/ /la ba Na ni ro bcud bsrung/ /rgya mtsho'i dbye ba mdzes dang gsal/ /lak+Sha NaM ni ming mtshan ma/ /lak+Sha Ni ni dga' byed dpun/ /lak+Sha ma NaM ni/ zla ba dbang//
192a7(mdo 'grel): la k+Sh+ma NaM ni ming mtshan byed/ /lak+Sh+ma NA ni mtsho skyes ma/ /'od ldan ma dang dpal ldan ma'o/ /bi ba NaM ni/ tshong khang zod/ /A pa Na ni tshong zod la/ /biShA NaM ni phyugs kyi rwa/ /mche ba/ sna dang/ so dag la'o/ /piShA Ni ni lug rwA can/ /sha ra NaM ni/ srung dang 'ching
192b1(mdo 'grel): sa ra NaM ni khyim gyi g.yabs/ /saM g+ha NaM ni sna'i dri ma/ /shi g+hA NaM ni lcags kyi rtsa/ /'ching bu'i snod la'ang lta bar bya/ /sh+ra ma Na ni sdom brtson dbye/ /smad pa'i 'tsho ba legs mthong dang/ /snag tsha/ tshang ma/ dge slong ma'o/ /sh+ra ba Na ni rgyu skar la/ /sh+ra ma NaM ni/ rna ba thos//
192b2(mdo 'grel): sh+rA pa Na ni mA si dang/ /saShDa dang/ da d+hyA lI'o/ /sh+rI prar+NI ni bum pa can dang/ /gam+b+hA ri dang/ pad+ma dang/ /me srub byed pa rnams la'o/ /saM/ kA r+NaM ni 'dres ma dang/ /ma dag pa'o pa ra Ni/ /phreng ba dang ni lam la'o/ /sA ra Na ni 'bod sgrogs kyi/ /blon po dang ni chad nad la'o//
192b3(mdo 'grel): sA ra NI ni 'bab chu chung/ /rab tu 'bab pa dag la'o/ /su bar+N+Ni ni gtsug pud gser/ /bya khyung dang ni phreng ba la/ /su pa r+NA ni pad+ma can/ /bya khyung gi ni ma la'o/ /su bar+Na ni/ gser ldan ma/ /a gu ru nag sog po'i dbye/ /su par+NaM ni/ mdog gser zhe/ /su She Na ni seng
192b4(mdo 'grel): ge dang/ /mgrin bzang rig pa lag nyid la/ /ha ra Ni ni gru yi rdzas/ /lus kyi do shal lag pa snying/ /ha ri Na ni ri dags skye/ /ha ri Ni ni ljang gu dang/ /ri dags bud med kun spyod dbye/ /harSha Na ni gzer gyi gzugs/ /rab dga' lto ba'i nad bye brag
192b5(mdo 'grel): lha la dad pa las byung ba/ /he ru Nu ni bud med rigs/ /bud med rdul dang sha tI la/ /hi ra Na dang/ hi ra N+ya/ /lte ba gser dang khu ba'o/ /k+She pa NI ni gru'i dbyug pa/ /dra ba'i khyad par dag la yang/ /a dgA ri NI/ ha san+tI/ /nyi ma dang ni bor ba la/ /A tarba
192b6(mdo 'grel): Na Ni tshim pa dang/ /kun tu byug pa la yang ngo/ /A tharbya Na srid bsrungs shes/ /bram ze dang ni mdun na 'don/ /A ro ha/ NaM them skas dang/ /yang dag 'jig dang rab tu 'dzegs/ /utk+She pa Ni rlung yab dang/ /so ba nyid dang dngos pa'o/ /skyugs dang drungs nas 'byin
192b7(mdo 'grel): dang sel/ /steng du 'dren dang/ 'byin la 'dod/ /kA ma gu Na chags pa dang/ /longs spyod dang ni yul la yang/ /kArSha pa NA snying pa dang/ /rko bar byed pa la yang ngo/ /tsIr+Na bar+Na 'bra go shing/ /bi tsu ma rda'i shing la'o/ /tsU Da ma Ni mgo'i rin chen/ /bya rog mchu dang
193a1(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu la/ /dzu ha pA Na me 'bras/ /bu/ haN+Da'i Na 'bu dang ni/ gshin rje'i yul la/ barka ba/ te la bar+Ni ri sgyes dang/ /sihma dang ni/ dpal gyi gnas/ /dA TA ya ni bgrod dka' ma/ /snar ma dang ni sgrol ma la/ /de ba ma Ni zhes pa ni/ /zhi ba nor
193a2(mdo 'grel): bu gau stu b+ha/ /rgyal po'i mgrin bar 'khyil pa la/ /nA rle ya Na mi nyams dang/ /'jigs byad dkar mo srod med ma/ ni ga ra Na zas dang ming/ /ni rU pa Ni rnam spyad dang/ snang ba dang ni lta ba la/ /nisti ra NaM nges sgrol dang/ /thabs dang nges bar
193a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba la/ /ni? sa ra Ni sgo dang grol/ nges 'byung thabs dang 'chi ba la/ /ba rI ra Na rus sbal dang/ /dbyug pa pa Ta/ bla Ta ka/ sarba rla Na/ rdo leb dang/ /mad dang la ba dag dang ni/ /lo ma phye ma'i khu ba dang/ /dkar po dri zhim tshogs rnams la/ /bar
193a4(mdo 'grel): pa Ni bshad pa dang/ /chos kyi spyan pa be'u la/ /pa dA ya NaM lhur len dang/ /mngon 'dod dang ni rten la'o/ /pA rA ma Ni pha rol bgrod/ /yang dag kun chags la bar ba dang/ /bI lu/ bar+NA mUrbra dang/ /gzugs dang sman gyi dbye ba la/ /puSh+ka ri ni
193a5(mdo 'grel): mtsho skyes dang/ /lag ldan dang ni chu'i gzhi la/ /bra ti baN 'du byed dang/ /nye bar 'dzin dang 'dod ba la/ /bra bA ra NaM 'gog pa dang/ /'dod bya spyin dang sgrib ba la/ /yA ra bA Na ya lang dang/ /go cha thams cad la yang ngo/ mI nA mrIN rkang 'ther dang/ /sbrul
193a6(mdo 'grel): gyi shun pa dag la'o/ /rak+Sha ra ? lri? dang/ /ba pA sha yi me tog rdul/ /rA ga tsUN+Da dran pa dang/ /khrag dang bya ma so rgyag pa'o/ /re ri hA Na/ phyugs bdag mkha' / /lam+ba kar+Na ra dang ni/ /adko tha dang/ sa skyes la'o/ /bi dra ra Ni 'thab pa dang 'byang
193a7(mdo 'grel): ba dang spyo ba la/ /bai te rA NI zhes bya ba/ /yi dags/ chu klung srin po'i ma/ /sha ra bA Ni mda'i gtong/ /sA yi kyang de dmangs 'tsho ba'o/ /si la ri Ni spyod pa yi/ /dbye dang ni dkra'i dbye/ /rin po cha dang mal+li kA/ /ba spu'i phreng ba la yang brjod/
193b1(mdo 'grel): sa mi ra Na rla dang ni/ /bri ba me tog bam la'o/ aM bi ra NaM 'khor ba dang/ /slar yang 'gro ba lar grod/ /lam po che dang 'thab mo rtsom/ /bsrub dang ni 'chol ba'o/ /hasti kar+Na sa lA ga/ e raN+Da dang tshogs kyi dbye /a ba gra ha naM zhes pa/ lo sar 'gol
193b2(mdo 'grel): dang me rtsem pa a ba hA ra Ni zhes so/ /'byung po 'gebs dang any+tsal mchod/ /a pa tA ra NA zhes pa/ /kun bshad cha dang mchod pa'i tshogs ba ri b+ha Sha NaM zhes pa/ /smod dang nyer dpogs nyed dang smra/ /bra birla ra Ni zhes pa/ 'dzin sa dang 'khrugs
193b3(mdo 'grel): pa dag la'o/ /moN+Du ka bar+Na ba shing ka sh+yan ka dang a rA li/ /ka bA tam dag la'o/ /maN+DU ka par+Ni zhes pa/ le bargan tshangs ma ba yang lteng ngo/ /mat+ta nA ra Na zhes pa/ myos shing gdul dka' i glang po dang/ /khang bzang dang ni chang gang ge/ ba ra NA dang gyi rten dang//
193b4(mdo 'grel): ba ru ra yi shing la'o/ /ra ma harya Ni/ bu leng/ /bA ta rA ya ti na smyo/ /rtsegs pa dang ni 'tshol ba dang/ /bzhad kyi gom pa lag pa'i 'dad/ cung zad byed pa med pa la'o/ /de ha ba lak+Sha Na ni/ /na tshod mtshams dang mngal la'o?/ /yau ba ya le ma NaM ni/ /'o ma
193b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang mdzes bar 'dod/ /sna tshogs gsal ba las/ /Na mdza' i sde'o// /twa ni skyong byed skyong ba po/ /ta ni tshims kun phag go mjug/ aM ka rnam dag khyab pa la/ /an+ta 'jig dang yid 'phrog dang/ /rang bzhin la'o a na/
193b6(mdo 'grel): rab mdza' dang ni nya ba la/ /arti gzir ba/ gzhu dang rtse asta nub kyi ri bo la/ /asta 'phangs dang song ba la/ /Asta/ 'dun sa bzung ba la/ /Abti sdom dang 'thob pa la/ /a taM mkhas dang/ rtogs pa la/ a'i ti chang tshes la sogs drug /Di sba dang
193b7(mdo 'grel): na sra bA/ usti smra dang yi ge gcig/ 'dun pa'o a'u ti zhes bya ba/ /srung bar byed dang/ swU? ti'o /ri ta nu nya'i rdo dang chu/ ri ti/ bden dang 'gro ba dang/ /'bar ba rang ni mngon par mchod/ /ra ti 'go dang smad pa dang/ /'gran pa dang ni bkra shis la/ /ni ni
194a1(mdo 'grel): dus skyes snang ba dang/ /dbyid la sogs dang brtan pa la/ /kan+ta 'gro ba zal po dang/ /yid du 'ong dang/ dga' ba dang/ /rngo ba la'o kAn+ta naM/ /pri yaM gu dang/ dgon pa la/ /kAn+ti mdzes dang mngon 'dod la/ /kIrti grags pa bster ba
194a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /khang bzang dang ni rgya chen la/ /kun+tu brA sa ba lang 'jo/ /rang bzhin srog chags chung ngu la/ /kun+tI skyab seng btsun mo la/ /kri traM/ gu gul shing dang ni/ /shal+la kI dang bden pa zung/ /'bras bu med dang rnam grangs 'thob/ /byas dang kun tu phan
194a3(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /kri ti 'ching dang byed pa la/ /kri ti dzi la dang ni gnas/ /kri ti/ rus sbal gro ga dang/ /byas pa can la rab tu brjod/ /ke tu gza' li bye brag dang/ /gyen du 'gro dang long mtshon byed/ /rgyal mtshan dang ni dgra la'o/ /kra tu/ mchod sbyin thub
194a4(mdo 'grel): b+ha lu/ /ga ti 'du shes dka' thub la/ /ga ti bcu dang 'gro ba dang/ /ye shes lam dang khas slangs dang/ /rtsa yi rma yi 'gro ba dang/ /skye bo'i khyad par lto ba la/ /gart+ta dong gsum bye brag dang/ /ku kundug sa'i g.yang sa/ /gA ru tri la 'khor
194a5(mdo 'grel): dang 'phyar/ /khro byed khu byug pho la'o/ /gi ti sdeb sbyor bye brag glu/ /gI taM/ glu dang sgra la'o/ /gupta bsrung dang sbed pa la/ /dmangs rig zla ba snga ma can/ /gun+ti yi ga'i khyim dang dong/ /ba lang skyong/ bsdud/ gshin rje'o/ /gra staM zos dang byas pa la
194a6(mdo 'grel): lus mdog dang rkang pa 'byung/ /g+hA ta/ bsnun dang tshar ma la/ /g+h+raM taM gsal dang/ snang ba chu/ /tsa'i? ti tshogs dang/ bsags pa la/ /tsi ti/ 'dus dang tshogs pa dang/ /bkab dang sgyed bu la yang ngo/ /dza taM/ skye ba tshogs dang skye/ /dza ti spyi dang phreng
194a7(mdo 'grel): ba can/ /sdeb sbyor dbye ba rigs dang skye/ /dzA ti pha la la yang ngo/ /'gro byed g.yo ba sgyed bu la'ang/ /dz+nyA ti rigs bzang pha la'o/ /ta ta rlung la'o/ /ta taM ni/ /pi wang la sogs rol mo la/ /prapta rnam par rgyas pa la/ /tA ta rjes brtse/ /skyed pa po/ /kik+ta
194b1(mdo 'grel): ro dang dri gzangs la/ /tik+tA ka Tu hi NI/ /tik+taM parba ta la 'dod/ /tre tA dus dang me gsum la/ /dat+taM bi sh+rA bi ta dang/ /a bi ta'o dan+ta ni/ /so dang glang po dag la'o/ /dan+ti sman gyi bye brag dang/ /dAn+ta dka' 'thub nyon mongs bzod/ /dul bar gyur pa la yang ngo//
194b2(mdo 'grel): de ni sbyin dang dum bu la/ /dIpta 'bar dang bsregs pa dang/ /nges par gsal pa la yang 'gyur/ /tri ti pags pa sbyar dang/ nya/ /gripta ma sgribs nus pa la/ /d+yu ti 'bar dang/ mdzes pa dag/ dru taM/ myur dang rnam par 'gro/ /rnam par zhum dang myur 'gro la/ /d+hA
194b3(mdo 'grel): ru tshangs pa yongs su sbyong/ /bya ba'i don dang khu ba dang/ /bad kan sogs dang khrag sogs btsud/ /'byung ba sogs dang sa sogs dang/ /ldong ros sogs dang ko lA hwa/ /khyad par btsag dang mig rnams la'o/ /d+hu taM/ rnam par gsal dang dor/ /d+hi
194b4(mdo 'grel): ta bsgul dang bcos pa la/ /d+ha d+haM/ lan tsha'i dum bu dang/ /ngan pa dang ni g.yo can la/ /d+h+ri ti 'dzin dang mchog shes dang/ /brtan dang/ rnal 'byor bye brag li/ /na ta/ ta ga ra yi shing/ /'khyog po dang ni 'dam bu la/ /nI ti tshul dang thob pa la/ /nri tu/
194b5(mdo 'grel): 'bu dang gang mkhan la/ /pakdi 'tshang dang gus pa la/ /pidku phreng dang bcu pa dang/ /yi ge bcu pa'i brit+ta la/ /pa ti khyab bdag rtsa ba dang/ /'gro ba la'o bat+ti ni/ /rkang thang dpa' bo dmag bye brag/ pa ti ltung dang skyob pa la/ /bI ti/ ser dang yA tsAn+ta/ /skyong
194b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang ni yung ba la/ /pI twa btung ba dang ni/ rta/ /pI tI btung ba'o/ /du staM ni/ /rnam shes dang ni glegs pa bris/ /pU ta gtsang byed sha Ti ta/ /bkangs dang/ bkab dang shar bu byas/ /pUrti grang ba 'obs sogs las/ /po ta/ byis ba dang ni gu/ /prA ti/ gang ba
194b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig la/ /prA pti cher 'byung thob pa la/ /prA bta tho ba dang mnyam skyes dang/ /prI ti rnal 'byor dbye ba dang/ /dran pa/ bu dang/ dga' dang/ rangs/ /prI ti dga' dang rtse ba 'jol/ /pra ta ro dang 'byung po'i dbye/ /po ti gos dang phreng bar rgyus blu ta phye mo gsum
195a1(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /plu taM/ myur ba'i 'gros dang ni/ /chu la skyal gyis 'gro ba'o/ /b+hak+ti rnam par dbye dang gus/ /b+hartA rje bo 'dzin pa po/ /b+hit+ti rtsig pa dbye ba dang/ /go skabs cha dang phyogs re ba/ /b+hi taM 'jigs dang 'jigs bcas la/ /b+hI ti/ sA d+hwa/ ba krim+ba/ /b+hA ta
195a2(mdo 'grel): lha yi skye gnas kyi/ /dbye ba dang ni lha ldan la/ /thob dang spyod pa la yang ngo/ /b+hU taM rigs dang bden pa dang/ /nye bar mjal dang sa sogs la/ /sha za la'ang brjod par bya/ /b+hA ti glang po sgeg pa dang/ /'byor pa thal ba skye ba la/ /b+h+ri ti/ 'dzin thob rin dag la/ /b+h+ran+ti
195a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrul dang log pa'i blo/ /mi gnas dpa' bo ma ta ni/ /mchod dang rjes su 'gro ba la/ /mi ti/ blo dang dran dang 'dod/ /man+ta shed bu mchog gnas la/ /mA tA kha lang/ tshad ma sogs/ /snyan dag mkhan dang bcas pa dang/ /dkar mo dang ni sa la'o/ /gzhan yang
195a4(mdo 'grel): dbyangs bdag mA pA ka/ /rab tu rnga ma can rnams la'o/ /mi ti/ tshang dang kun nas spyod/ /kuk+ti thar dang grol ba la/ /muk+ta thar par gyur dang dor/ /muk+ta mu tig nyid la'o/ /mArtaM/ mkhregs pa ldan pa la/ /mUrts+tsha rmongs brgyal sma ba la/ /murti lus dang sra ba la/ /mri
195a5(mdo 'grel): tA/ 'chi dang blo gros la/ /mri ti/ slong dang shi ba la/ /ya ti klog gcod sdom brtson dang/ /nges 'byed la'o yan+tA ni/ /srad bu dang ni 'dug pa la/ /yuk+ti sbyor ba rigs tshul la/ /yang dag ldan la yu ta ste/ /yu taM tho bzhi pa la yang/ /rak+taM khrag dang rjes su
195a6(mdo 'grel): chags/ /dmar po dang ni tshong la ste/ /nub phyogs kyu ru ra dang ni/ /gur kuM dang ni zangs la yang/ /ra ti gser dang nags tshal chags/ /yid bsrub dang ni btsun mo la/ /ra taM rab dga' gsang ba la/ /ra tU 'bab chu dang ni lam/ /rak+taM stong pa nags tshal la//
195a7(mdo 'grel): rI tiM tshig dang lam la'o/ /rI ti rta dang rab spyod dang/ /lcags kyi rtsa dang ther zug yin/ /sa tA sbrang rtsi skyes lcug ma/ /yal ga pri kA pri yad+gu/ /la tA 'od ldan ma dang ni/ /gla rtsi dang ni durbba'o/ /luptaM rnam par byug pa dang/ /dug chang dang ni 'khyogs sogs la/ /lU tA/
195b1(mdo 'grel): srog chags sdom dang ni/ /grog ma chu klung khyad par ro/ /lo taM chom rkun rlangs pa dang/ /smra byed/ smra mkhas mkhas pa la'o/ /pasta gnas dang lted ka dang/ /lus dang sgron me bcu pa dang/ /mar me sman dang sprul pa dang/ /mig dang mig sman yi ge la/ /brti lus dang rjes su byug/
195b2(mdo 'grel): bArtaM/ nad med snying po med/ /bArtA spyod mdza' zhing las sogs/ /zhing las ma dang/ spyod pa la/ /ma ta/ spyod tshul ni rug dang/ /urba ti'i bit+taM ni/ /'byor pa la ni yang dag 'dad/ /rnam par gcad dang shes pa dang/ /'thob pa la yang brjod par bya/ /shes dang
195b3(mdo 'grel): rnyed dang 'byung ba la'ang/ /bI taM snying po med pa dang/ /glang po/ rta dang dor ba dang/ /lus la gnas dang las la'o/ /bi ti gtor dang 'gro dang 'bar/ /mchod dang rgyug dang za ba la/ /brit+ti rnam par 'grel pa dang/ /mtsho bya/ brgya byin ma la sogs/ /brit+ta/ zlum
195b4(mdo 'grel): pa 'das pa dang/ /shi dang brtan dang/ /spyod pa la/ /brit+taM dbul po sdeb sbyor 'jug/ bri ti/ 'dzin dang/ dam bca' dkris/ /bri taM sgrib dang/ rab 'dzag 'chid/ /nu ma'i rtse dang buM pa 'dzin/ /byak+taM gsal dang shes rab can/ /byastaM khyab dang kun tu 'khrugs//
195b5(mdo 'grel): byAsti bshad dang yang dag dman/ /byAsti/ khyab byed rnyed pa dang/ /shak+ta sbom dang/ brtan pa la/ /shak+ti mthu la sogs dang stobs/ /shastaM bde dang bkra shis la/ /sha ta phra dang rno ba la/ /shA taM/ skyid pa shAnda nyams/ /dAn+ta shin tu grol ba la/ /shAn+ti zhi dang dge ba la//
195b6(mdo 'grel): shAsta ston pa sangs rgyas la/ /shi ti/ nag/ dkar/ gro ga la/ /shi taM phra dang rno ba la/ /shi ta/ chu grang 'khor mang la/ /shI taM/ tsanda kha ba skyes/ /'khyags dang grang dang le lo la/ /shuk+ti rung dang/ na khi dang/ /nya phyis dang ni dung chung la/ /muk+ti/ mu tig/ mdzod rings la/
195b7(mdo 'grel): rta gnas thod pa/ ka ko la/ nya phyis/ skyur rtsub rul ba la/ /sh+ru taM bstan bcos 'dzin pa la/ /sh+ru ti/ rna ba rig byed dang/ /gtam dang rna ba'i las la'o/ /shwe taM/ gzug dang dkar po la/ /shwe ta/ gling dang ri'i bye brag/ shwi tA lte ba dung can ma/ /ljon shing skya'o
196a1(mdo 'grel): legs dang yong/ /bkra shis dang ni mchod pa la/ /sa tI legs ma/ gtum po la/ /sat+tu bden pa sA sti sbyin/ /pi taM/ dkar po rdzogs pa la/ /shes dang bcings pa la yang ngo/ /si tA bu raM ka ra'o/ /shI tA nam mkha' i gaM gA dang/ /skyed byed ma
196a2(mdo 'grel): dang mdzes pa'i lam/ /su ta/ sa bdag skyes dang bu/ /supti yid brtan 'joms pa dang/ /nyal dang reg pa shes pa la/ /sU ta kha lo bsgyur ba dang/ /phyag 'tshal khu ba 'jog pa la/ /rgyal rigs bram ze mo dang bu/ /rab tu btsas dang ded pa'o/ /sU ti/
196a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro dang lam la'o/ /se tu chu dang bung ba la/ /s+thi ta yang gnas pa dang/ /nges dang dam bca' dang bcas dang/ /'gro ba med dang bcings pa la/ /s+thi ti shing phra ba skye ba'i khrims lugs gnas pa dang/ /kun tu gnas dang mtshams rnams la'o/
196a4(mdo 'grel): smri ti chos kyi bstan bcos dang/ /dran pa/ blo dang 'dod pa la/ /syA tI/ rgyu dang/ sI ba na/ s+yu ta/ a'u ta rab tu gus/ /sbAn+taM ni/ rang nang/ sems 'thibs po/ /hasta/ rgyu skar/ glang po dang/ glang mo lag pa byed pa la/ /re mig byed dang sgra mchog bsags//
196a5(mdo 'grel): hi tiM 'gro dang 'dzin dang phan/ /he ti/ 'bar ba nyi ma dang/ /gzi brjid dang ni mtshon cha'o/ /k+ShartI kha lo bsgyur ba dang/ /gnyis gnas dang ni gnyis 'dzin dang/ /b+hu 'dzin k+Sha skyes nges sbyor dang/ /dmangs rigs dang ni rgyal rigs bu/ /k+Shi ti sa dang gnas
196a6(mdo 'grel): tsam dang/ /gnas dang zad pa la yang ngo/ /a ga sti ni ri byi dang/ /bad+ga' i sde 'joms/ A hu ti/ /me dang tshangs pa me'i sbyin sreg/ a tsyu ta/ brtan/ tha gu'i lto/ /khyab 'jug rgyal ka a dzi ta/ /a di ti ni lha yi ma/ /brdzun dang zhing las a nri ta/ /khyab
196a7(mdo 'grel): 'jug klu lhag ma a nan+ta/ /a nan+taM ni nam mkha' dang/ /mdza' yas dang ni mtshams med la/ /a nan+tA ni sa gzhi dang/ /dUrbA mdzes ma ri'i bu mo/ /sA ri bA dang/ glu DU tsi/ /rgya mtsho'i mdza' dang yangs pa la'o/ /a mri taM ni/ bdud rtsi chu/ /thar pa dang ni snying
196b1(mdo 'grel): 'bab dngos ma slongs ba dang mchod sbyin lhag/ /mar dang shin tu mdzes pa la/ /a mri ta ni/ tshig bzang dang/ /d+hwa nan+ti la 'dod pa yin/ /a mri tA ni/ gu DU tsI/ /skyu ra ra dang/ phan pa dang/ /A ga tI rnams la 'dod do/ /a ma ti ni zla ba dang/ /dus dang dgra bcom rgyal
196b2(mdo 'grel): mchod 'os/ ardi ta ni/ rlung nad dang/ /lhung ba dang ni bcom pa la/ /arba tI ni/ 'bangs mo dang/ /mi'u thung ma rta mchod ngan/ /a pya k+ta ni 'phrog byed dang/ /rdo rje rmongs dang mi gsal brjod/ /ma hA ta ni dang po'i bdag/ a swan+ta ni 'chi dang ngan/ /sgyed bu shing
196b3(mdo 'grel): dang bar med la/ /ak+Sha taM ni rmi med 'bras/ /rang bzhin gsum pa ma yis dman/ /A kri ti ni lus dang gzugs/ /de bzhin mthum mong ba la yang/ /a khyA ti ni kun bshad dang/ /ting gi mdza' i tshig la bshad/ /A g+ha taM ni dri snom 'tshed/ /a tsi taM ni/ bsags
196b4(mdo 'grel): bkab bzung/ /A tsi na ni shing rta dang/ /kun tu rje dang sbun mi ldan/ /A dri ta mchod gus pa thog/ /A d+hA na ni/ rlung nad dang/ /rtad sgra grag pa dag la'o/ /A nirta ni gar gyi gnas/ /yul gyi dbye ba sgra skye'o/ /A bat+ti ni/ thob dang skyon/ /A pa ta ni/ lhung bar 'dod//
196b5(mdo 'grel): mtho ba yang ngo/ A blu ta/ /khrus tsam dang ni khrus byed la'o/ /A pat+ti ni gsher ba dang/ /khrims lugs dkar po stobs gnas la'o/ /a ya ti ni yang dag sdom/ /ring bo mthu dang dus phyi ma/ /a yastaM na rno dang 'phangs/ /khro dang nyon mongs gyur kyang bsnun/ /a
196b6(mdo 'grel): bAn+ta ni sems dang 'jug/ chu yi klong 'khor la yang ngo/ /A spho ta ni/ arka'i 'dab/ /ljon shing yongs 'du sa brdol la'o/ /A spho tA ni nags me tog/ ri yi rna ba la yang ngo/ /A dpat+ti ni kun 'gro thob/ /A ha taM ni bzod pa'i don/ /sngon med gos dang
196b7(mdo 'grel): gos sar dang/ /nA na ka dang/ bsnun dang bsgyur/ /id+ga taM ni bkris dang 'gros/ /i tsi taM ni mnyam shes la/ /a b+hyasta ni mnyam shes la/ /a b+hyasta ni rjes su ldan/ /son dang rnam par mkhas pa la/ /uts+tshir taM ni rab 'phel/ /kun tu skye dang sgreng ba la/ /ut+ta ptaM
197a1(mdo 'grel): ni sha skaM dang/ /kun tu gdungs dang yongs su rkyal/ /ut+thi taM ni skye ba dang/ /rab tu 'char dang 'phel ldan la/ /u di taM ni 'char dang thob/ /kun tu 'phags dang rab brjod la/ ud+gA ta ni thob dang/ /a tyA d+hA na nyer bgrod dang/ /'gro
197a2(mdo 'grel): ba 'khrul dang phye ma leb/ /bum can rnams so u dan+ta/ /gtam dang skyes bu dam pa la/ /u dan+ta ni yang dag gnon/ /ma myos pa yi glang po la/ /u da ta ni dbyangs bye brag/ snyan ngag dag gi rgyan la'o/ /u dan+ta ni sbyin byed dang/ /chen po 'dod pa'i snying
197a3(mdo 'grel): la 'bag /uDhi taM ni li ta dang/ /zos dang/ phyung dang gyen du bteg /bdud rtsi la'o un+na ni/ /'char dang rgan dang 'phags pa dang/ /skar mig bu yi chung ma la'o/ /unmat+ta ni smyo ldan la/ /ngan pa/ mu tsu kunda la'o/ /u Shi taM ni gnas dang bsregs/ /rta dang
197a4(mdo 'grel): bzhag pa sreg byed la/ /e d+ha tu ni skyes bu dang/ sdig pa/ gtor gnang dag la/ /ka po ta ni phag ron la/ /ka pa kA khya mkha' 'gro la/ /ka li taM ni rig dang shes/ /kA po taM ni phug ron khyu/ /bshad pa mig sman/ stwa dzA'o/ /kai ra ta ni lus chung dang/ /kla
197a5(mdo 'grel): klos yi nim+ba dang/ /rdung byed lha yig ge'o/ /kir ti ni gnas ngan dang/ /gla mi dang ni las byed la'o/ /kri tAn+ta ni gshes gnyen dang/ /grub mdza' gnam brkos dge ba'i las/ /krandi taM ni/ du dang 'bod/ /ga b+ha sti ni/ 'od nyi ma/ /bsreg za dang ni 'gro byed
197a6(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /gardzi taM ni/ sprin gyi sgra/ /gardzi ta ni glang chen myos/ /bya khyung gser dang yal ga'o/ /go pan+ti/ /ba ba la dang/ /ga shi ta dang go cha bgos/ /go pa ti ni sa bdag dang/ /ma ning nyi ma/ mkha' rtse mo/ /gra ti taM ni/ spel ba dang/ /mnan dang 'tshe ba rnams
197a7(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /tsaul+lA ta ni mi g.yo dang/ /gaM gA'i tsi la ring du 'tsho/ /dza gan+ti ni rlung sa 'gro/ /dza ga tA ni 'gro ba sa/ /sdeb sbyor dbye ba chu la'o/ /dza yan+ta ni brgya byin skyes/ /bde 'byung la'o dza yan+tI/ /shing gi dbye ba rgyal mtshan dang/ /gau ri dbang po bu mo la//
197b1(mdo 'grel): dzi mA tA ni bu mo'i bdag /nyi ma 'khyims dang/ nga yi ta/ /dzI mU ta ni/ brgya byin sprin/ /lha yi chu dang dbyangs ldan dang/ /'dzin pa dang ni 'tsho ba la'o/ /dzi wan+ti ni zas dang mtsho/ /'tsho bar byed pa'i sman la'o/ /dzi wan+ti ni 'tsho byed ma/ /shing dang/ zhi ma/ phyag 'tshal dang/ /bdud rtsi
197b2(mdo 'grel): rnams la'o/ dzim+b+hi taM/ /byed po bung sbyong? ba gsal/ /dzwa li taM ni 'bar dang bsrogs/ /tA ni ta ni/ dangs dang gos/ /rol mo'i snod dang yon tan la/ /tri Na ta ni gzhu dang rtsa/ /dod kra grangs kyi khyad par dang/ /tshang gi dbye ba'o traM gartA/ /dril chung dang ni 'dod can no/ /twa ra taM ni
197b3(mdo 'grel): rab mgyogs myur/ /ngan 'gro dang ni dmyal ba/ dor/ /dbul po yang ngo/ durdza taM/ /ngan par skyes dang 'phongs pa la/ /triSh+Tan+ta ni bstan bcos dang/ /dper brjod bla'o daM shi taM/ go cha bgos dang/ sos zin pa'o/ /tra ba n+ti ni 'bad chu'i dbye/ /sman la'o de nas dri
197b4(mdo 'grel): dzA ti/ /gnyis skyes bya dang blo ldan dang/ /tshig bdag brtan pa blo gros can/ /ni tri taM ni rab tu thob/ /dman dang rang bzhin bral ba la/ /ni kri ti ni spyod dang dor/ /ngan g.yo dang ni g.yo can la/ /ni mit+ta ni mtshan nyid rgyu/ /rgyu mtshan dang tshig la'o/ /a gan+ta ni lta
197b5(mdo 'grel): yi yul/ /ni ya taM ni yul dang sgrub/ /ni rasta ni mngags pa mnga' / /kun tu dor dang myur dang skye/ /gsal ba dang ni/ saur bcom/ /nirri ti ni nyer mi 'gro/ phyogs skyong/ rna ba nag po la/ /nirbi ti ni legs gnas dang/ /bde dang myang 'das nub gyur dus/ /nirmu k+ti mi
197b6(mdo 'grel): grogs spangs dang/ /shun pa rjes dang bal+la ga /ni bA ta ni rlung bral dang/ /gnas dang go cha brtan po la/ /ni shan+ta ni zhi ba la/ /ni shan+taM ni yod dang gnas/ /pany+tsa tA ni shi tsam dang/ /lnga pa'i dngos dang lnga pa nyid/ /paN+Di ta ni dkar dang brtan/ /'gro dang 'gro byed
197b7(mdo 'grel): 'dab chags la/ /pad+d+ha ti ni lam dang gral/ /ba re ta ro 'byung po'i dbye/ /parba ta ni char bzang ri/ /paryA bta ni glang po dang/ /tshim dang ci 'dod nus dang 'thob/ /'jig dang/ dbyug pa dka' tshigs skyon/ /parya pti ni rab 'dod dang/ /thob dang/ yongs su bsrung
198a1(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /parya sta ni/ lhung/ 'bangs bsnun/ /pa li ta ni skra dkar dang/ /'dam dang/ tshad gdung/ ri las skyes/ /pakA ti ni tshes gcig dang/ /phyogs rtsa dang ni dang po'i tshes/ /pArba tI ni/ dro pa dI/ /rdzong ma/ 'tsho ma shal+la kI/ piN+Di ta ni bsgyur dang
198a2(mdo 'grel): bsdus/ /dmag 'gro dang pa 'dab chags so/ /pi shi tA ni ba la la/ /pI DI taM ni bud med kyi/ /byed pa 'khrul 'khor rol mo dkrol/ /pu DI taM ni glang po dang/ /sbyar sogs pyu ta/ pA Ti ta'o/ /pri Sha ta ni bsre po dang/ /thig le tsam dang ri dags rta/ /dmar dang
198a3(mdo 'grel): thig le dkar po can/ /pra kri ti ni snying stobs dang/ /rdul dang mun pa ci tsam dang/ /rang bzhin blo dang grong dang ni/ /rtags dang skye gnas bdag la'o/ /pra ti ta ni rab tu bstod/ /rab byas rang bzhin gnas pa la'o/ /pra tsi ta ni shing rta dang/ /shin tu brje
198a4(mdo 'grel): dang spur mi ldan/ /pra NI ta ni 'dris dang me/ /rab tu 'bebs dang 'dus byas dang/ /nye bar phun tshogs/ des spel byas/ /pra tI ta ni gus bcas bshad/ /dga' dang mthong dang mkhas pa dang/ /lug dang shes pa la yang ngo/ /pra ta ti ni brtul
198a5(mdo 'grel): zhugs byung/ /ta ta'i de nas pra pA ta/ /chu sgra g.yangs a pa Ta/ /pra b+hi ta ni the ba dang/ /prA dzya'o de nas pra mI ta/ /rab tu song dang shi ba la/ /pra prit+ti ni/ 'grel pa dang/ /spyod mdza' rab 'bag rab 'jug ma/ /pra sU ti ni rab skyes dang/ /skye dang/ 'dab na
198a6(mdo 'grel): bu mo la/ /pra sU ti ni me tog dang/ /lcug ma dang ni skye ba la/ /pra sU tA ni skye dgu dang/ /tha ma dang ni rab skye la/ /pra sri ha ni/ steng thal sbyor/ /de rab 'gro dang/ 'jug rnam des/ /pra ha ti ni/ k+ShuN+Na mtho/ /prarthi taM ni slong pa dang/ /dgra bo 'gog dang rnam par
198a7(mdo 'grel): bcom/ /pro k+Shi ti ni rnam par bcom/ /bard+hi ti ni bkangs pa dang/ /bkab dang/ spel dang/ 'bras rgan po/ /pri hA tI/ mahA tI/ /kaN+Da kA rI bum pa can/ /shu dag/ lo rgyus/ phra mo dang/ /sdeb sbyor dbye ba gong brgyan la/ /b+ha ra ta ni dga' ston skyes/ /gar dang
198b1(mdo 'grel): gar gyi bstan bcos la/ /dauSh+man+ta ni rngon pa dang/ /tha ga pa la rgyas pas bshad/ /bA ra trI ni/ dag dang mda'/ /'dab chags/ bye brag/ spyod pa'i dbye/ /drang srong rgyas pa'i gzhung las ni/ /'dzam gling b+hA ra ta tu bshad/ /b+hA bi taM ni/ gnas dang thob/ /bsam dang
198b2(mdo 'grel): skyed pa rnams la'o/ /b+hA san+ta ni snang ba dang/ /mkha' 'gro dang ni mdzes pa dang/ /'ong dang/ gsal dang/ nyi ma dang/ /sa 'dzin/ tri ba ga la'o/ /ma thi taM ni/ bsrubs dang/ dkrugs/ /chu med dang ni/ nga sri ta'o/ /ma ru ta zhes bya ba ni/ /lha dang/ rlung dang/ rgyal
198b3(mdo 'grel): srid che/ /ma na tI ni mi sbyin gyi/ /pi wang dang ni sa gzhi la'o/ /mA la tI ni/ dzA ti dang/ /na tshug yot+snA/ nik+Shu dang/ /chu klung gi ni dbye ba la/ /mu Shi taM ni me'i rtse mo/ /kA ka mA tsI dum bu snying/ /murts+tshi taM rmongs par 'gyur/ /de bsgreng pa dang brtan pa la/ /ra dza
198b4(mdo 'grel): taM ni dngul ngo shal/ btsun pa dang ni rgyas pa la/ /ram ti ni mtho ris 'dren/ /ra si ti ni/ sprin dang sgra/ /gser la sogs pas spras pa la'o/ /re ba tI ni ma mo dang/ /skar ma'i bye brag 'bras ldan ma'o/ /ri ba ta ni/ ri yi bye brag /gser gyi phreng
198b5(mdo 'grel): dang mdung can la'o/ /re hi taM ni thang shing dang/ /g.yul du brtan dang khrag la'o/ /ro hi tA nI dang po dang/ /nya dang ri dags dbye ba la/ /ro hi Ni dang ro hi ta dang/ /nyi ma khri shing dbye ba la/ /la li taM ni mdzes dang 'dod/ /do shal gyi khyad par la/ /lo hi
198b6(mdo 'grel): taM ni tsan dan dmar/ /sa mchog dang ni/ gur kuM dang/ /khrag dang kha dog dmar po la/ /lo hi ta ni/ sa'i 'dab ma/ /chu klung bye brag la yang ngo/ /pa ni tA ni skyed ma dang/ /shin tu chags dang btsun mo la/ /ba ni taM ni/ slong dang bsten/ /ba sa ti ni mtshan mo khyim
198b7(mdo 'grel): kun tu gnas dang mchod ngal bso/ /pa ha tu khyu mchog lam/ /ba sa ti/ glang po tsi ba/ /bi pa taM ni gnyis skyes dang/ /byas dang mgo bo'i cha dag la/ /ba san+ta ni khu byug dang/ /sran ma/ mad+ga/ glang phrug dang/ /thob pa dang ni yal phran la'o/ /bA san+tI ni sprang ldan tu? ?
199a1(mdo 'grel): ljon shing/ skya nar dag la yang/ /ba si tA ni/ glang mo dang/ /bud med la'o bA si taM/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba'i sgra dang ni/ /shes dang gos kyis dkris pa dang/ /dri zhim byas pa dag la'o/ bi kri ti ni 'jigs rung dang/ nad can dang ni 'dus
199a2(mdo 'grel): ma byas/ /spyo ba dang ni/ nang la'o/ /bi kri ti/ bral/ 'od med 'gro/ /bi tsit+ti ni lus chags dang/ /rnam par chad dang sgeg pa la/ /bi dzA hA ni rab btsas la/ /rnam par 'gyur dang skyed pa la/ /bi ta ta ni khyab pa dang/ /rgya che ba la mngon par brjod
199a3(mdo 'grel): bi dyu ta ni glog gi 'od/ /thun mtshams dang ni 'od med la/ /bi di taM ni/ shes dang don/ /pi d+hA tA ni tshangs pa dran/ /bi na ta ni rab 'dud dang/ /nyams pa dang ni lhong pa la/ /bi na tA ni khyung gi ma/ /pha yi khyad par dag la yang/ /bi nI taM ni 'dul ba thob//
199a4(mdo 'grel): legs 'bab rta dang dbang po thul/ /nye bar drangs dang khrid pa dang/ /nges par zung dang dag skyes so/ rgyal po yul can bi ne tA/ /phongs dang/ slong ba bi pat+ti/ /nang dang phran tshegs/ /pi pri tA/ /pi pri tAM ni gsal ba'o/ /pi pat+ta ni kun spyod dang//
199a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'jug dang gar dag la/ /bi bi k+taM ni skye bo bral/ /rul dang 'du 'dzi med dang dben/ /bi sh+ru taM ni shes pa dang/ /mkhas dang kun nas dga' ba la/ /bi shwastA ni/ bsgrub pa la/ /pi shwasta ni nges 'dzin la/ rnam par sbyangs pa la yang ngo/ /bi
199a6(mdo 'grel): hasta ni dkar skya dang/ /rnam par skrag dang/ lag med la/ /brit+tan+ta ni srid pa 'dod/ /lo rgyus dang ni khyad par la/ /rab tu byed dang skabs dang ni/ /mdza' gcig la yang 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /bel+li taM ni g.yo ba dang/ /'khor lo skyal dang 'grel
199a7(mdo 'grel): la'o bu beSh+TaM taM ni bud med kyi/ /byed pa sgeg pa spyod pa la'o/ /byA g+hA ta ni bar dang ni/ /rnal 'byor dbye ba rab tu 'phrog /byA ya ti ni che dang ring/ /bya ba dang ni nyal ba la/ /sha kun+ta ni mkha' 'gro dang/ /'dag chags dbye ba 'od/ bde phyogs//
199b1(mdo 'grel): shud+hAn+ta ni mdza' grong dang/ /re'u mig dang/ gsang bar brjod/ /sh+ri pa tin+ni pad dkar mig /dpal gyi bdag dang sa yi bdag/ dpal ldan snum can shing dang ni/ /dbang phyug dang ni/ yid 'phog la/ /saM g+h+rshA ta ni 'dus pa dang/ /rab 'joms/ mi yi dgon pa la//
199b2(mdo 'grel): saM g+ha ta ni 'grogs dang shes/ pan+na ti ni 'dud dang/ sgra/ /pan+na ti ni rgyud dang yu/ rigs dang rgya che gral dang ni/ /gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa la'ang/ /sa masti ni gus dang dga' / /rjes gnang/ mngon 'dod saM mi ti/ /sa mi ti ni yang dag gnon/ /mnyam dang/
199b3(mdo 'grel): 'dun pa 'grogs pa dang/ /yang dag rig dang drang po dang/ /dam bca' kun spyod shes pa la/ /sam+bi t+ti ni rtsod pa med/ /so sor go byed skye bo la/ /samparta ni bskal ba'i mdza' / /lo dang rtsod pa'i shing la'o/ /si ka tA ni seg ma can/ /yul dang nad kyi
199b4(mdo 'grel): khyad par dang/ /bye ma dang ni bu ram la/ /su kri taM ni dge ba dang/ /bsod nams dang ni legs byas la/ /su nI ti ni bzang po'i tshul/ /lugs bzang nges pa/ phyi mo la/ /su pra tA ni bde ba dang/ /ba lang tshogs dang/ brtul zhugs bzang/ /su ra taM ni nags
199b5(mdo 'grel): tshal dang/ /lha nyid dang ni rab dga' la'o/ /su hi ta ni tshim pa dang/ /smras dang legs par phan pa la/ /su nri taM ni bkra shis dang/ /bden dang mnyam par brjod pa la/ /saM skra ta ni mtshan nyid dang/ /ldan dang/ brtson dang/ 'dus byas la/ /rgyan dang/ bkra shis
199b6(mdo 'grel): la yang ngo/ /saM ha staM ni 'grogs dang brtan/ /sA li dang ni zos pa dang/ /'khrul pa dang ni g.yo ba la/ /sti mi taM ni sa yo ba bral/ /ri bo lta bur gyur pa la/ /s+thas ti ni bzo bo'i dbye/ /go cha can dang srang bu dang/ /'tsho ba 'dod dang mchod sbyin la/ /s+thA pi ti ni bkod dang nges//
199b7(mdo 'grel): sra ban+ti ni chu klung dang/ /'dam bu byin dang sman gyi dbye/ /ha ri tA ni zlum po dang/ /ljang gu dang ni mdog ldan dang/ /rta dang mdog dang phyogs la'o/ /rtsa yi rab tu dbye ba la'ang/ /harmi taM ni/ spel dang/ bsregs// ha pan+ti ni srol ba
200a1(mdo 'grel): dag kyang ngo/ /dU ta dang ba Ni dza dag las kyang dngos po dang las kyi don la ya 'gyur te/ dU tyaM/ ba NaM dzya/ ka pi dz+nyA tyorDha ka ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las Dha ka 'o/ /ka pi dz+nyA ti dag las dngos po dang las kyi don la Dha ka 'gyur te/ Dha ka kA pe yaM/
200a2(mdo 'grel): Dha ka dz+nyA te yaM/ ba tyan+ta bu ro hi tA di b+hyo ya ka /pa ti mdza' dang pu ro hi ta la sogs pa rnams las ya ka'?/ /panya nyad dam pha nya'a las/ chod pa nyid dam? mchod pa'i las/ pi ta tshig phyi mar gyur pa dang pu ro hi ta la sogs pa las dngos po dang las kyi/ sra'u nyid dam spre'u'i las/ don
200a3(mdo 'grel): shes pa nyid dam shes pa'i las/ la yaka 'gyur te/ sai nA pa tyaM/ sen ba ti la yaka pau ro hi tyaM/ bu ro hi ta la ya ka rA dzyaM/ rgyal po nyid dam rgyal pa'am rgyal po'i las/ prA Na dzA ti ba yo ba tsa no dgA trA di b+hyonya nya/ srog chags kyi rigs dang na tshod brjod pa dang ud+gA tra la sogs pa rnams
200a4(mdo 'grel): las a nya'o/ /srog sde'i bdag po nyid dam sde'i bdag po'i las/ rgyal po'i mdun na 'don nyid dam las/ rA dza na la yaka na'i de phan la 'dongs Ti phyis/ chags kyi rigs dang na tshod brjod pa dang u dgA tra la sogs pa rnams las dngos po dang las kyi don la aN 'gyur te/ aN A shwaM/
200a5(mdo 'grel): kau mA raM/ gzhon nu nyid/ aau dgA traM/ to traM la aN ika gi a tsa la yata/ hau traM/ hA ya nAn+ta yu bA di b+hyonyaNa/ hA ya na mdza' dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las aN 'o/ /hA ya na tshig phyi mar 'gyur ba dang yu ba la sogs pa rnams las dngos po rta nyid/ dang
200a6(mdo 'grel): kumA ra? la a/ rdul? gyi gsher ba nyid/ ud+gA h+ra la aN/ las la aN sbyin sreg nyid/ 'gyur te/ aN dwi hA ya naM/ aN yau ba ni/ shau ba naM/ /bya nyid/ sau hA rdaM/ yid bcugs nyid dam mdza' bo nyid/ i gan+tA tstsa la g+hu pUrbA ta/ yang pa sngon ma las ika mdza' las kyang ngo/ /rtags kyi
200a7(mdo 'grel): yi ge sngan ma yang ba las pha rol gyi mdza' ika so sor bsdu ba'i yi ge lo gnyis pa nyid/ lang chos dar ba nyid/ shwa na la aN dwar sags kyis i tsa A gam/ su trid la aN su h+rid b+ha ga sogs kyi mangs tshig snga phyi gnyis kar 'phel ba/ yod na'ang dngos po dang las kyi dan la aN
200b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur te/ mau naM/ mu naM yaN/ go ra ba/ yang ba nyid lA g+ha baM/ yang ba zhes pas rnam bcad kyis lci ba la/ kA n+ta twaM/ yo ba d+hAdgu rU pot+ta mA dwu nya/ ya u d+hA las lci ba nye ba las du nya 'o/ /rtags gang gi 'ang u pa d+hA ya yig yin pa de'i sngan ma'i nye ba'i yi ge de li pa yod
200b2(mdo 'grel): pa las/ thur ba nyid/ bla ma nyid/ gu ru la aN 'phal ba u'i yon tan/ yag+hu la aN/ dngos po dang las kyi don la bza' ba nyid/ bunya 'gyur te/ ShA ma NI ya ki/ 'grel bar lung drangs pa/ sa hA yA dwA/ sa hA ya las yang na'o/ /mdo snga ma'i don rnams tshad yang sa hA ya
200b3(mdo 'grel): las dngos po dang las kyi don la punya yang na ba ste/ sA bunya hA ya kaM/ zla ba nyid/ sA hA yyaM/ d+hA n+yA nAM bta ba ne k+She tra la nya/ dga' bar bya ba nyid kha ma NI ya bunya nya 'phel ba'i don bu aka/ 'bru rnams kyi yod pa'i zhing la khanya 'o/ /'bru brjod pa'i sgra rnams la de yod pa'i zhing brjod
200b4(mdo 'grel): pa la khanya 'gyur te/ mud+gA nAM su ba ne k+She tre/ zhes pa'i don sa hA yal ba ti mdza' dang pu ro hi ta sogs kyi mangs laka 'phel ba/ la modbu ni/ brI hi shA lyorDha ka/ brI hi dang shA li dag las Dha ka'o/ /brI hi dang shA li dag las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la Dhaka 'gyur te/ brai he 'bru'i zhing
200b5(mdo 'grel): yaM/ bri haM la Dha ka sran ma mungs rnams yang ba'i zhing/ shA li ya Dha shA le yaM/ ya ba ya ba ka Sha Sh+Thi kA dya ta/ sa pa ya ba ka/ bud ga'i zhing/ mung+ga la khanya nya 'phel gab a'in/ Sha Sh+Thi ka las ya ta 'o/ /yab ya bka Sha Sh+Thi ka rnams las de yod pa'i zhing brjod pa la yaT 'gyur te/
200b6(mdo 'grel): yaTa ya byaM/ yata ya ba kyaM/ yata Shi Sh+Tha kyi/ bi b+hA 'bras kyi zhing/ ShA ti la mA Sho mA b+had+gA Nu b+hya:/ ti la mA Sha u mA b+had+gA a Nu rnams la yang na'o/ /ti la la sogs pa 'di rnams las de yod pa'i zhing brjed pa la yata yang na 'gyur te/ yata ti lyaM/ til gyi zhing/ khanya te
200b7(mdo 'grel): yI naM/ nas? kyi zhing/ yata mA drug cu ba'i zhing ste nyi ma drug cu la 'bru smin pa'i zhing/ Sh+yaM raM? sran ma'i zhing/ khanya mA ShI naM/ yata u mya/ zar ma'i zhing khanya aau mI naM/ yata b+hA dgyaM/ so mar ca'i zhing/ khanya b+hAdgI no/ yata a Na byaM/ phra mo'i zhing/ khanya A Na bI naM/ tat+sa rbA de(mdo 'grel): pa thyaM ga karma pa tra pA traM byApno ti/ sarba dang
201a1(mdo 'grel): pags pa stong pa la/ /ni(mdo 'grel): ka si ta nges phyin dang/ /ngan par byas dang/ steng du phan/ /pany+tsa gupta/ rus sbal dang/ /tsA rbA ka yi mthong ba la/ /pa ri ga taM shes dang bskor/ /g.yang sa thob dang rnyed pa la/ /pa ri g+hA ta/ yongs 'joms g.yul/ /pa ri barta/? 'bru
201a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ brje/ /rus spal rgyal dang 'bros pa la/ /pal+la bi taM/ ta ta dang/ /de rab 'jug dang rgya skyegs dmar/ /pA rA ba ta phug ron dang/ /ri skyes/ spre'u/ tindu ka/ sA rA ba ti/ sa skyong dang/ /dbyangs dang mdzes dang/ 'bras bu la/ /pA ri dzA ta yongs bzang dang/ /mandA
201a3(mdo 'grel): ra dang lha yi shing/ /pA shu pa ta/ phyugs bdag lha'i/ /bu dang/ ba ka'i me tog can/ /pu ra skri taM/ mdun du byas/ /mngon par mchod pa dga' la'o/ /mtshon/ cha/ khrus byas/ dgras bzung dang/ /bdag gir byas pa la yang ngo/ /puShpa dan+ta rigs 'dzin gyi//
201a4(mdo 'grel): bye brag/ glang po phyogs kyi glang/ pra dzA pa ti sa bdag dang/ /tshangs pa dang ni skyes dgu'i bdag/ pra Ni hi taM bshad dang bkod/ /thob dang/ mnyam par bzhag pa la/ /pra ti ha ta/ dgra dang ni/ /so sor 'khrul dang/ bkag pa la/ /pra ti pat+ti lam dang sems/ /gos byed
201a5(mdo 'grel): gnas byed rab 'jug thob/ /spyod yul dang ni rab tu rtogs/ /yang dag rig dang che la'o/ /pra ti kri ti bcos pa dang/ /gzugs brnyan dang ni mchod pa la/ /pra tik+Shi pA so sor thogs/ /mngags pa dang ni sel ba la/ /pra d+hU pi ta nyon mongs dang/ /nyi ma bgrod pa'i phyogs la'o/ /pra?
201a6(mdo 'grel): bra dzi ta/ dka' thub mdza' / /spang spos sman dang mgo zlum mo/ /b+ha ga bAn+ta/ gau rI dang/ bud med/ rgyal ba mchod 'os dang/ zlos gar dang ni gar la'o/ /b+ho ga ban+ta longs spyod can/ /b+ha ga wa tI klu? yi greng?/ klu dang/ chu klung la yang 'dod/ /rang+ga ma tA rgya skyegs dang/ /brtsegs ma la yang blta bar bya/ /lak+Sh+mI
201a7(mdo 'grel): pa te mi bdag dang/ /khyab 'jug?/ li shi/ pU gi'i 'bras/ /ba nasba ti shing tsam dang/ /me tog 'bras med shing la'o/ /be dzrim+b+hi taM/ kha/ kha byed dang/ /spyod pa mngon par 'phags pa la/ /bi ni pA ta lha sogs kyi/ /phongs dang 'og tu ltung ba la/ /pi ba swA ta pA ba? shu? rtsen dbang phyug dag la'o/ /ba bak+Shi ti/ smra 'dod bzang/ /be? dza?
201b1(mdo 'grel): yan+ta rgyal mtshan dang/ brgya byin khang bzang mda' skyes la/ /bai dzA yan+ti ba dan dang/ rgyal byed dang ni me bsrub le'o/ /bya ti pa ta rnal 'byor dbye/ /cher 'byung ba dang phyir 'jal dang/ /shati d+h+ri ti/ smin pa 'joms/ /padmo'i gdan can la yang 'dod/ /shu pa dAn+tI/ glang po/ rlung/ /glang mo dang ni so bzang ma'o/ /saM khyA pan+ta mkhas
201b2(mdo 'grel): grangs ldan/ /sa dA ga ti dri bzhon dang/ /rtag pa'i dbang phyug mya ngan 'das/ /sa mu drAn+ta mdza' yas dang/ /ras bal dang ni spri ka'o/ /sa brgya byin murd+hA ta kun nas g.yengs/ /ma dul ba dang rgad pa'o/ /sa mA g+hA ta gsong dang 'khrug/ ting 'dzin gnas dang mnye
201b3(mdo 'grel): bzhag /bkod dang/ dam bca' legs grub dang/ /bdag nyid ldan pa rnams la'o/ /sa mA hi taM kun tu 'dzin/ /bkod dang mnyam par bzhag pa la/ /sa ra swan+ta mtsho can dang/ /rgya mtsho dang ni/ chu klung la/ /swa ra swa tI/ chu klung dbye/ /chu klung/ lha mo/ sa dang ngag /lha
201b4(mdo 'grel): yi ri bo rnams la'o/ /su d+hA sU ti mdzes pa dang/ /lus ngan/ gzhan pa dag la'o/ /sU rya b+hak+ta nyi ma lha/ /band+hu dzi ba dag la'o/ /se nA pa ti sde dpon dang/ /dmag dpon dang ni skems byed la/ /he ma ba tI me nyi ma/ /sla la dang ni kha ba'i dgra/ /ser po dang ni
201b5(mdo 'grel): a ru ra/ /gser gyi 'o ma/ shu dag dkar/ /a byA bi taM dang ni skyes/ /'gro dang/ rdzu 'phrul spyod pa la/ /a pa rA dzi taM zhes/ /dpal mgrin dang ni rtul mo'i bu/ /mchod sbyin dbye ba rnams la'o/ /a pa rA dzi ta zhes pa/ /rgyal byed ma dang ri yi
201b6(mdo 'grel): bu mo/ /khyab 'jug gnon pa rnams dang ni/ /dkar mo dang ni pham pa'o/ /a ba lo ki taM zhes pa/ /lta ba/ bshad pa/ 'jig rten mgon/ /spyan ras gzigs pa rnams la'o/ /u pa d+hu ba ti zhes pa/ /nye bar 'chi dang yongs su gdung/ /ga NA d+hi pa ti zhes pa//
201b7(mdo 'grel): dbang phyug dang ni log 'dren la/ /pa pa ti Shan+ta zhes pa/ /lhung 'dod dang ni mkha' 'gro la/ /pri thi bI pa ti zhes pa/ /sa bdag/ khyu mchog sman la'o/ /mUrd+hA b+hi Shi k+ta zhes pa/ /sa skyong rgyal rigs sngags pa la/ /yA ta pAM pa ti zhes pa/ /chu bdag dang ni nyi ma
202a1(mdo 'grel): la/ ba sanda dU ta zhes pa/ /mA kan+ta dang pi ka dang/ lnga pa'i chags pa dag la'o/ /ba sanda dU tI yi sgra/ /skya nar ldan dang/ mu tig can/ /gzhan phyed 'debs dang mgul ris can/ /tit+ti ri dang mtsho'i mar sar/ /bdud rtsi bdud rtsi'i gter la'o/
202a2(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs gsal ba las/ ta mdza' i sde'o// //tha ni/ rdo ba brtsegs pa la/ /thu ni/ 'jigs skyob/ bkra shis la/ /artha/ dgos pa 'byor pa dang/ /rgyu dang/ byis pa mang po'i dngos/ /sgra yi brjod bya'i yul dang ni/ /'jug pa dang ni rnam pa la//
202a3(mdo 'grel): As+thA dmigs pa/ bltos pa med/ /'bad dang/ gnas la blta bar bya/ /kAn+thA sa dang/ rtsig pa dang/ /mgo ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /ku tha/ mdog dang/ la ba dang/ /rma bya'o ko tha mig nad dbye/ /ras dang/ srub par byed pa la/ /kwA tha phongs dang nges smin
202a4(mdo 'grel): rdzas/ /sdug bsngal la'o gA thA ni/ /tshigs bcad dang ni ngag dbye la/ /gran+tha ba sgrigs dang yi ge ni/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis nges byas la/ /gran+thi tshigs dang/ mdud pa dang/ /nad kyi dbye ba dag la'o/ /tIrthaM 'khyogs po 'chid? ba'i dbye/ /bstan bcos dang
202a5(mdo 'grel): ni 'jug pa dang/ /bsod nams zhing dang/ snod chen dang/ /thabs dang/ mkhan po lta ba dang/ /drang srong bsten dang chu mchod sbyin/ /pus mo ba ni tA dus mchod/ /tut+tha/ spangs ma sug smel la/ /tut+thaM/ mig sman/ tut+thA me/ /du(mdo 'grel): s+tha ngan 'gro /rmongs pa
202a6(mdo 'grel): la/ /sartha ka ku b+ha srid bsgrub/ /pI tha/ nyi ma/ pI thaM chu/ /pri thu/ mi bdag /zi ra nag /rdzing bu dang ni chen po brjod/ /pras+tha/ ri ngos tshad dang ni/ nyung ngur byas pa'i dngos po la/ pro tha rta dang/ zho krogs pa'i dar ba dang/ /lam dang rked pa snying po la/ /pI thI khyiM gyi snying po dang
202a7(mdo 'grel): phreng ba/ /zlos gar/ gzugs can lam/ /man+tha/ srub byed/ dbyug gu dang/ /bcu gnyis bdag dang/ tsam pa la/ /mi gnad kyang ngo/ pri thaM ni/ /dud 'gro bsags dang/ tshogs pa la/ /pra thI mnyam dka' / me tog dbye/ /ku ru N+Ta ka'o/ ra tha ni/ shing rta lus
202b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ be ta sa/ /sgra'o/ sArthA tshong pa la/ /'dus dang/ tshogs tsam la yang blta/ /sik+thaM rams dang sbrang rtsi rnyigs/ /zas las byung ba la yang ngo/ /saM s+thA 'jig dang rnam gnas dang/ /gsal dang de mthong ba dag la/ /s+thi ti gnas dang du yod dang/ /rjes gnang dang ni
202b2(mdo 'grel): spyod pa dang/ /ni dza rASh+Ta dag ya'o/ /a ti thi ni gshen pa dang/ /khro ba dang ni ku sha'i bu/ /a bya tha ni nad kyis dman/ /phan dang nad med/ yu nu ka/ a shwat+tha ni gang pa dang/ /garda b+hAN+Da pispa li/ /u da tha ni/ dbang chen dang/ /'dod chen grang zangs kyi gtsug pud
202b3(mdo 'grel): can/ /unma tha ni 'dab rtsegs dang/ /'gro byed dang ni 'joms byed do/ /u pa s+tha ni phang pa dang/ /skye gnas dang ni bshang lam mo/ /mi rnams rigs kyi bye brag dang/ /mchog shing gi bdag la ka yas+tha/ /na tshong gnas dang phan pa dang/ /lus kyi dbyi khyim bya bas
202b4(mdo 'grel): la kA yas+thA/ /ba lang lce dang ba lang lhas/ /lci ba sman la go gra s+thi/ /da ma tha ni dul ba dang/ /dbyug pa gos med phyogs dang ni/ /nor med dang ni skra nyal ba'o/ /ni shI tha ni mtshan phyed dang/ /mtshan mo tsam mo/ pra ma tha/ /bde byed tshogs dang phan pa dang/
202b5(mdo 'grel): de bzhin rab 'joms la yang ngo/ /ba yas+thA ni shalma lI/ /phan da kA ko li skyu ru ra'o/ /ba yas+tha ni gzhon nu dang/ /tshangs ma tru Ti gu DU tsI/ /manma tha ni 'dod sems dang/ /'dod pa'i lha dang ka pit+tha/ /ba ma thu ni skyug pa dang/ /glang po che dang/ dbang byed la'o/
202b6(mdo 'grel): ba rU thA ni shing rta sbas/ /ba rU thang ni ba'i khyim/ /bi da tha ni/ rnal 'byor dang/ /ka Di na'o/ sham tha/ /zhi ba dang ni blon po la/ /shu dag sha Ti Sha Tgan+thA/ /sen mo'i khyad par ShaTgran+tha/ /sa martha ni nus pa dang/ shing/ shor ba/ bcings pa'i don phan pa/ /sid+d+ha rtha zhes
202b7(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni/ /don kun grub dang yungs kar dkar/ /k+Sha pa thu ni/ kha bye dang/ /sprid pa dang ni phun tshogs la/ /a ni kas+tha ngan pa 'thab/ /mtshan rtags/ pa Ta/ 'joms pa dang/ /rgyal po bsrung dang lam po che/ /'dus dang dpa' ba' i mkhas pa rnams la'o/ /i ti
203a1(mdo 'grel): ru thA/ grong gtam dang/ /pra b+haSh+Ta'i chos la'o/ /pA ti ka thA zhes bya ba/ sa bdag tshig dang ma dang ba/ /u da ra thi nyi ma mtsho/ /tsa tuSha tha bzhi mdo'i lam/ /yang dag 'gro dang gnyis skyes la/ /tsi tra ra tha rigs 'dzin dang/ /dri za'i bye brag dag
203a2(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /da sha mIs+tha nyi ma dang/ /gnas brtan dang ni chags zang la/ /ba na pras+tha sbrang rtsi'i gnas/ /ba sti gnas gsum pa/ kiM shu ka'o/ /a pra ti ra tha zhes pa/ /dpa' ba dang ni ltad mo dang/ /snyan tshigs dang ni bkra shis la/ /tha yig mdza' i sde tshan no// //

203b1(mdo 'grel): dga' dang rmongs gzhan sbyor/ /gza' spen pa dang skal med dang/ /glang po'i rigs kyi khyad par la'o/ /mri du/ rno med 'byam po la/ /ra da so dang/ smyu gu la/ /sha da 'dzim pa/ sha Sh+yaMO/ /sU da/ gsal byed yon tan la/ /swA du/ zhim dang/ yid 'ong la/ /spe?
203b2(mdo 'grel): da/ rdul dang tshang pa la/ /h+ri di snying la'o k+Sho da ni/ /phye ma dang ni zhib mo la/ /aM ga da ni/ skya dang bu/ /aM ga daM ni dpung rgyan la'o/ /aM ga dA ni lho phyogs kyi/ /glang po che la/ glang mo la/ /arbu da ni grangs bye brag/ sha mdzer dang ni ri bo la/ /ard+he ndu ni zla
203b3(mdo 'grel): phyed dang/ lag sor sen mos mtshan ma la/ /A krAnda ni mi bzad sgras/ /du dang/ grogs dang dpun zla la/ /a mo da ni dri bzung dga' / /A spa daM ni bya pa/ gnas/ /ka ku da ni/ glang gi lus/ /nog dang/ rgyal po'i mtshon byed la/ /ka patpa ni dpa' ba dang//
203b4(mdo 'grel): bde 'byung ral pa'i tshogs dang ni/ /rwa dang gtso bo karkanda/ /yi ge bcas dang yal ga dang/ /chu yi dra ba phug tu 'gro/ gyen du 'degs pa rnams la'o/ /kar+Nandu ni/ rna zhags la/ /'dod pa 'dzo bar byed pa la/ /ku mu da ni/ phyogs kyi glang/ /klu dang
203b5(mdo 'grel): lha min khyad par dang/ /mtho ris la'o ka mu daM/ /kai ra ba la blta bar bya/ /ku mu daM ni/ 'dam skyes dkar/ /ku mu dA ni bum can dang/ /gam+b+hA ri yi shing dag la/ /ku mu daM ni/ sa dga' dang/ /mda' dang ral gri dag la'o/ /kU si da ni le lo bcas/ /ku sI daM ni/
203b6(mdo 'grel): 'phel 'tsho byed/ /kau mu da ni smin drug can/ /kau mu dI ni/ zla ba can/ /kra byA da ni ro zan dang/ /sha za dang ni srin po la'o/ /go bandi ni dbang gzhan skyes/ /ba lang mig dang dbyangs bdag la/ /goShpa daM ni pa la gis/ /rmeg rjes/ g.yang sa ba lang 'gros//
203b7(mdo 'grel): spyod yul la'o goShpa da/ /bsten pa dang ni sa la'o/ /sprin dang musta dza la dang/ /srad dang sman pa/ dzI ba dang/ /dur pa rkyal byed/ u ra dang/ /sprin dang ma sta/ to ya dang/ /to ya de ni mar la 'dod/ /da ra da ni/ 'jigs g.yang sa/ /gnya'o shes dang bu dag?/
204a1(mdo 'grel): dA ra da ni dngul chu dang/ /rgya mtsho/ 'tshal dang dug bye brag/ tri sha dang ni/ zhib btags dang/ /dro ba dar dpyangs grong dpon la/ /sbyin byed/ dpal sbyin/ d+ha na dang/ /na rmad ni rtsed mo ldan/ /rtsed 'dzo byed ma/ na rma dA/ /nam gru ? ? yang de
204a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /na la di ni chu srin sbyin/ /spang spos can dang pu shel tse/ /no rbI da ni yongs su rgol/ /yongs su mthar phyin smra ba la/ /ni ShA da ni dbyangs kyi dbye/ /khyi sha 'tshed pa la yang ngo/ /pra NA da ni/ nad dbye dang/ /shin tu mtho ba'i sgra la'o/ /ma? ma da
204a3(mdo 'grel): ni snyems dang dga' / /pra pa da ni rab dang pa// snyan ngag rgyan gyi khyad par dang/ /shin tu dad dang rjes su 'dzin/ /sgra sgrogs lha mi/ prahlA dang/ prA sA da ni lha mi dang/ /lha yi bskyod pa dag la'o/ /ma ra da ni bu mo zhi/ /ba ra da ni
204a4(mdo 'grel): rab dang la'o/ /b+ha sa da ni/ dus dang spyod/ /sha dang 'od gsal ba la'o/ /maryA dA ni gnas dang mtshams/ /khrims lugs dang ni spyod pa la'o/ /ma kanda ni ro bcud 'dzin/ /mA kand+hI dang/ skyu ru'i 'bras/ /me nA da ni/ ri byi la/ /'brug sgra'i rjes su sgeg pa
204a5(mdo 'grel): la/ /ba tandi ni barka ra/ /shing lcags dang ni stegs bu la'o/ /bi sha da ni skye bo dang/ /gsal ba dang ni sa ra ta/ /'dam bu dang ni lo dag la/ /shA ra dI chu'i bi spa lI/ /'dab ma bdun pa'o sha ra dang/ /sA li dang ni murga ser/ /parpa lo dang sgrub dang
204a6(mdo 'grel): mngags/ /sampad/ yan tan bstod pa dang/ /'byor pa do shal rab dbye la/ /kha dog sampid/ dam bca' ba dang brda/ /ye shes kun spyod ming dang ni/ /chu dang bya ba'i rnam pa dang/ /'thab dang yang dag 'chad pa la/ /saM b+he da ni/ rnam phye dang/ /rgya mtsho
204a7(mdo 'grel): yang dag 'grogs pa la/ /su nandA ni sred/ bud med/ /k+Sha Na da ni tshogs can dang/ /dga' ston sbyin pa'o k+Sha Na dam/ /chu la'o/ k+Sha Na dA mtshan mo/ /a pa bA da smod pa dang/ /bka' dang/ yid brtan dag la'o/ /a b+hi syanda mngon par 'phel/ /'dzag pa
204b1(mdo 'grel): dang ni mig la yang/ /a b+hi ma d+ha/ sgra/ bsrub shing/ /aSh+TA pa dA/ shA ri'i 'bras/ /sha ra b+ha dang/ spre'u dang/ /zla ba'i phreng ba la yang ngo/ /e ka pa dam dus dang lam/ /rkang gcig la'o de nas ni/ /ka Tu kanda sdeg pa dang/ /shi gru'i khu ba dag la'o/ /ku ru binda mustwa dang//
204b2(mdo 'grel): kulmA Sha dang/ 'bru'i dbye ba/ /ku ru pi ndiM tho ba dang/ /pad+ma rA ga mtshal dag la/ /ko ka na da pad+ma dmar/ /dmar po'i ke ra ba la'o/ /tsa kra tsunda 'od phung dang/ /rwa dyas/ nya yi bye brag la/ /tsa tuShpa dA rta glang sogs/ /bud med byed pa'i khyad par la/ /dza na pa da/ yul dang
204b3(mdo 'grel): ljongs/ /ta mo nu ta/ mun sel dang/ /zla ba/ nyi ma/ me rnams la/ /pa rI bA da smod pa dang/ /pi wang/ rdung pa'i dangs po la/ /pI Tha mad+da/ a d+hiSh+Ti/ /gar dang 'dren pa dga' ba la/ /pu Ta b+he dang chu klung khang/ /grong khyer dang ni gzhal med khang/ /lam dang dang
204b4(mdo 'grel): po'i tshes dang ni/ /yang dag rig pa la yang dran/ /pri yampa da mkha' spyod dang/ /snyan par smra ba nyid la'o/ /ma hA nA da sgra chen po/ /dbyar dus sprul chen glang po la/ /mu cu kunda/ thub pa dang/ /lha min shing gi khyad par la/ /me g+ha nA da/ nyi ma dang/ /langka mgrin
204b5(mdo 'grel): bcu'i bu la'o/ /pi shA ra da/ mkhas pa dang/ /spabs ldan 'jigs pa med pa la/ /biSh+Nu pa da/ rgya mtsho dang/ /nam mkha' dang ni/ chu skyes la/ /biSh+Nu pa dI sgro glegs dang/ /rtsal gyi dbye ba dag la yang/ /sha ta h+rA da/ klog ldan sprin/ /rtse mo brgya pa dag la'o//
204b6(mdo 'grel): sU ka ba daM/ spros pa dang/ /rtse mo'i phung po rtsa la'o/ /sa maryA daM nye ba dang/ /khrims lugs ldan pa dag la'o/ /sa ha sra pA/ da zhes pa/ /nyi ma dang ni za ma tog/ chos dang gsad dang nye bar 'gog/ dul dang ngos khyim mchog sbyin la/ /da yig mdza' i sde chan
204b7(mdo 'grel): no// //d+ha ni/ nor dang nor dbang la/ /d+hA ni 'dzin byed/ chos nyid la/ /and+haM rab rib mthang bas dman/ /long ba mngon par brjod pa'o/ /and+hi chu gter/ mtsho mchog la/ /ard+hi cha mnyam/ byed/ duM bu/ /a d+hi/ sems dang gzir ba dang/ mi 'dod?  'ching?
205a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ phongs dang gnas/ /bid+d+ha kun tu gdung dang 'bar/ /ri d+haM/ 'byor dang 'brel pa dang/ /g+hand+ha dri can yang dag 'brel/ /cha shas 'dod dga' snyems pa la/ /gA d+ha gnas sogs 'dod pa la/ /go d+hA mthil dang ni hA ka/ dagd+ha gnas dang
205a2(mdo 'grel): nyi ma shing/ /dagd+haM bsregs pa la yang ngo/ /da d+hi dpal stug zho dang ni/ /dpal gnas dang ni gnas la'o/ /digd+ha/ dus dang/ bi shi Sha/ /nipta'i don can la yang ngo/ /dugd+haM 'o ma rab tu dang/ /dogd+ha be'u ba lang skyong/ /shin tu nyer 'tshe snyan ngag mkhan/ /dand+haM phyung
205a3(mdo 'grel): dang bcings pa la/ /A d+hi 'ching dang tshul dang gnyen/ /pand+hU spun zla rtsa lag la/ /gnyen can dang ni shing la yang/ /bA d+hA/ sdug bsngal dgag pa la/ /bud+d+ha bde gshegs brtan dang zhi/ /blo dang ldan pa rnams la'o/ /bud+d+ha mkhas/ zhi/ rtogs pa dang/ smin
205a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang ni de bzhin gshegs/ /bud+d+hi 'phel dang 'byor dang sman/ /dga' ba'i cha shas khyad par la/ /brid+d+ha skyes dang snyan dag mkhan/ /rgas 'khogs la'o prid+d+haM ni/ /ri las skyes pa la yang ngo/ /bo d+hi ting 'dzin dbye ba dang/ /byang chub/ rtogs pa/ sa la
205a5(mdo 'grel): skyes/ /ma d+hu me tog bcud dang ni/ /sbrang skyes/ chang/ chu 'o ma la/ /mngar dang sbrang rtsi can dri zhim/ /ri mo lha min khyad par la/ /'tsho ba yal ga la yang ngo/ /mi d+haM/ le lo/ bshes gnyen dang/ /bsam pa mngon phyogs/ mdzes dang gnas/ /me d+ha mchod
205a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin/ blo gros gtsang/ /mo b+hi ngan pa mi bzad pa/ /rA d+hA/ lcug ma'i dbye ba dang/ /ri mo'i dbye dang gzhu can dang/ /sa ga/ klog dang khyab 'jug gnon/ /rgyal gyi 'bras bu rnams la'o/ /rA d+hA sa ga skyes la'o/ /lubd+ha/ rngon pa/ 'dod can la/ ba d+hU/
205a7(mdo 'grel): bu mo chung ma dang/ /btsun mo/ mna' ma sar pa dang/ /ras dang ri skegs spos rnams la/ /bid+d+hi/ de 'dra/ 'phangs dang/ bcug/ bi d+hi byed po cho ga dang/ /dus dang nges pa rnams la'o/ /bi d+ha rnam pa rdzu 'phrul dang/ /glang po'i zas dang thob dang sgrub/ /bi d+hu ri bor mtshon
205b1(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ /khyab 'jug/ ga pur srin po'i dbye/ /pyA d+hi nad dang/ khyab pa dang/ /bsnun dang/ rngon pa/ gdug pa can/ /shubd+ha 'ba' zhig gtsang ba la/ /sh+rad+d+hA dang pa nyid dang 'dod/ /sh+rAd+d+haM nges par gnas pa la/ /sh+rAd+d+ha dad dang ldan pa la/ /sand+hA gnas dang dam bcas dang/ /kun tu
205b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa la yang ngo/ /sand+hi dbye ba mtshon legs dang/ /bu ga yang dag spyod pa la/ /sA d+hu/ legs mdzes skyes bu dam/ /sid+d+ha rtag pa rdzogs pa dang/ /rab tu grags dang lha dag la/ /grub dang mngon par rab 'dzin dang/ /sgrub dang/ sbyor ba la yang ngo/ /sind+hu/ chu
205b3(mdo 'grel): gter/ chu klung yul/ /rgyags pa dang ni 'bab chu la/ /su d+hA/ bdud rtsi/ ts+tshU d+hA ni/ /dUrbA/ sgu hi/ gi gar gnas/ /sri d+hu blo dang/ bu ram la/ /skand+ha?/ lus dang skabs dang ni/ /dpung ba'i rtsa ba/ tshogs dang/ 'dus/ /sa bdag mi dang/ glang po che/ /rta rnams yang dag
205b4(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa la/ /snaM gb+ha/ gnyes gshin/ phun tshogs dang/ /tsik+ka Na la mngon par brjod/ /sla rd+d+ha yang dag dga' dang mtshungs/ /'gran dang rim pa kun nas mtho/ /a gA d+ha ni mthil reg min/ /a ba d+hi ni kun tu 'dzin/ /mtshams dus/ khung bu/ gnas la'o/ /u nad+d+haM ni
205b5(mdo 'grel): bcings pa dang/ /kun tu bcings dang rdza rnga sogs/ /A band+ha ni dga' mi'i rgyan/ /brtan par bcings pa la yang brjod/ /A bid+d+ha ni/ rab bsnun dang/ /'khyog po/ dgag pa/ lus 'greng dag /zol byed pa dang 'khor lo la/ /u pa d+hi ni/ nye bar 'dzin/ /khyad par
205b6(mdo 'grel): rgyan 'gyed chos sems dang/ /bu bza' i bya ba la yang ngo/ /ka band+ha ni da ra dang/ /sgra gcan srin po'i dbye ba la/ /ka band+ha ni/ chu dang 'gro/ /spyi bo dang ni lus la'o/ /durbi d+ha ni/ sdug bsngal dman/ /ni ro d+ha ni 'gog dang bsam/ /ni Sha d+ha ni ri dang yul/ /de yi rgyal po
205b7(mdo 'grel): 'khregs pa la/ /n+ya gro d+ha ni/ b+ha Ta'i shing/ /sa mi 'dom gang mnyam pa la/ /n+ya gri d+hi ni/ dag la ma/ /rmongs byed ma dang/ /ba d+h+ri'o/ /pa ra d+hi ni mchod sbyin spyod/ /nyi ma'i nye bar bskor ba la/ /yal ga/ mchod sbyin/ shing la yang/ /pra sid+d+ha ni grags dang rgyan/ /mA ga
206a1(mdo 'grel): d+ha ni yul dbus nas/ /byung dang rgyal rigs rje rigs skyes/ /phyag 'tshal 'tsho bdag la'o/ /mA la d+hA ni/ zegs sma khyu/ /bi ba d+ha ni yongs su za/ /lam la 'khor dang bI ba d+hi/ /bi bu d+ha ni mkhas dang lha/ /rnam par sbyangs dang des bdag nyid/ /bi
206a2(mdo 'grel): sh+rad+d+ha ni zhi ba dang/ /thams cad sgrol dang/ dpa' ba la/ /san+nad+d+ha ni go cha bgos/ /yal ga/ go ling/ rnam skyes la/ /san+ni d+hi na kun tu 'dzin/ /pho mo'i dbang po'i spyod yul la/ /sa mA d+hi ni bsam gtan dang/ /ngag med/ nges pa nus pa la/ /sam+bA d+ha ni/ shaM ka Ta/ /skye gnas
206a3(mdo 'grel): dri bzangs shaM ga ra/ /saM ro d+ha ni mngon 'dod dri/ /sug smel skyes dang/ 'phangs dang 'gog saM sid+d+hi ni 'dod pa dang/ /mtshams ldan ma dang rang bzhin grub/ /a ni rud+d+ha dran pa'i bu/ /spyod dang lus med skyes la'o/ /a nu band+ha gtso bo yi/ /rjes su 'brang dang
206a4(mdo 'grel): rtag pa dang/ /skyed bskyed pa dang rang bzhin sbyin/ /rab tu 'jug dang nges 'jug la'o/ /a nu bind+ha skyigs bu dang/ /sred pa la yang blta bar bya/ /a ba ro d+ha dag pa'i mdza' / /rgyal po'i kham dang a n+tard+hi/ a baSh+Ta bd+d+haM/ mnan pa dang/ /ring ba dang 'phyang ba la
206a5(mdo 'grel): ring ba dang ni 'phyang ba la/ /A band+ha/ dbugs dbyung dang/ /spre'u'i gnas dang dra ba can/ /ik+Shu ganda/ pu gri dang/ glo dang/ khro ba/ gze ma la/ u gra gand+ha shu dag dang/ /dza ma ni dang/ sprid 'byung sman/ /u ba la bd+hi 'thob pa dang/ /blo gros shes rab mtshan nyid ma/
206a6(mdo 'grel): kA la skand+ha ta mA la/ /tsindu ka dang/ 'tsho byed shing/ /b+hIk+Sh+Na gand+hA/ shu dag dang/ /ske tshem ta shli/ gru'o/ /tri NaM go d+hA tsi tra ka/ rgya skyegs dang ni/ rtsangs pa'o/ /kha ri bya d+ha 'dod chung dang/ /ut+ta la'i shing la'o/ /brahma/ band+hu ldag par 'dor/ /nges par ston dang gnyis
206a7(mdo 'grel): skyes mchog /ma hau ra Sha dug bca' sla/ /sh+rid+ga ba ra/ ro bcud do/ /sa mun+nad+d+ha/ kun tu 'byung/ /mkhas par rlom dang tshim pa la/ /yo dza na ganb+ha/ glang rtsi/ /rgyas pas/ spros dang/ bsil ba la'ang/ /d+ha mdza' i sde'o// //
206b1(mdo 'grel): nI ni/ 'dren pa dang ni gru/ /na ni rgyal dang/ mchod pa la/ /nau ni/ gru dang skyes pa la/ /nu ni bstod pa stong byed la/ /an+naM zas brjod pa la'o/ /i na sa bdag nyi ma bdag/ un+naM yul dang byed skyong la/ a'u naM sgra dang skyed mos tshal/ /dman pa la'o kriSh+na ni/ /thams cad
206b2(mdo 'grel): lto ba/ chu la'o/ /g+hu NaM/ 'khar ba'i/ pheb rdob dang/ /sil snyan par ma'i gar la'o/ /g+ha na sprin dang/ musta dang/ /rgya chen lcags kyi tho ba la/ /sra dang/ mkhregs dang/ ga sher bcas la'ang/ tsih+naM rgyal mtshan tsam dang ni/ /mtshan ma dang ni ba dan la/ /tsI na/
206b3(mdo 'grel): yul dang/ gos dang 'bru/ /ri dags/ khyad par rgyud kyi dbye/ /ts+tshan+naM bkab dang gsang ba la/ /ts+tshin+naM dbya ba/ ts+tshin+naM dbye ba/ ts+tshin+nAM gi/ shi/ g.yo/ thal mo sA ma ra/ /dza na/ 'jig rten 'jig rten che/ /'jig rten gzhan yang blta bar bya/ /dza nI bu mo/ mtshams
206b4(mdo 'grel): ldan ma/ /dza ni 'byung ba'o dza ni ni/ /dgra bcom sangs rgyas shin tu rgan/ /rgyal po'i ta bu phra ba dang/ /byi la dang ni/ chung ngu tsam/ /dA naM/ gtong ba glang po/ myos/ /gcod dang/ dag dang/ bsrung ba la/ /dA nu sbyin byed rnam gnon la/ /dI nA byi ba/ btsun mo la//
206b5(mdo 'grel): dI na ngan 'gro kA ta ra/ /dyu mna/ 'byor ba pha rol gnon/ /d+ha nu gzhu dang dra ba dang/ /khyim gyi dbye ba la yang ngo/ /d+ha ni nor dang 'byor pa la/ /d+hA nA b+h+riSh+Ta ya ba dang/ /so ba/ myu gu chu gter la/ /d+he na/ 'jo ba/ chu bo la/ /nagna/ gcer bu/

206b7(mdo 'grel): nyi ma/ 'o ma'o bar la/ /b+hI nTaM? bcom dang/ grogs dang/ gsal/ /mA ni chod ma/ bre sogs dang/ /'jal dang/ sems dang/ 'dzin pa dang/ /mchod pa'o/ mI na zhes bya ba/ /nya dang khyim gyi dbye ba la/ /mu ni/ dag bcad/ sangs rgyas dang/ /ri byi dang ni ki shu ka/ /i ? diSha dang ?
207a1(mdo 'grel): mritwA? dang/ /tu ba ri dang/ sa dag la/ /ya naM phyi dang/ /'gro ba la/ /yo ni 'byung gnas bud med dbang/ /ratnaM/ nor bu gtso bo'o/ /raSh+na sman dang/ gtum po'o/ /raSh+nA/ sprul mig/ e la'i 'dag/ lagnaM khyim rnams 'char pa ste/ /yang dag chags dang
207a2(mdo 'grel): dam pa rgyal/ /bA naM/ 'bras bu skam po dang/ /skam po'i rgun po myA ni/ /su rud+ga dang/ chu rlabs dang/ /dri zhim/ ka Ta 'gro ba la/ /bin+naM/ shes dang/ gnas dang thob/ /shI na gnyid log rmongs pa dang/ /sh+ye na dkar dang/ bya ba'i bye brag/ rwa dang mkhas dang/ lam la'o//
207a3(mdo 'grel): pa na/ lcug ma/ bA tya la/ sU nu/ nyi ma/ pu nu'o/ /sU naM btsas dang rab tu skyes/ /sU na/ muts+tsha dkar po la/ /sU n+yA/ bu mo 'ching gnas dang/ /ga la shuN+Di la yang 'dod/ /styA na/ le lo dud pa dang/ /snum dang/ pra ti/ sh+ru dya? la/ /s+tha na/ gnas de 'dra dang/ /nges par
