207a5(mdo 'grel): ad+ga naM ni yan lag mchog/ theg pa dang ni lus ma dang/ nA baM kA yaM khyad par la/ /any+dza na ni/ phyogs byed dbang/ /any+dza naM ni mig sman bcud/ /sudkI dud pa/ so so bI ra/ /shing gi dbye ba la yang ngo/ /any+dza na ni thu bo'i dbye/ /rlung dang/ sa lI'o/ /any+dza nA/ /byug pa dang ni

207b1(mdo 'grel): chu khams/ /smod dang rta dang glang/ /rna ba dang ni dbang chen la/ /arsho g+hI/ tA la'i 'dab/ /'brum bu 'joms dang dpa' byed do/ /a pa naM ni srung byed dang/ /sdig pa/ bud pa/ a lA dga' / /a sha ni ni rdo rje dang/ /glog dang gnam lcags la 'dod do/ /a pik+Shi ni 'bab rgu dang

207b3(mdo 'grel): la gnas/ /a sa nI ni tshong zod do/ /A sa na ni 'gyogs byed shing/ /ut+tA naM ni gan skyal dang/ /gnyid log pa dang zab pa'o/ /ut+thA naM ni ldang ba dang/ /rgyud dang/ skyed tshal/ dga' dang 'thab/ /rab lus zho shas 'tsho ba dang/ /gyad kyi shugs dang glegs

207b5(mdo 'grel): skor/ /ka thi naM ni gya tshom mo/ /ka da naM ni/ 'khrug sdig 'dod/ /kA ma na 'dod/ /mya ngan med/ /'dod pa can dang gzugs bzang ngo/ /kampa naM ni g.yo ba dang/ /'gul ba/ khyab pa/ bya ba la/ /karta naM ni gcod pa dang/ /shing bal rgyud dang las btsun mo/ /kalpa
207b6(mdo 'grel): naM ni gcod dang nus/ /glang po skyes mchog kalpa nA/ /kA ki nI ni/ /tshong zong dang/ /chad kyi shing bu bzhi cha la/ /kany+tsa na ni/ klu shing dang/ /nA ga ge sar tsampa ka/ u dum+ba ra/ kAny+dza nA/ /kAny+tsa nI ni yung ba la/ /kAny+tsa naM ni/ ge sar/ gser/ kA na nI ni nags dang khyim//
207b7(mdo 'grel): gdong bzhi'i gdong la'o/ /kA nI na/ /rgyas pa ni rna ba can/ /ka n+ya kA yi bu dag la/ /'jigs dang/ phyag 'tshal kA mi nI/ /kA ma ni/ /'dod tsam ko ka dang/ /phug ron la'o kun+nu naM/ /'ching bu'i snang dang/ phru'i bye brag/ ku ha nA ni ngan g.yo'i spyod/ /phrag dog par? ni
208a1(mdo 'grel): tshul 'chos so/ /kri ta ni/ mkhas dang/ rung ba la/ /ke ta naM ni mtshan ma khyim pa ngan/ las dang/ 'bod pa la/ /mdzes dang yul gcig /kau bi ni/ /smod dang/ ngan las/ gsang dang 'thab/ /ku lE na dang bcud lag 'gro/ phyugs dang
208a2(mdo 'grel): 'dab chags rnams la yang/ /kranda naM ni 'bod pa dang/ /mchim dang ni/ rnam grol la'o/ /khaDgAn/ bse dang/ bse ru dang/ /ral gri'i mtshon cha la yang ngo/ /gandA naM ni mtshon byed dang/ /'tsho dang/ spro dang/ rab gsal la/ /gardza ni ni khri dang/ sgra/ sgra
208a3(mdo 'grel): med pa yi sprin la'o/ /ga ha naM ni nags tshal dang/ /sdug bsngal/ tshang tshing/ rtsod ldan la/ /dug shing gis bsregs phyugs kyi sha'o/ /guny+dza naM ni rtags can la/ /go mIn sa li dbang phyug dang/ 'phrog byed dge bsnyen chen po la/ /gosta nI ni do shal
208a4(mdo 'grel): 'khrugs/ /do shal dbye ba/ pa'i nu ma/ grA bAn/ rngo ba/ ri chu/ brtse/ /g+hat+ta nA ni g.yo ba dang/ /kun tu 'jug dang 'khor lo can/ /'phrog byed/ sprul dang ku lA la/ /ko ka grong gi dra ba la/ /sbal ba'i dbye ba can dan/ /ma la ya skyes tsan dan ni/ /tsanda ni/ chu klung
208a5(mdo 'grel): dbye/ /tsarmlin ba bas pa/ 'bras bu'i shing/ /'bras bu'i lag dang 'jam pa yi/ /pags dang b+hAdgi/ rI Ta la/ /tsa la naM ni g.yo dang mgul/ /g.yo ba'i sa la la yang ngo/ /tsa ma nI gos/ g+haNnya rI/ tsA bI'i dbye ba la yang blta/ /tse ta na ni/ sems dang rigs/ /yang
208a6(mdo 'grel): dag rigs pa rnams la'o/ /ts+tsha nga naM ni/ 'dab ma/ gdugs/ khang pa g.yo dang/ ka lA sa/ grangs/ /'bun la yang ngo ts+tsha da na/ /snod dang/ 'phyang dang/ skyug pa la/ /ts+tshe da naM ni/ 'byed dang/ gcod/ /'gro ba skye bo/ shuSh+ma Na/ dza g+ha naM ni/ bud med dang/ /ska rags dang ni/
208a7(mdo 'grel): sngon ma'i cha/ /kra TI da ka rnams la'o/ /dza ya naM ni/ rgyal ba rta/ /glang po sogs dang ga cha la/ /dza ba na ni myur tsam? dang/ /lhag bar myur dang mgyogs 'gro la/ /yul gyi dbye dang/ tu rulka/ /rab tu skye ba la yang ngo/ /dze ba nI ni/ sman dbye dang/ /dzI bAn nI nbi/ ?
208b1(mdo 'grel): bo de tse/ /dzI ba ni ni/ myur tsam la'ang/ /gnas pa dang ni chu la yang/ /dzi ba nA ni/ tshil la 'dod/ /dzi ba nI ni 'tsho byed shing/ /dz+nya nI na/ /lha shes ye shes can/ /ye shes ldan pa rnams la'o/ /ta pa na ni nyi ma dang/ /kun tu gdung dang b+ha lA ta/ /dmyal ba'i dbye ba dag la'o/
208b2(mdo 'grel): ta mo g+ha zla nyi ma/ /blo dang dpal mgrin/ khyab 'jug dang/ /ta li naM ni byi la dang/ /chung ngu dang ba/ zab pa la/ /ta lu na chung lang tsho can/ /ta lu nI ni/ na chung ma/ /te ma na ni tshong ma gsher/ /te ma nI ni/ sgyed bu'i dbye/ /to dya naM ni/ gzir dang bsnun/ /da ma na ni/ gtong
208b3(mdo 'grel): dang 'ded/ /sbyin byed me tog dpa' bo'o/ /dar nAM ni mthong me long/ /rmi lam li dang bstan bcos dang/ /chos dang nye bar dmigs pa la/ /da sha na ni rtse mo la/ /da sha naM ni go cha so/ /da ha na ni/ gdug spyod dang/ khra'o b+hal+lA ta dang me/ /dri shA na ni gza' yi bdag/
208b4(mdo 'grel): pri shA naM ni skar mar brjod/ /de ba na ni/ zhags pa can/ /de ba naM ni smra 'dod dang/ /rtse ba dang ni/ tha snyad la/ /da sha naM ni/ so/ go cha/ dA? bAn/ nyin mo'i mgon dang ni/ /mngon par 'gro ba'o a d+hwan+ni/ /mya ngan thang dang/ gzhu dang/ mdud/ d+ha nA ni/ gzhu 'dzin/ Shid+ga?
208b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /srid sgrub shing la'o d+ha ma na/ me dang smin sbyor 'khrug pa la/ /d+ha ma nI ni g.yo ba dang/ /yung ba dang ni mgo dag la/ /d+hA ba ni ni/ /sbyor 'od zer/ /khyim lus/ mthu/ gnas/ skye dang rgyug/ dag dang/ dri ba lo ma la/ /sbyangs g.yo/ /chos mkhan tha ga ba'o
208b6(mdo 'grel): d+hwa 'dzin/ gnyis skyes shing rta dang/ /ri skyes rta dang/ sprul la'o/ /nanda nA ni dga' dang bu/ /nanda naM ni/ 'dres tshal la/ /rtsed bskyod rtsed ? ? nA/ nAM/ /nan+t+ri dga' ba'i dbang phyug go/ ljon shing/ n+ya ge d+ha bod sgong/ /na li nI ni/ mtsho skyas ma/ mtsho las skyes dang mtsho mchog dang/
208b7(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i gaM gla rgyun can la/ /na li naM ni/ chu chu skyas/ /nI tA naM ni/ nad dang nges/ /dang po'i rgyu dang gnas dag la/ /phrug gu/ phreng ba/ ni dta naM 'di bta naM tsa/ bum pa/ 'jig/ ba tA na/ mda' dang mkha' 'gro/ khra/ /ri/ shing/ shing rta/ shing rta can/ /padmi nI na/ pad+ma dang/ /pad can mtsho/
209a1(mdo 'grel): dang bud med dbye/ /sarba na/ dga' ston dus tshigs dang/ /bi Shu bata dang rab 'dzin dang/ /ches gcig mthong dang tshigs skabs dang/ /mtshan nyid kyi ni khyad par la/ /pa ba na ni/ ku lA la'i/ /'tshed gnas/ rlung dang rnam rtog med/ /pak+Sh+ma na/ mig gi sman
209a2(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /skra dang/ cha pra/ srad bu sogs/ /pA tsa naM ni chu dang/ rka/ /'ched pa'i gnas dang mkhas pa la/ /pA bI na ni 'joms pa dang/ /bkrA ba dang ni/ 'joms byed dang/ /klog mkhan dang ni gu gul? shing/ /pA tsa na ni/ si hA ma/ /pA tsa naM ni 'tshed byed la/ /pA ba naM
209a3(mdo 'grel): ni mang du sems/ /pA ba nI ni a ru ra/ /zhags pa can dang/ zhags pa 'dzin/ /pi shu na ni/ ngan pa dang/ /phra ma can dang nA ra dang/ bi shu naM ni gur kuM la/ /pi shu nA ni/ prik+kA la/ /pI ta na/ ka pi tsU ta'o/ /pi ta naM ni thang shing dang/ /gur guM dang ni/ bab la'o/ /pU na nA ni srin
209a4(mdo 'grel): mo'i dbye/ /phan pa/ a nI ki nI dang/ /dmag gi dbye ba/ sde dang dmag/ pradz+nyA naM ni/ mtshan ma shes/ /blo'o de nas pra d+ha naM/ /'joms byed dang ni/ grangs la'o/ /pra d+hA naM ni mchog bdag nyid/ /zhing shes/ blo dang ma chen dang/ /gcig nyid mchog dang/ rtag tu ba'o
209a5(mdo 'grel): pra sA na ni skyes ba la/ /pra sU naM ni me tog? 'bras/ /pra san+nA ni/ ma di rA/ /rab tu dang ba dang bcas pa'o/ /pre twa na/ bzhad dang rlung la'o/ /pre man mdangs dang rtsed 'jol?/ /phalgu nA ni dka' thub dang/ /sgrub dang ardzu na yi shing/ /phalgu na ni/ chu klung skyes/ /phAlgu ni ni

209a7(mdo 'grel): nI ki nI/ chu klung dang/ /lci ba la'o bud+d+hA na/ rtegs pa dang ni mkhas pa la/ /bo d+ha nI ni byang chub dang/ /spi spi lI'o bo d+ha naM/ /spos dang mar me dag la'o/ /byon man/ lha yi lam dang ni/ /bA ri Ni la brjod par bya/ /brahman/ tshangs pa bram ze dang/ dus mchod/ zla
209b1(mdo 'grel): nyi sbyor ba la/ /thos/ shes/ nang dang dka' thub la'ang/ /b+ha Tdi nI ni btsun mo dang/ /zlos gar mkhan dang btsun mo'i rgyal/ /tshangs ma mi phaM go cha bgos/ /b+haN+Da naM ni ngan byas la/ /b+harman/ gser dang/ glu gar/ khur/ /b+ha ba NaM ni/ khang pa/ lus/ /b+hA dzo naM ni/ snod rung ??
209b2(mdo 'grel): nA ni/ bsam gtan/ byug/ b+hu ba naM ni/ 'jig rten chu/ /nam mkha' dang ni 'gro ba la/ /b+ho gin gdengs ka ldan pa dang/ /sbrul dang/ grong dpon rgyal po dang/ /nA si tA'o/ /b+ho gi nI/ /dbang bskur ma dang rang rigs ma/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rnams la'o/ /maN+Da naM/

209b4(mdo 'grel): dbye/ /b+haM gA phreng? ldan btsun mo dang/ /dkar mo tsempA'i grong khyer la/ /mi thu na ni khyim la'o/ /mi thu naM ni/ khyo shugs dang/ /chung dang grong dang 'brel chos la/ /mgo zlam yid skyob/ muN+Da ni/ me ha na ni/ dri chu dang/ /shi sh+na'o mai thu naM zhes pa/ /nid+hu ba na'o/ mai thu naM/ /yang

210b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang lha yi shing la'o/ /saM d+ha naM ni mngon skye dang/ /yang dag byed pa la yang ngo/ /sand+hi ni ni lus dang mdzes/ /dus dang/ ba gzhon dag la dran/ /sa ma de ka dang mtshungs ba la/ /sampa n+na ni phun tshogs dang/ /ldan pa dang ni bsgrubs pa la/ /saM byA na ni/ bla gos khebs?

212a1(mdo 'grel): krony+tsa da naM/ g+hiny+tsu lI/ /tsin+to ta ka pad+ma'i rtsa/ /kha kA ma nA nges brtan dang/ /spyod byed ma dang bud med gzhon/ /la? Dga? d+he nu/ bu mo'i gri/ nga bzhin sdong po can la'o/ /gang lid+gu? smra byed dang/ /'dod dang 'dod ldan rnams la'o/ /ga gDe? don?
212a2(mdo 'grel): chu lha'i dbang/ /lus ldan dbyangs kyi rten la'o/ /g+ha nA g+ha na/ char sprin dang/ /brgya byin dang ni glang po myos/ /g+ho Sha yitga zhes bya ba/ /ne tso dang na bram ze la/ /tsi tra b+hA nu bya dang me/ /tso? la ka ni ni zha nye dang/ /li sa dang ni/ kiSh+ku'i tshigs/ /dza lA
212a3(mdo 'grel): Ta na 'jug pa dang/ /kraM ka/ kaM ka/ khrag gi rgyan/ /dza la Ta naM chu 'khor la/ /dza lA Ta ni chur gnas la/ /na la mI na/ nya'i bye brag/ iny+tsA ka dang byis pa gsong/ /ta pi swa ni dka' thub can/ /dka' thub dang ni rjes su ?? gi rtse/ /ta po d+ha na dka' thub
212a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /snag can tsha ba skye ba la/ /ta po d+ha na mog zlum ma/ /nad ma khyim dang dpa' ba la/ /durbA man+ni 'dam gyi ni/ /nya phyis dang ni 'brum sran no/ /de ba se na lha yi dmag/ gnas dang rtogs pa dag la'o/ /dwi dzanman/ so bya/ bram ze/ /glang po/
212a5(mdo 'grel): thob/ klu shing klu/ /ni d+h+Shu ba naM/ bskyod dang dga' / /gsong dang mthar byed nags tshal la/ /nirbA sa ni gnas med dang/ /'che dang 'gro ba'i gnas la'o/ /nirb+ha t+sa naM/ ngan byed dang/ /a lak+ta ka zhes pa la/ /nirya ta naM/ sbyin pa dang/ /bkod dang
212a6(mdo 'grel): gtong dang sgra dag la/ /na pe ma naM/ thos dang mthong/ /na shA ma naM/ lta dang mthong/ /pa ya swa ni/ ba bzhon dang/ /mun can ma dang/ sprin la'o/ /ba ri dzan ni mchod sbyin can/ /mchod sbyin las dang yongs byed la/ puN+ya/ dza na/ srin po dang
212a7(mdo 'grel): ljon shing/ sA lA sha da ni/ /srung dang skyes mchog/ bya rnams la/ /pri thagdza na rmongs dang dman/ /pra dza na naM/ skye gnas dang/ /skye ba dang ni rab 'gro la/ /pa Ni d+hA ni rab 'bad dang/ /rab tu 'jug dang mnyam gzhag la/ /pa te mA naM
212b1(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan dang/ dag glang po'i mche ba'i bar la'o/ /pra ti pan+na daM bca' dang/ /rnam par shes dang zhugs pa'o/ /pra ti yatna 'du byed dang/ /so sor 'dzin dang 'dod pa'o/ /pra tya? na ni brjod bya'i rtags/ /gnyis gnyis so sor
212b2(mdo 'grel): smra ba'o/ /pra yo dza ni/ dags pa/ rgyu/ /pra ba tsa naM bzang po dang/ /rang bzhin brjod pa la yang ngo/ /pra spo tra naM/ nyi ma dang/ /rab tu/ ba bye bsnun pa la/ /pra sA d+ha nO/ grub pa dang/ /ka ka ti kA zhes pa la/ /pra sra d+ha ni 'bebs pa la/ /pra ha sa
212b3(mdo 'grel): naM 'joms pa dang/ /rab tu bzhang dang kun bskyod la/ /pha la ken ni 'bras bu can/ /il+li she zhes bya ba la/ /bart+ta mA na 'dam bu dang/ /nyams pa med dang e raN+Da/ /dri ba'i bye brag rnams la'o/ /bA Da gin+ni sdeng pa dang/ /lam dang/ lo
212b4(mdo 'grel): mas 'tsho ba dang/ /rta yi khyad par rnams la'o/ /bA rA sha naM 'gro 'joms dang/ /mdung dang sgo skyong dag la'o/ /b+hA tAt+man ni tshangs pa dang/ /gang zag ma nga yid+gu na/ /chad dang/ sI d+hu'i btung ba la/ /ma d+ha d+ha naM/ bdud rtsi che/ /gos bza?
212b5(mdo 'grel): dang ni si hlA/ /ma hA mu ni/ ri byi dang/ /dpal yon dang ni/ ri byI pu/ /ma hA se na sa ga dang/ /dmag dpon chen po dag la'o/ /mA tu lA nI b+hAdgA dang/ /cha shes bgrod dang/ zhang po la/ /mA lu d+hA na/ /sbrul khra po/ /pad+ma chen po dag la'o/ /mA lu
212b6(mdo 'grel): d+hA nA 'khri shing dbye/ /yid gzhungs can dang yid gzhungs lpan?/ /me d+ha bo nI bram ze mo/ /ra sna ya na ma/ ba'i?  lding la/ /ra sA ya naM/ ru ra dang/ /nad 'phrog dag dang byi daM ka/ rA dza da ni/ bdag 'dzin shing/ /'o ma can dang kaM shu ka la lA ma dang
212b7(mdo 'grel): la lA man/ /rtag mtshan nyams dga' rgyan dang ni/ /rwa dang gtso bo mjug ma dang/ /mthu dang rgyal mtshan rta rnams la/ /laM ga lin+na/ puN+Da'i? shing/ /'ba? ta sha' dang gshol mtshon no/ /ba naShtsa ni ce sbyang dang/ /dzam+bu ka dang stag dang ni//
213a1(mdo 'grel): dri dang byi la rnams la'o/ /bi ro tsa na nyi ma me/ /zla ba rab bde/ dga' ba la/ /bi Sha yin ni dbang po dang/ /yul can yid las skyes dang sreg /yul las skyes dang mi yi bdag /'bar ba dang ni rang dbang can//

213a3(mdo 'grel): gtong/ /sbyin dang/ mngags dang gsod pa la/ /bismA sa ni dri za'i grong/ /bu ga can dang dran pa la/ /bi ha na ni 'joms pa dang/ /piny+dza na dang shing bal bskyong/ /bi he Tha Ni 'tshe dang 'joms/ /bri k+ShA da nI shing skyes dang/

213a6(mdo 'grel): pa can dang/ glang po che/ /shle Sha g+ha nA/ mal+lI dang/ /ka ta kI dang tik+ta'i bcud/ /sa dA da na/ /glang chen dkar/ /ha la gnas dang spos kyi glang/ /sa nA ta na 'phrog byed dang/ /khyab 'jug pha mis/ 'gron mo/ brtan/ /rtag pa'o sa

213b1(mdo 'grel): 'gog/ sa mu rtsa ni ni/ /mngon khyab yang dag 'dod dnag rmongs/ /sa m+bA ha naM/ khur la sogs/ /'dren dang yan lag nyed pa la/ /sam+ba da naM lta ba dang/ /ba slu dang dbang du byed pa la/ /sa ro dzi nI pad+ma can/ /mtsho las

216a3(mdo 'grel): sde'o// //phu ni sngags dang pe ni sgra/ /grangs med snyA ni rgan dang 'phel/ /spha ni/ g+hany+dza'i rlung dang khyab/ /spu ni/ sphung byed phalgu'i dngos/ /gumpha dpung pa'i rgyan dang/ tshig /lugs dang brjod pa dag la'o/ /re pha ra yig smod ba brjod/ /pa phe/

216b1(mdo 'grel): dampa/ dang pa'i tshogs dang/ mnga' la'o/ /ga dzA hwa glang po bisba lI /glang po 'gran dang glang po'i grang/ /gargd+harbba? ni/ ri dags dbye/ /glu mkhan dang ni mkha' spyod dang/ /srid pa bar ma'i sems can la/ /khu dbyug rta dang bcud len grub/ /lha yi glu mkhan rnams
216b2(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /go Dumpa ni snying dang 'bras/ /brin+ta dang ni ba lang zas/ /dwi dzi hwA ni sprul phra mo/ /ka Tir ka'o ni ta m+ba/ /rtse mo phrag ba lus byed do/ /pra lam nil 'phyang ba dang/ /lha min /tA la'i myu gu dang/ /yal ga la'o pra lcam+ba/ /khyab 'jug dbye ba gsum
216b3(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang/ /'o ma 'dzin pa'o b+hU dzam+bu/ /bi kaM ka ta'i 'bras bu dang/ /go DUm+ba la'o he rampa/ /ma he lto 'phyang dpa' dang snyems/ /dza ra dzam+bu dza mwU 'byed/ /'bra go'i 'bras bu dag la'o/ /la la dzi hA 'tshe ba dang/ /rim pas 'gro dang/ /khyim pa'o/ /sha ta parbA
216b4(mdo 'grel): du rbA dang/ /ngan spong bu dang btsun mo la/ /go rak+Sha dzam+bu ni gro/ /de bzhin sa bsrungs 'bras la'o/ /d+hU lI ka dam+ba ni shing/ /ti ni sha dang ka dam+ba/ chu la'i shing la lta bar bya/ /sh+ri lA la dzmd+hU zhes pa/ /go Dum+ba'o 'ga' zhig ni/ /rgya shugs 'bras bu zhas 'dod
216b5(mdo 'grel): de/ /ba mthi'i sde mtshan no// //b+ha ni 'di 'bru chags pa dang ni/ /dkar dang rgyas pa'i don la yang/ /b+hA ni 'bar dang gnas tsam la b+haM ni skal ma b+hI ni 'jigs/ /bdU ni sa dang gnas tsam la/ /'byung bar byed pa rnams la'o/ /b+ho ni bod pa mi
216b6(mdo 'grel): zad pa'o/ /kum+b+ha bum pa khyim gyi dbye/ bi Ta glang po'i mgo'i yan lag /bum rna can gyi bu la yang/ /kum+b+hI skya nar chu'i 'dab ma/ /bi tha ra ka ta 'bras bu'o/ /kum+b+haM gu gul sh+rig dur byed/ /garb+hA/ mngal dang byis pa dang/ /nag la ste rtags phyogs
216b7(mdo 'grel): tsher can la nas/ /dzam+b+ha/ so dang/ skyur rtse dang/ /lha min dbye dang za ba la/ /dzwinb+ha/ kha gdangs kha bya glal/ DaMm+b+ha/ bA li sha dang byis/ /dam+b+ha tog can shing shun la/ /drikb+hU/ sbrul dang/ bdag po la/ /nA b+hi/ rgyu skar 'khor lo sgyur/ /gtso bo
217a1(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo'i mdza' dang ni/ /srog chags yan lag myos pa la/ /ni b+ha 'dra ba/ zol la'o/ /ram+b+ha 'od ma'i dbyug pa la/ /ram+b+ha chu shing/ chu skyes ma/ /bi b+hu sum rtsen dbang khyab bdag/ sham+b+hu dbang phyug tshangs pa dang//
217a2(mdo 'grel): mchod 'os dang ni skra can ma/ /shu b+ha grub pa shu b+haM bde/ /sho b+ha mdzes dang grib ma la/ /sa b+ha/ mdun/ pa/ ba lang gnas/ /rgyan po bgyed pa rta rag go /stam+b+ha bems po/ ka ba la/ /sa b+hU khyab 'jug tshangs pa la/ /a shu b+ha ni 'chi
217a3(mdo 'grel): ltas sdig/ mi 'dod/ mi bzang/ sdig can no/ /At+mA b+hU ni/ 'dod lha tshangs/ /a ram+b+ha ni/ skyed tshal dang/ /dregs dang myur dang/ gsod pa la/ /ri Sha b+ha ni/ khyu mchog gtso bo/ /sde tshan brgyad dang sman bye brag/ dbyangs kyi khyad par
217a4(mdo 'grel): phag pa'i 'jug/ pu ga rna ba dag la'o/ /ri Sha b+hA mi yi rnam pa/ /bud med rnam mang btsun mo dang/ /rtse mo/ byi la/ mchog gnas gtso/ /ka ku pa ni srid sgrub shing/ /'dod chags dbye ba rab bsten dang/ /phyogs mdzes/ bstan bcos
217a5(mdo 'grel): la ba dang/ /tsampa ka yi phreng ba la'o/ ka ra b+hi na/ 'khrig ma dang/ /mthe'u chung/ cha dang rim pas 'gro/ /rkang pa brgyad pa sha/ ri dags bye brag dag la'o/ /ku sum+b+ha ni/ gser/ tshos chen/ /ril pa spyi blugs/ garda b+ha/ /bong bu/ dri yi
217a6(mdo 'grel): dbye ba dang/ /ki bar+Na dang kai ra ba/ /garda g+hI ni nad nyung dang/ /skye ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /dundu b+hi ni/ rnga bo che/ /sbyin skyes dbang pos thig le la/ /durma b+ha ni rnyed dka' dang/ /yig gtsugs/ khyi/ rdo/ nad can la/ /ni kum+b+ha ni so ldan ma/ /bum rna can
217a7(mdo 'grel): gyi bur yang dran/ /pal+la lha ni rig ldan dang/ /brtse ba can dang dbang po la/ /barShA b+hU ni slar skye dang/ /kiny+tsi la dang sbal pa la/ /biSh+kam+b+ha ni sbyor ba'i dbye/ /rgya khyon so sor bcings pa dang/ /gzugs can yan lag so sor 'bad/ /'ching ba'i dbye dang rnal
217b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor can/ /biSh+Ta m+b+ha ni so sor 'ching/ /rnam 'phel ba dang rnam par 'phel/ /bi sram+b+ha ni rol pa can/ /'thab mo dbugs 'byin 'dren dang/ gsod/ /pri Sha b+ha ni/ khyu mchog dang/ /dkar po khu ba/ skyes mchog la'ang/ /bai darb+ha ni dag 'khyog po/ /nyid dang mtshams pa'i
217b2(mdo 'grel): khyod par la/ /sha ra b+ha ni/ seng ge'i dbye/ /rkang pa brgyad pa kar b+ha/ /sa nA b+hi ni rang skye mtshungs/ /su ra b+hi ni tsampa ka/ khra bo dpyid dang dri ldan la/ /gser dang dzA ta pa la dang/ /mid 'ong dri bzangs dag la'o/ /sha ra b+hi ni shal+la ki/ ma mo'i dbye ba dag la'o//
217b3(mdo 'grel): a nuSh+Thu b+ha mda' dang ni/ /sdeb sbyor rab dbye dag la dran/ /a baSh+Tam+b+ha/ gser dang ni/ /rab rtsom dka' ba dag la yang/ /shA ta kum+b+haM gser la ste/ /shA ta kum+b+ha rta gsod pa'o/ /b+ha mdza' i sde mtshan no// //ma ni zhi ba mA zla ba/ /sgra gcan dang ni ma mo dang//
217b4(mdo 'grel): dga' dang nga rgyal 'chid? ba dang/ /dgag pa la ste mi zad pa'o/ /me dang maM zhes pa'ang/ don de'o/ /A ma nad dang de dbye phyogs/ /iSh+ma 'dod dang/ dpyid la'o/ /u mA go rI dang ni ser/ /mdzes dang grags dang dga' ba la/ /a'u ma grong dang byed pa la/ u
217b5(mdo 'grel): rmi rlabs dang dba' rlong dang/ /'jug pa dang ni gsal ba la/ gos khums pa dang rtsig pa dang/ /mgrin pa btegs dang/ bcir ba la/ /kA ma dran pa grib ma la/ /ka maM 'dod bya dga' nges 'dod/ /A ma rjes su 'dod pa la/ /kA mI 'dod dang/
217b6(mdo 'grel): bud med btsun/ /kA mI 'dod can skyes bur 'gyur/ /sarba nA ma'i/ kaM zhes pa/ /rnam par rtog dang dri ba dang/ /'dor dang smod dang rnam pa la/ /ki mi gser dang bu mo dang/ /phreng ba A b+ha lA la'o/ /kri? srin 'bu/ kI Ta dang/ /rgya skyegs dang ni/ srin
217b7(mdo 'grel): bu'i dbang/ /gnyis ma nub pa rim pa dang/ /g.yo ba dang ni 'gul pa la/ /kharma zer mi'i? rab dbye la/ /ga ma/ a nA/ lo tsi ta/ /lam dang rgyan 'gyed khyad par la/ /gulma sdong po tsa mU ni/ /bsrung dang dmag sde mchin nad byed/ /gulmI A ma la kya
218a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /yol ba dang ni gos kyi khyim/ /brA ma dbyangs dang/ 'dug gnas dang/ /tshogs dang sgra sogs snga ma can/ /g+harma tshang gdung sos ka dang/ /drod dang rdul gyi chu la'o/ /dzalpa sA ma ra dang 'khrus/ /yang dag lta bar byed pa
218a2(mdo 'grel): mo'o/ /dzi hma gya gyu ta ga ra/ /dal ba dang ni 'khor lo'o/ /yung ba dang ni ljang gu la'ang/ /tokma/ stokmaM thos dri ma/ /da ma/ 'du byed/ dbyug pa dang/ /dul dang zhal zhal la yang ngo/ /dasma ma dang/ chom rkun dang/ /skye bo'i nga rgyal la yang dran?
218a3(mdo 'grel): dru ma/ rkang rgya spos 'thung/ yongs 'du dang/ /mi 'am ci yi dbang phyug la/ /d+harma 'tshe med/ bsod nams dang/ /rigs pa mchod sbyin rang bzhin dang/ /dpe dang/ sdom dang kun spyod dang/ /rigs byed mdza' dang/ gzhu rna ba 'byor
218a4(mdo 'grel): zhi ba'i gtung ba sman bdag nyid/ /dri yi rtsa dang bsil ba dang/ /'dul byed/ ming dang gzhan bstod la/ /ne mi khron pa'i kha skor dang/ /ti ni sha shing 'khor lo'i mdza' / /ne ma dus dang mtshams dang dor/ /ra ba dang ni kai ta ka'o/ /pad+ma pad+ma'i ?
218a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni/ /chu skyes bkod pa grangs bye brag/ gter dang pad+ma can klu'i dbye/ /pad+ma b+hA? rgIr dang ni dpal/ /prAhmI dbyangs can 'dam skyes gdong/ /tshangs pa'i nus ma /pany+dzi kA/ /zla ba'i lcug ma yal ga'i dbye/ /b+hA ma khro ba sgra dang 'od/ /b+hI ma bde 'byung sbyang? ka lto//
218a6(mdo 'grel): amA be ta sa'i shing dang/ /drag po dang ri 'jigs rung la/ /b+hISh+ma 'phrog 'byed gaM gA skyes/ /srin po dang ni 'jig byed ma/ /b+hU mi sa dang/ gnas tsam la/ /b+hau ma/ dmyal ba sa skyes la/ /b+ha ma 'khrul dang kunda dang/ /zad dang chu yi nges 'gro la/ /ya ma gcig
218a7(mdo 'grel): rje chos kyi rgyal/ /zung dang yang dag sdom dang khwa/ /mche? ma skyes dang/ lus dang sgrub/ /bltos pa med dang rtag pa'i las/ /yA ma mtshon cha yang dag 'gog gzar yA mi? sring mo bud med rigs/ /yud+hma gzhu dang g.yul bgyed pa/ /ra yA
218b1(mdo 'grel): sbrang rtsi'i chung ma la/ /ra ma yid bsrubs mdzes pa dang/ /sa skyes mya ngan med pa la/ /rasmi 'od dang/ rta'i srab dang/ /mig gi rma dag la'o/ /rA ma/ rag+hu'i bu dang ni/ /drang srong ya mad agni dang/ /shol 'dzin phyug kyi dbye ba dang/ /shin tu yid du 'ong rnams ?
218b2(mdo 'grel): lha ma yin rA mA bud med dang shing kun/ /rA maM gnas can ru rta'o/ /rugmaM/ gser dang lcags la ste/ /ma swa tsa la/ tsa NA ka re/ /ru mA mgrin bzang mdzes pa la/ /lak+Sh+mi dpal dang/ phun tshogs la/ /pad+ma/ pri yangku dang mdzes/ /ba mi nad can skyugs pa la/ /nA ma
218b3(mdo 'grel): g.yon dang 'phrog byed dang/ /'dod dang sprin dang phra tI pa/ /bA maM gcod byed bA mA mdzes/ /sha mi phye dang 'bras bu dang/ /shim+b+ha dang ni dag mtshungs pa/ /shuSh+ma nyin mo'i bdag po la/ /shuSh+maM gzi brjid la 'dod do/ /sh+yA ma ljang gu nag po dang/ /rab
218b4(mdo 'grel): sbyor/ ba Ta'i shing dang ni/ /sbal pa sprin dang byis ba rgan/ /sh+yA mA kha dog ljang gu dang/ /sngo bsangs tsA grA li dang ni/ /rab tu 'gro min bud med dang/ /zla ba'i khri shing sman dur byid/ /sA ri ba dang guN+DA dang/ /mtshan mo rams dang bri yaM ku'o/ /sh+yA ma ma
218b5(mdo 'grel): lan tshwa'i dbye ba dang/ /na le shaM la'o/ sh+rA ma ni/ /thub pa dus dang snga ma min/ /dal tsA gu li zer ba'i mtshan bu snang ba sel ba'o ma lA ni/ /'gug dang 'dra dang skye bo kun/ /sI ma mtshams dang dus dang ni/ /zhing dang dbye ba gnas la'o/ /sra ma mkha' dang
218b6(mdo 'grel): 'o ma la/ /sraSh+ma chung ngu mngon par brjod/ /sriSh+ma ba dang nang dag la/ /sUk+Sh+ma? phra dang phyi mo la/ /so ma 'od dkar/ bu gar 'gro/ /pha mes dang ni lha dag la/ /syA ma lha'i sman khri shing dang/ /nor gyi dbye ba/ rlung/ spre'u/ hi mi/ khya ga ba mo dang/ /tswa na bsil
218b7(mdo 'grel): dang khyags pa la/ /ho mi dang ba dang no/ mar?/ /k+Sha ma sa dang bzod pa la/ /k+Sha ma bzod pa ldan pa la kA? ma zar ma phreng ba can/ /k+She ma 'thob dang bsrung ba dang/ /bkra shis dang ni chom rkun la/ /k+Shai mA gtum po 'phrog byed la/ /k+Shau mi zar ma'i gos dang
219a1(mdo 'grel): ni/ /du kU la yi ras la'o/ /a da ma ni smad dang/ dman/ /A ga ma ni bstan bcos lung/ /A sh+ra ma ni tshangs spyod sogs/ /thub pa'i gnas dang tshogs khang la/ /u t+ta ma dang ut+ta me/ /mchog dang phul bu byung ba'o//
219a2(mdo 'grel): ka la ma ni sA li 'dzin/ /brko bya 'bras dang/ rgya skyegs bcud/ /ku su mi ni me tog 'bras/ /dus su skyes dang mig nad la/ /kri tri mi ni lan tshwa dang/ /sIha ka dang bcos pa dang/ /go dgU? naT/ ni/ 'bru'i bye brag/ narng+ga dang sman gyi dbye/ /go li mi ni/ dUrbA dkar
219a3(mdo 'grel): 'khor dang shu dag la yang ngo/ /gau ta ma ni thub pa'i dbye/ /shAkya seng ge'o gau ta mI/ /bkrod dka' dang ni gsal ba la/ /ta ni maM ni ral mal dang/ /bla re dang ni zhal zhal la/ /kra Di ma ni se 'bru dang/ /ka ra ka dang e la'o/ /ni ga ma ni tshong dral
219a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ /pUrbi da ka Ta luN+DI/ /tshong pa'o ni ga mi na des/ /'ching ba dam bca' 'khrul 'khor skyob/ /ni rga ma ni des 'gro blo/ /phun sum tshogs dang rigs ngan la/ /nai ga ma ni lha'i mdza' dang/ /tshong pa'i grong khyer nA si ta/ /pany+tsa ma ni 'dod
219a5(mdo 'grel): chags dbye/ /lnga rnams dang ni rdzogs byed la/ /mkhas pa dang ni khang chung la'ang/ /pany+tsa mi ni skyabs seng bu/ /par mi ni phul byung gtso/ /snang ba'o pa ra ma oM mdzad/ /rjes gnang dang ni grangs med can/ /phra kra ma ni skabs go rims
219a6(mdo 'grel): nye ba'i rim dang rim pa'o/ /pra tA ma ni rjes su byed/ /so 'ching ba dang so ldan ma/ /pra tha ma ni dang po gtso/ /pra harma ni khang rtsegs dang/ /bum pa dang ni ri yi stong/ /ma d+hya ma ni yul dbus dang/ /mchog dang/ gung dang/ dbus su skyes/ /ma
219a7(mdo 'grel): thya? mA ni gnam stong dang/ /rdul mthong bud med dag dang ni/ /rna ba can dang yang gsum gyi/ /sdeb sbyor la gsor dbus ma la/ /bi kra ma ni rnam gnon mdzes/ /bzo dang nus pa phun tshogs la/ /bi dru ma ni rin chen shing/ /bi ru dang ni lcug?
219b1(mdo 'grel): ma sar/ /baM sbra ma ni rnam sgeg dang/ /'khrul dang sgeg pa'i bya ba la/ /bi lo ma ni go bzlog dang/ /lag 'gro khyi dang zhags pa la/ /bi lo mI na na tshong gnas/ /bzlog dang bsod par byed pa la/ /byA a ma ni bgrod dka' pa'i/ /kun spyod rnam 'gog skyes bu'i
219b2(mdo 'grel): rtsal/ /saM kra ma ni 'gro byed dang/ /chu las yang dag sgrol ba yi/ /kun spyod 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/ /sat+ta ma ni ches mtshod 'os/ /mchog dang legs pa la yang ngo/ /saM b+h+ra ma ni gus pa dang/ /skyong dang legs pa la yang ngo/ /su Sha maM ni mdzes dang 'dus
219b3(mdo 'grel): su Sha mA ni gsal ba dang/ /mngon par gsal ba yang ngo/ /su Shi ma ni sprul bye brag/ /su ShI ma ni rlung sor bu/ /mdzes dang 'khyags pa dag la'o/ /a nu pa ma mdzes pa dang/ /stod pa dang ni srin po yi/ /phyogs kyi glang mo la 'dod do/ /a b+hyA ga ma mthar
219b4(mdo 'grel): byed dang/ /shen la 'gal byed khas blangs mtshon/ /u pa kra ma gso spyod dang/ /nyer 'dzin rtsom dang rnam par gnon/ /u ba kra ma logs su 'gro/ /rang gir byas pa dag la'o/ /dza la gam chu'i gong dang/ chu yi bzhi mdo rus sal la/ /daN+Da yA ma nyon mo dang/ /bum pa
219b5(mdo 'grel): skyes dang kO nA sa/ /ba ra kram nus ba dang/ /rnam gnon brtson pa dag la'o/ /sla bad+ga ma/ /sbal pa spre'u/ /na hA pad+ma nga rgyal can/ /mahA pad+ma grangs dang gter/ /klu yi khyad par la yang 'dod/ /mAt+ta pA ma 'khogs pa dang/ /yongs su zos dang bor ba la/ /sarba btau ma/ phyogs glang dbye
219b6(mdo 'grel): ba kun pa la yang 'dod do/ /ma mdza' i sde'o// //ya ni rlung dang grags pa dang/ /thob byed gtod dang 'gro byed la/ /yA ni sa dang ma mo dang/ /me dang rnga yab mUrbI dang/ /murbba hlA rnams la'o/ /dyo ni lha gnas skabs gsum lam/ /a nu mtshungs man dbye ba dang/
219b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan du 'gyur dang tha ma la/ /arthya? blo dang rigs pa dang/ /brag zhun la'o arg+hyaM naM ni/ /rin thang don dang mchod dang 'os/ /arg+hya sbyor pa tsam la yang/ /arsh+ya rje bo rje rigs la/ /A byA gnas dang gtso bo la/ /A byaM gdong/ dbus kha las byung/ i hya? bla
220a1(mdo 'grel): ma 'dod dang sbyin/ /mchod dang 'grogs dang gnas la'o/ /i b+hya phyug por gyur pa la/ /i b+hyA glang po shal+la kI/ /ka n+yA bud med chung ngu dang/ /gzhon nu ma dang khyim gyi dbye/ /sman gyi bye brag dag la'o/ /ka lyaM tho rangs snang ba dang/ /nyin mo'o
220a2(mdo 'grel): ka lye/ nad med mkhas/ /ka lyA skyes mchog dge ba 'chang/ /ka pyaM chad dang lcag 'os dang/ /bar ma dang ni lcags rnams la/ /kak+Sha chen po dang ni gser/ /skad chings dang ni glang po'i so/ /kaM syaM khang bzang la sogs kyi/ /re mig dang ni btung ba'i gnod//
220a3(mdo 'grel): gzi brjid skyes dang rdzas kyi dbya/ /rol mo'o bye brag la yang ngo/ /kA ya lus dang rang bzhin 'dus/ /'bum dang lha las byung ba'o/ /karyi rgyu dang dgos ba la/ /kA bya pa sangs gza' la'o/ /ka bya gtsang byed blo dag la/ /kAM byaM gzhung gi khyad par la//
220a4(mdo 'grel): ku TyaM rtsig pa byug pa la/ /ku lya mA tya rigs byung dang/ /rigs la shin+tu phan pa dang/ /sha dang nyi ma/ khrus gzhong dang/ /kI ka sha'o ku lyA ni/ /chung ngu bcos ma chu klung dang/ /chu bo 'tsho gsil sgra sgrogs/ /kri tya/ bya ba lha dag dang/ /nor la sogs
220a5(mdo 'grel): pa bgo bya dang/ /'phel ba'i bya ba dag la 'di/ /kri tyA ta bya sogs su brjod/ /kri yA las dang bya ba dang/ /byed pa rab tu bzung dang thabs/ /rtsom pa dang ni bslab pa mchod/ /gso dpyad dang ni nges byed laM/ /ga byaM rgyal bya ba lang gi/ 'o ma sogs
220a6(mdo 'grel): dang mchod sbyin rdzas/ /ga bya ba lang rigs pa pan/ /gu hyaM gsang ba nyer gnas dang/ /sba bya/ khyo shugs rus sbal la/ /gu hyA yal ga'i grong dang phug /bya dang/ ri dags/ chang dag dang/ /gshad laM rang dbang min dang phyogs/ /ge ya
220a7(mdo 'grel): glu mkhan glu dang dbyangs/ /go hyaM yon tan sbyin dang bu/ /grA mya skyed ma bud med dang/ /grA myaM/ dga' 'brel a shlA la/ /tsa sa/ gdung ba tshogs dang ni/ /rtsa ba ra ba 'ching ba'o/ /tsa bya dben pa tsa byA ni/ /chen po dang ni dri yi mchog/ tsi tyA ro
220b1(mdo 'grel): yi kha dang ma tsi tyaM gshin po'i mchod rten la/ /tsai tyaM gnas gzhi tsi tyA ni/ /gtsang khang phyur bu la yang ngo/ /tsai tya sangs rgyas sku gzugs dang/ /shing la yang ni shin tu bstan/ /tso tyaM dri ba rmad byung la/ tsA tyaM brjod bya bzhin tso la/ /dpal gnas
220b2(mdo 'grel): ma'o/ tshA pA/ ni tsha gdung med dang bkur sti dang/ /shin tu bskums dang mdzes pa dang/ /gzugs brnyan me shel gral skyong ba/ /dza na ma dang mna' ma sar/ /bshes dang kho la po/ dga' dang phan/ /skyed byed ma'o/ dza n+yaM ni/ /kun sbyor yongs smod
220b3(mdo 'grel): tshong? dus la/ dza n+yA ma dang/ grogs mo dga' / /dza n+yu? srog chags me mchog gnas/ /dza ya rgyal byed rnam rgyal la/ /dza ya chos kyi dbye ba nad/ /u ma'i grogs mo/ rgyal byed ma/ /phan pa dang ni ma bsrub la/ /dzA tyaM rigs can gtso bo la/ /tA rtA? bya khyung? nyi
220b4(mdo 'grel): ma i/ /kha lo pa dang shing rta/ rta/ /rta rna la sogs la 'dod do/ /ta k+Sh+yaM mig dman khu ba la/ /ti Sh+ya? me tog cha shas la/ /'dzin pa la'o tra yI ni/ /de gsum rigs byed gsum pa dang/ /rdzogs pa la ni yang dag 'dod/ /dra slu dag dang chom rkun
220b5(mdo 'grel): la/ dA ya sol+lu N+NA bshad dang/ /yau ta ka sogs nor dang sbyin/ /cha sogs rin dang sa yid ngos/ /dpyi/ lam bcas/ li shi dang/ /me tog la'o di byA ni/ /skyu ru ra 'od di byaM ni/ /kha dog la sogs 'byor ba la/ /dA Sh+yA gos khyim gos la sta/ /de tya lha min de tyA ni//
220b6(mdo 'grel): chang dang gtum po sman pa yang/ /dra byaM pi ru la dang 'byor/ /shing gi rnam 'gyur skyed pa dang/ /sman dang sa sogs 'jig dang 'dul/ /d+ha n+yaM 'bras dang skyu ru ra/ /d+ha n+ya bsod nams ldan pa la/ /d+hA naM 'bru dang so ba la/ /d+hi Shtya?/ rgyu skar khang pa la
220b7(mdo 'grel): na ya/ nus pa gnas dang ma/ /lugs dang pho nya'i khyad par la/ /nA TyaM sil snyan gsum pa sgeg/ ni tyaM stag dang des pa la/ /pa thyA a ru ra la 'dod/ /pa thyI ba na ba nyid la'o/ /pa dya dmangs rigs pa dyaM ni/ /tshigs bcad pa dyA mi yi la ma//
221a1(mdo 'grel): pA dya kun tu rnam 'gyur dang/ /pi tidki'o/ yAM yyaM ni/ /smod pa dang ni btung ba la/ /pI yu nyi ma dug pa dus/ /pu N+yaM/ legs byas chos dang ni/ /bsod nams ldan dang yid 'ong la/ /pU dzya dang phyag 'os la/ /pe yaM btung bya'o thug la
221a2(mdo 'grel): pe yA/ 'tshed bya dang ba snying/ /pra ya phal che mang dang mtshungs/ /mal dang 'chi bdag dag la'o/ /pri ya/ dga' dang myur/ rgan sman/ /pa n+yaM/ nags tshal las byung la/ /ba n+yA tshogs dang nags kyi chu/ /band+hya/ bud med mo gsham la/ /band+hya rgyal dang 'bras
221a3(mdo 'grel): med shing/ /ba lyaM gtso bo stobs byed 'dzin/ /baryya mchog ldan mtsho lnga pa/ /pind+hyA gcod byed mdzes pa la/ /bind+hya snum dang sum 'byed la/ /bIryaM mthu dang khu ba dang/ /gzi brjid dang ni nus pa la/ /be sh+yA tshogs can ma la'o/ /be sh+yAM rje rigs kre ta na/ /b+ha yang drag po
221a4(mdo 'grel): so sor 'jigs/ /rab ded/ sgur 'gyogs 'ga' pa dang/ /las dang tshon gyi shing dag la/ /b+ha bya legs dang skal ldan byed/ /b+ha bye bden dang dge ba dang/ /rung ba dang ni ngo bo can/ /b+hA gyaM dge ba'i bdag nyid dang/ /sgrub dang dge dang mi dge'i las/ /b+h+ri tyA 'bangs dang gla
221a5(mdo 'grel): mi la/ /matpya nya dang da'i dbye ba/ /shing gi rgyal po la yang ngo/ /ma d+hyaM 'byar byed/ kun tu 'byar/ /rigs dang go skabs tha ma la/ /ma n+yu lha min/ mchod sbyin khro/ /ma ya bzo bo lha min dang/ /glang po che dang rta la'o/ /ma yu ri dags mi'am ci/ /mA ya gos sar can lha mi
221a6(mdo 'grel): ma ya ngan g.yo brtse ba dang/ /sAM ba rI dang bla dag la/ /mA lyaM me tog phreng ba la/ /mU lyaM rin dang/ dngos po la/ /mri tyu 'ched dang lha dag la/ /me d+hyaM me du ra la'o/ /me d+hyA zas dang shu dag la/ /bArya/ gtsang pa me d+hyaM rten/ /kha yurta dang mchod sbyin rta/ /yA myA smin byed rgyas
221a7(mdo 'grel): ba la/ /yA myA ri byi tsanda na la/ /ya gya pi wang mchog dag la/ /gArd+hya nus dang sdig pa can/ /yo gya/ smas me shel lo/ /yo gya 'byor dang sman dag la/ /ra thya'o khyags dang bzhi mdo dang/ /laM dang shing rta dag la'o/ /ra thya shing rta 'dren pa la/ /ra myaM yid dga' ra myA ni/ /mchog
221b1(mdo 'grel): tu rnam par bsams pa'o/ /ra mya tsampa ka yi shing/ /rU byaM gus dang gser dang dngul/ /rab bzhi'i tshul dang thob bya dang/ /thob pa dang ni rigs pa la/ /la ya gar sogs mtshungs pa dang/ /rnam par sgeg dang ma 'dres pa/ /lak+Sh+yaM grangs dang mda' zad pa/ /khang pa la'o lA byaM ni/ /sil
221b2(mdo 'grel): snyan gsum pa bud med gar/ /bi k+Sh+ya rta yi rol pa dang/ /mthong bya rmad du byung ba la/ /brahmyA sde tshan rab gnas dang/ /barya Ta na la yang ngo/ /sha ya/ mal stan/ sprul lag pa/ /mal dang ldan pa nyid dang yang/ /sgra yi gumpha la yang ngo/ /sha lya shwA pi Ta/ myos byed shing/ /sha mya phur bu mda'
221b3(mdo 'grel): dang ni 'od ma'i kam+bi kA mda' chen/ /shU n+yA sbubs can/ shU n+yaM ni/ /skye bo med pa la 'dod do/ /sau rmyaM dpa' ba nyid dang ni/ /spyod dang shor ba la yang po/ saM khyaM yang dag 'gro dang grangs/ /gcig nyid sogs dang 'dor ba la'o/ /ta ya 'jig rten las pha rol/ /sa tya bden pa/
221b4(mdo 'grel): bden pa zung/ /lha rdzas la'o sa tyA skad/ /sa tya da ldan mtshams dang bsags/ /chu klung dbye ba kun 'dzin dang/ /dam bca' bsam pa khrims lugs la/ /sa bya g.yon phyogs nye ba la/ /sha byaM mtshon cha 'bros yon tan/ /rdo ba bdun dang soDha bya/ /nai ru dzya dang bzod pa la/ /sa
221b5(mdo 'grel): d+hya rnal 'byor dbye ba la/ /tshogs dang lha'o bsgrub bya la'ang/ /sA ya mda' dang phyi dro la/ /sUrya nyin mo'i de'i dga' ma/ /sman gyi dbye ba la suryA/ /se byaM bsten 'os 'dam bu byings/ /bsten pa'o so myA mdzes 'khri shing/ /s+the ya/ mdun na 'don la'o/ /sma ya brtsod pa'i
221b6(mdo 'grel): tshig gtan 'debs/ /sgrol bsnyems dang/ rmad du byung/ /rtArya ba ru ra yi shing/ /'phrog bya la'o h+ri dya ni/ /dbang du byed dang rigs byed sngags/ /rig ba dang ni sman la'o/ /h+ri dya 'tsho ba brgya pa dang/ /snying dga' ba dang snying po la/ /k+Sha ya 'god dang bskal pa'i mdza' 
221b7(mdo 'grel): gnas dang skyes bu'i khyad par la/ /a dya ya ni sun 'byin dang/ /dka' dang rim 'das 'jig pa'i dbyug/ a d+hi Sh+ya ni chugs pa med/ /spungs che/ chu klung khyad par la/ a na ya ni phongs pa dang/ /skal pa lugs dang mi dge'i gnas/ /a pa taM ni/ bu mo gu/ a d+ha
222a1(mdo 'grel): yin 'jigs pa med/ /oM ni phan pa la/ /a b+hi ya ni/ u shI ra/ /a b+hi khyA ni/ snyan dang grags/ /bzang po rnam grags ming rnams la/ /a ba dyaM ni bsad 'os dang/ /don ma yin dang spyo ba la/ /a shwI ya ni rta'i cho ga
222a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rta la phan pa'o a ta lya/ /lha dang dpal mo'i dbye ba dang/ /gau ta ma yi btsun mo'o/ /ma hA rma ni ri dang/ brtan/ /A ti thugs ni shen pa'i bu/ /shen ba la Sho A tre yI/ /me tog can dang rgyan shes bu/ /'bab chu'i khyad par dag la'o/ /A trai yi
222a3(mdo 'grel): thub pa'i dbye/ /A di tya ni nyi? ma lta/ /amna ya ni man ngag thos/ /A sha yin bsam pa dang/ /gzhi rten gzhan la brtan pa'o/ /A sh+ra ya ni bang mdzod dang/ /ma rgas pa dang/ ci 'chad ma'o/ /in+d+ri ya ni sems la ste/ /in+t+ri ya ni yul dbang byed/ /u
222a4(mdo 'grel): da ya ni shar ri 'char/ /u pA ya ni mnyam 'byed sogs/ /thabs dang nye bar bgrod pa la/ /a'ur+NA yu ni ba ldan lug/ la ba skad cig 'jig pa la/ /i N+ya'i lpags/ /dga' ba 'chid ba'i khyad par la/ /aau tsi tyaM ni grol de nyid/ /bden pa
222a5(mdo 'grel): dang ni rung ba la/ /kampa ya ni/ ni ?? pa/ /bcud kyi dbye ba byug pa dang/ /'dod chags yan lag dri bzang ngo dmar/ kA le ya ni lha min dbye/ /kA me yi ni/ dus/ dum bu/ /ku lA ya ni sngon po bzhin/ /'dab chags sngon po dang ni gnas/ /kau kri tya ni rjes su

222a7(mdo 'grel): tsampo ya/ /sh+ya pa ka dang 'jig byed mda'/ /me tog ge sar gser la'o/ /dza g+ha n+yaM ni tha ma smod/ /lhag ma'o/ dza TA yu bya'i dbye/ /gu gul shing ngo ta pa syA/ /tshangs spyod dka' thub skar ma dpo?/ /de ba yu ni chos ldan dang/ /bde ba yA tri ka
222b1(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /dwi tI yA ni ches dbye dang/ /sa le rdzogs par byed pa la'o/ /nA de yI ni/ rgyal ma dang/ /spa yi dzam+bu chu'i lcang ma/ /nI ka ya ni bdag nyid khyim/ /dza bA ni rad+ga ki guShtha/ /chos mthun nges 'bab mtshon cha dang/ /'dus pa dang ni 'dres pa la'o/ /nai pa thyi ni tshos
222b2(mdo 'grel): byed pa/ /rab tu sgrub par byed pa la/ /pa ya sya ni 'o thug dang/ mdog bzang/ 'o ma bzhon ma dang/ /'o ma phan pa'o/ parya dang/ /gnas dang 'brag sgra sgra 'byin la/ /paryA ya ni rnam grangs dang/ /sprul pa rab 'byed mda' la'o/ /sA nI ya ni btung bya chu/ /pA ru Sha ni phur bu la

222b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin ldan pa'o ba la ya/ /gdu bu/ mgul nad kaM ka Na/ /bA le ya ni/ pany+dzi kA/ bong bu/ ba si hi ta pa/ /brahma n+ya ni sa nu dang/ /pri Sha changs pa'i legs pa la/ /brahma N+yaM ni bram ze dang/ /bram ze rnams kyi tshogs pa la/ /b+hu dzi Sh+ya ni grogs ngan dang/ /lag pa'i srang bu'o

222b7(mdo 'grel): lyAM ni gsal ma dang/ me tog brgya pa pri yang gu/ /thur bltas me tog zhi ma dkar/ /dung gi me tog shu thag rnams/ /ma la ya ni yul ri'i dbye/ /kun dga' ra dang ri yi cha/ /dur byed la yang ma la yA/ /mri ga yu na bram zer brjod/ /go ma mu ni nad
223a1(mdo 'grel): dag la/ /ra ha sya ni/ sba bya la/ /ra ha syA ni chu bo'i dbye/ /lo hi tyaM ni dmar po dang/ /'bru dang chu bo'i khyad par la/ /bak+ta bya ni smod dang dman/ /rag las pa'o ma dA tya/ /dag bzang po dang gcod byed dang/ /rnam par rgyal dang rgyal ba'i lam/ /bi dza
223a2(mdo 'grel): ya ni gau rwi dang/ /de'i grogs mo chos dbye la/ /bi na yin dul dang lugs/ /dra ba la'o bi sha lya/ /me yi gtsug pud glang po dang/ /gu DU ci dang dur byid dang/ /zug rngu bral ba la yang ngo/ /pisma ya ni rmad byung snyems/ /bi Sha ya ni spyod yul yul/ /dbang po'i don la'ang nges
223a3(mdo 'grel): par 'jug/ 'brel pa sogs kyi shes pa'ang dran/ /bya bA ya ni rab dga' dang/ /mi snang ba la yang dag dran/ /bya bA yaM ni gzi brjid la/ /shiN+Da yaM ni thub pa'i dbye/ /dpal 'bras dag byad khyad par la/ /shA lyaM yaM ni me tog brgya/ /sha'i skyes pa la yang ngo/ /sh+rIrSha N+ya ni rnam par

223b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i dbye ba la/ /kA tra be ya zha nye dang/ /sha tshe dang ni mtshon dag la/ /u pa kra ya gso sbyang dang/ /rtsom pa dang ni gsod pa la/ /zla ba'i na tshod bla re dang/ /bdag nyid dang ni sman gyi dbye/ /dzA lA sha ya chu mi gzhi/ /dza la sha yaM 'dab bu sbyin/ /taN+Tu li ya byi dang ga'i
223b2(mdo 'grel): shing dang chung ngu mA ri/ la/ gdung ba rtsa dang/ stong pa dang/ /ka ta ka'i 'bras phreng ba yangs/ /d+ha naM dza ya rta dang lus/ /glang po/ rlung me ka ku b+ha/ /ni ra ma ya skyon med rtog/ pa ri bA ma chu yi gnas/ /ni tam+ba dang/ yongs su bkab/ /pAny+tsa dze n+ya/ tri ThI ka sha/ dung dang pA Ta ga la'o//

223b4(mdo 'grel): ya byis pa sprul/ /b+hA ga d+he yaM skal pa dang/ /lag pa dang ni cha la'o/ /b+h+ri tan+d+ri ya byed pa dang/ /sgra dang spyod yul 'dus pa la/ /ma hod yya kun 'byung dang/ /byang grol bu mo rgur mo la/ /ma hA la ma gtsugs lag khang/ /mu stegs khang dang mchog bdag la/ /ma hA mU

223b6(mdo 'grel): brang sya?/ /sa mA ra ya g.yul bgyed dang/ rgud dag phyi ma'i dus dag la/ /sa lang+ga ya sgra dang ming/ /rol rtsed phyugs dang bya dag ya/ /s+thuA lots+tsha ya mdza' dag ni/ /shing dum rdo ba bram tog/ glang po rnams kyi bar ma la/ /a ku to b+ha yaM zhes pa/ /lha khang a

224a1(mdo 'grel): briSha ka bA yI zhes pa/ /dpal mo go rim 'tsho byed ma/ /brgya las mchog tu gyur ma'o/ /pra tyud+gA ma nAM yaM ni/ /nye bar gnas bya sbyangs ba'i gos/ /bi shwa kse na pri yA ni/ /pad+ma ma dang skyob byed ya/ /ya mdza' i sde'o// //

225a6(mdo 'grel): bu la'o/ /tri ra dka' thub 'gram dgos dang ka shar dang nub kyi de dag go/ tI praM shin+tu bod pa dang/ /tshang ba dang ni mig de ldan/ /hI praM dar ba'i rta zer dang/ /dri yi dUrbA dag dang ni/ /'od ma can dang rab skyes la/ /to traM/ 'joms byed skrag dang do pa/
225a7(mdo 'grel): da raM/ ri sul/ cung zad don/ /da pra bung bu rta dag la/ /da ru lha yi shing dang shing/ /dwa raM/ sgo dang/ bas? len la/ /d+hU ra/ rus sbal phyugs dang gsod/ /ras bal d+ha ra 'dzin ma dang/ /snying po'i gzhi dang sa la'o/ /d+hA trI sgyur dang sha ma/ /nye ba'i ma
225b1(mdo 'grel): dang ke ta kI/ /d+hA ra 'dzin ma phun tshogs char/ /dwa na phreng pa/ 'tshe ba rdzas/ /'gro ba rta 'gros lnga pa can/ /ral gri sogs kyi kha dang ni/ /dmag/ rtse mig deng gong bye brag/ yung pa dang ni mtshan mo la/ /d+haM ra mkhas brtan/ yangs dang 'jam/ /d+hI raM gur/ guM na bkra
225b2(mdo 'grel): mi zab mo la'o na tra ni/ /sna yi rtse mo drag po la/ /na ra/ sa dang rgyal ba/ mi/ /mA rA ma dang/ ga pur la/ /nA ra/ rgyud ban chu nA bra/ /mtshan mo'i bdag po'o ni praM ni/ /stobs can dang ni mu khyud dang/ /naM gru dang ni nags tshal la/ /na traM mig dang shing gi rtsa/ /gos dang
225b3(mdo 'grel): yon tan shing rta gar/ /ne rtra dar dang 'dren byed brjod/ /pat+tri lo ma 'dab ma mda'/ /phyogs dang 'dren pa'o pa ra mchog bdag nyid 'di dang/ lkog tu gyur/ /pa raM mi zad 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /pA traM snod dang blon po dang/ /rung dang 'gram gnyis/ /byad par dang/ /blugs bzar
225b4(mdo 'grel): sogs kyi 'dab ma dang/ /phan tshun 'gram gyi khyad par la/ /pA rI sdig srin rdzogs pa dang/ /pAn+ta dang ni/ pA ra ba/ /glang po'i rkang pa'i thag pa la'o/ /pun+ta lha min pur shing dbye/ /pad+ma dkar po dang ni 'bu/ /khra bo dang ni gnas ma dang/ /sa dang tshang la'o/ su raM ni/ /grong khyer skya nar
225b5(mdo 'grel): bu dang khyir/ /steng khyim/ grong dang lus la'o/ /pu ra gu gul pu rA ni/ /sngon dus/ pu ru mtho ris dang/ /mi bdag khyad par pra hya'o/ /pa rA chom rkun pur ni/ /phye ma'i bye brag chu 'bab dang/ /rma ni yang dag 'khrung pa la/ /po traM gos dang gdong gi rtsa/ /phag pa'i mtshul 'ang
225b6(mdo 'grel): da lta bar bya/ /po? ra grong na brjod par byed/ /pau raM rtsa'o/ ba kra ni/ /dal ba la 'gro ba'o ba kraM naM/ /'phar ma'i dbye ba rjod par byed/ /ba kra 'khyogs dang/ bro ba la/ /ba d+h+ru grong dang mig dag la/ /ba d+hu thub pa pra me dang/ /ne'u le/ rkang pe/ rdo rje dang/ /dmar ser dang ni yangs pa la/ /bar bu
225b7(mdo 'grel): ? bdag po dang shilga lha la sogs dang/ bslu/ /yongs su bskor ba la 'gyur ro/ /ba raM gur kuM la 'dod do/ /gtso bo yid kyi khyad par la'ang/ /bi rA 'bras bu gsum dang/ gru/ /ba rI brgya las 'dams pa'o/ /bA ra nyi ma sogs nyin dang/ /sgo dang/ skabs dang/ 'phrogs byed la/ /bA ra shing
226a1(mdo 'grel): sgur chad snod tshogs/ /bA ri glang po'i chings sogs lus/ /bA ri lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /ba ri ngo tsha shes dang chu/ /bA sra nyin mo/ pa saM ni/ /myos byed yan lag bzhi mdo'i laM/ /bI ra shin tu dpa' dang rdzogs/ /bi raM rtsa dang bI raM mi/
226a2(mdo 'grel): chu shing/ gamha rI dang ni/ /tA ma la dang la bA lu/ /k+ShI rI bI dang/ kA ko lI/ /'o ma bdag po bu ldan ma/ /u dum pa ri pa lang lhas/ /'o ma rnam par 'jams pa la/ /brin+ta sbyin byed/ brgya byin sogs/ /'dzoms dang sprin dang sgra rnams la/ /b+ha dra 'grog
226a3(mdo 'grel): byed dga' spyod dang/ /shing dang ma ru ka dand+ha/ /glang po gtso bo legs pa la/ /b+ha draM byed pa'i dbye ba dang/ /bla sgang bde ba gser rnams la/ /b+ha brA 'dor byed/ sman dang phra/ /ma gug pa dang ka Tpha la/ /b+ha ra shin+tu phul byung/ /bur/ /b+ha ru spun zla gser la'o
226a4(mdo 'grel): b+hA ra gsod bral kha lA ni/ /gser dang khri phrag gnyis la'o/ /b+hi ru dbang po/ 'dam pa dang/ /'jigs dang nA si ka'i bye brag/ b+hU ri prA dzya/ gser dang/ tshangs/ /dbang po dang ni dpa' ba la/ /man+t+ra rigs byed khyad par dang/ /gsang ba smra dang
226a5(mdo 'grel): lha sogs sgrub/ /ma ru mya ngam ri skyes la/ /mA traM mdza' dang nges bzung la/ /mA traM yongs su 'gebs dang 'byor/ /nga rgyal nyung dang rna rgyan dang/ /yi ga'i lus so mA ra ni/ /bgegs dang 'chi dang lha pri Sha/ /mA ri gtum po skye ba zad/ /mi tra grogs
226a6(mdo 'grel): po nyi ma la/ /mI ra/ 'od zer/ ri po chu/ /mu ra/ lha min/ gsod pa la/ /yA trA ltar mo 'gro dang 'gro/ /lha yi dga' ston dag la'o/ /rASh+TaM yul skyed pa dag la/ /nu ru ri dags lha min dbye/ /re traM/ /bu ba/ bdud rtsi dang/ /dngul chu gos kyi gnas
226a7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /rod+hwa/ rngon pa'i bu/ lo d+h+raM/ /rgya skyegs/ sdig pa/ sgrub pa bral/ /ro trI gtum mo/ rau twa ni/ /drag po dang ni 'jigs su rung/ /dbang po'i dbye ba dang ni sgo/ /ba kraM badzra rgyud can sman/ /badzra dbyig dang/ rgyags dang ni/ /byis pa dag dang skyu ru ra'o/ nga?
226b1(mdo 'grel): pra pha dang/ 'gram la'o/ /k+She tra yid dang rdul dag la/ /pe raM lus dang/ ba phye rlung/ /bya gra go bzlog yang dag 'khrugs/ /byA g+h+ra gung dang/ ka rany+dza/ /khrag ldan sgo nga'o/ /byA g+h+ri ni/ /reg dang gtso bo gzhan gnas so/ /sha bkra brgya byin/ srid sgrub shing/ /rta tri bde
226b2(mdo 'grel): sogs bdag po sprin/ /ga ru/ rdo rje/ khro bo la/ /tsA ra gzi brjid cher ma la/ /sha daM chu dang gri la'o/ /sastI gri dang mtshon cha lcags/ /sha ra khra bo dang ni rlung/ /shA ri bya dang/ mdog dmar ser/ /'thab dang glang po bgrod pa dang/ /'dogs dang byed ba dag la'o/ /shAtraM
226b3(mdo 'grel): ka dang bstan pa la/ /shi gru som nye ya lag la/ /badzra lus dang snying po la/ /shi g+h+ra myur dang sgrol ba la/ /shu kra pa sangs ma gtso bo/ /shu kraM khu ba mig nad dang/ /dkar po la'o shu b+h+raM sprin/ /sgron me dang ni dkar po'o/ /shu ra mdzes dang dpa' bar bshad/ /slu ra
226b4(mdo 'grel): nyi ma la yang blta/ /sha traM mchod sbyin rtag tu sbyin/ /ke ta ba dang gnas dang nags/ /sa ra do shal ltag pa'i rtse/ /sAM traM 'thug po dang naM sa/ /nags tshal rnams la'o pA raM ni/ /rigs pa chu dang nor la'o/ /sA ra rkang mar cha shas rags/ /pi pra tshad gdung dang ni chu//
226b5(mdo 'grel): pi pra chu klung khyad par la/ /sI ra thong gshol nyin mo'i bdag/ su ra lha'o su rA ni/ /chad dang btung ba snod dag la/ /sU traM mtshon byed dang ni gzhu/ /snal ma dang ni rnam gnas la/ /s+thi raM g.yo med thar pa dang/ /sha la'i 'dab mas la'o/ /spA ra rnam par gtsigs pa dang//
226b6(mdo 'grel): spyi blugs sogs dang chu bur bdag/ sa ra a yig la sogs dang/ /mtho ba sogs dang bar ma sogs/ /sgra med 'jigs dang rlung la'o/ /swa raM rang 'dod dang ni dal/ /sra ru rdo rje mchod sbyin 'dal/ khur ba dang ni dum bu la'o/ /ha ri khyab 'jug yongs dbang dang
226b7(mdo 'grel): zla ba rlung dang dbang po ma/ /gshin rje sprul dang sbal pa spre'u/ /rta dang ne tso 'jig rten dbye/ /dmar ser dang ni 'phrog byed do/ /hA ra ma tig phreng mtshon cha/ /hi sra/ bya rog 'bras bu sha/ hi pra 'joms par byed pa la/ /hI rA pi sI li kA dang/ /dpal dang rdo rje/
227a1(mdo 'grel): bde byed la/ /ho rA ri mo'i bye brag dang/ /bstan bcos dbye ba khyim dang ni/ /dus sbyor phyed pa rnams la'o/ /k+Sha ra sprin dang k+Sha raM chu/ /k+ShA ra 'ching bu thal ba dang/ /bcud dang dan pa lan tshwa la/ /k+Shi raM 'o ma chu dag la/ /k+Shu twa/
227a2(mdo 'grel): chung ngu tha ma dang/ /khro dang ser sna dag la'o/ /k+Shu twA rje rigs ma gar ma/ /lus bral bcud 'joms chen mo'o/ /haM shwa kaN+Ta kA ri dang/ /tsi ge rI/ dang/ makI ka/ k+Shu ra NA si ta phan byed/ bzam dang ni ampar/ /k+She traM lus dang chung ma dang/ /zor ba
227a3(mdo 'grel): grub pa gnas rnams la/ /k+Shau tra 'o ma la yang ngo/ /aM gu ra ni shing sha ba/ /yodka ke dang yang ba'o/ /ad+gu ra ni myu gu dang/ spu dang chu dang khrag la'o/ /aM gA ra ni mi shes dang/ /bkra shis dang ni ma phi pa/ /a dzaM ra ni rlung bud med/ /lus kyi yul
227a4(mdo 'grel): dang da rnga ra/ /aN+Di ra ni skyes bu nus/ /a d+ha ra ni so dang gnas/ /dma' ba dang ni brla med la/ /a d+ha ra ni sa'i bye brag/ mi shes pa dang lhur len la/ /an+ta ri ni khyad par dang/ /khyad par can dang/ go skabs dang/ /bdag dang bdag gi bral ba dang
227a5(mdo 'grel): nang dang phyi dang bar dang mtshams/ /de yi don ched/ skabs bu ga/ /sa pa raM ni dus bab don/ /glang po phyi nas lus la yang/ /a nA tsi dang/ ne tra brjod/ a pa ra ni rga ba dang/ /srid pa ma dang tha mar 'dod/ /a ba raM ni glang po che'i/ /byin
227a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i mdza' dang phyi ma bsal/ /a ra ni lha rus pa/ /bsdus pa rdo rje ljon shing la/ /a mA rA ni dbang po'i grong/ /durbA ka pa gu DU tsi/ /am+ba raM ni gos ras bal/ /nam mkha' chags pa dri bzangs la/ /sgrib byed sgo glegs a ra raM/ /a su ra
227a7(mdo 'grel): ni srin po me/ /lha min nyi ma dag la'o/ /a k+Sha raM ni tshangs pa dang/ /mkha' dang yi ga dag la'o/ /A ka ra ni skye dang gnas/ /des 'bab gtso bo 'dod par bshad/ A kA ra ni zur gyi mtshon/ /dbyibs dang 'bod pa dag la'o/ /A
227b1(mdo 'grel): d+ha ra ni rten gzhi dang/ /gzhi dang chu 'dzin rnams la'o/ /A sA ra ni/ rab 'byams dang/ /'dzin ma dang ni char pa dang/ /mdza' bshes dang ni stobs la'o/ /aM ku raM ni rab rim dang/ /'khrugs dang rang stobs legs pa la/ /A hA ra ni bza' ba dang/ /za ba 'phrog dang
227b2(mdo 'grel): sdud pa la/ /i ta ra ni/ sA ma ra/ /gzhan dang grub dang nad med myur/ /i twa ra ni rwa 'bigs dang/ /dma' ba/ lam pa 'khrug pa'i las/ /i shwa ra ni nor phun tshogs/ /zhi ba/ rje bo/ yid srub la/ /a'i sh+ra rI ni rdza mo dang/ /dkar mo dbang mo skems byed ma
227b3(mdo 'grel): at+ta ra ni tshig tha dad/ /rgyal po'i sras dag la yang ngo/ /ut+ta ra ni byang dang steng/ /phyi ma dang ni bla ma'o/ /ud ra ni lto ba dang 'thab dang ngos 'dzin spyod skad cig/ u dA ra ni gcod byed la/ /chen po yon gnas rigs pa la/ /anda rA ni
227b4(mdo 'grel): sa gzhi dang/ /lo tho thams cad za ba la/ /chu rgyun/ dus mchod rik+Sha raM/ aau shI raM ni rtse gcig dang/ /tA na gcig dang ma 'khrugs pa/ /rnga yab yu ba gcig brjod dang/ /mal stan dag la'o/ /kats+tshu raM/ /sA ma na dang g.yo ba'o/ kats+tshu rA ni ngan pa rnyed
227b5(mdo 'grel): da na? reg/ rtse mo/ shim+bi dang/ /sa rI 'o kany+dza ra ni sgra/ /nyi ma tshangs pa thub pa lto/ /ka Twa raM ni 'khor lo 'dod/ /smad pa'o de nas ka Twa sru/ /ram+baM shI pa mig sbyin dang/ /'den bral dang ni lang tsho can/ /ka Ti traM ni skyed gos dang/ /gser can pags pa'i yan lag la/ /ka
227b6(mdo 'grel): rA ra ni dmar ser dang/ /'bangs dang dmar ser mdog dag la/ /ka Ne ru ni dong ka dang/ glang mo dang ni 'jug pa la/ /ga Ne ru yang de nyid la/ /ka dar ni seng ldeng gi/ bye brag sogs le nad dag la/ /sh+ri Na/ ri sul kanda ra/ /kanda ra dang/ kand+hA rA/ sprin dang mgrin
227b7(mdo 'grel): pa dag la'o/ /ku ra ri ni bya dbye khyi/ /sog la long ba/ ka rI ra/ /'od ma'i myu gu bum pa dang/ /shing gi dbye ba la yang ngo/ /ka ba rI ni skra'i bkod ba/ /yal ga'i dbye ba la yang ngo/ /ka ba raM ni lan tshwa dang/ /skyur dang gser dang ngas yug la/ /ka po ran ni khungs
228a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mtshon cha'i bye brag gzhong ba la/ /karka rI ni ga lan+ti/ /srin bu me long brtan pa la/ /ka rI rI ni sbrang chung dang/ /so yi rtsa ba glang po che/ /karbu ra ni srin po dang/ /sdig pa chung dang/ gser la'o/ /karbu rA ni nag/ po'i tshogs
228a2(mdo 'grel): karbu ra ni khraM bo la/ /karbu rA ni ce sbyang la/ /karbu raM ni stag la'o/ /ka la tri ni yang yang za/ /bgrod dka' i gnas dang chung ma sked/ /kAn+t+ra ra ni nyer 'tshe sogs/ /mdzod dang byed pa'i khyad par la/ /kAn+tA raM ni bgrod dka' i laM/ /dkon pa chen po la yang ngo/ /kA be
228a3(mdo 'grel): re ni chu klung dbye/ /yung ba lta ba/ bud med do/ /kAsmI raM ni gur kuM la'o/ /tsi ku ra ni g.yo ba 'ong/ /khyim dang yangs pa lag 'gro dang/ /ri byi shing gi khyad par la/ /tshi twa raM ni gcod byed rdzas/ /ngan pa dang ni sdang ba la/ /tshi di ra ni snang ba che/ /pa pa sh+gud+ha dang ral
228a4(mdo 'grel): gi/ /thag pa la'o dza Tha raM/ /lto ba/ sra ba bcings pa la/ /dzi bi rang bzhin/ dzam+bi ri'i/ /shing dang bre dang me tog dag/ dza rdza ra ni rnying ba dang/ /h+rul po gnas kyi rgyal mtshon la/ /dza len+t+ra ni chu lha dang/ /rgya mtsho dang ni rmugs 'dzin dang/ /dza su ri ni rdo rje thog dzhardzha
228a5(mdo 'grel): ri? ni rtsod pa'i dus/ /rol mo'i dbye ba shing khyad par/ /dzha la rI ni sil khrol dang/ /bcings dang rol mo hu Dug/ byis pa 'khor lo 'dzin la'o/ /Ta ga ra ni/ TaM gaN+Da/ /Tai ra dang ni/ ku re dang/ /rnam par 'khor ba spyod yul la/ /TaM kA ra ni siM dza nI/ /sgra dang rab
228a6(mdo 'grel): grags ngo mtshar la/ /brid+gi ra ni dor bya la/ /tiM ga ra ni skyug pa dang/ /TaTTha rI ni 'byang ba dang/ /dmag rnga/ rol mo brdzun smra la/ /ta mi praM ni rab rib khro/ /ta mi sh+rA ni/ mun mtshan mo/ /mun pa bstod pa'o/ tit+ti ri/ /byi'u dang ni thub pa la/ /ti mi raM ni mun tshub
228a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mun pa dang ni thibs po dang/ /sred pa dang ni sprin nag la'o/ /tam+bu tI ni shu lI dang/ /A DU/ dpal yon dag la'o/ /tu ShA rang bzhin kha pa'i dbye/ /bsil bar byed pa dag la'o/ /b+hU pa ra ni bska ba dang/ /rwa dang khyu mchog smra ra mi/ /twa kyan+t+rA ni lag
228b1(mdo 'grel): pa tsa na/ /ta kyan+ta ni yan lag mchog/ daN+DA ra ni rdza mkhan gyi/ /'khor lo 'dren dang glang bo myos/ /mda'i 'khrul 'khor dag la'o/ /dan+tu ra ni mi mnyam dang/ /mtho dman can gyi so dag la/ /da ha ra ni/ rdzun can dang/ /no bo dang ni nag po can/ /darta ra ni ri yi dbye//
228b2(mdo 'grel): cung zad zhig pa brjod par byed/ /dardu ra ni sAl pa dang/ /ma la ya dang sil snyan dang/ /b+haM dra ri yi dbye ba la/ /da ru rA ni dbyig dang shel/ /grong gi dra pa/ durdu ra/ /dA ser ni 'bangs 'os bu/ /durdu raM ni gzung dka' dang/ /khyu mchog sman dang/ lha min sogs/ /sum rtsen/ khyab

228b5(mdo 'grel): ga dang rgas 'dor dang/ ta la'i 'dab dang gu TA tsi/ /nirbar ni 'dzem med dang/ /'jigs med/ snying po mkhregs? pa la/ /niSh+Thu ra ni 'dzem med sra/ /nI bar ni chod pa dang/ /dngos po can no bu ku ra/ /zaM pa them skas/ chu ba la dang/ /chu yi sgur 'khyog dag la'o/ /yuM dza ra ni lus la ste
228b6(mdo 'grel): pany+dza raM ne bya yi snod/ /pa dA ra ni rkang pa'i rdul/ /rkang par gos pa rnams la'o/ /pa bi traM ni/ zangs dang chu/ /chos ldan dang ni gtsang byed dang/ /gtsang ma la'o/ ba TI ra/ /zor ba dang ni rtsa ba rtsan/ /mchil pa 'od ma rdul snying spyod/ /pA nu raM ni kha dog dang/ /ma ru ba kaM de
228b7(mdo 'grel): ldan la/ /sA ma ra na dman dang rmongs/ /mkha' la gnas pa la yang ngo/ /parpa ra ni rgyal po yi/ /mchod sbyin 'jigs dang zan snyigs la/ /pirp+pa ni thal pa dang/ /mI tra ral pa/ ni pa ka/ mnga' rnams la'o pany+dzi raM/ /gser dang ser po rta'i khyad par/ /pi Tha ra ni snas 
229a1(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /pi Tha raM ni bsrub pa dang/ /mu sta'o/ paN+DI ra zhes pa/ /ma he skyong dang yal ga 'dor/ /pI bar ni rus spal rgya ba/ /puSh+ka raM ni mkha' dang chu/ /glang po/ lag rtse/ pad+ma dang/ /chags pa mtshon dang sa dang sman/ /gling dang 'gram gyi
229a2(mdo 'grel): dbye ba dang/ /mtsho mda' ral gri 'bras bu dang/ /rol mo snod dang/ kha rnams la'o/ /pra ka ra ni/ ku rum+bba?/ /rab bkraM me tog la sogs la/ /pra ka raM ni/ dzedga ka/ shes bya'o pra ka rI zhes pa/ /bzhi mdo dang ni nags tshal la/ /pra kA ra ni 'dra ba dbye/ /pra
229a3(mdo 'grel): kha ra ni shin tu rtsub/ /rta la sogs dang go cha dang/ /dre'u dang ni khyi la'o/ /pra da ra ni nad dbye ba dang/ /sha ra b+ha dang/ glu dag la/ /prAn+ta ram ni ring dang gtong/ /lam dang nags tshal bas mdza' la/ /ba ba rang ni rgyud dang rigs/ /pra ba ra ni mchog la'o/ /bra

229a5(mdo 'grel): rA ni e la'i 'dab/ /khyab 'jug gnon dang sman la'o/ /band+hu ra ni 'ching ba dang/ /dga' dang so sor 'chid ba la/ /ba d+hu rA ni mkha' 'gro la/ /dang pa dang ni bud med mchog/ ba ra tA na mtshan khung dang/ /'jug pa tsam la'o barba ra/ /skra'i bkod par

229a7(mdo 'grel): mchog bud med/ /de ni ri dags ro'i dbye ba/ /b+hA ska ra ni nyi ma me/ /d+h+ri gA ri ni bung ba la/ /b+h+ri ga rin gser spyi blugs/ /'dod can bung ba b+h+ru ra'o/ rdo ba sbrang bu b+hA ma ra/ /ma ka ra ni mi la 'dzin/ /gter dang khyim gyi rab dbye la/ /bas kur
229b1(mdo 'grel): ni mu ku ra/ /me long ba kur yi shing/ /sdong bu me tog ku lA la'i/ /bal+la ka'o/ many+dza rI/ /snye ma mu tig spom po dang/ /ti la ga yi ljon shing la/ /ma tsha ra ni dge dang sdang/ /lam dang 'thab mo'o matsha rA/ /ser sna dang ni sbrang bu la/ /na dA ra ni sind+hu pa/ /ngan pa la'o
229b2(mdo 'grel): ma d+d+hu tra/ /bung ba dang ni 'od ldan la/ /ma d+hu ra ni ma sha ste/ /ma d+hu raM ni dug bye brag /ma d+hu ra ni bcud phra mo/ /mi dga' ba'o ma d+hu rA/ /sbrang gi sbal mo me tog brgya/ /grong gi dbye ba dag la'o/ /de bzhin sprang ldan shing dang naM/ /nistre yA dang/ tshim bu la'o//
229b3(mdo 'grel): man+tha ra ni mtshon byed dang/ /mdzod dang srub par byed pa la/ /man+tha raM ni le brgan rtsi/ /man+tha ra ni myas byed dang/ /'khor lo dang ni yangs ba la/ /manda ra ni mtho ris dang/ /mandA ra dang srub byed ri/ /manda ra ni dal dang 'bras/ /manda raM ni grong khyer dang//
229b4(mdo 'grel): khang pa'o manda ra zhes pa/ /chu sring gnas la'o mandA ra/ /lha shing yongs bzangs/ /arka'i 'dab/ /mi du rA ni rta'i ra ba/ nye ba'i don can dngos po la/ /ma yU ra ni gtsug bud ldan/ /marma ra ni gos sga med/ /lo ma sgra mang gos kyi dbye/ /ma rma rI ni shing
229b5(mdo 'grel): sor bo/ /ma sU ra ni sran chung dang/ /mtshungs pa dang ni bud med do/ /ma hi ra na tha snyad rgan/ /mahen+d+ra ni gnas dang ri/ /ma tha ra ni nyi ma yi/ /'od skor dang ni bya'i bye brag /mAny+dzA rA ni byi la dang/ /khabdza sha'o mu di ra/ /'od ldan dang ni sprin la'o/ /mung+ga rin bong pa
229b6(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /'joms dang thabs min me tog dbye/ /mur mu ra ni nyi ma ta/ /pa mo med dang zhi gnas la/ /mu hi ra ni rgyags dang rmongs/ /ru d+hi ra ni gur kuM khrab/ /du d+hi ra ni sra dga' byed/ /ba Tha ra ni sra ba dang/ /g.yo ba paSh+Ta dag la'o/ /bak+ka ra ni gzhon pa
229b7(mdo 'grel): lug /bal+lu ra ni sha skaM sha mche ba can no bal+lu raM/ /nags kyi zhing dang 'bab pa la/ /bal+la rI ni snyem dang/ /sha skam la'o bal+la ra/ /ne'u sid dang ni chu med gnas/ /tsi lu'i zhing dang sman ljongs la/ /pa shi raM ni rgya mtsho'i tsha/ /b+ha ga NaM d+ha ka dang ni/ /ki Ni
230a1(mdo 'grel): hI'o barda raM/ /chu dang g.yas 'khyil dung la'o/ /guny+dza dmar po'i sa bon dang/ /'bu skyes la yang blta bar byi/ /ba sa ru ni bdug pa dang/ /bya yi gnas dang khyim bum pa'o/ /bi kA ra ni mi sdug nad/ /rnam par 'joms dang 'joms byed sgra/ /?
230a2(mdo 'grel): du ra ni paN+Di ta/ /Shi lga ko ra bA na'o/ /bi d+hu ri ni so sor 'gro/ /phral ba dang ni ma tshang ba/ /bi du rin bcud len la/ /bI ba ra ni khung bu ga/ 'jug pa rwa dang dong la'o/ /bi sa ra ni rab 'byams 'gro/ /basti ra ni rgya che spros/ /yangs pa'i bstrI ra zhes pa/ /lo 'dab
230a3(mdo 'grel): rgya chen khobs pa'o/ /biSh+Ta ra ni ku sha'i khres/ /stan dang sal skyes pa'o/ /bi hA ra ni 'khor ba dang/ /phung po bde gshegs rol ba'i gnas/ /sha kA rI ni sdeb sbyor dbye/ /chu bo'i dbye ba ska rags la/ /sha shA raM ni chung bus sgang/ /durdu rI ni 'grom la'o/ /shaM ka
230a4(mdo 'grel): daM ni ri sras ma/ /mgon mo dge ba byed pa'o/ /sharka rA ni gseg ma dang/ /ldan pa'i yul dang ras bal can/ /bur ma/ dub bu/ rnam 'gyur dang/ /rdo ba mdzes pa'i dbye ba la/ /sarba rI ni thun gsum ma/ /yung ba dang ni bud med la'o/ /sha wa ra ni kla klo'i
230a5(mdo 'grel): dbye/ /bde byed dang ni chu la'o/ /sha kA ra ni glang la ste/ /shA kA raM naM sdebs sbyor dbye/ /shAM ka ri ni bgegs kyi bdag/ skems byed la'o shA rI ra/ /lus skyas dang ni glang la'o/ /'o ma'i spu bsha rkang/ /'joms byed mun nag sharba daM/ /shA lA raM ni

230a7(mdo 'grel): mdza' rnams la/ se 'bru sman pa'i sa bon dang/ nor bu can dang mdza' dag la'ang/ /shi linda ni nya'i dbye dang/ /shing gi dbye ba dag la'o/ /shI lIn+t+raM ni ka ra ke/ dngos po'i me tog grong gsum pa'o/ /shI lIn+d+ri ni bya mo'i dbye/ /rkang rings dang
230b1(mdo 'grel): ni sa la'a/ /shi shi ra ? dus las te/ /ba mo can dang 'khyags pa la'o/ /shI ka ra ni khra bo dang/ /rlung dang 'gro med/ chu can la'o/ /shu Shi ram ni khung bu can/ /nI gna dang ni/ bu ga can/ /sh+rIM gA ra ni rab dga' dang/ /gar gyi nyams dang glang po'i rgyan/ /priM gA raM ni
230b2(mdo 'grel): phye ma dang/ /sindu ra dang laM shi yi/ /me tog la ni 'jug par 'dod/ /shwa shur ni khyo shugs gnas/ /shwa shu rA ni tshangs ldan sman/ /saM ka ra ni me de byes/ /kun nas byi dor bral/ /mi sun 'brin pa'i bu mo la/ /sa kA ra ni zhes 'ga' zhig 'dod/ /saM
230b3(mdo 'grel): gar ni mdangs dam bca' / /bya ba'i rnam pa dug dang phongs/ /saM ga raM ni/ bgrod bya 'bras/ /se b+hA ra ni bsags dang tshogs/ /am+ba ra ni ri dags dang/ /sa 'dzin lha min nya dang ni/ /rgyal ba'i khyad par dag la'o/ /saM ba raM ni chu dang ni/ /sangs rgyas pa yi

230b7(mdo 'grel): a nut+ta ra gtso bo dang/ /so so'i tshig ni rnams sangs la/ /a gro pa ni byang phyogs dang/ /go bzlog pa dang bla na med pa a ti sar bcings dang 'khrug/ rang stobs dang ni 'jigs bcas la/ /a b+hi hA ra mngon sbyor dang/ /chom rkun dang ni bzos

231b6(mdo 'grel): mchog /da sha pur yul dang grong/ /ba lang gi ni sgra dag la'o/ /ri gampa ra zad byed pa/ /gtser bu/ mun pa mdung can no/ /du ro da raM tha snyad dang/ /cho lo rgyan po 'gyed pa la/ /de ha yA tra/ gnom lcags 'chi/ /de ma tu ra glang po'i gdong/ /sems
231b7(mdo 'grel): can rgan po'o de nas ni/ /d+ha ra b+ha ra ri khyab 'jug /pA ra d+ha ra chu'i bzhon pa/ /ral gri'o d+ha ri ku raM ni/ /ka ra kA dang pI ka ra/ /shI ra'o d+hA rtu raSh+Ta na/ /mchu rkang nag po'i dang ba dang/ /ko ra ba dang sprul ba la yang/ /d+hu raM d+ha ra zhes pa ni/ /d+ha ba'i shing dang d+hUrba ha/ /d+hUn?
232a1(mdo 'grel): ma ra brgya byin dang/ /tshig bsrung khyim dang du ba dang/ /rkang pa ldan pa rnams la'o/ /d+hi ta rASh+Ta ma can dang/ /bya yi bye brag rgyal po bzang/ /d+h+ri ta rASh+Ti ngang pa dang/ /gnas rnams dang ni sman la yang/ /na b+haShtsa ra sprin dang rlung

233a7(mdo 'grel): pa bsam pa yang/ /a lu ga ya ni ka'o/ /b+he la ka kaM nga la'o/ /i lA ba lang sa bdud rtsi/ /dbyangs can zla ba bud med la/ /Do la 'ded da 'di 'gro ba la/ /ka la snyan dang gsal ba'i sgra/ /ma rnyings cha dang dkar ba la/ /ke lA

233b7(mdo 'grel): 'degs dang/ zol? dang g.yo/ /Di? laM chu mer/ chu/ 'khyil/ 'khyogs/ dzA laM/ ko ra kA/ dra mig /dam+b+ha/ priNda dag la'o/ /dzA li khebs kyi dra ba dang/ /nye ba'i dra ba shing dag la/ /dzhA l+la/ tshad gdung rlabs lu mo/ /'jigs pa'o dzha l+lI tshad pa'i? nad/  
234a1(mdo 'grel): dzhi ru ka dang/ 'jug dang/ nyal/ /ta la rol mo ta laM ni/ /ral gri'i chang bzung 'joms byed gang/ /nags dang byi'u dbyangs chu 'dzi/ /tal+lI bye ma ta lu khung/ /to lA shing gi khyad par dang/ /mthe bong/ gung mo dag la 'dod/ /tA saM dbyangs
234a2(mdo 'grel): kyi bya dus chad/ /ral gri sogs kyi chad zung dang/ /khar ba las bkod rol mo yi/ /snod kyi khyad par dag dang ni/ /lag pa'i 'bras bu lag mthil dang/ /tA saM dang ni bab la'i tshogs/ /tu lA khyim dang srad brgyad dang/ /'jal byed ched
234a3(mdo 'grel): kyi dbye ba dang/ /'ching ba 'dzin byed mi bzad pa/ khri'u dang ni snod la'o/ /tU la 'jam po/ rtsa dang ni/ /nam mkha' tshangs pa'i shing la'o/ /da laM rdzas dang/ grib ma dang/ /mtshon cha 'dab ma dum bu min/ /da li 'dab ldan dbye ba'o/ /du li ka ma bI
234a4(mdo 'grel): la'o/ /do lA theg pa'i khyad par dang/ /rams la/ 'o /d+hU li rdul dang ni/ /tshad kyi khyad par dag la'o/ /na la/ po Ta ga la dang/ /rgyal po can dang/ sI sa dang/ /pi dU di ba ta la'o/ /na lI ldong ros grib ma la/ /na laM mtsho skyes pad spod la/ /ne lA nA lA
234a5(mdo 'grel): nI lI rnams/ /yal ga ka DaM pa ka /la/ /nA lA btung bar byed sogs don/ /gur la'o nI la mdog nag dang/ /spre'u'i dbang phyug ri yi bye brag /nag po'o/ nI lI shing mtshan dbye/ /pa laM mI pa/ bdag nyid la/ /ba lU sbom po ku su ma//
234a6(mdo 'grel): khang chung 'khor lo'i grong la'o/ /sA li/ gral dang/ phyogs re dang/ /g.yangs sa'o/ ka luM 'khri shing rtse/ /che shas shig dang sma ra la'o/ /sa lU skyur dang mtshan ma la/ /kli lu 'khrus la'o/ pI lu ni/ /shing dang/ glang po me tog dang/ /mnga' dang
234a7(mdo 'grel): tA la rus dum la/ /bu la don tsam thal mo yangs/ /pha laM lo thog rgyus bskrun dang/ /'bras bu rnam skyed/ rnyad pa dang/ /dzA ti pha la pak+ka la/ /tshol par byed pa'i phud la yang/ /'bras gsum/ 'bras ldan/ 'bras bu can/ /phA laM snying po'i
234b1(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten dang/ /ras bal sogs dang gos dang ni/ /stobs ldan gshol ldan lha min dang/ /lus dang bya rog/ gtong ldan la/ /ba laM/ dri ro dmag dang ni/ /mthu dang/ rags pa gzugs dga' la/ /pa lA pa Tya la kar brjod/ /ba laM lta min khyad pa
234b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /rnga la pa so dang/ 'od zar dang/ /rnag dang/ phan pa rgya mtsho skyes/ /rga ba/ bshad lo/ pa ba/ sa ba dang/ /lta ba bcom pa khyad par dang/ /khyim/ dang shing gi khyad par la/ /bal+lI/ dza mo bA dang ni/ /ta tA me tog khyad par la/ /bA la byis pa skra dang/ rta/ /glang po
234b3(mdo 'grel): che dang mgo po la/ /bA li/ rmongs dang/ byis pa khrel/ /bi laM phug dang bu ga dang/ /bud dang/ changs dang/ khyim la'o/ /pai lA/ dus dang/ mtshams dang ni/ /dbang phyug rnams kyi ston me dang/ /so yi rnyil dang 'o ma'i dkris/ /chu gter dang ni de yi chu/ /nyon mongs
234b4(mdo 'grel): yod par shi ba dang/ /chags dang tshig dang/ blo rnan so/ /b+hal+la mda' dang dom la'o/ /b+hal+lI b+hal+lA ta dang mnga' / /b+hA laM dpral ba nyin mo'o/ /b+ha laM 'jigs dag snying dang ni/ /smyung ba'i bye brag rgyal tshul byed la'o/ b+he la dri ma bshad 'bu sdig/ mal+la kun tu ser sna
234b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /snod dang thod pa can la'o/ /mA lu nya'i dbye ba la Ti/ /bu dang/ 'khri shing dag la'o/ /ma laM zhing dang chu la'o/ /mA la me tog tshun pa phrad/ /mU laM dang po rtsa ba dang/ /rgyu skar/ glang po la logs dag la/ /mau lI 'dus dang/ 'dres pa dang/ /chos ldan dang ni

234b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i so can la/ /sha la/ shal+la ka'i lo ma/ /bud ba'i tshogs kyi bya ba las shA la nya yi khyad par dang/ /shing dang spyi dang 'bras dang za/ /shA lA khyim dang khang pa dang/ /phyogs gcig skems byed yal ga la/ /shA lu ga ti/ chom rkun sman/ /shA li dri
235a1(mdo 'grel): dang byi la dang/ /'bras bu la sogs rnams la'o/ /shi lA/ chu klung/ chung ngu dang/ /rdo ba/ mi bzad 'khor lo 'dzin/ /shi laM ma tho pa/ rdo ba la/ /shi li'i srog chags mangs la/ /shI laM rab+hi dpyod pa mchog/ khu ba/ dkar po rnal 'byor la/ /shukAM
235a2(mdo 'grel): gzugs can dkar po dang/ /yon tan ldan pa nyid la'o/ /shU laM shi dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ /rnal 'byor dang ni nang la'o/ /shU lA tshod zod yo Sha dang/ /lta ba 'jigs dang/ phur bu la/ /shai la ri bo shai laM ni/ /ri skyes bya khyung ri bong can/ /shA la sa shing
235a3(mdo 'grel): spos dkar shing/ /s+tha la snod kyi dbye ba la/ /s+thA lI/ skya nar nam mkha' dang/ /s+thA la/ sbom rtsegs shes rab dman/ /hA lA chad dag mi yi bdag/ ha la ku re brnyas dang/ sgeg/ aM gu li ni glang po che/ /rna rgyan lag pa'i yal ga'o/ /a tsa la ni ri phur bu
235a4(mdo 'grel): g.yo med a tsa lAM ni sa/ any+dza li ni ku ta pa/ /lag pa kha sbyar thal mo la/ /a na la ni nor lha me/ /a ni la ni nor dang rlung/ /a be la ni go la'i phye/ /a ma lA ni pad+ma la/ /a ma laM ni rnam 'jig dang/ /sprin la'o a rA la zhes pa/ /thang chu/ glang chen
235a5(mdo 'grel): myos dang/ 'khyog/ a ku laM ni/ a ka ka'i/ /gos dang/ dbyug ba'i rna can la/ a b+hI laM ni 'jig rung gnas/ /su lU lAM rigs kyi ma/ /mgo dang spyi bos sgrol ba la/ /i twa la ni nya dang ni/ /lha min rab dbye sgeg dang 'bar/ /udzdza la ni 'bar gsal
235a6(mdo 'grel): rgyas/ /ut+tA? ni spre'u dang/ /gtso bo rnam gyur steng du 'gro/ utpal laM ni utpal dang/ /ru rta dang ni sha med la/ /utpu l+la ni bud med kyi/ byed pa kha bye steng 'gro la/ /un+nA la ni 'phags pa dang/ /gtso bo steng du 'gro ba la/ /u pa lA ni gseg
235a7(mdo 'grel): ma dang/ /rdo ba/ shag ma/ rin chen la/ /ka ta lI ni ba dan dang/ /b+ha pa tA kA ri dags dbye/ /rtsom byed chu shing/ 'dri byed dang/ DaM sbyaM dang ni shAlma lI'o/ /ganda laM ni nyer chags dang/ /myu gu sar dang thod pa la'o/ /ka dA lI ni sgra snyan dang/ /ljon

235b3(mdo 'grel): can/ /gtsigs pa 'bad pa til mar la/ /kal+lo la ni/ ul+lo la/ /rab tu dga' dang lam la'o/ /kA ko la ni/ lung pa yi/ /bya rog rdza'i dbye/ rdza mkhan la/ /kA kI la ni cha shas 'tsho/ /'dod pas rtsen dang/ pra NA la/ /brtan bral yid 'phrog shing grib don//
235b4(mdo 'grel): kA mA lA ni 'dod ldan dang/ /'dod chags dbye ba mya ngan can/ /kArha li ni gzhon nu ma/ /ko ha lAM ni nges dang skraM/ /kA ha lA ni sil snyan gyi/ /snod kyi khyad par dag la'o/ /kA ha la ni ngan pa la'o/ /kaTTi la ni zangs bum dang/ /lcags kyi tshogs la yang brjod do/ /kI lA
235b5(mdo 'grel): laM ni khrag dang chu/ /ku tU laM ni phur bu 'dris/ g.yang sa dang ni bur ma'i me/ /ku tsi lA ni rnam phub/ /gos ngan dri ma ldan gos la/ /ku Ti le min gser ldan 'khyog /ku Ti lA ni 'bab chu'i dbye/ /kuN+Da laM ni rna rgyan dang/ /de bzhin gdu bu sra ya bdag/ gser

236a1(mdo 'grel): nams dang ni bslab pa la/ /ke ba la ni gcig byas dang/ /'ba' zhig pa dang ku ha na/ /ke ba laM ni gtan phan dang/ /ye shes dbye ba dag la'o/ /kai pi la ni shing dang skya/ /ko ra re ka ke ma'o/ /ko ma la ni 'jam dang
236a2(mdo 'grel): chu/ ko ha la ni thub pa chad/ /gand+ho lI ni ba ra TA/ /bzang po'i gnas so ga ra laM/ /dug dang nga rgyal rtswa dang ni/ /bu la ka'o go ki la/ /kha 'dzin snying po ba lang skyong/ /nye ba'i sa skyong dag la'o/ /gau ri la ni lcags phye dang/ /gai ra
236a3(mdo 'grel): la dang yungs kar dkar/ /gran+thi la ni smyug ma dang/ /bi kangka ta/ sa dyan+thi/ /tsany+tsa la ni/ glog dpal mo/ tsany+tsa la g.yo 'dod ldan la/ tsa twA la rlung/ snying po la/ /rmongs dang sbyin sreg thab la'o/ /tsandi la ni/ zla ba min/ /tsa pa la ni skad

236a5(mdo 'grel): rgan po dang ni byis pa la/ /ts+tsha ga la ni tam ta/ /da dang sngon po'i gos la'o/ /dza ga la ni da da ka/ chang dang/ dang byed/ myos byed shing/ /dza ga la ni chu med pa'i/ /yul dang/ dgon dung sa la'o/ /dza Ti la ni ral pa ldan/ /ral pa bdud 'gro
236a6(mdo 'grel): 'dzin dang/ spang spos sman/ /dzam+b+ha la ni dzam+b+hi ra/ /lha yi khyad par la yang ngo/ /dzam+buA? la ni shing dzam+bu'i/ /yal 'dab dang ni 'dab mas khebs/ /dzam+b+ha la ni chu bal dang/ /'dam la'o/ de nas dzA ga la/ ka piny+dza la'o dzaM guny+tsi?
236a7(mdo 'grel): dzad+ga la las skyes pa dang/ /rtse mo dang ni shim+b+ha dang/ /dug gi sman pa'o dzaM ga laM/ /dwa ba can dang 'bras bu'o/ /taN+Du la ni 'bras so ba/ 2/ sogs tshogs dang bid+ga ka/ tu mu la ni byangs pa dang/ /rtsod pa'i shing do te ti la/ /gaN+Da ka? dang
236b1(mdo 'grel): byed ba'i dbye/ /du kU laM ni phyed pa dang/ /zar ma'i ras dang gos phra mo/ /d+ha ba la ni mdzes dang dkar/ /ma hA bri Sha dag la'o/ /d+ha ba lI ni dri bzang skyes/ /na ku la ni skyab seng bu'i/ /bye brag dang ni bse mo'o/ /na ku lI ni bya dgag dang/ /spang spos dang ni sman la'o
236b2(mdo 'grel): nA ku li ni bya ga ga mi/ /rtsa ba/ rtsa bya ra swa'o?/ nA b+hI laM ni lte ba yi/ /snying po'i gnas dang ? 236b4(mdo 'grel): dbye dang/ /'od ldan ma dang bgo pa la/ /ba la lam ni til gyi dbye/ /sha dang 'dam dang srin po la/ pA ka laM ni du rta sman/ sA ma laM ni/ chu ngan rig/ brtsegs pa sngon ma yang de nyid/ /pA ka li ni sa rtsis pa?/ pA lA ni gnod byed rdzas/ sred byed la'o

236b7(mdo 'grel): pits+tsha lI ni shAt+ma? li/ /rgya mtsho'i dbye ba shing sha pa'o/ rkang ster?/ chu med/ pits+tsha la/ kuny+dza laM ni sha yi bu/ /piny+dza laM ni gnod pa la/ pit+ta laM ni gzi brjid skyes rdzas !dang 'khris pa ldan pa la/ /pit+ta lI chu pap+pi lI/ pap+pi la ni/ byang chub shing/

238a6(mdo 'grel): smin pa la/ /ka la ka lu ko lA ha la/ /de bzhin sardza na sa la'o/ /ku'rU ha laM mchan mkhan mtshon/ /kha ta mA la/ du ba sprin/ /gaN+Da shai mar smin pa/ /s+thu lo pa la/ /thod pa la/ gand+ha pha lI 'bras can dang/ /tsampa ka'i ko ra ka'o/ /rak+ta
238a7(mdo 'grel): bA la ri'i dbye ba/ /tsa kra ba laM 'khor yug pa'o/ /dza lAM tsa laM chu ba la dang/ /chu la nges par 'gro ba la/ /da mA ma laM ma ru ka /'dul bar byed pa la yang ngo/ /d+hwa ni nA lA/ pi wang dang/ /gling bu ko ha la dag go /pa ri ma la rnam nyed dri/ /'phrog byed
238b1(mdo 'grel): ba kra ba dag la'o/ /sa munmI la dag 'joms dang/ /yan lag chags sogs dri zhim la/ /sI tha ke li khri'u nyed/ /byed ba can dang mig zur la/ /dka' bas bgrod dang chu 'bab dang/ /rkang pas mngon par rgyug pa'ang/ /Sho Da ga la ga?
238b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /spubs dang nya'i khyad par la/ /ba hu pa lA dri ma dang/ /bdag byed dang ni 'o ma la/ /bri han+na la skra chas dang/ /ma hA po Ta ga la'ang/ /b+ha tra kA li/ ri sras la/ /gand+ho lI dang sman dbye la/ /b+hasma tu'laM kha pa'i rdul/ /char dang grong gi kunda la/ /ma Ni
238b3(mdo 'grel): lA lA btsun mo dang/ /rgyu skar bcu ba/ 'phrog byed la/ /ma da ka la glang po myos/ /dregs dang mi gsal brjod pa la/ /ma hA kA la lha chen po/ /kimpa ka dang rab 'joms byed/ /ma hA nI la/ klu'i bye brag /ba mA kA ra nor bu'i dbye/ /ma hA ba la
238b4(mdo 'grel): sI sha ka /dar mi'i stobs la brjod par bya/ /ma hA ba lA ba lang rdzi/ /'bras la'o/ mak+tA pha laM ni/ /mu tig ga bur/ ba li'i 'bras/ /mri tyu pha li'i Arka'i 'dab/ /dus chen po yi shing la'o/ /ba hu pha la/ be NI dang/ /dug mo nyungs dang spang spos
238b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /ra dza swa la bud med la/ /ra dza swa lA rdul ldan ma/ /ba ta ki li/ ka lA lA sa/ /gyol po rnams kyi dbyug dum la/ /ba ta pha laM brgya byin gzhu/ /dro ba'i chags pa la yang ngo/ /ma tsi ki la/ mal+li'i dbye/ /'dul bar byad pa la yang ngo/ /sa dA
238b6(mdo 'grel): pa la pe ta'i shing/ /u dum+ba ra 'bras bu'i phud/ /ha ri tA lI na kha'i ri mo/ /ral gri durbA rnams la'o/ /ha lA ha la'i tshangs pa'i sbrul/ /thu bo dang ni dug gi dbye/ /ha sti ma la sa bsrungs bu/ /ki ni ya ka zhes pa'o/ /a su tI ba la yi sgra//
238b7(mdo 'grel): mchod sbyin dang ni chad 'tshod la/ /durdanDa pA la zhes pa/ /nya dang sbrul gyi ra ba dbye dang/ /rgyal po'i rgyal po la yang ngo/ /e ka kuN+Da la zhes pa/ /kA lin+d+ri 'joms byed pa la/ /klu Ta pa ka la zhes pa/ /glang po'i 'khris pa'i rims dang ni/ /smin dang
239a1(mdo 'grel): dag par byed pa la/ /kri pI Ta pA la zhes pa/ /chu phrad pa dang rgya mtsho la/ /pany+tsa kam+ba la zhes pa/ /la ba dkar dang rdo'i khyad par/ /man+t+ra tsU rna la zhes pa/ /dbang byed rig sngags la 'dod de/ /mkha' 'gro ma yi don med sngags/ /shes dang
239a2(mdo 'grel): ku sha'i chu skad cig /su ra ta tA li zhes pa/ /pho nya mo yi mgo phreng dang/ /bag ma'i nyin mo dang 'brel ba'i/ /mgo bo'i me tog phreng la 'dod/ /zhes pa sna tshogs gsal ba zhes bya ba ming gzhan du mu tig phreng ba las/ la yig mdza' i sde rdzogs so// //
239a3(mdo 'grel): wa ni bum pa/ chu lha dang/ /nyin mo dang ni rang dbang la/ /bA ni rlung dang/ mda' dang mdung/ /bi ni bya dang nam mkha' la/ /swa ni/ shes dang/ bdag legs gcod/ /bdag gi ba yi nor la'o/ /a bi lug dang nyi ma ri/ /byi ba dang ni bal la'o/ /a
239a4(mdo 'grel): bI me tog ldan ma dang/ /rta dang lcags dang skyes bu'i dbye/ /a'ur+d+h+waM steng dang and+hya dang/ /ka NwaM sdig dang/ thub pa la/ /ka Nwa ngan pa ldan pa la/ /ka bi snyan dngag mkhan po dang/ /pa ba sangs dang grog mkhar dang/ /khyi dang snyan dags byed
239a5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /ki NwaM sdig pa rgyal po skyes/ /skya'o dang ni rnam gnon la/ /kharba thung ngu dang ni dri/ /grI ba/ mgrin pa/ 'gul pa la/ /ts+tsha bi bzang dang mdzes pa la/ /dza bA Dod+d+ha'i me tog shugs/ /dza ba shugs can la yang ngo/ /dzI ba tshig bdag shing gi
239a6(mdo 'grel): dbye/ /srog chags tsam la'an lta bar bya/ /dzI bA 'tsho bar byed pa la/ /mau rbI sa dang spyod pa dang/ /piny+dzi ta dang 'dod pa la/ /dzI bi 'tsho ba la yang ngo/ /ta twaM rang bzhin rtag pa'i dbye/ /mchog bdag la'o nga ba ni/ /nags dang nags tshal/ nags
239a7(mdo 'grel): rlung la/ /di baM mtho ris bar snang dang/ /'od 'gro/ gnam dang/ mkha' la'o/ /de ba/ rgyal po lha dang sprin/ /de baM dbang po la 'dod do/ /de bI rje btsun ma dang ni/ /gzi brjid can ma prik+ka dang/ /gar mar tshangs bas dbang bskur
239b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ /mi bdag po'i bud med la/ /dra ba/ bcud dang pra dA ba/ /rnam par zhu bar gyur pa la/ /dwa ndwaM log par spyod pa la/ /dwandwa zung dang 'thab dang gsang/ /d+ha ba bdag po shing dbye dang/ /khram pa dang ni mi la'o/ /d+h+rU ba cha shas 'jug pa dang//

239b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rtsa ba dang ni tha ma la/ /paM kwa yongs su 'dud pa dang/ /rnam par 'jig dang mngon phyogs la/ /pA rshwa mchan khung gzhi dang ni/ /'khor lo/ mdza' nye phyugs tshogs la/ /pri thwI sa gzhi sa dang ni/ /shing kun bu mo zer nag /prA d+hwaM 'ching dang 'graM

239b7(mdo 'grel): dang sbyin dang dga' byed dga' / /dpal 'bras dang ni bi ba li/ /bilwaM sna tshogs/ lhe grong khyer/ /bi shwaM/ sna tshogs/ thams cad dug /phye ma'i btung ba la yang ngo/ /sha ba ro dang btung ba la/ /shi bi/ gro ga mi bdag dbye/ /shi ba 'phrog byed/ rnal
240a1(mdo 'grel): 'byor dbye/ /lha dang phur bu phye ma dang/ /gu gul dang ni bad kar shing/ /si ba/ thar ba/ /sgo dang chu/ /dge ba'i shi bA/ dkar mo dang/ /dri ma med dang ka ke ru/ /dzhA TA ma lA laM dang ni/ /rnga mo dang ni shak+tu'i 'bras/ /sa twi? skye 'o/

240a5(mdo 'grel): ni dga' ston dang/ /'dod dang/ rab 'byams khro ba la/ /ud+d+ha ba ni dga' ston dang/ /bya ba 'jug zhang po mchod sbyin dang/ /ngag byed byed pa gsal ba dang/ /pags ba za ri nag po la'o/ /ki ta pa ni ngan pa dang/ /myos

240b1(mdo 'grel): la mngon par brjod/ /naMShpA pa ni nyi ma rlung/ /ka Dam+ba dga ra dang ni/ /rnam par rtog pa med pa dang/ /sim+bi kA ra dza mA ShA/ /nih+na pa ni ngan smras dang/ /mi mkhas pa dang yid brtan min/ /pany+tsa twaM ni lnga len dang/ /dngos po dang ni gter la'o/ /bal+la ba ni/ rgya chen
240b2(mdo 'grel): gyol/ /sgeg dang/ rgya skyags mtshon dag la/ /bIrtha bI ni g.yo ba dang/ /ki sha la dang yal 'dab ma/ /pIrtha ba ni ma thab dang/ /sa dag /sa yi rnam 'gyur la/ pud+ga ba ni khyu mchog dang/ /gtso skyes mchog sman bye brag /bra b+ha ba ni/ skye ba pa/ /chu yi

240b4(mdo 'grel): rten skyes/ /pra sa ba ni/ lcugs ma can/ /rdo rje'i shing dang syu ta'o/ /pe ra ba ni srin mo dang/ /ce spyang la'o bal+la pa/ /'joms pa dang ni ba lang skyong/ /'jigs sde la'o/ band+ha ba/ /gnyen dang mdza' bshes dag la'o/ /b+harga ba ni pa sangs dang/ /glang

240b7(mdo 'grel): bud med byed pa'i khyad par dang/ /sa 'og aaurba bram ze la/ /bi tra ba ni 'bros su 'jug /plo la'o de nas bi b+ha ba/ /nor dang mya gan 'das pa la/ /pi b+hA pa ni/ yongs bsags dang/ /'dod pa dang ni gsal byed dang/ /dgra rnams kyi dngos

241a2(mdo 'grel): dang 'bod/ /sam+b+ha pa ni 'byung ba dang/ /dran pa rgyu dang/ slong ba dang/ /'dus dang shin tu tha dad dang/ /rten dang brten pa dag la'o/ /su grA ba ni bdud kyi bdag/ mgrin pa mdzes pa rjod par byed/ /saind+da ba ni nor bu bsrub/ /rta dang/

241a7(mdo 'grel): garga rI dang/ zangs bum la/ /be la da bA char can dang/ /stobs lha stobs dang/ rlung dang ni/ /rta dmar dang ni 'phrog byed rta/ /mthil skyes dang ni rig byed la'o/ /shI ta shi ba brag spos lam/ /rgyam tshwa dang ni mi sI ma/ /sa he de ba stobs dang ni/ /utpal

241b7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /byi? 'tshed bag phye thug pa'i dbye/ /rA shi phung po lug dang skyon/ /mtshon cha dang ni dbang bral la'o/ /pa sha/ sgyu ma/ ta ta dang 'dod pa dang ni gtso bo la/ /pa shA/ yo Sha'i bu mo gsham/ /pa dang glang mo rnams la'o/ /bi sha rje rigs yid skyes dang/ /rab tu
242a1(mdo 'grel): tu 'jug la yang dag 'dod/ /be sha tshod khang 'jug pa dang/ /'jug bya'i khyim dang khang pa la/ /baM shing 'od ma rigs dang sre/ /rgyab kyi cha shas rus pa la/ /ba shu phyugs dang dri yi bcud/ /skyes bu'i khyad par lo d+h+ra la/ /parsha reg
242a2(mdo 'grel): byed sbyin pa dang/ /nad dang/ reg pa po la yang/ /g.yul dang smon lam la yang 'dod/ /A darsha ni me long dang/ /rgyas bshad so so'i glegs baM la/ /uDDI sha ni ri'i bu mo/ /mdzes dang gzhung gi khyad par la/ /u pAM shu ni skyes bye bag/ rtul dang/

242a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /ku li sha nya'i dbye ba dang/ /A li dang ni rdo rjer 'dod/ /go ri sha ni dbang phyug dang/ /tshig bdag dang ni ri yi bdag/ /tud+gI sha ni seng ge zla/ /du(mdo 'grel): dursha ni nad kyi gnas/ /tsher ma dang ni rag rtsub po/ /ni re sha ni mdza' nye dang/ /ston pa dang
